viśvāmitraḥ
ātmodantasamaṃ rāma varṇyamānam imaṃ mayā 
śṛṇu vyāsātmajodantaṃ janmanām antakāraṇam  MU
yo 'yam añjanavarṇābho niviṣṭo hemaviṣṭare 
pārśve tava pitur vyāso bhagavān bhāskaradyutiḥ  MU
asyābhūd induvadanas tanayo nayakovidaḥ 
śuko nāma mahāprājño yajño mūrtyeva saṃsthitaḥ  MU
pravicārayato lokayātrām alam imāṃ hṛdi 
taveva kila tasyāpi viveka udabhūd bhṛśam  MU
tenāsau svavivekena svayam eva mahāmate 
vicārya suciraṃ cāru yat satyaṃ tad avāptavān  MU
svayaṃ prāpte pare vastuny aviśrāntamanās tataḥ 
nedaṃ vastv iti viśvāsaṃ nāsāv ātmany upāyayau  MU
kevalaṃ virarāmāsya ceto vigatacāpalam 
bhogebhyo bhūribhaṅgebhyo dharādbhya iva cātakaḥ  MU
ekadā so 'malaprajño merāv ekāntasaṃsthitam 
papraccha pitaraṃ bhaktyā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ munim  MU
saṃsārāḍambaram idaṃ katham abhyutthitaṃ mune 
kathaṃ ca praśamaṃ yāti kiyat kasya kadeti ca  MU
iti pṛṣṭena muninā vyāsenākhilam ātmaje 
yathāvad amalaṃ proktaṃ vaktavyaṃ viditātmanā  MU
ajñāsiṣaṃ pūrvam etad aham ity atha tatpituḥ 
sa śukaś śuddhayā buddhyā na vākyaṃ bahv amanyata  MU
vyāso 'pi bhagavān buddhvā putrābhiprāyam īdṛśam 
pratyuvāca punaḥ putraṃ nāhaṃ jānāmi tattvataḥ  MU
janako nāma bhūpālo vidyate vasudhātale 
yathāvad vetty asau vedyaṃ tasmāt sarvam avāpsyasi  MU
pitrety uktaś śukaḥ prāyāt sumeror vasudhātalam 
videhanagarīṃ prāpa janakenābhipālitām  MU
āvedito 'sau yāṣṭīkair janakāya mahātmane 
dvāri vyāsasuto rājañ śuko 'tra sthitavān iti  MU
jijñāsārthaṃ śukasyāsāv āstām evety avajñayā 
uktvā babhūva janakas tūṣṇīṃ saptadināny api  MU
tataḥ praveśayām āsa janakaś śukam aṅganam 
tatrāhāni sa saptaiva tathaivāvasad unmanāḥ  MU
atha praveśayām āsa janako 'ntaḥpuraṃ śukam 
rājā na dṛśyate tāvad iti saptadināni tam  MU
tatronmadābhiḥ kāntābhir bhojanair bhogasañcayaiḥ 
janako lālayām āsa śukaṃ śaśisamānanam  MU
te bhogās tāni duḥkhāni vyāsaputrasya tan manaḥ 
na jahrur mandapavano baddhapīṭham yathācalam  MU
kevalaṃ saśamas svaccho maunī muditamānasaḥ 
atiṣṭhad atra sa śukas sampūrṇa iva candramāḥ  MU
parijñātasvabhāvaṃ taṃ śukaṃ sa janako nṛpaḥ 
ānīya muditātmānam avalokya nanāma ha  MU
niśśeṣitajagatkārya prāptākhilamanoratha 
kim īpsitaṃ tavety āśu kṛtasvāgatam āha tam  MU
śukaḥ
saṃsārāḍambaram idaṃ katham abhyutthitaṃ guro 
kathaṃ praśamam āyāti yathāvat kathayāśu me  MU
viśvāmitraḥ
janakeneti pṛṣṭena śukasya kathitaṃ tathā 
tad eva yat purā proktaṃ tasya pitrā mahātmanā  MU
śukaḥ
svayam eva mayā pūrvam etaj jñātaṃ vivekataḥ 
etāvad eva pṛṣṭena pitrā me samudāhṛtam  MU
bhavatāpy eṣa evārthaḥ kathito vāgvidāṃ vara 
eṣa eva ca vākyārthaś śāstreṣu paridṛśyate  MU
yathāyaṃ svavikalpotthas svavikalpaparikṣayāt 
kṣīyate dagdhasaṃsāro nissāra iti niścayaḥ  MU
tat kim etan mahābāho satyaṃ brūhi mamāmalam 
tvatto viśrāmam āpnoti ceto mā bhramatāj jagat  MU
janakaḥ
nātaḥ parataraḥ kaścin niścayo 'sty aparo mune 
svayam etat tvayā jñātaṃ gurutaś ca punaś śrutam  MU
avyucchinnaś cidātmaikaḥ pumān astīha netarat 
sa saṅkalpavaśād baddho nissaṅkalpaś ca mucyate  MU
yena tv etat sphuṭaṃ jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ 
bhogebhyo viratir jātā dṛśyād vā sakalād iha  MU
tava cālaṃ mahāvīra matir viratim āgatā 
bhogebhyo dīrgharogebhyaḥ kim anyat paripṛcchasi  MU
na tathā pūrṇatā jātā sarvajñānamahānidheḥ 
tiṣṭhatas tapasi sphāre pitus tava yathā tava  MU
vyāsād adhika evāhaṃ vyāsaśiṣyo 'pi tatsutaḥ 
bhogecchātānaveneha matto 'py abhyadhiko bhavān  MU
prāptaṃ prāptavyam akhilaṃ bhavatā pūrṇacetasā 
na dṛśye patasi brahman muktas tvaṃ bhrāntim utsṛja  MU
anuśiṣṭas sa ity evaṃ janakena mahātmanā 
viśaśrāma śukas tūṣṇīṃ svacche paramavastuni  MU
vītaśokabhayāyāso nirīhaś chinnasaṃśayaḥ 
jagāma śikharaṃ meros samādhyartham aninditam  MU
tatra varṣasahasrāṇi nirvikalpasamādhinā 
daśa sthitvā śaśāmāsāv ātmany asnehadīpavat  MU
vyapagatakalanākalaṅkaśuddhas svayam amalātmani pāvane pade 'sau 
salilakaṇa ivāmbudhau mahātmā vigalitabhedam athaikatāṃ jagāma  MU
śukanirvāṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
dvitīyas sargaḥ
viśvāmitraḥ
tasya vyāsatanūjasya matimātrāpamārjanam 
yathopayuktaṃ te rāma tāvad evopayujyate  MU
jñeyam etena vijñātam aśeṣeṇāvanīśvara 
svadante 'smai na yad bhogā rogā iva sumedhase  MU
jñātajñeyasya manaso nūnam etad dhi lakṣaṇam 
na svadante samagrāṇi bhogavṛndāni yat punaḥ  MU
bhogabhāvanayā yāti bandho dārḍhyam avastujaḥ 
tayaiva śāntayā yāti bandho jagati tānavam  MU
vāsanātānavaṃ rāma mokṣa ity ucyate budhaiḥ 
padārthavāsanādārḍhyaṃ bandha ity abhidhīyate  MU
ātmatattvābhigamanaṃ bhavati prāyaśo nṛṇām 
punar viṣayavairasyaṃ kadarthād upajāyate  MU
samyak paśyati yas tajjño jñātajñeyas tu paṇḍitaḥ 
na svadante balād eva tasmai bhogā mahātmane  MU
yaśaḥprabhṛtinā yasmai hetunaiva vinā punaḥ 
bhuvi bhogā na rocante sa jīvanmukta ucyate  MU
jñeyaṃ yāvan na vijñātaṃ tāvat tāta na jāyate 
viṣayeṣv aratir jantor marubhūmau latā yathā  MU
ata eva hi vijñātajñeyaṃ viddhi raghūdvaha 
yad enaṃ rañjayanty etā na ramyā bhogabhūmayaḥ  MU
rāmo yad etaj jānāti tad vastv ity eva sanmukhāt 
ākarṇya cittaviśrāmo rāghavasyopajāyate  MU
kevalaṃ kevalībhāvaviśrāntiṃ samapekṣate 
rāmabuddhiś śarallakṣmīr jalaviśramaṇaṃ yathā  MU
atrāsya cittaviśrāntyai rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 
yuktiṃ kathayatu śrīmān vasiṣṭho bhagavān ayam  MU
raghūṇām eṣa sarveṣāṃ prabhuḥ kulagurus sadā 
sarvajñas sarvadarśī ca trikālāmaladarśanaḥ  MU
vasiṣṭha bhagavan pūrvaṃ kaccit smarasi yat svayaṃ 
āvayor vairaśāntyarthaṃ śreyase ca mahātmanām  MU
niṣadhādrer munīnāṃ ca sānau saralasaṅkule 
upadiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā jñānaṃ padmabhuvā bahu  MU
yena yuktimatā brahmañ jñāneneyaṃ hi vāsanā 
saṃsārī nūnam āyāti śamaṃ śyāmeva bhāsvatā  MU
tad eva yuktimaj jñeyaṃ rāmāyāntenivāsine 
brahmann upadiśāśu tvaṃ yena viśrāntim eṣyati  MU
kadarthanā ca naivaiṣā rāmo hi gatakilbiṣaḥ 
nirmale makure vaktram ayatnenaiva bimbati  MU
taj jñānaṃ sa ca śāstrārthas tad vaidagdhyam akhaṇḍitam 
sacchiṣyāya viraktāya sādho yad upadiśyate  MU
aśiṣyāyāviraktāya yat kiñcid upadiśyate 
tat prayāty apavitratvaṃ gokṣīraṃ śvadṛtāv iva  MU
vītarāgabhayakrodhā nirmamā galitainasaḥ 
vadanti tvādṛśā yat tu tatra viśrāmyatīha dhīḥ  MU
ity ukte gādhiputreṇa vyāsanāradapūrvakāḥ 
munayas te tam evārthaṃ sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan  MU
athovāca mahātejā rājñaḥ pārśve vyavasthitaḥ 
brahmeva brahmaṇaḥ putro vasiṣṭho bhagavān muniḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
mune yad ādiśasi me tad avighnaṃ karomy aham 
kas samarthas samartho 'pi satāṃ laṅghayituṃ vacaḥ  MU
ahaṃ hi rājaputrāṇāṃ rāmādīnāṃ manastamaḥ 
jñānenāpanayāmy adya dīpeneva niśātamaḥ  MU
smarāmy akhaṇḍitaṃ sarvaṃ saṃsārabhramaśāntaye 
niṣadhādrau purā proktaṃ yaj jñānaṃ padmajanmanā  MU
vālmīkiḥ
iti nigaditavān asau mahātmā parikarabandhagṛhītavandyatejāḥ 
akathayad idam ajñatopaśāntyai paramapadaikavibodhanaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ  MU
viśvāmitravākyaṃ nāma sargaḥ
tṛtīyas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
pūrvam uktaṃ bhagavatā yaj jñānaṃ padmajanmanā 
sargādau lokaśāntyarthaṃ tad idaṃ kathayāmy aham  MU
rāmaḥ
kathayiṣyasi vistīrṇāṃ bhagavan mokṣasaṃhitāṃ 
imaṃ tāvat kṣaṇaṃ jātaṃ saṃśayaṃ me nivāraya  MU
pitā śukasya sarvajño gurur vyāso mahāmuniḥ 
videhamukto na kathaṃ kathaṃ muktas suto 'sya saḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
paramārkaprakāśāntas trijagattrasareṇavaḥ 
utpatyotpatya līnā ye na saṅkhyām upayānti te  MU
vartamāne ca yās santi trailokyagaṇakoṭayaḥ 
śakyante naiva saṅkhyātuṃ tāś ca kāścana kenacit  MU
bhaviṣyanti parāmbhodhau jagatsargataraṅgakāḥ 
ye tāṃś ca parisaṅkhyātuṃ saṅkathaiva na vidyate  MU
rāmaḥ
yā bhūtā yā bhaviṣyantyo jagatsargaparamparāḥ 
tāsāṃ vicāraṇaṃ yuktaṃ vartamānāsu kā kathā  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
tiryakpuruṣadevāder yo yo rāma vinaśyati 
tasminn eva pradeśe 'sau tadaivedaṃ prapaśyati  MU
ātivāhikanāmnāntas svahṛdy eva jagattrayam 
vyomni cittaśarīreṇa vyomātmānubhavaty ajaḥ  MU
evaṃ mṛtā mriyante ca mariṣyanti ca koṭayaḥ 
bhūtānāṃ yā jaganty āsām uditāni pṛthak pṛthak  MU
durvātabhūkampa iva piśācatrastabālavat 
muktālīvāmale vyomni nauspandataruyānavat  MU
svapnasaṃvittipuravat smṛtijātakhavṛkṣavat 
jagatsaṃsaraṇaṃ svāntar mṛto 'nubhavati svayam  MU
tatrātipariṇāmena tad eva ghanatāṃ gatam 
iha loko 'yam ity eva jīvākāśe vijṛmbhate  MU
punas tatraiva janmehāmaraṇādyanubhūtimān 
paralokaṃ kalpayati mṛtas tatra tathā punaḥ  MU
tadantar anye puruṣās teṣām antas tathā pare 
saṃsārā iti bhāntīme kadalīdalapīṭhavat  MU
na pṛthvyādimahābhūtagaṇā na ca jagatkramāḥ 
mṛtānāṃ santi tatrāpi tathāpy eṣāṃ jagadbhramāḥ  MU
avidyaivam ananteyaṃ nānāprasavaśālinī 
jaḍānāṃ sarid ādīrghā jagatsargataraṅgiṇī  MU
paramārthāmbudhau sphāre rāma sargataraṅgakāḥ 
bhūyo bhūyo vivartante ta evānye ca bhūriśaḥ  MU
sarvatas sadṛśāḥ kecit kulakramamanoguṇaiḥ 
kecid ardhena sadṛśāḥ kecic cātivilakṣaṇāḥ  MU
imaṃ vyāsamuniṃ tatra dvātriṃśaṃ saṃsmarāmy aham 
yathāsambhavayā jñānadṛśā darśasamānayā  MU
dvādaśānyadhiyas tatra kulākārehitais samāḥ 
daśa sarvasamākārāś śiṣṭāḥ kulavilakṣaṇāḥ  MU
adyāpy anye bhaviṣyanti vyāsavālmīkayas tathā 
bhṛgvaṅgiraḥpulastyāś ca tathaivāthānya eva ca  MU
nānāsurarṣidevānāṃ gaṇās sambhūya bhūriśaḥ 
utpadyante vilīyante kadācic ca pṛthak pṛthak  MU
brahmadvāsaptates tretā āsīd asti bhaviṣyati 
sa evānyaś ca lokaś ca tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti vedmy aham  MU
krameṇāsya muner itthaṃ vyāsasyādbhutakarmaṇaḥ 
saṃlakṣyate 'vatāro 'yaṃ daśamo dīrghadarśinaḥ  MU
abhūma vyāsavālmīkiyuktā vayam anekaśaḥ 
abhūma vayam eveme nānākārās samāśayāḥ  MU
bhāvyam adyāpy aneneha nanu vārāṣṭakaṃ punaḥ 
bhūyo 'pi bhārataṃ nāma svetihāsaṃ kariṣyati  MU
kṛtvā vedavibhāgaṃ ca nītvānena kulaṃ prathām 
brahmatvaṃ ca tato gatvā bhāvyaṃ vaidehamokṣiṇā  MU
vītaśokabhayaś śānto nirvāṇo gatakalpanaḥ 
jīvanmukto jitamanā vyāso 'yam iti varṇitaḥ  MU
vittabandhuvayaḥkarmavidyāvijñānaceṣṭitaiḥ 
samāni santi bhūtāni sarge sarge punaḥ punaḥ  MU
kvacit sargaśatais tāni bhavanti na bhavanti vā 
kadācid api māyeyam ittham antavivarjitā  MU
gacchatīyaṃ viparyāsaṃ bhūribhūtaparamparā 
bījarāśir ivājasram upyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ  MU
tenaiva sanniveśena tathānyena punaḥ punaḥ 
sargākārāḥ pravartante taraṅgāḥ kālavāridheḥ  MU
āśvastāntaḥkaraṇaḥ kṣīṇavikalpas svarūpasāramayaḥ 
paramaśamāmṛtatṛptas tiṣṭhati vidvān nirāvaraṇaḥ  MU
bhūyo bhūyas sargānubhavanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
caturthas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
saumyāmbutve taraṅgatve salilasyāmbutā yathā 
samaivābdhau tathādehasadehatvavimuktatā  MU
rāmaḥ
sadehā vāstv adehā vā muktatā viṣayena vaḥ 
anāsvāditabhojyasya kuto bhojyānubhūtayaḥ  MU
jīvanmuktaṃ muniśreṣṭha kevalaṃ hi padārthavat 
paśyāmaḥ purato nāsya punar vidmo 'ntarāśayam  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
sadehādehamuktānāṃ bhedaḥ ko 'bhedarūpiṇām 
yad evāmbu taraṅgatve saumyatve 'pi tad eva tat  MU
na manāg api bhedo 'sti sadehādehamuktayoḥ 
saspando 'stv atha vāspando vāyur eva kilānilaḥ  MU
sadehā vā videhā vā muktatā na pramāspadam 
asmākam asyās tu yadā svaikatāsty avibhāginī  MU
tasmāt prakṛtam evedaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam 
mayopadiśyamānaṃ tvaṃ jñānam ajñāndhyanāśanam  MU
sarvam eveha hi sadā saṃsāre raghunandana 
samyakprayuktāt sarveṇa pauruṣāt samavāpyate  MU
iha hīndor ivodeti śītalāhlādanaṃ hṛdi 
parispandaphalaprāptau pauruṣād eva nānyataḥ  MU
pauruṣaspandaphalavad dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣato na yat 
kalpitaṃ mohibhir mandair daivaṃ kiñcin na vidyate  MU
sādhūpadeśaśāstreṇa yan mano'ṅgaviceṣṭitam 
tat pauruṣaṃ tat saphalam anyad unmattaceṣṭitam  MU
yo yam arthaṃ kāmayate tad arthaṃ cehate kramāt 
avaśyaṃ tam avāpnoti na ced ardhān nivartate  MU
pauruṣeṇa prayatnena trailokyaiśvaryasundarīm 
kaścit prāṇiviśeṣo hi śakratāṃ samupāgataḥ  MU
pauruṣeṇa prayatnena sahasāmbhoruhāspadām 
kaścid eva cidullāso brahmatām adhigacchati  MU
sāreṇa puruṣārthena svenaiva garuḍadhvajām 
kaścid eva pumān eṣa puruṣottamatāṃ gataḥ  MU
pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena lalanāvalanākṛtim 
śarīrī kaścid eveha gataś candrārdhacūḍatām  MU
prāktanaṃ caihikaṃ ceti dvividhaṃ viddhi pauruṣam 
prāktano 'dyatanenāśu puruṣārthena jīyate  MU
yatnavadbhir dṛḍhābhyāsaiḥ prajñotsāhasamanvitaiḥ 
meravo 'pi nigīryante kaiva prākpauruṣe kathā  MU
śāstraniyantritapauruṣaparamā puruṣasya puruṣatā yā syāt 
abhimataphalabharasiddhyai bhavati hi sānyā tv anarthāya  MU
kasyāñcit svayam ātmadussthitivaśāt puṃso daśāyāṃ śanair aṅgulyagranipīḍitaikaculukād
ācāmabindur bahuḥ 
kasyāñcij jalarāśiparvatapuradvīpāntarālaṅkṛtā kartavyocitasaṃvibhāgakaraṇe pṛthvī
na pṛthvī bhavet  MU
pauruṣopakramaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
pañcamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
pravṛttir evaṃ prathamaṃ yathāśāstraṃ vihāriṇām 
prabheva varṇabhedānāṃ sādhanī sarvakarmaṇām  MU
manasā vāñchyate yat tu yathāśāstraṃ na karmaṇā 
sādhyate mattalīlāsau mohanī nārthasādhanī  MU
yathā sañcetyate yena tathā tenānubhūyate 
svakarmaiveti vāstv anyā vyatiriktā na daivadṛk  MU
ucchāstraṃ śāstritaṃ ceti pauruṣaṃ dvividhaṃ smṛtam 
tatrocchāstram anarthāya paramārthāya śāstritam  MU
dvau huḍāv iva yudhyete puruṣārthau samāsamau 
ātmīyaś cānyadīyaś ca jayaty atibalas tayoḥ  MU
anarthaḥ prāpyate yatra śāstritād api pauruṣāt 
anarthakartur balavat tatra jñeyaṃ svapauruṣam  MU
paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya dantair dantān vicūrṇayan 
śubhenāśubham udyuktaḥ prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ jayet  MU
prāktanaḥ puruṣārtho 'sau māṃ niyojayatīti dhīḥ 
balād adhaspadīkāryā pratyakṣād adhikā na sā  MU
tāvat tāvat prayatnena yatitavyaṃ svapauruṣam 
prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ yāvad aśubhaṃ śāmyati svayam  MU
doṣaś śāmyaty asandehaṃ prāktano 'dyatanair guṇaiḥ 
dṛṣṭānto 'tra hyastanasya doṣasyādyaguṇaiḥ kṣayaḥ  MU
asaddaivam adhaḥ kṛtvā nityam udyuktayā dhiyā 
saṃsārottaraṇaṃ bhūtyai yatetādhātum ātmani  MU
na gantavyam anudyogais sāmyaṃ puruṣagardabhaiḥ 
udyogas tu yathāśāstraṃ lokadvitayasiddhaye  MU
saṃsārakuharād asmān nirgantavyaṃ svayaṃ balāt 
pauruṣaṃ yatnam āśritya hariṇevāripañjarāt  MU
pratyahaṃ pratyavekṣeta naraś caritam ātmanaḥ 
santyajet paśubhis tulyaṃ śrayet satpuruṣocitam  MU
kiñcit kāntānnapānādikalilaṃ komalaṃ gṛhe 
vraṇe kīṭa ivāsvādya vayaḥ kāryaṃ na bhasmasāt  MU
śubhena pauruṣeṇāśu śubham āsādyate phalam 
aśubhenāśubhaṃ nityaṃ daivaṃ nāma na kiñcana  MU
pratyakṣadṛṣṭam utsṛjya yo 'numānamanās tv asau 
svabhujābhyām imau sarpāv iti prekṣya palāyatām  MU
daivaṃ samprerayati mām iti mugdhadhiyāṃ mukham 
adṛṣṭaśreṣṭhadṛṣṭīnāṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmīr nivartate  MU
tasmāt puruṣayatnena vivekaṃ pūrṇam āśrayet 
ātmajñānamayārthāni śāstrāṇi pravicārayet  MU
citte cintayatām arthaṃ yathāśāstraṃ nijehitaiḥ 
asaṃsādhayatām eva mūḍhānāṃ dhig durīpsitam  MU
pauruṣaṃ ca na cānantaṃ na yan nāmābhivāñchyate 
na yatnenāpi mahatā tailam āsādyate 'śmanaḥ  MU
yathā ghaṭaḥ parimito yathā parimitaḥ paṭaḥ 
niyataḥ parimāṇasthaḥ puruṣārthas tathaiva vaḥ  MU
sa ca śāstrārthasatsaṅgasamācārair nijaṃ phalam 
dadātīti svabhāvo 'yam anyathānarthasiddhaye  MU
svarūpaṃ pauruṣasyaitad evaṃ vyavaharan naraḥ 
yāti niṣphalayatnatvaṃ na kadācana kaścana  MU
dainyadāridryaduḥkhārtā apy anye puruṣottamāḥ 
pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena yātā devendratulyatām  MU
ā bālyāc caivam abhyastaiś śāstrasatsaṅgamādibhiḥ 
guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo 'rthas samprāpyate hi taiḥ  MU
iti pratyakṣato dṛṣṭam anubhūtaṃ śrutaṃ kṛtam 
daivottham iti manyante ye hatās te kubuddhayaḥ  MU
ālasyaṃ yadi na bhavej jagaty anarthaḥ ko na syād bahudhaniko bahuśruto vā 
ālasyād iyam avanis sasāgarāntā sampūrṇā narapaśubhiś ca nirdhanaiś ca  MU
bālye gate 'viratakalpitakelilole paugaṇḍamaṇḍanavayaḥprabhṛti prayatnāt 
satsaṅgamaiḥ padapadārthavibuddhabuddhiḥ kuryān naras svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇāni  MU
vālmīkiḥ
ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma 
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma  MU
pauruṣasthāpanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
ṣaṣṭhas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
tasmāt prākpauruṣaṃ daivaṃ nānyat tat projjhya dūrataḥ 
sādhusaṅgamasacchāstrair jīvam uttārayed balāt  MU
yathā yathā prayatnas syād bhaved āśu phalaṃ tathā 
iti pauruṣam evāsti daivam astu tad eva vaḥ  MU
duḥkhād yathā duḥkhakāle hā kaṣṭam iti kathyate 
hākaṣṭaśabdaparyāyas tathā hā daivam ity api  MU
prāksvakarmetarākāraṃ daivaṃ nāma na vidyate 
bālaḥ prabalapuṃseva taj jetum iha śakyate  MU
hyastano duṣṭa ācāra ācāreṇādya cāruṇā 
yathāśu śubhatāṃ yāti prāktanaṃ kukṛtaṃ tathā  MU
tajjayāya yatante ye na lābhalavalampaṭāḥ 
te mūḍhāḥ prākṛtā dīnās sthitā daivaparāyaṇāḥ  MU
pauruṣeṇa kṛtaṃ karma daivād yad abhinaśyati 
tatra nāśayitur jñeyaṃ pauruṣaṃ balavattaram  MU
yad ekavṛntaphalayor apy ekaṃ śūnyakoṭaram 
tatra prayatnas sphuritas tathā tadrasasaṃvidaḥ  MU
yat prayānti jagadbhāvās saṃsiddhā api saṅkṣayam 
kṣayakārakayatnasya tatra jñeyaṃ mahad balam  MU
bhikṣuko maṅgalebhena nṛpo yat kriyate balāt 
tad amātyebhapaurāṇāṃ prayatnasya mahat phalam  MU
pauruṣeṇānnam ākramya yathā dantair vicūrṇyate 
alpaṃ pauruṣam ākramya tathā śūreṇa cūrṇyate  MU
anubhūtaṃ hi mahatāṃ lāghavaṃ yatnaśālinām 
yatheṣṭaṃ viniyujyante te taiḥ karmasu loṣṭavat  MU
śaktasya pauruṣaṃ dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ vāpi yad bhavet 
tad daivam ity aśaktena buddham ātmany abuddhinā  MU
bhūtānāṃ balavadbhūtayatno daivam iti sthitam 
tasthuṣām apy adhiṣṭhātṛvatām etat sphuṭaṃ mithaḥ  MU
śāstrāmātyebhapaurāṇām avikalpyā svabhāvadhīḥ 
sā yā bhikṣukarājyasya kartrī dhartrī prajāsthiteḥ  MU
aihikaḥ prāktanaṃ hanti prāktano 'dyatanaṃ balāt 
sarvadā puruṣaspandas tatrānudvegavāñ jayī  MU
dvayor adyatanasyaiva pratyakṣād balitā bhavet 
daivaṃ jetum ato yatnair bālo yūneva śakyate  MU
meghena nīyate yad vā vatsaropārjitā kṛṣiḥ 
meghasya puruṣārtho 'sau jayaty adhikayatnavān  MU
krameṇopārjite 'py arthe naṣṭe kāryā na kheditā 
na balaṃ yatra me śaktaṃ tatra kā paridevanā  MU
yan na śaknomi tasyārthe yadi duḥkhaṃ karomy aham 
tad amānitamṛtyor me yuktaṃ pratyaharodanam  MU
deśakālakriyādravyavaśato visphuranty amī 
sarva eva jagadbhāvā jayaty adhikayatnavān  MU
tasmāt pauruṣam āśritya sacchāstrais satsamāgamaiḥ 
prajñām amalatāṃ nītvā saṃsārāmbunidhiṃ tara  MU
prāktanaś caihikaś cemau puruṣārthau phaladrumau 
aihikaḥ puruṣārthaś ca jayaty abhyadhikas tayoḥ  MU
karma yaḥ prāktanaṃ tucchaṃ na nihanti śubhehitaiḥ 
ajño jantur anīśo 'sau vāṅmanassukhaduḥkhayoḥ  MU
yas tūdāracamatkāras sadācāravihāravān 
sa niryāti jaganmohān mṛgendraḥ pañjarād iva  MU
kaścin māṃ prerayaty evam ity anarthakukalpane 
yas sthito dṛṣṭam utsṛjya tyājyo 'sau dūrato 'dhamaḥ  MU
vyavahārasahasrāṇi yāny upāyānti yānti ca 
yathāśāstraṃ vihartavyaṃ teṣu tyaktvā sukhāsukhe  MU
yathāśāstram anucchinnāṃ maryādāṃ svām anujjhataḥ 
upatiṣṭhanti sarvāṇi ratnāny ambunidher iva  MU
svārthaprāpakakāryaikaprayatnaparatā budhaiḥ 
proktā pauruṣaśabdena sā siddhyai śāstrayantritā  MU
kriyāyās spandadharmiṇyās svārthasādhakatā svayam 
sādhusaṅgamasacchāstratīkṣṇayābhyūhyate dhiyā  MU
anantaṃ samatānandaṃ paramārthaṃ vidur budhāḥ 
sa yebhyaḥ prāpyate 'tyantaṃ te sevyāś śāstrasādhavaḥ  MU
prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ tac ced daivaśabdena kathyate 
tad yuktam etad etasmin nāmni nāpavadāmahe  MU
mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivam anyad yais te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ 
nityaṃ svapauruṣād eva lokadvayahitaṃ bhavet  MU
hyastanī duṣkriyābhyeti śobhāṃ satkriyayā yathā 
adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava  MU
karāmalakavad dṛṣṭaṃ pauruṣād eva yat phalam 
mūḍhaḥ pratyakṣam utsṛjya daivamohe nimajjati  MU
sakalakāraṇakāryavivarjitaṃ nijavikalpabalād upakalpitam 
tad anapekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam ātmanaḥ  MU
śāstrais sadācaritajṛṃbhitadeśadharmair yat kalpitaṃ phalam atīva ciraprarūḍham 
tasmin hṛdi sphurati no 'param eti cittam aṅgāvalī tadanu pauruṣam etad āhuḥ  MU
buddhvaiva pauruṣaphalaṃ puruṣatvam etad ātmaprayatnaparataiva sadaiva kāryā 
neyā tatas saphalatāṃ paramām athāsau sacchāstrasādhujanapaṇḍitasevanena  MU
daivapauruṣavicāracārubhiś cetasā caritam ātmapauruṣam 
nityam eva jayatīti bhāvitaiḥ kārya āryajanasevanodyamaḥ  MU
janmaprabandhamayam āmayam eṣa jīvo buddhvaihikaṃ sahajapauruṣam eva siddhyai 
śāntiṃ nayatv avitathena varauṣadhena pṛṣṭena tuṣṭiparapaṇḍitasevanena  MU
daivanirākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
saptamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
prāpya vyādhivinirmuktaṃ deham alpādhivedhitam 
tathātmānaṃ samādadhyād yathā bhūyo na jāyate  MU
daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa yo 'tivartitum icchati 
iha cāmutra ca jayet sa sampūrṇābhivāñchitam  MU
ye samudyogam utsṛjya sthitā daivaparāyaṇāḥ 
te dharmam arthakāmau ca nāśayanty ātmavidviṣaḥ  MU
saṃvitspando manasspanda indriyaspanda eva ca 
etāni puruṣārthasya rūpāṇy ebhyaḥ phalodayaḥ  MU
yathā saṃvedanaṃ cetas tathāntasspandam ṛcchati 
tathaiva kāyaś calati tathaiva phalabhoktṛtā  MU
ābālyam etat saṃsiddhaṃ yatra tatra yathā tathā 
daivaṃ tu na kvacid dṛṣṭam ato jayati pauruṣam  MU
puruṣārthena deveśagurur eṣa bṛhaspatiḥ 
śukro daityendragurutāṃ puruṣārthena cāsthitaḥ  MU
dainyadāridryaduḥkhārtā api sādho narottamāḥ 
pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena yātā devendratulyatām  MU
mahānto vibhavāḍhyā ye nānāścaryasamāśrayāḥ 
pauruṣeṇaiva doṣeṇa narakātithitāṃ gatāḥ  MU
bhāvābhāvasahasreṣu daśāsu vividhāsu ca 
svapauruṣavaśād eva vivṛttā bhūtajātayaḥ  MU
śāstrato gurutaś caiva svataś ceti trisiddhatā 
sarvatra puruṣārthasya na daivasya kadācana  MU
aśubheṣu samāviṣṭaṃ śubheṣv evāvatārayet 
yatnena cittam ity āśu sarvaśāstrārthasaṅgrahaḥ  MU
yac chreyo yad atucchaṃ ca yad apāyavivarjitam 
tat tad ācara yatnena putreti guravas sthitāḥ  MU
yathā yathā prayatno me phalam āśu tathā tathā 
ity ahaṃ pauruṣād eva phalabhāṅ na tu daivataḥ  MU
pauruṣād dṛśyate siddhiḥ pauruṣo dhīmatāṃ kramaḥ 
daivam āśvāsanāmātraṃ duḥkhe pelavabuddhiṣu  MU
pratyakṣapramukhān nityaṃ pramāṇāt pauruṣaḥ kramaḥ 
phalato dṛśyate loke deśāntaragamādikaḥ  MU
bhoktā tṛpyati nābhoktā gantā gacchati nāgatiḥ 
vaktā vakti na cāvaktā pauruṣaṃ saphalaṃ nṛṇām  MU
pauruṣeṇa durantebhyas saṅkaṭebhyas subuddhayaḥ 
samuttaranty ayatnena na tu mūkatayānayā  MU
yo yo yathā prayatate sa sa tadvat phalaikabhāk 
na tu tūṣṇīṃ sthiteneha kenacit prāpyate phalam  MU
śubhena puruṣārthena śubham āsādyate phalam 
aśubhenāśubhaṃ rāma yathecchasi tathā kuru  MU
puruṣārthaphalaprāptir deśakālavaśād iha 
prāptā cireṇa śīghraṃ vā yāsau daivam iti smṛtā  MU
na daivaṃ dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā na ca lokāntare sthitam 
uktaṃ daivābhidhānena svaṃ loke karmaṇaḥ phalam  MU
puruṣo jāyate loke vardhate kṣīyate punaḥ 
na tatra dṛśyate daivaṃ jarāyauvanabālyavān  MU
deśād deśāntaraprāptir hastasthadravyadhāraṇam 
vyāpāraś ca tathāṅgānāṃ pauruṣeṇa na daivataḥ  MU
arthaprāpakakāryaikaprayatnaparatā budhaiḥ 
proktā pauruṣaśabdena sarvam āsādyate 'nayā  MU
anarthaprāptikāryaikaprayatnaparatā tu yā 
soktā pronmattaceṣṭeti na kiñcit prāpyate 'nayā  MU
kriyāyās spandadharmiṇyās svārthasādhakatā svayam 
sādhusaṅgamasacchāstratīkṣṇayonnīyate dhiyā  MU
anantaṃ samatānandaṃ paramārthaṃ svakaṃ viduḥ 
tad yebhyaḥ prāpyate yatnāt te sevyāś śāstrasādhavaḥ  MU
sacchāstrādiguṇo matyā sacchāstrādiguṇān matiḥ 
vardhete te mitho 'bhyāsāt sarobdāv iva kālataḥ  MU
ā bālyād alam abhyastaiś śāstrasatsaṅgamādibhiḥ 
guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo 'rthas samprāpyate hitaḥ  MU
pauruṣeṇa jitā daityās sthāpitā bhuvanakriyāḥ 
racitāni jagantīha viṣṇunā na tu daivataḥ  MU
jagati puruṣakārakāraṇe 'smin kuru raghunātha ciraṃ tathā prayatnam 
vrajasi tarusarīsṛpābhidhānāṃ subhaga yathā na daśām aśaṅka eva  MU
pauruṣapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
aṣṭamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
nākṛtir na ca karmāṇi nāspadaṃ na parākramaḥ 
tan mithyājñānavat prauḍhaṃ daivaṃ nāma kim ucyate  MU
svakarmaphalasamprāptāv idam ittham itīva yāḥ 
giras tā daivanāmnaitāḥ prasiddhiṃ samupāgatāḥ  MU
tathaiva mūḍhamatibhir daivam astīti niścayaḥ 
ātto duravabodhena rajjāv iva bhujaṅgamaḥ  MU
hyastanī duṣkriyābhyeti śobhāṃ satkriyayā yathā 
adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava  MU
mūḍhānumānasaṃsiddhaṃ daivaṃ yasyāsti durmateḥ 
daivād dāho 'stu mā veti vaktavyaṃ tena pāvake  MU
daivam eveha cet karma puṃsaḥ kim iva ceṣṭayā 
snānadānāśanācāraṃ daivam eva kariṣyati  MU
kiṃ vā śāstropadeśena mūko 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ kila 
sañcāryate tu daivena kiṃ kasyehopadiśyate  MU
na ca nisspandatā loke dṛṣṭeha śavatāṃ vinā 
spandāś ca phalasamprāptis tasmād daivaṃ nirarthakam  MU
na cāmūrtena daivena mūrtasya sahakartṛtā 
hastādīn īhataś caiva na daivena kvacit kṛtam  MU
manobuddhivad apy etad daivaṃ nehānubhūyate 
āgopālaṃ kila prājñais tena daivam asat sadā  MU
buddheś cet pṛthag anyo 'rthas saiva cet kānyatā tayoḥ 
kalpanā vā pramāṇaṃ cet pauruṣaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate  MU
nāmūrtes tena saṅgo 'sti nabhaseva vapuṣmataḥ 
mūrtaṃ ca dṛśyate lagnaṃ tasmād daivaṃ na vidyate  MU
viniyoktātha bhūtānām asty anyas taj jagattraye 
śeratāṃ bhūtavṛndāni daivaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyati  MU
daivenetthaṃ niyukto 'smi kiṃ karomīdṛśaṃ sthitam 
samāśvāsanavāg eṣā na daivaṃ paramārthataḥ  MU
mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivaṃ tatparās te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ 
prājñās tu puruṣārthena padam uttamam āgatāḥ  MU
ye śūrā ye ca vikrāntā ye prājñā ye ca paṇḍitāḥ 
tais taiḥ kair iva loke 'smin vada daivaṃ pracakṣyate  MU
kālavidbhir vinirṇītā yasyāsti cirajīvitā 
sa cej jīvati sañchinnaśirās tad daivam uttamam  MU
kālavidbhir vinirṇītaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ yasya rāghava 
anadhyāpita evāsau tajjñaś ced daivam uttamam  MU
viśvāmitreṇa muninā daivam utsṛjya dūrataḥ 
pauruṣeṇaiva samprāptaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ rāma nānyathā  MU
amībhir aparai rāma puruṣair munitāṃ gataiḥ 
pauruṣeṇaiva samprāptā ciraṃ gaganagāmitā  MU
utsādya devasaṅghātāṃś cakrus tribhuvanodare 
pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena sāmrājyaṃ dānaveśvarāḥ  MU
ālūnaśīrṇam ābhogi jagad ājahrur ojasā 
pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena dānavebhyas sureśvarāḥ  MU
rāma pauruṣayuktyaiva salilaṃ dhāryate na vā 
ciraṃ karaṇḍake yuktyā na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam  MU
haraṇādānasaṃrambhavibhramabhramabhūmiṣu 
śaktatā dṛśyate rāma na daivasyauṣadher iva  MU
sakalakāraṇakāryavivarjitaṃ nijavikalpavaśād upakalpitam 
tvam anavekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam uttamam  MU
daivanirākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
navamas sargaḥ
rāmaḥ
bhagavan sarvadharmajña pratiṣṭhām alam āgatam 
yal loke tad vada brahman daivam evaṃ kim ucyate  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
pauruṣaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ kartṛ rāghava netarat 
phalabhoktṛ ca sarvatra na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam  MU
daivaṃ na kiñcit kurute na ca bhuṅkte na vidyate 
na dṛśyate nādriyate kevalaṃ kalpanedṛśī  MU
siddhasya pauruṣeṇeha phalasya phalaśālinām 
śubhāśubhā vā sampattir daivaśabdena kathyate  MU
pauruṣopanatā nityam iṣṭāniṣṭasya vastunaḥ 
prāptir iṣṭāpy aniṣṭā vā daivaśabdena kathyate  MU
bhāvī tv avaśyam evārthaḥ puruṣārthaikasādhanaḥ 
yas so 'smiṃl lokasaṅghāte daivaśabdena kathyate  MU
na tu rāghava lokasya kasyacit kiñcid eva hi 
daivam ākāśakalpaṃ hi karoti na karoti vā  MU
puruṣārthasya siddhasya śubhāśubhaphalodaye 
idam itthaṃ sthitir iti yoktis tad daivam ucyate  MU
itthaṃ mamābhavad buddhir itthaṃ me niścayo hy abhūt 
iti karmaphalāvāptir yoktis tad daivam ucyate  MU
iṣṭāniṣṭaphalāvāptāv evam ityarthavācakam 
āśvāsanāmātravaco daivam ity eva kathyate  MU
rāmaḥ
bhagavan sarvadharmajña prāg yat karmopasañcitam 
tad etad daivam ity uktam apamṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tvayā  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
sādhu rāghava jānāsi śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te 'khilam 
daivaṃ nāstīti te yena sthirā buddhir bhaviṣyati  MU
yā magnā vāsanā pūrvaṃ babhūva kila bhūriśaḥ 
saiveyaṃ karmabhāvena nṝṇāṃ pariṇatiṃ gatā  MU
jantur yadvāsano nāma tatkarmā bhavati kṣaṇāt 
anyakarmānyabhāvaś cety etan naivopapadyate  MU
grāmago grāmam āpnoti pattanārthī ca pattanam 
yo yo yadvāsanas tat tat sa sa prayatate tathā  MU
yad eva tīvrasaṃvegād iha karma kṛtaṃ purā 
tad eva daivaśabdena paryāyeṇa hi kathyate  MU
evaṃ daivaṃ svakarmāṇi karma prauḍhā svavāsanā 
vāsanā manaso nānyā mano hi puruṣas smṛtaḥ  MU
yad daivaṃ tāni karmāṇi karma sādho mano hi tat 
mano hi puruṣas tasmād daivaṃ nāstīti niścayaḥ  MU
ekam eva mano jantor yathā prayatate hi yat 
nūnaṃ tat tad avāpnoti svata eva na daivataḥ  MU
manaś cittaṃ vāsanā ca karma daivaṃ svaniścayaḥ 
rāma puṃniścayasyaitās sañjñās sadbhir udāhṛtāḥ  MU
evaṃnāmā hi puruṣo dṛḍhabhāvanayā yathā 
nityaṃ prayatate rāma phalam āpnoty alaṃ tathā  MU
evaṃ puruṣakāreṇa sarvam eva raghūdvaha 
prāpyate netareṇeha tasmāt sa śubhado 'stu te  MU
rāmaḥ
prāktanaṃ vāsanājālaṃ niyojayati māṃ yathā 
mune tathaiva tiṣṭhāmi kṛpaṇaḥ kiṃ karomy aham  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
ata eva hi he rāma śreyaḥ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam 
svaprayatnopanītena pauruṣeṇaiva nānyathā  MU
dvividho vāsanāvyūhaś śubhaś caivāśubhaś ca te 
prāktano vidyate rāma dvayor ekataro 'tha vā  MU
vāsanaughena śuddhena tatra ced adya nīyase 
tat krameṇa śubhenaiva padaṃ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam  MU
atha ced aśubho bhāvas tvāṃ yojayati saṅkaṭe 
prāktanas tad asau yatnāj jetavyo bhavatā balāt  MU
prājña cetanamātraṃ tvaṃ na dehas tvaṃ jaḍātmakaḥ 
tad eva cetasy anyena cet tat tvaṃ kveva vidyase  MU
anyas tvāṃ cetayati cet tat tvayy asati ko 'paraḥ 
kam imaṃ cetayet tasmād anavasthā na vāstavī  MU
śubhāśubhābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ vahantī vāsanāsarit 
pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yojanīyā śubhe pathi  MU
aśubheṣu samāviṣṭaṃ śubheṣv evāvatārayet 
svamanaḥ puruṣārthena balena balināṃ vara  MU
aśubhāc calitaṃ yāti śubhaṃ tasmād apītarat 
jantoś cittaṃ tu paśuvat tasmāt tat pālayet sadā  MU
samatāsāntvanenāśu na drāgiti śanaiś śanaiḥ 
pauruṣeṇa prayatnena pālayec cittabālakam  MU
vāsanaughas tvayā pūrvam abhyāsena ghanīkṛtaḥ 
śubho vāpy aśubho rāma śubham adya ghanīkuru  MU
prāgabhyāsavaśād yātā yadā te vāsanodayam 
tadābhyāsasya sāphalyaṃ viddhi tvam arimardana  MU
idānīm api te yāti ghanatāṃ vāsanānagha 
abhyāsavaśatas tasmāc chubhābhyāsam upāhara  MU
pūrvaṃ ced ghanatāṃ yātā nābhyāsāt tava vāsanā 
vardhiṣyate tu nedānīm api tāta sukhī bhava  MU
sandigdhāyām api bhṛśaṃ śubham eva samāhara 
asyāṃ tu vāsanāvṛddhau śubhād doṣo na kaścana  MU
yad yad abhyasyate loke tanmayenaiva bhūyate 
ity ākumāraṃ prājñeṣu dṛṣṭaṃ sandehavarjitam  MU
śubhavāsanayā yuktas tad atra bhava bhūtaye 
paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya vijityendriyapañcakam  MU
avyutpannamanā yāvad bhavān ajñātatatpadaḥ 
guruśāstrapramāṇais tu nirṇītaṃ tāvad ācara  MU
tataḥ kaṣāyapākena nūnaṃ vijñātavastunā 
śubho 'py asau tvayā tyājyo bhāvanaugho nirādhinā  MU
yad atisubhagam āryasevitaṃ tac chubham anusṛtya manojñabhāvabuddhyā 
adhigamaya padaṃ sadā viśokaṃ tad anu tad apy avamucya sādhu tiṣṭha  MU
karmavicāro nāma sargaḥ
daśamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
ataḥ pauruṣam āśritya śreyase nityabāndhavam 
ekāgraṃ kuru cittaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama  MU
avāntarābhipātīni svārūḍhāni manoratham 
pauruṣeṇendriyāṇy āśu saṃyamya samatāṃ naya  MU
ihāmutra ca siddhyarthaṃ puruṣārthaphalapradām 
mokṣopāyamayīṃ vakṣye saṃhitāṃ sārasammitām  MU
apunargrahaṇāyāntas tyaktvā saṃsāravāsanām 
sampūrṇau śamasantoṣāv ādāyodārayā dhiyā  MU
sapūrvāparavākyārthavicāraviṣayādṛtam 
manas samarasaṃ kṛtvā sānusandhānam ātmani  MU
sukhaduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ mahānandaikasādhanam 
mokṣopāyam ito rāma vakṣyamāṇaṃ imaṃ śṛṇu  MU
imāṃ mokṣakathāṃ śrutvā saha sarvair vivekibhiḥ 
padaṃ yāsyasi nirduḥkhaṃ nāśo yatra na vidyate  MU
idam uktaṃ purākalpe brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā 
sarvaduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ paramāśvāsanaṃ dhiyaḥ  MU
rāmaḥ
kenoktaṃ kāraṇenedaṃ brahman pūrvaṃ svayambhuvā 
kathaṃ ca bhavatā prāptam etat kathaya me prabho  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
asty anantavilāsātmā sarvagas sarvasaṃśrayaḥ 
cidākāśo 'vināśātmā pradīpas sarvavastuṣu  MU
spandāspandasamākārāt tato viṣṇur ajāyata 
spandamānarasāpūrāt taraṅgas sāgarād iva  MU
sumerukarṇikāt tasya digdalād dhṛdayāmbujāt 
tārakākesaravataḥ parameṣṭhī vyajāyata  MU
vedavedārthadeveśamunimaṇḍalamālitam 
so 'sṛjat sakalaṃ sargaṃ vikalpaughaṃ yathā manaḥ  MU
jambudvīpasya koṇe 'smin varṣe bhāratanāmani 
sa sasarja janaṃ putrair ādhivyādhipariplutam  MU
bhāvābhāvaviṣaṇṇārtham utpātadhvaṃsatatparam 
sarge 'smin bhūtajātīnām āpyāyanakaraṃ param  MU
janasya tasya duḥkhaṃ sa dṛṣṭvā sakalalokakṛt 
jagāma karuṇām īśaḥ putraduḥkhād yathā pitā  MU
ka eteṣāṃ hatāśānāṃ duḥkhasyānto hatāyuṣām 
syād iti kṣaṇam ekāgraś cintayām āsa bhūtapaḥ  MU
iti sañcintya bhagavān sasarja punar īśvaraḥ 
tapo dharmaṃ ca dānaṃ ca satyaṃ tīrthāni caiva ha  MU
etat sṛṣṭvā punar devaś cintayām āsa bhūtakṛt 
puṃsāṃ nānena sarvasya duḥkhasyānta iti svayam  MU
nirvāṇaṃ nāma paramaṃ sukhaṃ yena punar janaḥ 
na jāyate na mriyate taj jñānād eva labhyate  MU
saṃsārottaraṇe jantor upāyo jñānam eva hi 
tapo dānaṃ tathā tīrtham aṇūpāyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ  MU
tat tāvad duḥkhamokṣārthaṃ janasyāsya mahātmanaḥ 
pratyagraṃ taraṇopāyam āśu prakaṭayāmy aham  MU
iti sañcintya bhagavān brahmā kamalasaṃsthitaḥ 
manasā parisaṅkalpya mām utpāditavān imam  MU
kuto 'py utpanna evāśu tato 'haṃ samupasthitaḥ 
pitus tasya puraś śīghram ūrmer ūrmir ivānagha  MU
kamaṇḍaludharo nāthas sakamaṇḍalunā mayā 
sākṣamālas sākṣamālaṃ sa praṇamyābhivāditaḥ  MU
ehi putreti mām uktvā sa svābjasyottare dale 
śukle 'bhra iva śītāṃśuṃ yojayām āsa pāṇinā  MU
mṛgakṛttiparīdhāno mṛgakṛttinijāmbaram 
mām uvāca pitā brahmā sa haṃsas sārasaṃ yathā  MU
muhūrtamātraṃ te putra ceto vānaracañcalam 
ajñānam abhyāviśatu śaśaś śaśadharaṃ yathā  MU
iti tenāśu śaptas san vicārasamanantaram 
ahaṃ vismṛtavān sarvaṃ svarūpam amalaṃ dvijaḥ  MU
athāhaṃ dīnatāṃ yātas sthitas sambuddhayā dhiyā 
duḥkhaśokābhisantapto jāto jana ivādhamaḥ  MU
kaṣṭaṃ saṃsāranāmāyaṃ doṣaḥ katham ivāgataḥ 
iti cintitavān antas tūṣṇīm eva vyavasthitaḥ  MU
athābhyadhāt sa māṃ tātaḥ putra kiṃ duḥkhavān asi 
duḥkhopaghātaṃ māṃ pṛccha sukhī nityaṃ bhaviṣyasi  MU
tataḥ pṛṣṭas sa bhagavān mayā sakalalokakṛt 
haimapadmadalasthena saṃsāravyādhibheṣajam  MU
kathaṃ nāma mahad duḥkham ayaṃ saṃsāra āgataḥ 
kathaṃ ca kṣīyate jantor iti pṛṣṭena tena me  MU
taj jñānaṃ subahu proktaṃ yaj jñātvā pāvanaṃ param 
ahaṃ pitur api prāyaḥ kilādhika iva sthitaḥ  MU
tato viditavedyaṃ māṃ nijaprakṛtim āsthitam 
sa uvāca jagatkartā vaktā sakalakāraṇam  MU
śāpenājñapadaṃ nītvā pṛcchakas tvaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ 
putrāsya jñānasārasya samastajanasiddhaye  MU
idānīṃ śāntaśāpas tvaṃ paraṃ bodham upāgataḥ 
saṃsthito 'ham ivaikātmā kanakaṃ kanakād iva  MU
gacchedānīṃ mahīpīṭhe jambudvīpāntarasthitam 
sādho bhāratavarṣaṃ tvaṃ lokānugrahahetunā  MU
tatra kriyākāṇḍaparās tvayā putra mahādhiyaḥ 
upadeśyāḥ kriyākāṇḍakrameṇa kramaśālinaḥ  MU
viraktacittāś ca tathā mahāprajñā virāgiṇaḥ 
upadeśyās tvayā sādho jñānenānandadāyinā  MU
iti tena niyukto 'haṃ pitrā kamalayoninā 
iha rāghava tiṣṭhāmi yāvad bhūtaparamparā  MU
kartavyam asti mama neha hi kiñcid eva sthātavyam ity abhimanā bhuvi saṃsthito 'smi 
saṃśāntayā satatasuptadhiyeva vṛttyā kāryaṃ karomi na ca kiñcid ahaṃ karomi  MU
jñānāvataraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
ekādaśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ jñānāvataraṇaṃ bhuvi 
mayā svam īhitaṃ caiva kamalodbhavakalpitam  MU
tad idaṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śrotum adya tavānagha 
bhṛśam utkaṇṭhitaṃ ceto mahatas sukṛtodayāt  MU
rāmaḥ
kathaṃ brahman bhagavato loke jñānāvatāraṇe 
sargād anantaraṃ buddhiḥ pravṛttā parameṣṭhinaḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
parame brahmaṇi brahmā svabhāvavaśatas svayam 
jātas spandamayo nityam ūrmir ambunidhāv iva  MU
sṛṣṭvaivam ātataṃ sargaṃ sargasya sakalā gatīḥ 
bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyatsthā dadarśa parameśvaraḥ  MU
satkriyākramakālasya kṛtādeḥ kṣaya āgate 
moham ālokya lokānāṃ kāruṇyam agamat prabhuḥ  MU
tato mām īśvaras sṛṣṭvā jñānenāyojya cāsakṛt 
visasarja mahīpīṭhe lokasyājñānaśāntaye  MU
yathāhaṃ prahitas tena tathānye 'pi maharṣayaḥ 
sanatkumārapramukhā nāradādyāś ca bhūriśaḥ  MU
kriyākrameṇa puṇyena tathā jñānakrameṇa ca 
manomahāmayottabdham uddhartuṃ lokam īritāḥ  MU
maharṣibhis tatas tais tu kṣīṇe kṛtayuge purā 
kramāt kriyākrame śuddhe pṛthivyāṃ tanutāṃ gate  MU
kriyākramavidhānārthaṃ maryādāniyamāya ca 
pṛthagdeśavibhāgena bhūpālāḥ parikalpitāḥ  MU
bahūni smṛtiśāstrāṇi yajñaśāstrāṇi cāvanau 
dharmakāmārthasiddhyarthaṃ kalpitāny uditāny atha  MU
kālacakre vahaty asmiṃs tato vigalite krame 
pratyahaṃ bhojanapare jane śālyarjanonmukhe  MU
dvandvāni sampravṛttāni viṣayārthaṃ mahībhujām 
daṇḍyatāṃ samprayātāni bhūtāni bhuvi bhūriśaḥ  MU
tato yuddhaṃ vinā bhūpā mahīṃ pālayituṃ kramāt 
asamarthās tad āyātāḥ prajābhis saha dīnatām  MU
teṣāṃ dainyāpanodārthaṃ samyaksṛṣṭikramāya ca 
tato 'smadādibhiḥ proktā mahatyo jñānadṛṣṭayaḥ  MU
adhyātmavidyā teneyaṃ pūrvaṃ rājasu varṇitā 
tadanu prasṛtā loke rājavidyety udāhṛtā  MU
rājavidyā rājaguhyam adhyātmagrantham uttamam 
jñātvā rāghava rājānaḥ parāṃ nirduḥkhatāṃ gatāḥ  MU
atha rājasv atīteṣu bahuṣv amalakīrtiṣu 
asmād daśarathād rāma jāto 'dya tvam ihāvanau  MU
tava cātiprasanne 'smiñ jātaṃ manasi pāvanam 
nirnimittam idaṃ cāru vairāgyam arimardana  MU
sarvasyaiva hi bhavyasya sādhor api vivekinaḥ 
nimittapūrvaṃ vairāgyaṃ jāyate rāma rājasam  MU
idaṃ tv apūrvam utpannaṃ camatkārakaraṃ satām 
tavānimittaṃ vairāgyaṃ sāttvikaṃ svavivekajam  MU
bībhatsaṃ viṣamaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko nāma na virajyate 
satāṃ tūttamavairāgyaṃ vivekād eva jāyate  MU
te mahānto mahāprajñā nimittena vinaiva hi 
vairāgyaṃ jāyate yeṣāṃ ta evāmalamānasāḥ  MU
svavivekacamatkāraparāmarśaviraktayā 
rājate hi dhiyā jantur yuveva vanamālayā  MU
parāmṛśya vivekena saṃsāraracanām imām 
virāgaṃ ye 'dhigacchanti ta eva puruṣottamāḥ  MU
svavivekavaśād eva vicāryedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ 
indrajālaṃ parityājyaṃ sabāhyābhyantaraṃ balāt  MU
śmaśānam āpadaṃ dainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na virajyate 
tad vairāgyaṃ paraṃ śreyas svato yad abhijāyate  MU
akṛtrimavirāgas tvaṃ mahattām alam āgataḥ 
yogyo 'si jñānasārasya bījasyeva mṛdusthalam  MU
prasādāt parameśasya nāthasya paramātmanaḥ 
tvādṛśasya śubhā buddhir vivekam anudhāvati  MU
kriyākrameṇa mahatā tapasā niyamena ca 
dānena tīrthayātrābhiś cirakālavivekataḥ  MU
duṣkṛte kṣayam āpanne paramārthavicāraṇe 
kākatālīyayogena buddhir jantoḥ pravartate  MU
kriyāparās tāvad alaṃ cakrāvṛttibhir ādṛtāḥ 
bhramantīha janā yāvan na paśyanti paraṃ padam  MU
yathābhūtam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃsāraṃ tanmayīṃ dhiyam 
parityajya paraṃ yānti nirālānā gajā iva  MU
viṣameyam anantehā rāma saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ 
dehamuktā mahātantur vinā jñānaṃ na naśyati  MU
jñānayuktiplavenaiva saṃsārābdhiṃ sudustaram 
mahādhiyas samuttīrṇā netareṇa raghūdvaha  MU
tām imāṃ jñānayuktiṃ tvaṃ saṃsārāmbhodhitāriṇīm 
śṛṇuṣvāvahito buddhyā nityāvahitayānayā  MU
yasmād anantasaṃrambhā jagato duḥkharītayaḥ 
cirāyāntar dahanty etā vinā yuktim anindita  MU
śītavātātapādīni dvandvaduḥkhāni rāghava 
jñānayuktiṃ vinā kena sahyatāṃ yānti sādhuṣu  MU
āpatanti pratipadaṃ yathākālaṃ dahanti ca 
duḥkhacintā naraṃ mūḍhaṃ tṛṇam agniśikhā iva  MU
prājñaṃ vijñātavijñānaṃ samyagdarśinam ādhayaḥ 
na dahanti vanaṃ varṣadabdam agniśikhā iva  MU
ādhivyādhiparāvarte saṃsāramarumārute 
kṣubhite 'pi na tattvajño bhajyate kalpavṛkṣavat  MU
tattvaṃ jñātum ato yatnād dhīmān eva hi dhīmatā 
prāmāṇikaḥ prabuddhātmā praṣṭavyaḥ praṇayānvitaṃ  MU
prāmāṇikasya pṛṣṭasya vaktur uttamacetasā 
yatnena vacanaṃ grāhyam aṃśukeneva kuṅkumam  MU
atattvajñam anādeyavacanaṃ vāgvidāṃ vara 
yaḥ pṛcchati naraṃ tasmān nāsti mūḍhataro 'paraḥ  MU
prāmāṇikasya tajjñasya vaktuḥ pṛṣṭasya yatnataḥ 
nānutiṣṭhati yo vākyaṃ nānyas tasmān narādhamaḥ  MU
tajjñatātajjñate pūrvaṃ vaktur nirṇīya kāryataḥ 
yaḥ karoti naraḥ praśnaṃ pṛcchakas sa mahāmatiḥ  MU
anirṇīya pravaktāraṃ bālaḥ praśnaṃ karoti yaḥ 
adhamaḥ pṛcchakas sa syān na mahārthasya bhājanam  MU
pūrvāparasamādhānakṣamabuddhāv anindite 
pṛṣṭaṃ prājñena vaktavyaṃ nādhame paśudharmiṇi  MU
prāmāṇikārthayogyatvaṃ pṛcchakasyāvicārya vā 
yo vakti tam iha prājñāḥ prāhur mūḍhatamaṃ naram  MU
tvam atīva guṇādhāraḥ pṛcchako raghunandana 
ahaṃ ca vaktuṃ jānāmi sa ca yogo 'yam āvayoḥ  MU
yad ahaṃ vacmi tad yatnāt tvayā śabdārthakovida 
etad vastv iti nirṇīya hṛdi kāryam akhaṇḍitaṃ  MU
mahān asi virakto 'si tajjño 'si janatāsthitau 
tvayi vastu lagaty antaḥ kuṅkumāmbu yathāṃśuke  MU
uktāvadhānaparamā paramārthavivecanī 
viśaty arthaṃ tava prajñā jalamadhyam ivārkabhā  MU
yad yad vacmi tavādeyaṃ hṛdi kāryaṃ prayatnataḥ 
na cet praṣṭavya evāhaṃ na tvayeha nirarthakam  MU
mano hi capalaṃ rāma saṃsāravanamarkaṭam 
saṃrodhya hṛdi yatnena śrotavyā paramārthadhīḥ  MU
avivekinam ajñānam asajjanaratiṃ janam 
ciraṃ dūrataraṃ kṛtvā pūjanīyā hi sādhavaḥ  MU
nityaṃ sajjanasamparkād viveka upajāyate 
vivekapādapasyaite bhogamokṣau phale smṛte  MU
mokṣadvāre dvārapālāś catvāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ 
śamo vicāras santoṣaś caturthas sādhusaṅgamaḥ  MU
ete sevyāḥ prayatnena catvāro dvau trayo 'tha vā 
dvāram udghāṭayanty ete mokṣarājagṛhe balāt  MU
ekaṃ vā sarvayatnena prāṇāṃs tyaktvā samāśrayet 
etasmin vaśage yānti catvāro 'pi vaśaṃ yataḥ  MU
saviveko hi śāstrasya jñānasya tapaso dyuteḥ 
bhājanaṃ bhūṣaṇākāro bhāskaras tejasām iva  MU
ghanatām upayātaṃ hi prajñāmāndyam acetasām 
yāti sthāvaratām ambu jāḍyāt pāṣāṇatām iva  MU
tvaṃ tu rāghava saujanyaguṇaśāstrārthadṛṣṭibhiḥ 
vikāsitāntaḥkaraṇas sthitaḥ padma ivodaye  MU
imāṃ jñānadṛśaṃ śrotum avaboddhuṃ ca sanmate 
arhasy uddhṛtakarṇas tu jantur vīṇādhvaniṃ yathā  MU
vairāgyābhyāsayogena samasaujanyasampadā 
tat padaṃ prāpyate rāma yatra nāśo na vidyate  MU
śāstrais sujanasamparkapūrvakais sutapodamaiḥ 
ādau saṃsāramuktyarthaṃ prajñām evābhivardhayet  MU
saṃsāraviṣavṛkṣograsekam āspadam āpadām 
añjanaṃ mohayāminyā maurkhyaṃ yatnena nāśayet  MU
etad eva ca maurkhyasya paramaṃ viddhi nāśanam 
yad idaṃ prekṣyate śāstraṃ kiñcitsaṃskṛtayā dhiyā  MU
durāśāsarpagartena maurkhyeṇa hṛdi valgatā 
cetas sañkocam āyāti carmāgnāv iva yojitam  MU
prājñe yathārthabhūteyaṃ vastudṛṣṭiḥ prasīdati 
dṛg ivendau nirambhodasakalāmalamaṇḍale  MU
pūrvāparavicārārthacārucāturyaśālinī 
savikāsā matir yasya sa pumān iti kathyate  MU
vikasitena sitena manomuṣā varavicāraṇaśītalarociṣā 
guṇavatā hṛdayena virājase tvam amalena nabhaś śaśinā yathā  MU
vaktṛpṛcchakalakṣaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
dvādaśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
paripūrṇamanā mānyaḥ praṣṭuṃ jānāsi rāghava 
vetsi coktaṃ ca tenāhaṃ pravṛtto vaktum ādarāt  MU
rajastamobhyāṃ rahitāṃ śuddhasattvānupātinīm 
matim ātmani saṃsthāpya jñānaṃ śrotuṃ sthiro bhava  MU
vidyate tvayi sarvaiva pṛcchakasya guṇāvalī 
vaktur guṇālī ca mayi ratnaśrīr jaladhau yathā  MU
āttavān asi vairāgyaṃ vivekāsaṅgajaṃ mune 
candrakānta ivārdratvaṃ lagnacandrakarotkaraḥ  MU
ciram ā śaiśavād eva tavābhyāso 'sti sadguṇaiḥ 
śuddhaiś śuddhasya dīrghaiś ca padmasyevātisantataiḥ  MU
ataś śṛṇu kathāṃ vakṣye tvam evāsyā hi bhājanam 
na hi candraṃ vinā śuddhā savikāsā kumudvatī  MU
ye kecana samārambhā yāś ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ 
te ca tāś ca pade dṛṣṭe niśśeṣaṃ yānti vai śamam  MU
yadi vijñānaviśrāntir na bhaved bhavyacetasaḥ 
tad asyāṃ saṃsṛtau sādhuś cintāṃ soḍhuṃ saheta kaḥ  MU
paraprāptyā vilīyante sarvā mananavṛttayaḥ 
kalpāntārkagaṇāsaṅgāt kulaśailaśilā iva  MU
dussahā rāma saṃsāraviṣāveśaviṣūcikā 
yogagāruḍamantreṇa pāvanena praśāmyati  MU
sa ca yogas sujanena saha śāstrārthavicārāt 
paramārthajñānamayo labhyate eva  MU
avaśyam iha hi vicāre kṛte sakaladuḥkhaparikṣayo bhavatīti mantavyam  MU
nāto vicāradṛṣṭayo 'vahelayā draṣṭavyāḥ 
vicāravaśataḥ puruṣeṇa sakalam idam ādhipañjaraṃ sarpeṇa tvacam iva paripakvāṃ parityajya
vigatajvareṇa śītalāntaḥkaraṇena vinoda iva jagad akhilam ālokyate samyagdarśanavatā  MU
asamyagdarśanavato hi paraṃ duḥkham idam 
viṣamo hy ayam atitarāṃ saṃsārarogo bhogīva daśati 
asir iva cchinatti 
śara iva vedhayati 
rajjur iva veṣṭayati 
pāvaka iva dahati 
rātrir ivāndhayati 
aśaṅkitaparipātitaparuṣapāṣāṇa iva vivaśīkaroti 
harati prajñām 
nāśayati sthitim 
pātayati mohāndhakūpe 
tṛṣṇayā jarjarīkaroti 
na tad asti kiñcid duḥkhaṃ saṃsārī yan nāpnoti  MU
duranteyaṃ kila viṣayaviṣamaviṣaviṣūcikā 
yadi na cikitsyate tad atitarāṃ narakanagaranikaraphalānubandhinī tat tat karoti 
yatra śitāsiśatapāta utpalatāḍanam 
agnidāho himāvaseko 
'ṅgavikartanaṃ candanacakrakaracanā 
ghūrṇadvātāntaḥ paripeṣo 'ṅgaparimālanam 
anavaratānalajvālāvicalitacāmaranārācanikaranipāto nidāghavinodanadhārāgṛhaśīkaravarṣaṇam 
śiraśchedas sukhanidrā 
mūkīkaraṇaṃ pāṭavamudrā mahān upacayaḥ  MU
tad evaṃvidhe kaṣṭaceṣṭāsahasradāruṇe saṃsāracapalayantre 'smin rāghava nāvahelā kartavyā 
avaśyam idaṃ hi vicāraṇīyam  MU
evaṃ cāvaboddhavyam yathā kilāsti vicārāc chreyo'vāptir iti  MU
anyac ca raghukulendo 
yadi naite mahānto munayo maharṣayaś ca viprāś ca rājānaś ca jñānakavacenāvaguṇṭhitaśarīrās
tat katham aduḥkhakṣamā api duḥkhamayīṃ tamovṛttipūrvakaṃ saṃsārakadarthanām anubhavantas
satatam eva muditamanasas tiṣṭhanti  MU
iha hi 
vikautukā vigatavikalpaviplavā yathā sthitā hariharapadmajādayaḥ 
narottamās samadhigatātmadīpakās tathā sthitā jagati vibuddhabuddhayaḥ  MU
tathā ca 
parikṣīṇe mohe galati ca ghane 'jñānajalade parijñāte tattve samadhigata ātmany abhimate 
vicāryāryais sārdhaṃ galitavapuṣor vā sadasator dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ
jāgatam idam  MU
anyac ca rāghava 
prasanne cittattve hṛdi savibhave valgati pare samābhogībhūtāsv akhilakalanādṛṣṭiṣu
puraḥ 
śamaṃ yāntīṣv antaḥkaraṇaghaṭanāsv āhitarasaṃ dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam
idam  MU
anyac ca 
rathas sphāro dehas turagaracanā cendriyagatiḥ parispando vātād aham akalitānantaviṣamaḥ 
paro vārvāg dehī jagati viharāmīty anaghayā dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam
idam  MU
tattvamāhātmyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
trayodaśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya puṣṭātmānas subuddhayaḥ 
vicaranty asamunnaddhā mahānto 'bhyuditā iva  MU
na śocanti na yācante na vāñchanti śubhāśubham 
sarvam eva ca kurvanti kurvanti na ca kiñcana  MU
svastham evāvatiṣṭhanti svasthaṃ kurvanti yānti ca 
heyopādeyatāpakṣarahitās svātmani sthitāḥ  MU
āyānti ca na cāyānti vanaṃ yānti na yānti ca 
na kurvanty api kurvanti na vadanti vadanti ca  MU
ye kecana samārambhā yāś ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ 
heyādeyadṛśo yās tāḥ kṣīyante 'dhigate pade  MU
parityaktasamastehaṃ mano madhuravṛttimat 
sarvatas sukham abhyeti candrabimba iva sthitam  MU
api nirmananārambham apy astākhilakautukam 
ātmany eva na māty antar indāv iva rasāyanam  MU
na karotīndrajālāni nānudhāvati vāsanām 
bālacāpalam utsṛjya pūrṇam eva virājate  MU
evaṃvidhā hi vṛttaya ātmatattvāvalokanāl labhyante 
nānyataḥ 
tasmād vicāreṇātmānveṣṭavyaḥ upāsanīyo jñātavyo yāvajjīvaṃ puruṣeṇa netarad iti  MU
svānubhūtes suśāstrasya guroś caivaikavākyatā 
yatrābhyāsena tenātmā santatenāvalokyate  MU
avahelitaśāstrārthair avajñātamahājanaiḥ 
kaṣṭām apy āpadaṃ prāpto na mūḍhais samatām iyāt  MU
na vyādhir na viṣaṃ nāpat tathā nāmāsti bhūtale 
khedāya svaśarīrasthaṃ maurkhyam eva yathā nṛṇām  MU
kiñcitsaṃskṛtabuddhīnāṃ śravyaṃ śāstram idaṃ yathā 
maurkhyāpahaṃ tathā śāstram anyad asti na kiñcana  MU
idaṃ śravyaṃ sukhakaraṃ kathādṛṣṭāntasundaram 
aviruddham aśeṣeṇa śāstravākyārthabandhunā  MU
āpado yā duruttārā yāś ca tucchāḥ kuyonayaḥ 
tās tā maurkhyāt prasūyante khadirāt kaṇṭakā iva  MU
varaṃ śarāvahastasya caṇḍālāgāravīthiṣu 
bhikṣārtham aṭanaṃ rāma na maurkhyahatajīvitam  MU
imam ālokam āsādya mokṣopāyamayaṃ janaḥ 
andhatām eti na punaḥ kaścin mohatamasy api  MU
tāvan nayati saṅkocaṃ tṛṣṇāśyāmā narāmbujam 
yāvad vivekasūryasya noditā vimalā prabhā  MU
saṃsāraduḥkhamokṣārthaṃ mādṛśais saha bandhubhiḥ 
svarūpam ātmano jñātvā guruśāstrapramāṇataḥ  MU
jīvanmuktāś carantīha yathā hariharādayaḥ 
yathā brahmarṣayaś cānye tathā vihara rāghava  MU
anantānīha duḥkhāni sukhaṃ kṣaṇalavopamam 
nātas sukheṣu badhnīyād dṛṣṭiṃ duḥkhānubandhiṣu  MU
yad anantam anāyāsaṃ tat padaṃ sārasiddhaye 
sādhanīyaṃ prayatnena puruṣeṇa vijānatā  MU
ta eva puruṣārthasya bhājanaṃ puruṣottamāḥ 
anuttamapadālambi mano yeṣāṃ gatajvaram  MU
sambhogāśanamātreṣu rājyādiṣu sukheṣu ye 
santuṣṭā duṣṭamanaso viddhi tān andhaḍuṇḍubhān  MU
ye śaṭheṣu duranteṣu duṣkṛtārambhaśāliṣu 
dviṣatsu mitrarūpeṣu bhaktā vai bhogabhogiṣu  MU
te yānti durgamād durgaṃ duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam 
narakān narakaṃ mūḍhā mohamantharabuddhayaḥ  MU
parasparavināśotke śreyasyau na kadācana 
sukhaduḥkhadaśe rāma taḍitprasarabhaṅgure  MU
ye viraktā mahātmānas suviviktā bhavādṛśaḥ 
puruṣān viddhi tān vandyān bhogamokṣaikabhāginaḥ  MU
vivekaṃ param āśritya vairāgyābhyāsayogataḥ 
saṃsārasaritaṃ ghorām imām āpadam uttaret  MU
na svaptavyaṃ tu saṃsāramāyāsv iha vijānatā 
viṣamūrchanasammohadāyinīṣu vivekinā  MU
saṃsāram imam āsādya yas tiṣṭhaty avahelayā 
jvalitasya gṛhasyoccaiś śete tārṇasya so 'ntare  MU
yat prāpya na nivartante yad āsādya na śocyate 
tat padaṃ śemuṣīlabhyam asty evātra na saṃśayaḥ  MU
nāsti cet tad vicāreṇa doṣaḥ ko bhavatāṃ bhavet 
asti cet tat samuttīrṇā bhaviṣyatha bhavārṇavāt  MU
pravṛttiḥ puruṣasyeha mokṣopāyavicāraṇe 
yadā bhavaty āśu tadā mokṣabhāgī sa ucyate  MU
anapāyi nirāśaṅkaṃ svāsthyaṃ vigatavibhramam 
na vinā kevalībhāvaṃ vidyate bhuvanatraye  MU
tatprāptāv uttamaprāptau na kleśa upayujyate 
na mitrāṇy upakurvanti na dhanāni na bandhavaḥ  MU
na hastapādacalanaṃ na deśāntarasaṅgamaḥ 
kleśātiśayasādhyo vā na tīrthāyatanāśrayaḥ  MU
puruṣārthaikasādhyena vāsanaikārthakarmaṇā 
kevalaṃ tan manomātrajayenāsādyate padam  MU
vivekamātrasādhyaṃ tadvicāraikāntaniścayam 
tyajatā duḥkhajālāni nareṇa tad avāpyate  MU
sukhasevyāsanasthena tad vicārayatā svayam 
na śocyate padaṃ prāpya na ca bhūyo 'bhijāyate  MU
tat samastasukhāsārasīmāntaṃ sādhavo viduḥ 
tad anuttamaniṣṣyandaṃ param āhū rasāyanam  MU
kṣayitvāt sarvabhāvānāṃ svargamānuṣyayor dvayoḥ 
sukhaṃ nāsty eva salilaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāsv ivaitayoḥ  MU
ato manojayaś cintyaś śamas santoṣasādhanaḥ 
anantaśamasambhogas tasmād ānanda āpyate  MU
jīvatā gacchatā caiva bhramatā patatā tathā 
rakṣasā dānavenāpi devena puruṣeṇa vā  MU
manaḥpraśamanodbhūtaṃ tat prāpya paramaṃ sukham 
vikāsiśamapuṣpasya vivekoccataroḥ phalam  MU
vyavahārapareṇāpi kāryavṛndam acinvatā 
bhānunevāmbarasthena nojjhyate na ca vāñchyate  MU
manaḥ praśāntam atyacchaṃ viśrāntaṃ gatavibhramam 
anīhaṃ vigatābhīṣṭaṃ nābhivāñchati nojjhati  MU
mokṣadvāre dvārapālān imāñ śṛṇu yathākramam 
yeṣām ekatamāsaktyā mokṣadvāre praviśyate  MU
duḥkhadoṣadaśā dīrghā saṃsāramarumaṇḍalī 
jantoś śītalatām eti śītalena śamāmbunā  MU
śamenāsādyate śreyaś śamo hi paramaṃ padam 
śamaś śivaṃ śamaś śāntiś śamo bhrāntinivāraṇam  MU
puṃsaḥ praśamatṛptasya śītalācchatarātmanaḥ 
śamatoṣitacittasya śatrur apy eti mitratām  MU
śamacandramasā yeṣām āśayas samalaṅkṛtaḥ 
kṣīrābdhīnām ivodeti teṣāṃ paramaśuddhatā  MU
hṛtkuśeśayakośeṣu yeṣāṃ śamakuśeśayam 
satāṃ vikasitaṃ te hi dvihṛtpadmās samā hareḥ  MU
śamaśrīś śobhate yeṣāṃ mukhendāv akalaṅkite 
te 'mī kulendavo vandyās saundaryavijitendavaḥ  MU
trailokyodaravartinyo nānandāya tathā śriyaḥ 
sāmrājyasampatpratimā yathā śamavibhūtayaḥ  MU
yāni duḥkhāni yās tṛṣṇā dussahā ye durādhayaḥ 
tat sarvaṃ śāntacetassu tamo 'rkeṣv iva naśyati  MU
mano hi sarvabhūtānāṃ prasādam anugacchati 
na tathendau yathā śānte jane janitakautukam  MU
śamaśālini sauhārdavati sarveṣu jantuṣu 
sujane paramaṃ tattvaṃ svayam eva prasīdati  MU
mātarīva paraṃ yānti viṣamāṇi mṛdūni ca 
viśvāsam iha bhūtāni sarvāṇi śamaśālini  MU
na rasāyanapānena na lakṣmyāliṅganena ca 
tathā sukham avāpnoti śamenāntar yathā janaḥ  MU
sarvādhivyādhivalitaṃ krāntaṃ tṛṣṇāvaratrayā 
manaś śamāmṛtāsekais samāśvāsaya rāghava  MU
yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi śamaśītalayā dhiyā 
tat te 'tisvadate svādu netarat tāta mānase  MU
śamāmṛtarasasnātaṃ mano yām eti nirvṛtim 
chinnāny api tayāṅgāni manye rohanti rāghava  MU
na piśācā na rakṣāṃsi na daityā na ca śatravaḥ 
na ca vyāghrabhujaṅgādyā dviṣanti śamaśālinam  MU
susannaddhasamastāṅgaṃ praśamāmṛtavarmaṇā 
vedhayanti na duḥkhāni śarā vajraśilām iva  MU
na tathā rājate rājāmātyāntaḥpurasaṃsthitaḥ 
samayā svasthayā vṛttyā yathopaśamaśobhitaḥ  MU
prāṇāt priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭim eti na tāṃ janaḥ 
yām āyāti janaṃ śāntam avalokya samāśayam  MU
samayā śamaśālinyā vṛttyā yas sādhu vartate 
abhinanditayā loke jīvatīha sa netaraḥ  MU
anuddhatamanāś śāntas sādhu karma karoti yat 
tat sarvam abhinandanti tasyemā bhūtajātayaḥ  MU
śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā śubhāśubham 
na hṛṣyati glāyati yas sa śānta iti kathyate  MU
yas samas sarvabhāveṣu nābhivāñchati nojjhati 
jitvendriyāṇi yatnena sa śānta iti kathyate  MU
tuṣārakarabimbācchaṃ mano yasya nirākulam 
maraṇotsavayuddheṣu sa śānta iti kathyate  MU
sthito 'pi na sthita iva na hṛṣyati na kupyati 
yas suṣuptamanās svasthas sa śānta iti kathyate  MU
amṛtasyandasubhagā yasya sarvajanaṃ prati 
dṛṣṭiḥ prasarati prītā sa śānta iti kathyate  MU
spaṣṭāvadātayā buddhyā yathaivāntas tathā bahiḥ 
dṛśyante yasya kāryāṇi sa śānta iti kathyate  MU
apy āpatsu durantāsu kalpānteṣu dahatsv api 
tucchehaṃ na mano yasya sa śānta iti kathyate  MU
antaśśītalatāṃ yāto yo bhāveṣu na majjati 
vyavahārī na sammūḍhas sa śānta iti kathyate  MU
ākāśasadṛśī yasya nityaṃ svavyavahāriṇaḥ 
kalaṅkam eti na matis sa śānta iti kathyate  MU
tapasviṣu bahujñeṣu yājakeṣu nṛpeṣu ca 
balavatsu guṇāḍhyeṣu śamavān eva rājate  MU
śamasaṃsaktamanasāṃ mahatāṃ guṇaśālinām 
udeti nirvṛtiś cittāj jyotsneva himarociṣaḥ  MU
sīmānto guṇapūgānāṃ pauruṣaikāntabhūṣaṇam 
saṅkaṭeṣv abhayasthānaṃ śamaś śrīmān virājate  MU
śamam amṛtam ahāryam āryajuṣṭaṃ param avalambya padaṃ paraṃ prayātāḥ 
raghutanaya yathā mahānubhāvāḥ kramam anupālaya siddhaye tam eva  MU
śamanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
caturdaśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
śāstrāvabodhāmalayā dhiyā paramapūtayā 
kartavyaḥ kāraṇajñena vicāro niyatātmanā  MU
vicārāt tīkṣṇatām etya dhīḥ paśyati paraṃ padam 
dīrghasaṃsārarogasya vicāro hi mahauṣadham  MU
āpadvanam anantehāparipallavitākṛti 
vicārakrakacacchinnaṃ naiva bhūyaḥ prarohati  MU
moheṣu bandhunāśeṣu saṅkaṭeṣu bhrameṣu ca 
sarveṣv eva mahāprājña vicāro hi satāṃ gatiḥ  MU
na vicāraṃ vinā kaścid upāyo 'sti vipacchame 
vicārād aśubhaṃ tyaktvā śubham āyāti dhīs satām  MU
balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca pratipattiḥ kriyāphalam 
phalanty etāni sarvāṇi vicāreṇaiva dhīmataḥ  MU
yuktāyuktamahādīpam abhivāñchitasādhakam 
sphāraṃ vicāram āśritya saṃsārajaladhiṃ taret  MU
ālūnahṛdayāmbhojaṃ mahāmohamataṅgajam 
vidārayati śuddhātmā vicārodārakesarī  MU
mūḍhāḥ kālavaśeneha yad gatāḥ paramaṃ padam 
tad vicārapradīpasya vijṛmbhitam anuttamam  MU
rājyāni sampadas sphāro bhogo mokṣaś ca śāśvataḥ 
vicārakalpavṛkṣasya phalāny etāni rāghava  MU
yā vivekavilāsinyo matayo mahatām iha 
na tā vipadi majjanti tumbakānīva vāriṇi  MU
vicārodayahāriṇyā dhiyā vyavaharanti ye 
phalānām atyudārāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ hi bhavanti te  MU
mūrkhahṛtkānanasthānām āśāprasararodhinām 
avicārakarañjānāṃ mañjaryo duḥkharītayaḥ  MU
kajjalakṣodamalinā madirāmodadharmiṇī 
avicāramayī nidrā yātu te rāghava kṣayam  MU
mahāpady api dīrgheṣu sadvicāraparo naraḥ 
na nimajjati moheṣu tejorāśis tamassv iva  MU
mānase sarasi svacche vicārakamalotkaraḥ 
nūnaṃ vikasito yasya himavān iva bhāti saḥ  MU
vicāravikalā yasya matir māndyam upeyuṣaḥ 
tasyodety aśaniś candrān mudhā yakṣaś śiśor iva  MU
duḥkhaṣaṇḍakavalmīkaṃ vipannavalatāmadhuḥ 
rāma dūre parityājyo nirviveko narādhamaḥ  MU
ye kecana durārambhā durācārā durādhayaḥ 
avicāreṇa te bhānti vetālās tamasā yathā  MU
avicāriṇam ekāntajaraddrumasadharmiṇam 
akṣamaṃ sādhukāryeṣu dūre kuru raghūdvaha  MU
viviktaṃ hi mano jantor āśāvaivaśyavarjitam 
parāṃ nirvṛtim abhyeti pūrṇaś candra ivātmani  MU
vivekitoditā dehaṃ sarvaṃ śītalayaty alam 
alaṅkaroti cātyantaṃ jyotsneva bhuvanam navā  MU
paramārthapatākāyā dhiyo dhavalacāmaram 
vicāro rājate janto rajanyām iva candramāḥ  MU
vicāracāravo bhāvā bhāsayanto diśo daśa 
bhānti bhāskaravad bhagnabhūyobhavabhayāmayāḥ  MU
bālasya svamanomohakalpitaḥ prāṇahārakaḥ 
rātrau tamasi vetālo vicāreṇa vilīyate  MU
sarva eva jagadbhāvā avicāraṇacāravaḥ 
avidyamānasadbhāvā vicāraviśarāravaḥ  MU
puṃso nijamanomohakalpito 'nalpaduḥkhadaḥ 
saṃsāraciravetālo vicāreṇa vilīyate  MU
samasvacchaṃ nirābādham anantam anapāśrayam 
viddhīmaṃ kevalībhāvaṃ vicārogrataroḥ phalam  MU
acalasthitinodāraprakaṭābhogatejasā 
tena niṣkāmatodeti śītatevoditendunā  MU
cintājvaramahauṣadhyā sādhucittaniṣaṇṇayā 
tayottamatvapradayā nābhivāñchati nojjhati  MU
tat sadālambanaṃ cetas sphāram ābhāsam āgatam 
nāstam eti na codeti kham ivātitatāntaram  MU
na jahāti na cādatte na tāmyati na śāmyati 
kevalaṃ sākṣivat paśyañ jagad ātmani tiṣṭhati  MU
na ca śāmyati nāpy antar nāpi bāhye 'vatiṣṭhati 
na ca naiṣkarmyam ādatte na ca karmaṇi majjati  MU
upekṣate gataṃ vastu samprāptam anuvartate 
na kṣubdho nāti cākṣubdho bhāti pūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ  MU
evaṃrūpeṇa manasā mahātmāno mahāśayāḥ 
jīvanmuktā jagaty asmin viharanti hi yoginaḥ  MU
uṣitvā suciraṃ kālaṃ dhīrās te yāvadīpsitam 
tanum ante parityajya yānti kevalatāṃ tatām  MU
ko 'haṃ kasya ca saṃsāra ity āpady api dhīmatā 
cintanīyaṃ prayatnena sapratīkāram ātmanā  MU
kāryasaṅkaṭasandehaṃ rājā jānāti rāghava 
niṣphalaṃ saphalaṃ vāpi vicāreṇaiva nānyathā  MU
vedavedāntasiddhāntasthitayas sthitikāraṇam 
nirṇīyante vicāreṇa dīpeneva bhuvo niśi  MU
anaṣṭam andhakāreṣu bahutejassv ajihmitam 
paśyaty api vyavahitaṃ vicārac cārulocanam  MU
vivekāndho hi jātyandhaś śocyaś sarvasya durmatiḥ 
divyacakṣur vivekātmā jayaty akhilavastuṣu  MU
paramātmamayī pālyā mahānandaikasādhanī 
kṣaṇam ekaṃ parityājyā na vicāracamatkṛtiḥ  MU
vicāracāruḥ puruṣo mahatām api rocate 
paripakvaṃ camatkāri sahakāraphalaṃ yathā  MU

hṛdyākāśe vivekārke śamālokini nirmale 
anarthasārthakartāro nodyanti kaliketavaḥ  MU
śāmyanti śuddhim āyānti saumyās tiṣṭhanti sūnnate 
acañcale jaḍās tṛṣṇāś śaradīvābhramālikāḥ  MU
yatkiñcanakarī krūrā grāmyatā vinivartate 
dīnānanā piśācānāṃ līleva divasāgame  MU
dharmabhittau bhṛśaṃ lagnāṃ dhiyaṃ dhairyadhuraṃ gatām 
ādhayo na vilumpanti vātāś citralatām iva  MU
na pataty avaṭe jantur viṣayāsaṅgarūpiṇi 
kaḥ kila jñātasaraṇiś śvabhre samanudhāvati  MU
sacchāstrasādhuvṛttānām avirodhini karmaṇi 
ramate dhīr yathāprāpte sādhvīvāntaḥpurājire  MU
jagatāṃ koṭilakṣyeṣu yāvantaḥ paramāṇavaḥ 
teṣām ekaikaśo 'ntassthān sargān paśyaty asargadhīḥ  MU
mokṣopāyāvabodhena śuddhāntaḥkaraṇaṃ janam 
na khedayati bhogaugho na cānandayati kvacit  MU
paramāṇau paramāṇau sargavargā nirargalam 
ye patanty utpatanty ambuvīcivat tān sa paśyati  MU
na dveṣṭi sampravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati 
kāryāṇy eṣa prabuddho 'pi niṣprabuddha iva drumaḥ  MU
dṛśyate lokasāmānyo yathāprāptānuvṛttimān 
iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaprāptau hṛdayenāparājitaḥ  MU
buddhvedam akhilaṃ śāstraṃ vācayitvā vivecya vā 
anubhūyata evaitan na tūktaṃ varaśāpavat  MU
śāstraṃ subodham evedaṃ nānālaṅkārabhūṣitam 
kāvyaṃ rasaghanaṃ cāru dṛṣṭāntaiḥ pratipādakam  MU
budhyate svayam evedaṃ kiñcitpadapadārthavit 
svayaṃ yas tu na vettīdaṃ śrotavyaṃ tena paṇḍitāt  MU
asmiñ śrute mate jñāte tapodhyānajapādikam 
mokṣaprāptau tu tasyeha na kiñcid upayujyate  MU
etacchāstraghanābhyāsāt paunaḥpunyena vīkṣitāt 
jantoḥ pāṇḍityapūrvaṃ hi cittasaṃskārapūrvakam  MU
ahaṃ jagad iti prauḍho draṣṭṛdṛśyapiśācakaḥ 
piśāco 'rkodayeneva svayaṃ śāmyaty avighnataḥ  MU
bhramo jagad ahaṃ ceti sthita evopaśāmyati 
svapnamohaḥ parijñāta iva no ramayaty alam  MU
yathā saṅkalpanagare puṃso harṣaviṣāditā 
na bādhate tathaivāntaḥ parijñāte jagadbhrame  MU
citrasarpaḥ parijñāto na sarpabhayado yathā 
dṛśyasarpaḥ parijñātas tathā na sukhaduḥkhadaḥ  MU
parijñānena sarpatvaṃ citrasarpasya naśyati 
yathā tathaiva saṃsāras sthita evopaśāmyati  MU
sumanaḥpallavāmarṣe kiñcid vyatikaro bhavet 
paramārthapadaprāptau na tu vyatikaro 'sti naḥ  MU
gacchaty avayavaspandas sumanaḥpatramardane 
iha dhīmātrabodhas tu nāṅgāvayavabodhanam  MU
sukhāsanopaviṣṭena yathāsambhavam aśnatā 
bhogajālaṃ sadācāraviruddheṣu na tiṣṭhatā  MU
yathākṣaṇaṃ yathādeśaṃ pravicārayatā sukham 
yathāsambhavasatsaṅgam idaṃ śāstram athetarat  MU
āsādyate mahājñānabodhas saṃsāraśāntidaḥ 
sa bhūyo yena nāyāti yoniyantraprapīḍanam  MU
etāvaty eva ye bhūtā bhogān prāpya rase sthitāḥ 
svamātṛviṣṭhākrimayaḥ kīrtanīyā na te 'dhamāḥ  MU
śṛṇu tāvad idānīṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam imaṃ mayā 
rāghava jñānavistāraṃ buddhisāratarāntaram  MU
yayedaṃ śrūyate śāstraṃ tāṃ tu vistarataś śṛṇu 
vicāryate yathārtho 'yaṃ yayā ca paribhāṣayā  MU
yenehānanubhūte 'rthe dṛṣṭenārthāvabodhanam 
bodhopakāraphaladaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ vidur budhāḥ  MU
dṛṣṭāntena vinā rāma nāpūrvo 'rtho 'vabudhyate 
yathā dīpaṃ vinā rātrau bhāṇḍopaskaraṇaṃ gṛhe  MU
yair yaiḥ kākutstha dṛṣṭāntais tvaṃ mayehāvabodhyase 
sarve sakāraṇās te hi prāpyaṃ tu sad akāraṇam  MU
upamānopameyānāṃ kāryakāraṇatoditā 
varjayitvā paraṃ brahma sarveṣām eva vidyate  MU
brahmopadeśadṛṣṭānto yasya veha hi kathyate 
ekadeśasadharmatvaṃ tatrātaḥ parigṛhyate  MU
yo yo nāmeha dṛṣṭānto brahmatattvāvabodhane 
dīyate sa sa boddhavyas svapnadṛṣṭajagadgataḥ  MU
evaṃ sati nirākāre brahmaṇy ākāravān katham 
dṛṣṭānta iti nodyanti mūrkhavaikalpikoktayaḥ  MU
anyā siddhaviruddhādidṛg dṛṣṭāntapradūṣaṇe 
svapnopamatvāj jagatas samudeti na kācana  MU
avastu pūrvāparayor vartamānavicāritam 
yathā jāgrat tathā svapnas siddha ābālam akṣatam  MU
svapnasaṅkalpanadhyānavaraśāpauṣadhādibhiḥ 
ye 'rthās ta iha dṛṣṭāntās tadrūpatvāj jagatsthiteḥ  MU
mokṣopāyakṛtā granthakāreṇānye 'pi ye kṛtāḥ 
granthās teṣv iyam evaikā vyavasthā bodhyabodhane  MU
svapnābhatvaṃ ca jagataś śrute śāstre 'vabhotsyate 
śīghraṃ na pāryate vaktuṃ vāk kila kramavartinī  MU
svapnasaṅkalpasudhyānanagarādyupamaṃ jagat 
yatas ta eva dṛṣṭāntās tasmād bhāntīha netare  MU
akāraṇaṃ kāraṇinā yad bodhāyopamīyate 
na tatra sarvasādharmyaṃ sambhavaty upamābhramaiḥ  MU
upameyasyopamānād ekāṃśena sadharmatā 
aṅgīkāryāvabodhāya dhīmatā nirvivādinā  MU
arthāvalokane dīpād ābhāmātrād ṛte kila 
na sthālatailavartyādi kiñcid evopayujyate  MU
ekadeśasadharmatvād upameyāvabodhanam 
upamānaṃ karoty aṅga dīpo 'rthaṃ prabhayā yathā  MU
dṛṣṭāntasyāṃśamātreṇa bodhyabodhodaye sati 
upādeyatayā grāhyo mahāvākyārthaniścayaḥ  MU
na kutārkikatām etya nāśanīyā prabuddhatā 
anubhūtyapalāpāttair apavitrair vikalpitaiḥ  MU
vicāraṇād anubhavakāri vāṅmayaprasaṅgatām upagatam asmadādiṣu 
striyoktam apy aparam athāpi vaidikaṃ vaco vacaḥpralapanam eva nāgamaḥ  MU
asmākam asti matir aṅga tayeti sarvaśāstraikavākyakaraṇaṃ phalitaṃ yato 'taḥ 
prātītikārthamayaśāstranijāṅgapuṣṭāt saṃvedanād itarad asti na naḥ pramāṇam  MU
pramāṇadṛṣṭāntanirṇayo nāma sargaḥ
ekonaviṃśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
viśiṣṭāṃśasadharmatvam upamāneṣu gṛhyate 
ko bhedas sarvasādṛśye tūpamānopameyayoḥ  MU
dṛṣṭāntabuddhād ekātmajñānaśāstrārthavedanāt 
mahāvākyārthasaṃvittyā śāntir nirvāṇam ucyate  MU
tasmād dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntavikalpollasitair alam 
yayā kayācid yuktyāśu mahāvākyārtham āśrayet  MU
śāntiś śreyaḥ paraṃ viddhi tatprāptau yatnavān bhavet 
bhoktavya odanaḥ prāptaḥ kiṃ tatsiddhivikalpitaiḥ  MU
akāraṇaṃ kāraṇibhir bodhārtham upamīyate 
upamānais tūpameyasadṛśair ekadeśataḥ  MU
sthātavyaṃ neha bhogeṣu vivekavikalātmanā 
upalodarasañjātaparipīnāndhabhekavat  MU
dṛṣṭāntair yuktibhir yatnād vāñchitaṃ tyajatetarat 
vicāraṇavatā bhāvyaṃ śāntiśāstrārthaśālinā  MU
śāstropaśamasaujanyaprajñātajjñasamāgamaiḥ 
antarāntarasampannadharmyārthopārjanakriyaḥ  MU
tāvad vicārayet prājño yāvad viśrāntim ātmani 
samprayāty apunarnāśāṃ śāntiṃ turyapadābhidhām  MU
turyaviśrāntiyuktasya pratīrṇasya bhavārṇavāt 
jīvato 'jīvataś caiva gṛhasthasyātha vā yateḥ  MU
na kṛtenākṛtenārtho na śrutismṛtivibhramaiḥ 
nirmandara ivāmbhodhis sa tiṣṭhati yathāsthitam  MU
ekāṃśenopamānānām upameyasadharmatā 
boddhavyā bodhyabodhāya na stheyaṃ codyacañcunā  MU
yayā kayācid yuktyāśu boddhavyaṃ bodhyam eva te 
muktaye tan na paśyanti vyākulāś codyacañcavaḥ  MU
hṛdaye saṃvidākāśe viśrānte 'nubhavātmani 
vastuny anarthaṃ yaḥ praṣṭā codyacañcus sa ucyate  MU
abhimānavikalpāṃśair ajño jñaptiṃ vikalpayan 
bodhaṃ malinayaty antar mukhaṃ sarpa ivāmalam  MU
sarvapramāṇasattānāṃ padam abdhir apām iva 
pramāṇam ekam eveha pratyakṣaṃ rāma tac chṛṇu  MU
sarvārthasāram adhyakṣaṃ vedanaṃ vidur uttamāḥ 
nūnaṃ tat prati yat siddhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tad udāhṛtam  MU
anubhūter vedanasya pratipatter yathāsthitam 
pratyakṣam iti nāmeha kṛtaṃ jīvas sa eva ca  MU
sa eva saṃvit sa punar ahantāpratyayātmakaḥ 
sa yayodeti saṃvittyā sā padārtha iti smṛtā  MU
sa saṅkalpavikalpādyaiḥ kṛtanānākramo bhramaiḥ 
jagattayā sphuraty ambu taraṅgāditayā yathā  MU
prāg akāraṇam evāśu sargādau sargalīlayā 
sphuritvā kāraṇībhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ svayam ātmani  MU
kāraṇatvaṃ vicāro 'sya jīvasyāsad api sthitam 
sad ivāsyāṃ jagadrūpasampattau vyaktim āgatam  MU
svayam eva vicāras tu sanañarthaṃ svakaṃ vapuḥ 
nāśayitvā karoty āśu pratyakṣaṃ paramaṃ padam  MU
vicārayan vicāro 'pi nātmānam adhigacchati 
yadā tadā nirullekhaṃ param evāvaśiṣyate  MU
manasy anīhite śānte tair buddhīndriyakarmabhiḥ 
neha kaiścit kṛtair artho nākṛtair apy abhāvanāt  MU
manasy anīhite śānte na pravartanta eva te 
karmendriyāṇi karmādāv asañcāritayantravat  MU
manoyantrasya calane kāraṇaṃ vedanaṃ viduḥ 
prāṇālī dārumeṣasya rajjur antargatā yathā  MU
rūpālokamanaskārapadārthādyākulaṃ jagat 
vidyate vedanasyāntar vāte 'ntas spandanaṃ yathā  MU
sarvātmavedanaṃ śuddhaṃ yathodeti tadātmakam 
bhāti prasṛtadikkālabāhyāntārūpadehakam  MU
draṣṭaiva dṛśyatābhāsaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ dhārayan sthitaḥ 
svaṃ yathā tatra yad rūpaṃ pravibhāti tathaiva tat  MU
sarvam ātmā yathā tatra saṅkalpatvam ivāgataḥ 
tiṣṭhaty āśu tathā tatra tadrūpa iva rājate  MU
sarvātmakatayā draṣṭur dṛśyatvam iva yujyate 
draṣṭṛtvaṃ draṣṭrasadbhāve dṛśyasya tv asti nāsataḥ  MU
akāraṇakam evāto brahmakalpam idaṃ sthitam 
pratyakṣam eva nirmātṛ tasyāṃśās tv anupādhayaḥ  MU
svayatnamātretararūpako yas taddaivaśabdārtham apāsya dūre 
śūreṇa sādho padam uttamaṃ tat svapauruṣeṇaiva hi labhyate 'ntaḥ  MU
vicārayācāryaparamparāṇāṃ matena satyena sitena tāvat 
yāvad viśuddhāṃ svayam eva buddhām anantarūpāṃ paratām upaiṣi  MU
pramāṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
viṃśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
āryasaṅgamayuktyādau prajñāṃ vṛddhiṃ nayed balāt 
tato mahāpuruṣatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ  MU
yo yo yena guṇeneha puruṣaḥ pravirājate 
śikṣeta taṃ tam evāśu tasmād buddhivivṛddhaye  MU
mahāpuruṣatā tv eṣā śamādiguṇaśālinī 
samyagjñānaṃ vinā rāma siddhim eti na kasyacit  MU
jñānāc chamādayo yānti vṛddhiṃ satpuruṣakramāt 
ślāghanīyāḥ phalenāntar vṛṣṭer iva navāṅkurāḥ  MU
śamādibhyo guṇebhyaś ca vardhate jñānam uttamam 
annātmakebhyo yajñebhyaś śālivṛṣṭir ivottamā  MU
guṇāś śamādayo jñānāc chamādibhyas tathā jñatā 
parasparaṃ vivardhete ete 'bdasarasī yathā  MU
jñānaṃ satpuruṣācārāj jñānāt satpuruṣakramaḥ 
parasparaṃ gatau vṛddhiṃ jñānasatpuruṣakramau 
eko 'pi naitayos tāvat puruṣasyeha sidhyati  MU
yathā kalamarakṣiṇyā gītyā vitatatārayā 
khagotsādena sahito gītānandaḥ prasādhyate  MU
jñānasatpuruṣehābhyām akartrā kartṛrūpiṇā 
tathā puṃsā niricchena samam āsādyate padam  MU
sadācārakramaḥ prokto mayaiṣa raghunandana 
tathopaveśyate samyag ayaṃ jñānakramo 'dhunā  MU
idaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puruṣārthaphalapradam 
tajjñād āptātmaśāstrārthāc chrotavyaṃ kila dhīmatā  MU
śrutvā tu buddhinairmalyād balād yāsyasi satpadam 
yathā katakasaṃśleṣāt prasādam avaśaṃ payaḥ  MU
viditavedyam idaṃ hi mano mune vivaśam eva hi yāti paraṃ padam 
yad avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamaṃ tadavabodhadaśāṃ na jahāti hi  MU
jñānasatpuruṣakramo nāma sargaḥ
mumukṣuvyavahāraprakaraṇaṃ samāptam
 Prakaraṇa Utpatti
vasiṣṭhaḥ
vāgbhābhir brahmavid brahma bhāti svapna ivātmani 
yad idaṃ tat svaśabdārthair yo yad vetti sa vettu tat  MU
nyāyenānena sarvasmin sarge brahmāmbare sati 
kim idaṃ kasya vakṣīti codyacañcur nirākṛtaḥ  MU
ahaṃ tāvad yathājñānaṃ yathāvastu yathākramam 
yathāsvabhāvaṃ vacmīdaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrūyatāṃ budhāḥ  MU
svapnavat paśyati jagac cinnabho dehavinmayam 
svapnasaṃsāradṛṣṭāntā ihaivāntas samanvitāḥ  MU
mumukṣuvyavahāroktimayāt prakaraṇād anu 
athotpattiprakaraṇaṃ mayedaṃ parikathyate  MU
bandho 'yaṃ dṛśyasadbhāvo dṛśyābhāve na bandhanam 
na sambhavati dṛśyaṃ tu yathedaṃ tac chṛṇu kramāt  MU
utpadyate yo jagati sa eva kila vardhate 
sa eva mokṣam āpnoti svargaṃ vā narakaṃ ca vā  MU
atas te svavabodhārthaṃ tat tāvat kathayāmy aham 
utpattiṃ saṃsṛtāv eti pūrvam eva hi yo yathā  MU
idaṃ prakaraṇārthaṃ tvaṃ saṅkṣepāc chṛṇu rāghava 
tataḥ prakathayiṣyāmi vistaraṃ te yathepsitam  MU
yad idaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam 
tat suṣupta iva svapnaḥ kalpānte pravinaśyati  MU
tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam 
anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ yat kiñcid avaśiṣyate  MU
ṛtam ātmā paraṃ brahma satyam ityādikā budhaiḥ 
kalpitā vyavahārārthaṃ yasya sañjñā mahātmanaḥ  MU
sa tathābhūta evātmā svayam anya ivollasan 
jīvatām upayātīva bhāvināmakadarthanām  MU
tatas sa jīvaśabdārthakalanākulatāṃ gataḥ 
mano bhavati maunātmā mananān mantharībhavat  MU
manas sampadyate tena mahataḥ paramātmanaḥ 
susthirād asthirākāras taraṅga iva vāridheḥ  MU
tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati nityaśaḥ 
teneyam indrajālaśrīr vitateva vitanyate  MU
yathā kaṭakaśabdārthaḥ pṛthaktvārho 'sti kānake 
na nāma kaṭake tadvaj jagacchabdārthatā pare  MU
brahmaṇy evāsty ananyātma yathāsthitam idaṃ jagat 
na jagacchabdakārtho 'sti hemnīva kaṭakāditā  MU
asataivāsatī tāpanadyeva laharī calā 
manasaivendrajālaśrīr jāgatī pravitanyate  MU
avidyā saṃsṛtir bandho māyā moho mahat tamaḥ 
kalpitānīti nāmāni yasyās sakalavedibhiḥ  MU
bandhasya tāvad rūpaṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ śṛṇu 
tatas svarūpaṃ mokṣasya jñāsyasīndusamānana  MU
draṣṭur dṛśyatvasattāṅga bandha ity abhidhīyate 
draṣṭā dṛśyavaśād baddho dṛśyābhāvād vimucyate  MU
jagat tvam aham ityādisargātmā dṛśyam ucyate 
yāvad etat sambhavati tāvan mokṣo na vidyate  MU
nedaṃ nedam iti vyarthaiḥ pralāpair nopaśāmyati 
saṅkalpajanakair dṛśyavyādhiḥ pratyuta vardhate  MU
na ca tarkabharakṣodair na tīrthaniyamādibhiḥ 
sato dṛśyasya jagato yasmād ete vicārakāḥ  MU
jagad dṛśyaṃ tu yady asti na śāmyaty eva tat kvacit 
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ  MU
acetyacitsvarūpātmā yatra yatraiṣa tiṣṭhati 
tatra tatrāsya dṛśyaśrīs samudety apy aṇūdare  MU
tasmād asti jagad dṛśyaṃ tat pramṛṣṭam idaṃ mayā 
tyaktaṃ tapodhyānajapair iti kāñcikatṛptivat  MU
yadi nāma jagad dṛśyam asti tat pratibimbati 
paramāṇūdare 'py asmiṃś cidādarśe na saṃśayaḥ  MU
yatra tatra sthitaṃ rāma yathādarśe prabimbati 
adridyūrvīnadīśādi cidādarśe tathaiva hi  MU
tatas tatra punar duḥkhaṃ jarā maraṇajanmanī 
bhāvābhāvagrahotsargās sthūlasūkṣmacalācalāḥ  MU
idaṃ pramārjitaṃ dṛśyaṃ mayā nātrāham āsthitaḥ 
etad evākṣayaṃ bījaṃ samādhau saṃsṛtismṛteḥ  MU
sati tv asmiñ jagaddṛśye nirvikalpasamādhinā 
na cākṣayasuṣuptatvaṃ turyaṃ vāpy upapadyate  MU
vyutthāne hi samādhīnāṃ suṣuptānta ivākhilam 
jagadduḥkham idaṃ bhāti yathāsthitam akhaṇḍitam  MU
prāptaṃ bhavati he rāma tat kiṃ nāma samādhibhiḥ 
bhūyo 'narthanipāte hi kṣaṇasāmye 'pi kiṃ sukham  MU
yadi vāpi samādhāne nirvikalpe sthitiṃ vrajet 
tad akṣayasuṣuptābhaṃ tan manye nāmalaṃ padam  MU
prāpyate sati dṛśye 'smin na ca tan nāma kenacit 
yatra tatra kilāyāti cittabhrāntyā jagadbhramaḥ  MU
draṣṭātha yadi pāṣāṇarūpatāṃ bhāvayan balāt 
kilāste tat tadante 'pi bhūyo 'syodeti dṛśyatā  MU
na ca pāṣāṇatātulyā nirvikalpasamādhayaḥ 
keṣāñcit sthitim āyānti sarvair ity anubhūyate  MU
na ca pāṣāṇatātulyā rūḍhiṃ yātās samādhayaḥ 
bhavanty agryaṃ padaṃ śāntaṃ cidrūpam ajam avyayam  MU
tasmād yadīdaṃ sad dṛśyaṃ tan na śāmyet kadācana 
śāmyet tapojapadhyānair dṛḍham ity ajñakalpanā  MU
ālīnavallarīrūpaṃ yathā padmākṣakoṭare 
āste kamalinībījaṃ tathā draṣṭari dṛśyadhīḥ  MU
yathā rasaḥ padārtheṣu yathā tailaṃ tilādiṣu 
kusumeṣu yathāmodas tathā draṣṭari dṛśyadhīḥ  MU
yatra yatra sthitasyāpi karpūrādes sugandhatā 
yathodeti tathā dṛśyaṃ ciddhātor udare jagat  MU
yathā cātra tava svapnasaṅkalpaś cittarājyadhīḥ 
svānubhūtyaiva dṛṣṭāntas tasmād dhṛdy asti dṛśyabhūḥ  MU
tasmāc cittavikalpasthaḥ piśāco bālakaṃ yathā 
vinihanty evam eṣāntar draṣṭāraṃ dṛśyarūpikā  MU
yathāṅkuro 'ntar bījasya saṃsthito deśakālataḥ 
karoti bhāsuraṃ dehaṃ tanoty evaṃ hi dṛśyadhīḥ  MU
dravyasya hṛdy eva camatkṛtir yathā sadoditāsty astamayojjhitodare 
dravyasya cinmātraśarīriṇas tathā svabhāvabhūtāsty udare jagatsthitiḥ  MU
bandhahetuvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
dvitīyas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
idam ākāśajākhyānaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam 
utpattyākhyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ yena rāghava budhyase  MU
astīhākāśajo nāma dvijaḥ paramadhārmikaḥ 
dhyānaikaniṣṭhas satataṃ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ  MU
sa ciraṃ jīvati yadā tadā mṛtyur acintayat 
sarvāṇy eva krameṇāhaṃ bhūtāny admi kilākṣayaḥ  MU
evam ākāśajaṃ vipraṃ na kasmād bhakṣayāmy aham 
atra me kuṇṭhitā śaktiḥ khaḍgadhārā yathopale  MU
iti sañcintya taṃ hantum agacchat tatpuraṃ tadā 
tyajanty udyamam udyuktā na kadācana kecana  MU
tatas tatsadanaṃ yāvan mṛtyuḥ praviśati svayam 
tāvad enaṃ dahaty agniḥ kalpāntajvalanopamaḥ  MU
agnijvālāmahājālaṃ vidāryāntargato 'py asau 
dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā samādātuṃ hastenaicchat prayatnataḥ  MU
na cāśakat puro dṛṣṭam api hastaśatair dvijam 
balavān apy avaṣṭabdhuṃ saṅkalpapuruṣaṃ yathā  MU
athāgatya yamaṃ mṛtyur apṛcchat saṃśayacchidam 
kim ity ahaṃ na śaknomi bhoktum ākāśajaṃ prabho  MU
yamaḥ
mṛtyo na kiñcic chaktas tvam eko mārayituṃ balāt 
māraṇīyasya karmāṇi tatkartṝṇīha netarat  MU
tasmād etasya viprasya māraṇīyasya yatnataḥ 
karmāṇy anviccha teṣāṃ tvaṃ sāhāyyenainam atsyasi  MU
tatas sa mṛtyur babhrāma tatkarmānveṣaṇādṛtaḥ 
maṇḍalāni digantāṃś ca sarāṃsi sarito diśaḥ  MU
vanajaṅgalajālāni śailāmbhodhitaṭāny api 
dvīpāntarāṇy araṇyāni nagarāṇi purāṇi ca  MU
grāmān akhilarāṣṭrāṇi deśāntagahanāni ca 
evaṃ bhūmaṇḍalaṃ bhrāntvā sa kutaścin na kānicit  MU
tāny ākāśajakarmāṇi labdhavān mṛtyur udyataḥ 
vandhyāputram iva prājñas saṅkalpādrim ivāparaḥ  MU
samapṛcchad athāgatya yamaṃ sarvārthakovidam 
parāyaṇaṃ hi prabhavas sandeheṣv anujīvinām  MU
mṛtyuḥ
ākāśajasya karmāṇi kva sthitāni vada prabho 
dharmarājo 'tha sañcintya suciraṃ proktavān idam  MU
dharmarājaḥ
ākāśajasya karmāṇi mṛtyo santi na kānicit 
eṣa hy ākāśajo vipro jātaḥ khād eva kevalāt  MU
ākāśād eva yo jātas sa vyomaivāmalaṃ bhavet 
sahakārīṇi no santi kāraṇāṇy asya kānicit  MU
sambandhaḥ prāktanenāsya na manāg api karmaṇā 
asti vandhyāsutasyeva tathājātākṛter iva  MU
tasmād ajāta evaiṣa svayambhūr aja eva ca 
naitasya pūrvakarmāsti nabhasīva mahādrumaḥ  MU
naitad asyāvaśaṃ cittam abhāvāt pūrvakarmaṇaḥ 
adya tāvad anenānyan na kiñcit karma sañcitam  MU
eṣa ākāśakośātmā viśadākāśarūpiṇi 
samādhau saṃsthito nityaṃ karmāṇy asya na kānicit  MU
prāktanāni na santy asya karmāṇy adya karoti no 
kiñcid apy evam eṣo 'tra vijñānākāśamātrakam  MU
prāṇaspando 'sya yat karma lakṣyate cāsmadādibhiḥ 
dṛśyate 'smābhir evaitan na tv asyāsty atra karmadhīḥ  MU
deho 'sya dṛśyate 'smābhir naiṣa vetti parāt padāt 
bhinnam ākāśam ātmīyaṃ citstambhe sālabhañjikām  MU
anutkīrṇā yathā stambhe saṃsthitā sālabhañjikā 
tathaiṣa paramātmāntas svātmabhūtas sthito dvijaḥ  MU
yathā dravatvaṃ payasi śūnyatvaṃ ca yathāmbare 
mārute ca yathā spandas tathaiṣa parame pade  MU
karmāṇy adyatanāny asya sañcitāni na santi hi 
na pūrvāṇy eva teneha na saṃsāravaśaṃ gataḥ  MU
sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve yaḥ prajāyate 
nāsau svakāraṇād bhinno bhavatīty anubhūyate  MU
nirmalākāśakośātmā dvija eṣa svayambhavaḥ 
kartā na pūrvaṃ nāpy adya katham ākramyate vada  MU
yadaiṣa kalanāṃ buddhyā mṛtyunāmnīṃ kariṣyati 
tadaiva rahito buddhyā svayam eva mariṣyati  MU
pṛthvyādimān aham ayam iti yasya svaniścayaḥ 
sa pārthivo bhavaty āśu grahītuṃ sa ca śakyate  MU
eṣa tv apārthivākāraś śuddhavijñānarūpavān 
dṛḍharajjveva gaganaṃ grahītuṃ naiva yujyate  MU
mṛtyuḥ
bhagavañ jāyate śūnyaḥ kathaṃ nāma vadeti me 
pṛthvyādayaḥ kathaṃ santi na santi vada vā katham  MU
yamaḥ
na kadācana jāto 'sau na ca nāsti kadācana 
dvijaḥ kevalavijñānabhāmātraṃ tat tathā sthitam  MU
mahāpralayasampattau na kiñcid avaśiṣyate 
brahmāste śāntam ajaram anantātmaiva kevalam  MU
cetyanirmuktacinmātram aṇūnām aṇu viddhi tat 
tathā tad aṇu yenāsya nikaṭe 'drinibhaṃ nabhaḥ  MU
sa cinmātrasvabhāvatvād deho 'ham iti cetasi 
kākatālīyavad bhātam ākāraṃ tena paśyati  MU
sa eṣa brāhmaṇas tasmin sargādāv ambarodare 
svayaṃ bhātas svayambhūtvaṃ gato bhāty ajarāmaraḥ  MU
nāsya deho na karmāṇi na kartṛtvaṃ na vāsanā 
eṣa śuddhacidākāśo vijñānaghanam ātatam  MU
prāktanaṃ vāsanājālaṃ kiñcid asya na vidyate 
kevalaṃ vyomarūpasya bhārūpasyeva tejasaḥ  MU
kevalaṃ vedanāmātrād evam eṣo 'valokyate 
vedanāmātrasaṃśāntāv īdṛśo 'pi na dṛśyate  MU
tasmād yathā cidākāśas tathā tatpratipattayaḥ 
kutaḥ kilātra pṛthvyādeḥ kīdṛśas sambhavaḥ katham  MU
etadākramaṇe mṛtyo tasmān mā yatnavān bhava 
grahītuṃ yujyate vyoma na kadācana kenacit  MU
rāmaḥ
brahmaiva kathito brahmaṃs tvayā me prapitāmahaḥ 
svayambhūr aja ekātmā vijñānātmeti me matiḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
evam etan mayā rāma brahmaiṣa kathitas tava 
vivādam akaron mṛtyur yamenaitatkṛte purā  MU
manvantare sarvabhakṣo yadā mṛtyur haran prajāḥ 
balam ety abjajākrāntāv ārambham akarot svayam  MU
tad evaṃ dharmarājena yamenāśv anuśāsitaḥ 
yad eva kriyate nityaṃ ratis tatraiva jāyate  MU
brahmā kila parākāśavapur ākramyate katham 
manomātram asaṅkalpaḥ pṛthvyādirahitākṛtiḥ  MU
yaś cidvyomacamatkāraḥ kilākāśānubhūtimān 
sa cidvyomaiva no tasya kāraṇatvaṃ na kāryatā  MU
ākāśasphuradākāras saṅkalpapuruṣo yathā 
pṛthvyādirahito bhāti svayambhūr bhāsate tathā  MU
na dṛśyam asti no draṣṭā paramātmani kevale 
svayaṃ cittvāt tathāpy eṣa svayambhūr iti bhāsate  MU
saṅkalpamātram evaitan mano brahmeti kathyate 
saṅkalpākāśapuruṣo nāsya pṛthvyādi vidyate  MU
yathā citrakṛdantassthā nirdehā bhāti putrikā 
tathaiva bhāsate brahmā cidākāśāccharañjanam  MU
cidvyoma kevalam anantam anādimadhyaṃ brahmeti bhāti nijacittavaśāt svayambhūḥ 
ākāravān iva rasād iha vastutas tu vandhyātanūja iva nāsti tu tasya dehaḥ  MU
ādyasṛṣṭivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
tṛtīyas sargaḥ
rāmaḥ
evam etan manaś śuddhaṃ pṛthvyādirahitaṃ nabhaḥ 
mune brahmeti kathitaṃ satyaṃ pṛthvyādivarjitam  MU
tad atra prāktanī nāma smṛtiḥ kasmān na kāraṇam 
yathā mama tathānyasya bhūtānāṃ ceti me vada  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
pūrvadeho 'sti yasyādyaḥ pūrvakarmasamanvitaḥ 
tasya smṛtis sambhavati kāraṇaṃ saṃsṛtisthiteḥ  MU
brahmaṇaḥ prāktanaṃ karma yadā kiñcin na vidyate 
prāktanī saṃsmṛtis tasya tadodeti kutaḥ katham  MU
tasmād akāraṇaṃ bhāti vā svacittvaikakāraṇam 
svakāraṇād ananyātmā svayambhūs svayamātmavān  MU
ātivāhika evāsau deho 'sty asya svayambhuvaḥ 
na tv ādhibhautiko rāma deho 'jasyopapadyate  MU
rāmaḥ
ātivāhika eko 'sti deho 'nyas tv ādhibhautikaḥ 
sarvāsāṃ bhūtajātīnāṃ brahmaṇo 'sty eka eva kim  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
sarveṣām eva dehau dvau bhūtānāṃ kāraṇātmanām 
ajasya kāraṇāsattvād eka evātivāhikaḥ  MU
sarvāsāṃ bhūtajātīnām eko 'jaḥ kāraṇaṃ param 
ajasya kāraṇaṃ nāsti tenāsāv ekadehavān  MU
nāsty eva bhautiko dehaḥ prathamasya prajāpateḥ 
ākāśātmāvabhāty eṣa ātivāhikadehavān  MU
cittamātraśarīro 'sau na pṛthvyādimayātmakaḥ 
ādyaḥ prajāpatir vyomatanuḥ pratanute prajāḥ  MU
tāś ca nirvāṇarūpiṇyo vinānyaiḥ kāraṇāntaraiḥ 
yad yatas tat tad eveti sarvair evānubhūyate  MU
nirvāṇamātraṃ prathamaṃ paraṃ bodhas tad eva ca 
cittamātraṃ tad evāste na yāti vasudhāditām  MU
sarveṣāṃ bhūtamanasāṃ saṃsāravyavahāriṇāṃ 
prathamo 'sau praticchandaś cittadehas svatodayaḥ  MU
yasmāt pūrvāt praticchandād ananyaitatsvarūpiṇī 
iyaṃ pravisṛtā sṛṣṭis spandadṛṣṭir ivānilāt  MU
pratibhānākṛter asmāt pratibhāmātrarūpadhṛt 
vibhāty evam ayaṃ sargas satyānubhavavat sthitaḥ  MU
dṛṣṭānto 'tra svapnapuraṃ svapnastrīsurataṃ tathā 
asad apy arthasampattyā satyānubhavabhāsuram  MU
apṛthvyādimayo bhāti vyomākṛtir adehakaḥ 
sadeha iva bhūteśas svātmabhūḥ puruṣākṛtiḥ  MU
sa citsaṅkalparūpatvād udety apy atha śāmyati 
svāyattatvāt svabhāvasya nodeti na ca śāmyati  MU
brahmā saṅkalparahitaḥ pṛthvyādirahitākṛtiḥ 
kevalaś cittamātrātmā kāraṇaṃ trijagatsthiteḥ  MU
saṅkalpa eṣa kacati yathā nāma svasambhavaḥ 
vyomātmaiṣa tathā bhāti bhavatsaṅkalpaśailavat  MU
ātivāhikataikāntavismṛtyā dṛḍharūḍhayā 
ādhibhautikabodhena mudhā bhāti piśācavat  MU
idamprathamatodyogasamprabuddhamahāciteḥ 
nodeti śuddhasaṃvittvād ātivāhikavismṛtiḥ  MU
ādhibhautikatā tena nāsyodeti piśācikā 
asatyā mṛgatṛṣṇeva mithyā jāḍyabhramapradā  MU
manomātraṃ yadā brahmā na pṛthvyādimayātmakaḥ 
manomātram ato viśvaṃ yad yatas tat tad eva hi  MU
ajasya sahakārīṇi kāraṇāni na santi yat 
tajjasyāpi na santy eva tāni tasmāt tu kānicit  MU
kāraṇāt kāryavaicitryaṃ tenātrāsti na kiñcana 
yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ śuddhaṃ kāryaṃ tādṛg iha sthitam  MU
kāryakāraṇatā tv atra na kiñcid upapadyate 
yādṛg eva paraṃ brahma tādṛg eva jagattrayam  MU
manastām iva yātena brahmaṇā tanyate jagat 
ananyad ātmanaś śuddhād dravatvam iva vāriṇā  MU
manasā tanyate sarvam asad evedam ātatam 
yathā saṅkalpanagaraṃ yathā gandharvapattanam  MU
ādhibhautikatā nāsti rajjvām iva bhujaṅgatā 
brahmādayaḥ prabuddhās tu kathaṃ tiṣṭhantu tatra te  MU
ātivāhika evāsti na prabuddhamateḥ kila 
ādhibhautikadehasya carcaivātra kutaḥ katham  MU
manonāmno manuṣyasya vividhākāradhāriṇaḥ 
manorājyaṃ jagad iti satyarūpam iva sthitam  MU
mana eva viriñcatvaṃ viddhi saṅkalpanātmakam 
svavapus sphāratāṃ nītvā manasedaṃ pratanyate  MU
viriñco manaso rūpaṃ viriñcasya mano vapuḥ 
pṛthvyādi vidyate nātra tena pṛthvyādi kalpitam  MU
padmākṣe padminīvāntar manohṛdy asti dṛśyatā 
manodṛśyadṛśau bhinne na kadācana kiñcana  MU
tathā cātra bhavatsvapnasaṅkalpaś cittarājyadhīḥ 
svānubhūtyaiva dṛṣṭāntas tasmād dhṛdy asti dṛśyabhūḥ  MU
tasmāc cittavikalpasthaḥ piśāco bālakaṃ yathā 
vinihanty evam eṣāntar draṣṭāraṃ dṛśyarūpikā  MU
yathāṅkuro 'ntar bījasya saṃsthito deśakālataḥ 
karoti bhāsuraṃ dehaṃ tanoty evaṃ hi dṛśyadhīḥ  MU
sac cen na śāmyati kadācana dṛśyaduḥkhaṃ dṛśye tv aśāmyati na boddhari kevalatvam 
dṛśye tv asambhavati boddhari boddhṛbhāvaḥ śāmyet sthite 'pi hi tad asya vimokṣam
āhuḥ  MU
bandhahetur nāma sargaḥ
caturthas sargaḥ
vālmīkiḥ
kathayaty evam uddāmavacanaṃ munināyake 
śrotum ekarase jāte jane maunavati sthite  MU
śānteṣu kiṅkiṇījālasvaneṣu spandanaṃ vinā 
pañjarāntarahārītaśukeṣv apy astakeliṣu  MU
suvismṛtavilāsāsu sthitāsu lalanāsv api 
citrabhittāv iva nyaste samaste rājasadmani  MU
muhūrtaśeṣam abhavad divasaṃ madhurātapam 
vyavahāro ravikarais saha tānavam āyayau  MU
vavur utphullakamalaprakaronmadamāṃsalāḥ 
vāyavo madhuraspandaṃ śravaṇārtham ivāgatāḥ  MU
śrutaṃ cintayituṃ bhānur ivāhoracanābhramam
