bhāga eṣa tv avidyāyā eva vidyātvam āgataḥ 
bījaṃ phalatvam āyāti phalam āyāti bījatām  MU
udety avidyā vidyāyās salilād iva budbudaḥ 
vidyāyāṃ līyate 'vidyā payasīva hi budbudaḥ  MU
payastaraṅgayor dvitvabhāvanād eva bhinnatā 
vidyāvidyādṛśor bhedabhāvanād eva bhinnatā  MU
payastaraṅgayor aikyaṃ yathaiva paramārthataḥ 
vidyāvidyādṛśor aikyaṃ tathaiva paramārthataḥ  MU
nāvidyātvaṃ na vidyātvam iha kiñcana vidyate 
vidyāvidyādṛśau tyaktvā yad astīha tad asti hi  MU
pratiyogivyavacchedavaśād ete raghūdvaha 
vidyāvidyādṛśau na staś śeṣe baddhapado bhava  MU
nāvidyāsti na vidyāsti kṛtaṃ kalpanayānayā 
kiñcid asti nakiñcid yac citsaṃvid iti tat sthitam  MU
tad evāviditābhāsaṃ sad avidyety udāhṛtaṃ 
viditaṃ sat tad evedam avidyākṣayasañjñitam  MU
vidyābhāvād avidyākhyā mithyaivodeti kalpanā 
mithas sattaitayor ante chāyātāpadṛśor iva  MU
avidyāyāṃ tu līnāyāṃ kṣaṇād dve eva kalpane 
ete rāghava līyete avācyaṃ pariśiṣyate  MU
avidyāsaṅkṣayāt kṣīṇe vidyāpakṣe 'pi rāghava 
yac chiṣṭaṃ tan nakiñcid vā kiñcid vāpīdam ātatam  MU
tatredaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ na ca kiñcana dṛśyate 
vaṭas svavaṭadhānāyām iva puṣpaphalādimān  MU
tat sarvaśakti kacitaṃ sarvaśaktisamudgakam 
nabhaso 'py adhikaṃ śūnyam avedyaṃ ca cidātmakam  MU
sūryakānte yathā vahnir yathā kṣīre ghṛtaṃ tathā 
tatredaṃ saṃsthitaṃ sarvaṃ deśakālakramodayam  MU
yathā sphuliṅgā analād yathā bhāso divākarāt 
tasmāt tathemā niryānti sphurantyas saṃvidas sthitāḥ  MU
yathāmbhodhis taraṅgāṇāṃ yathāmalamaṇis tviṣām 
kośo nityam anantānāṃ tathā tat saṃvidāṃ tviṣām  MU
sabāhyābhyantaraṃ sarvavastūnāṃ tad avasthitam 
sarvadaivāvināśātma kumbhānāṃ gaganaṃ yathā  MU
yathā maṇer ayasspandeṣv ayaskāntasya kartṛtā 
akartur eva hi tathā kartṛtā tasya kalpyate  MU
maṇisannidhimātreṇa yathāyas spandate jaḍam 
tatsattayā tathaivāyaṃ dehaś copaty acidvapuḥ  MU
tatra sthitaṃ jagad idaṃ jagadekabīje cinnāmni saṃvid iti kalpitakalpane ca 
lolormijālam iva vāriṇi citsvarūpaṃ khād apy arūpavati yatra nakiñcid asti  MU
avidyānirākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
daśamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
tasmān nakiñcid evedaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam 
na kiñcid bhūtatāṃ yātaṃ yat kiñcid api viddhi he  MU
tatra kācin na kalanā bhāvābhāvamayātmikā 
tad idaṃ rāma jīvādi sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ kim īhase  MU
subuddho 'yam asāv antar iti yo vyapadiśyate 
na taṃ labhāmahe sarpaṃ rajjusarpabhramād iva  MU
aparijñāta ātmaiva bhramatāṃ samupāgataḥ 
jñāta ātmatvam āyāti sīmāntaṃ sarvasaṃvidām  MU
avidyety ucyate loke cic cetyamalamālitā 
cetyātītācchatām eti sarvopādhivivarjitā  MU
cittamātraṃ hi puruṣas tasmin naṣṭe na naśyati 
sthite tiṣṭhati nātmāyaṃ ghaṭe sati yathāmbaram  MU
gacchan paśyati gacchantaṃ sthitaṃ tiṣṭhañ śiśur yathā 
bhānum evam idaṃ cetaḥ paśyaty ātmānam ākulam  MU
kośakāravad ātmānaṃ vāsanānanatantubhiḥ 
veṣṭayaṃś caiva ceto 'ntar bālatvān nāvabudhyate  MU
rāmaḥ
maurkhyam atyantaghanatām āgataṃ sadavasthitam 
sthāvarāditanuṃ prāptaṃ kīdṛśaṃ bhavati prabho  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
amanastvam asamprāptaṃ manastvād api vicyutam 
taṭasthaṃ rūpam āśritya sthitaiṣā sthāvareṣu cit  MU
suptapuryaṣṭakā yatra saṃsthitā duḥkhadāyinī 
mūkāndhajaḍavat tatra sattāmātreṇa tiṣṭhati  MU
rāmaḥ
sattādvaitatayā yatra saṃsthitā sthāvareṣu cit 
tatrādūrasthitāṃ muktiṃ manye vedyavidāṃ vara  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
buddhipūrvaṃ vicāryedaṃ yathāvastvavalokanāt 
sattāsāmānyabodho yas sa mokṣaś ced anantakaḥ  MU
parijñāya parityāgo vāsanānāṃ ya uttamaḥ 
sattāsāmānyarūpatvaṃ tat kaivalyapadaṃ viduḥ  MU
vicāryāryais sahālokya śāstrāṇy adhyātmabhāvanāt 
sattāsāmānyaniṣṭhatvaṃ yat tad brahma paraṃ viduḥ  MU
antas suptā sthitā mandā yatra bīja ivāṅkuraḥ 
vāsanā tat suṣuptatvaṃ viddhi janmapradaṃ punaḥ  MU
antas saṃlīnamananaṃ paritas suptavāsanam 
suṣuptaṃ jaḍadharmāpi janmaduḥkhaśatapradam  MU
sthāvarādaya ete hi samastā jaḍadharmiṇaḥ 
suṣuptapadam ārūḍhā janmayogyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ  MU
yathā bījeṣu puṣpāṇi mṛdo rāśau yathā ghaṭāḥ 
tathāntas saṃsthitās sādho sthāvareṣu svavāsanāḥ  MU
yatrāsti vāsanābījaṃ tat suṣuptaṃ na siddhaye 
nirbījā vāsanā yatra tat turyaṃ siddhidaṃ smṛtam  MU
vāsanāyās tathā vahner ṛṇavyādhidviṣām api 
snehavairaviṣāṇāṃ ca śeṣas svalpo 'pi bādhate  MU
nirdagdhavāsanābījas sattāsāmānyarūpavān 
sadeho vā videho vā na bhūyo duḥkhabhāg bhavet  MU
cicchaktir vāsanābījarūpiṇī svāpadharmiṇī 
sthitā rasatayā nityaṃ sthāvarādiṣu vastuṣu  MU
bījeṣūllāsarūpeṇa jāḍyena jaḍarūpiṣu 
draveṣu dravabhāvena kāṭhinyenetareṣu ca  MU
bhasmany athādityarucau pāṃsuṣv apy aṇurūpiṇī 
asiteṣu talasthityā śitadhāratayāsiṣu  MU
ātmaśaktiḥ padārtheṣu ghaṭāvaṭapaṭādiṣu 
sarvatra sattāsāmānyaṃ rūpam āśritya tiṣṭhati  MU
itīyam akhilāṃ dṛśyadaśām ādāya saṃsthitā 
yathā ghanapaṭā prāvṛḍ ambarālambinī tathā  MU
svarūpam asyāś caivaitat kathitaṃ pravicāritam 
asarvaṃ sarvato vyāpi sad ivāsanmayātmakam  MU
ātmadṛṣṭir adṛṣṭaiṣā saṃsṛtibhramadāyinī 
dṛṣṭā satī samagrāṇāṃ duḥkhānāṃ kṣayakāriṇī  MU
asyās tv adarśanaṃ yat tad avidyety ucyate budhaiḥ 
avidyā hi jagaddhetus tatas sarvaṃ pravartate  MU
avidyā rūparahitā yāvad evāvalokyate 
tāvad eva galaty āśu tuhināṇur yathātape  MU
yathā naro galannidro yāvat kalanayā manāk 
vimṛśaty āśayaṃ tāvan nidrā tasya vilīyate  MU
tathā kīdṛg avastv etad iti yāvad vikalpyate 
avidyā kṣīyate tāvad ālokenāndhatā yathā  MU
dīpahasto yadābhyeti tamorūpadidṛkṣayā 
tadā galati tat sarvaṃ tamas tāpe ghṛtaṃ yathā  MU
na tu saṃlakṣyate dīpais tamaso rūpaniścayaḥ 
udeti kevalaṃ dhvāntadhvaṃso vimalamūrtimān  MU
evam ālokyamānaiṣā kvāpi yāti palāyate 
asadrūpā hy avastutvaṃ dṛśyate 'syā vicāraṇāt  MU
āloka āgate yādṛg yad yat tad dṛśyate tathā 
avastutve tv avidyāyās tv avastutvaṃ pratīyate  MU
yāvan nālokyate tāvan na kiñcid api dṛśyate 
ālokyate yathā yad yat tat tathā pratipadyate  MU
raktamāṃsāsthiyantre 'smin kas syām aham iti svayam 
yāvad vicāryate tāvat sarvam āśu pralīyate  MU
ādyantayor asadrūpe nūnaṃ parihṛte hṛdaḥ 
sarvasminn eva yaś śeṣas tam avidyākṣayaṃ viduḥ  MU
tan nakiñcic ca kiñcic ca yat sat tad brahma śāśvatam 
tad vastu tad upādeyaṃ tad avidyānivartanam  MU
svarūpaṃ nāmna evāsyā jñāyate nissvabhāvakam 
na hi jihvāgatasyekṣos svādo 'nyasmāt pratīyate  MU
nāvidyā kvacid apy asti brahmaivedam akhaṇḍitam 
sadasatkalanāsphāram aśeṣaṃ yena maṇḍitam  MU
etāvad evāvidyā yan nedaṃ brahmeti niścayaḥ 
etad eva kṣayo yas syād idaṃ brahmeti niścayaḥ  MU
ghaṭapaṭaśakaṭāvabhāsajālaṃ na vibhur itīty uditeha sā tv avidyā 
ghaṭapaṭaśakaṭāvabhāsajālaṃ vibhur iti ced galitaiva sā tv avidyā  MU
avidyācikitsā nāma sargaḥ
ekādaśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
punaḥ punar idaṃ rāma prabodhārthaṃ mayocyate 
abhyāsena vinā sādho nābhyudety ātmabhāvanam  MU
ajñānam etad balavad avidyetaranāmakam 
janmāntaraśataprauḍhaṃ nūnaṃ sthitim upāgatam  MU
sabāhyābhyantaraṃ sarvair indriyair anubhūyate 
bhāvābhāveṣu dehasya tenātighanatāṃ gatam  MU
ātmajñānaṃ tu sarveṣām indriyāṇām agocaram 
sattāṃ kevalam āyāti manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyakṣaye  MU
prollaṅghyendriyajāś śaktīr yat sthitaṃ tat kathaṃ kila 
yāti pratyakṣatāṃ jantoḥ pratyakṣātītavṛttimat  MU
nityam ajñānam evātas svabhyastaṃ sarvadehinām 
na kadācana vijñānam iha vāmutra vānagha  MU
tasmād avidyābhāgena pradhānenetaraṃ dahet 
tāvad yāvan mithogharṣāt svayaṃ śāmyec chivaṃ bhavet  MU
na hy abhyāsaṃ vinā kiñcit phaladaṃ bhavati kvacit 
yad yad āsādyate yatra tad abhyāsataroḥ phalam  MU
avidyāṃ sucirābhyastāṃ prarūḍhām api yatnataḥ 
ātmajñānadṛḍhābhyāsād anudvegāc chamaṃ nayet  MU
tvam avidyālatām etāṃ prarūḍhāṃ hṛdayadrume 
jñānābhyāsavilāsāsipātena cchinddhi siddhaye  MU
yathā viharati jñātajñeyo janakabhūpatiḥ 
ātmajñānaghanābhyāsas tathā vihara rāghava  MU
niścayo yo maruttasya kāryākāryavicāraṇe 
jāgratas tiṣṭhato vāpi taj jñānaṃ tena satyatā  MU
niścayena harir yena vividhācārakāraṇāt 
yoniṣv avataraty urvyāṃ tat tajjñatvam udāhṛtam  MU
niścayo yas trinetrasya kāntayā saha tiṣṭhataḥ 
brahmaṇo vāpy arāgasya sa te bhavatu rāghava  MU
yo niścayas suraguror vākpater bhārgavasya ca 
divākarasya śaśinaḥ pavanasyānalasya ca  MU
nāradasya pulastyasya mama vāṅgirasas tathā 
pracetaso bhṛgoś caiva krator atreś śukasya ca  MU
anyeṣāṃ devaviprendrarājarṣīṇāṃ ca rāghava 
yo niścayo 'ntarmuktānāṃ jīvatāṃ te bhavatv asau  MU
rāmaḥ
yenaite bhagavan vīrā niścayena mahādhiyaḥ 
viśokās saṃsthitās taṃ me brahman prabrūhi tattvataḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
rājaputra mahābāho viditākhilavedya he 
sphuṭaṃ śṛṇu yathāpṛṣṭam ayam eteṣu niścayaḥ  MU
yad idaṃ kiñcid ābhogi jagajjālaṃ pradṛśyate 
tat sarvam amalaṃ brahma bṛṃhayetthaṃ vyavasthitam  MU
brahma dig brahma bhuvanaṃ brahma bhūtaparamparā 
brahmāhaṃ brahma macchatrur brahma manmitrabāndhavāḥ  MU
brahma khānilatejāṃsi brahma bhūmir jalādi vā 
brahma kālatrayaṃ tac ca brahmaṇy eva vyavasthitam  MU
taraṅgamālayāmbhodhir yathātmani vivardhate 
tathā padārthalakṣmyettham idaṃ brahma vivardhate  MU
gṛhyate brahmaṇā brahma bhujyate brahma brahmaṇā 
brahma brahmaṇi bṛṃhābhir brahmaśaktyaiva bṛṃhati  MU
brahma macchatrurūpaṃ ced brahma me priyakṛd yadi 
tad brahma brahmaṇi śliṣṭaṃ kim anyat kasya kiṃ kṛtaṃ  MU
rāgādīnām avastūnāṃ kalpitānāṃ khavṛkṣavat 
asaṅkalpananaṣṭānāṃ kaḥ prasaṅgo 'tra vardhane  MU
brahmaṇy eva hi sarvasmiṃś calanaspandanādikam 
sphurati brahma sakalaṃ sukhitāduḥkhite kutaḥ  MU
brahma brahmaṇi saṃvettṛ brahma brahmaṇi saṃsthitam 
sphurati brahmaṇi brahma nāyam astītarātmakaḥ  MU
ghaṭo brahma paṭo brahma brahmāham idam ātatam 
ato rāgavirāgāṇāṃ mudhaiva kalanaiva kā  MU
maraṇabrahmaṇi svairaṃ dehabrahmaṇi saṅgate 
duḥkhitā nāma keva syād rajjusarpabhramopamā  MU
sambhogādau sukhe brahmaṇy āsthite dehabrahmaṇi 
sampannam etan ma iti mudhā syāt kalanā kutaḥ  MU
vīcyambhasos spandavator na stas tvanmanmatī yathā 
tvattāmatte tathā na sto brahmaṇi spandarūpiṇi  MU
yathāvarte mṛte toye na kiñcin mriyate kvacit 
mṛte brahmatvam āyāte dehabrahmaṇi vai tathā  MU
yathā calācale toye tvattāmatte na tiṣṭhataḥ 
tathā jaḍājaḍe rūpe na sthite paramātmani  MU
kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemno yathāvarto jalasya ca 
tadatadbhāvarūpeyaṃ tathā prakṛtir ātmanaḥ  MU
idaṃ hi bhūtaṃ jīvātma jaḍarūpam idaṃ bhavet 
ity ajñātātmano moho na tu jñātātmanaḥ kvacit  MU
ajñasya duḥkhaughamayaṃ jñasyānandamayaṃ jagat 
andhaṃ bhuvanam andhasya prakāśaṃ tu sacakṣuṣaḥ  MU
jagad ekātmakaṃ jñasya jaḍasya dvaitaduḥkhadam 
śiśor eva sphuradyakṣā niśā puṃsas tu kevalā  MU
asmin brahmaghane nityam ekasmin sarvatas sthite 
na kiñcin mriyate rāma na ca kiñcana jīvati  MU
yathollāsavilāseṣu na naśyati na jāyate 
taraṅgādi mahāmbhodhau bhūtavṛndaṃ tathātmani  MU
idaṃ nāstīdam astīti bhrāntināmnātmanātmani 
śaktir nirhetukaivāntas sphurati sphaṭikāṃśuvat  MU
jagacchaktyātmanātmaiva brahma svātmani saṃsthitam 
taraṅgakaṇajālena payasīva payoghanam  MU
śarīranāśena kathaṃ brahmaṇo mṛtadhīr bhavet 
brahmaṇo vyatiriktaṃ hi na śarīrādi vidyate 
payaso vyatirekeṇa taraṅgādi yathārṇave  MU
yaḥ kaṇo yā ca kaṇikā yā vīcī yas taraṅgakaḥ 
yaḥ pheno yā ca laharī tad yathā vāri vāriṇi  MU
yo deho yā ca kalanā yad dṛśyaṃ yau kṣayāvyayau 
yehā yā racanā yo 'rthas tat tathā brahma brahmaṇi  MU
saṃsthānaracanā citrā brahmaṇaḥ kanakād iva 
nānyarūpā vimūḍhānāṃ mudhaiva dvitvabhāvanam  MU
mano buddhir ahaṅkāras tanmātrāṇīndriyāṇi ca 
brahmaiva sarvaṃ nānyātma sukhaduḥkhādi vidyate  MU
ayaṃ so 'ham ayaṃ ca tvam ityādyarthotthayā girā 
śabdaḥ pratiśraveṇādrāv ivātmātmani jṛmbhate  MU
brahmaivājñātam ajñatvam abhyāgatam iva sthitam 
tathā hi dṛśyate svapnacetasātmātmanā mṛtaḥ  MU
abhāvitaṃ brahmatayā brahmājñānamayaṃ bhavet 
abhāvitaṃ hematayā yathā hemaiva mṛd bhavet  MU
jñātaṃ brahmatayā brahma brahmaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt 
jñātaṃ hematayā hema hemaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt  MU
brahmātmā sarvaśaktir hi yad yathā bhāvayaty alam 
nirhetukaṃ svayaṃ śaktyā tat tathāśu prapaśyati  MU
akarmakartṛkaraṇam akāraṇam anāmayam 
svayaṃprabhu mahātmaitad brahma brahmavido viduḥ  MU
aparijñātam ajñānam ajñānam iti kathyate 
parijñātaṃ bhavej jñānam ajñānaparināśanam  MU
bandhur evāparijñāto hy abandhur iti kathyate 
parijñāto bhaved bandhur abandhubhramanāśanāt  MU
idaṃ tv ayuktam ity antar jñāte sodeti bhāvanā 
tasmād ayuktād vairasyād yayā kila virajyate  MU
dvaitaṃ tv asatyam ity antar jñāte sodeti bhāvanā 
tasmād dvaitāt suvairasyād yayā kila virajyate  MU
ayaṃ nāham iti jñāte sphuṭaṃ sodeti bhāvanā 
mithyāhaṅkāratādātmyād yayā nūnaṃ virajyate  MU
brahmaivāham iti jñāte satyaṃ sodeti bhāvanā 
tasmin satye nije rūpe yayāntaḥ parilīyate  MU
sarvam eveha brahmeti jñāte brahmaiva śiṣyate 
pīte 'mṛte 'mṛtamayaḥ ko nāma na bhavet kila  MU
ceto yad evāharati tad evāśu bhavaty alam 
brahmaikābhyavahāreṇa brahmaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt  MU
yan mithyā tan mudhaiveti jñāte sodeti bhāvanā 
mithyāpratītir akhilā yayā nūnaṃ pramārjyate  MU
sarvaṃ sad eveti tate jñāte sodeti bhāvanā 
tasmin satye tate sphāre yayāntaḥ prāpyate sthitiḥ  MU
yathābhūte yathātattve yathārūpe yathāsthite 
bhāvanā sthitim āyāti nānyatrāṅga kadācana  MU
samāśatopayāte 'pi vismṛte 'pi nije jane 
abandhuvat sthite 'py antas snihyaty eva balān manaḥ  MU
janmāntaraśatābhyaste sthite 'pi hi bhavabhrame 
ātmātmany eva vimale nirvṛtiṃ vindate parāṃ  MU
nityam antikasaṃsthe 'pi pare bandhāv ivāśrite 
bandhubhāvaṃ gate 'py antar mano yāti na nirvṛtim  MU
atyantagupte 'pi viṣe bhojanasthe nanu smṛtiḥ 
nivṛttāpi pravṛttāpi sphuraty eva cakoravat  MU
janmāntaraśatābhyaste 'py āgate sauhṛdaṃ param 
anātmabhūte dṛśye 'smin nāyam ātmā prasīdati  MU
atyantagupte 'py amṛte bhojanasthe nanu smṛtiḥ 
rājate rajanī meghacchanne 'pīva niśākare  MU
nitye satye tathābhūta ātmātmany eva hṛṣyati 
nānātāciragupte 'pi lupte 'pi kalanāmalaiḥ  MU
tāvad ātmātmanā yatnāt prakṣālyedaṃ malaṃ malaiḥ 
durbhāvanamalaś śāstraiś śodhyo yāvad bhavet sitaḥ  MU
śāntadurvāsane jñānaṃ puṇyaṃ lagati cetasi 
niṣkalaṅke site vastre yathā kuṅkumarañjanam  MU
sarvaṃ sakalanirmāṇaṃ kāleṣu triṣv api sthitam 
nityam ekaṃ samaṃ śuddhaṃ brahmaiveti suniścayaḥ  MU
sarvathā sarvadā sārvaṃ sarvaṃ ghaṭapaṭādimat 
jagajjanitavistāraṃ brahmedam iti vedmy aham  MU
na me duḥkhaṃ na karmāṇi na mamehā na vāñchitam 
samas svastho viśoko 'smi brahmāham iti satyatā  MU
ahaṃ raktam ahaṃ māṃsam aham asthīny ahaṃ vapuḥ 
cid ahaṃ cetanaṃ cāhaṃ brahmāham iti satyatā  MU
ahaṃ tṛṇam ahaṃ vallī gulmo 'haṃ kānanāny aham 
śailasāgarasārtho 'haṃ brahmaivetthaṃ kila sthitam  MU
ādānadānasaṅkocapūrvikā bhūtaśaktayaḥ 
sarvam eva cidātmāsmi brahma vyātatarūpadhṛt  MU
latāgulmāṅkurādīnām aham udbhāvanaiṣaṇāḥ 
cidātmāntargataṃ śāntaṃ paraṃ brahma rasātmakam  MU
yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ 
so 'yaṃ cid aham ekātmā paraṃ brahmeti niścayaḥ  MU
cid ātmā brahma sat satyam ṛtaṃ jña iti nāmabhiḥ 
procyate sarvagaṃ tattvaṃ cinmātraṃ cetyavarjitam  MU
ābhāsamātram amalaṃ sarvabhūtāvabodhakam 
sarvatrāvasthitaṃ śāntaṃ cidbrahmety anubhūyate  MU
manobuddhīndriyavrātasamastakalanācitam 
bhedaṃ tyaktvā svam ābhāsaṃ cidbrahmāham anāmayam  MU
śabdādīnām aśeṣāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ jagatsthiteḥ 
tattvāvabhāsakaṃ svacchaṃ cidbrahmāsmi na me kṣayaḥ  MU
anāratagalatsvacchaciddhārāvahanātmakam 
ālokas samanomaunaṃ cidbrahmāsmy amṛtaṃ param  MU
anāratagaladrūpaṃ nityaṃ cānubhavāmṛtam 
aharniśaṃ kacatkānti cidbrahmāham alepakaḥ  MU
suṣuptasadṛśaṃ śāntam ālokavimalātmakam 
sambhogāntasamābhāsaṃ cidbrahmāsmi vivāsanaḥ  MU
khaṇḍādisvādusaṃvittir īṣad yatrānutiṣṭhati 
cittādiṣv apy abuddheṣu tac cidbrahmāham acyutaḥ  MU
kāntāsaṃsaktacittasya candre samudite sati 
candrapratyayasattātma cidbrahmāham anāmayam  MU
bhūmiṣṭhanaradṛṣṭīnāṃ lagnānāṃ khe niśākare 
yā khasthā tantuvac chaktis tac cidbrahmāsmi nirmalam  MU
sukhaduḥkhādikalanāvikalaṃ nirmanas tathā 
satyānubhavarūpātma cidbrahmātmāsmi śāśvatam  MU
asaṃstutādhvagāloke manasy anyatra saṃsthite 
yā pratītir anāgaskā tac cidbrahmāsmi sarvagaḥ  MU
bhūvāryanilabījānāṃ sambandhe 'ṅkurakarmasu 
śaktir udgamanī yāntas tac cidbrahmāham ātatam  MU
kharjūranimbabimbānāṃ svayam ātmani tiṣṭhatām 
yāsvādasattā līnāntas tad brahma cid ahaṃ samam  MU
khedānandavimuktāntas saṃvin nirmananodayā 
lābhālābhavidhau tulyā cidbrahmāsmi nirāmayam  MU
yāvad bhūmer dhruvas tāvad dṛṣṭisūtraṃ yad ātatam 
tanmadhyasadṛśaṃ śāntaṃ nirmalaṃ cid ahaṃ tatam  MU
jāgraty api suṣupte 'pi svapne 'pi satatoditam 
turyarūpam anādyantaṃ cidbrahmāham anāmayaḥ  MU
puṃsāṃ kṣetraśatotthānām ikṣūṇāṃ svāduvat sthitaḥ 
sarveṣām ekarūpo 'ntaś cidbrahmāsmi samas sthitaḥ  MU
sarvagā prakṛtau sūkṣmarūpā bhānor iva prabhā 
ālokakāriṇī kāntā cidbrahmedam ahaṃ tatam  MU
sambhogānandalavavad amṛtāsvādaśaktivat 
svānubhūtyekamāno 'ntaś cidbrahmāsmi sad avyayaḥ  MU
protāṅgam api guptasthaṃ dehe tantur bise yathā 
chedabhede sphuradrūpaṃ cidbrahmāham anāmayaḥ  MU
ākrāntabhuvanāpy abhramāleva spandaśālinī 
durlakṣyāṇumayākārā cicchaktir aham ātatā  MU
anubhūtimayāntassthasnehamātropalakṣitā 
kṣīrāntarghṛtasatteva cid ahaṃ kṣayavarjitā  MU
kaṭakāṅgadakeyūraracanā tadatanmayī 
hemnīva saṃsthitā dehe cid brahmātmāsmi sarvagam  MU
padārthaughasya śailāder bahir antaś ca saṃsthitā 
sattāsāmānyarūpeṇa yā cit sāham alepakaḥ  MU
sarvāsām anubhūtīnām ādarśo yo hy akṛtrimaḥ 
agamyo malalekhānāṃ tac cittattvam ahaṃ mahat  MU
sarvasaṅkalpaphaladaṃ sarvatejaḥprakāśakam 
sarvopādeyasīmāntaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
sarvāvayavaviśrāntaṃ samastāvayavātigam 
anārataṃ kacadrūpaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
ghaṭe paṭe taṭe kuḍye svadamānaṃ sadā tanau 
jāgraty api suṣuptasthaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
uṣṇam agnau hime śītaṃ mṛṣṭam anne śitaṃ kṣure 
kṛṣṇaṃ dhvānte sitaṃ candre cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
madhurādiṣu mādhuryaṃ tīkṣṇādiṣu ca tīkṣṇatām 
gataṃ padārthaśaktyarthaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu turye turyātige pade 
samaṃ sadaiva sarvatra cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
praśāntasarvasaṅkalpaṃ vigatākhilakautukam 
viratāśeṣasaṃrambhaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
niṣkautukaṃ nirālambaṃ nirīhaṃ sarvam eva ca 
niraṃśaṃ nirahaṅkāraṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
sarvasyānte sthitaṃ sarvam apy apāraikarūpiṇam 
aparyantaṃ cidārambhaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
trailokyadehamuktānāṃ tantum uttamam ātatam 
prasārasaṅkocakaraṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
līnam antar bahiś cograṃ kroḍīkṛtya jagatkhagam 
citraṃ bṛhajjālam iva cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
sarvaṃ yatredam asty eva nāsty eva ca manāg api 
sadasadbhūtam ekaṃ tac cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
paramaṃ pratyayaṃ pūrṇam āspadaṃ sarvasaṃvidām 
sarvākāravihārasthaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
carmamarmasirābaddhadehaduryantravāhakam 
akalaṃ sakalādhāraṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
niṣkalaṃ ṣoḍaśakalaṃ kalanākāravarjitam 
sarvākāraṃ nakiñcic ca cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
hṛtkaṇṭhatālumadhyasthaṃ bhrūnāsāpuṭakoṭigam 
gamāgamotkaprāṇasthaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
hṛtpadmakoṭarāntassthaṃ sarvāvayavakośagam 
bhuvanāḍambarādarśaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
aśiraskahakārāntam ābhāsvaram akhaṇḍitam 
bhūṣaṇaṃ sarvabhūtīnāṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
snehādhāradaśāśāntimukhavātāhatibhramaiḥ 
yuktaṃ muktaṃ ca ciddīpaṃ bahir antar upāsmahe  MU
hṛtsaraḥpadminīkandatantuṃ sarvāṅgarañjakam 
janatājīvitopāyaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
akṣīrārṇavasambhūtam aśaśāṅkāśayasthitam 
ahāryam amṛtaṃ satyaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
śabdarūparasasparśagandhair ābhāsam āgatam 
tenaiva rahitaṃ śāntaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
mahāmahimnā sahitam ahataṃ sarvakartṛbhiḥ 
kartṛtvenāpy akartāraṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
akhilam idam ahaṃ mamaiva sarvaṃ tv aham api nāham athetarac ca nāham 
iti viditavato jagat kṣataṃ me sthiram atha vāstu gatajvaro bhavāmi  MU
jīvanmuktaniścayayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ
dvādaśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
iti niścayavantas te mahānto vigatainasaḥ 
satyāsatyapade śānte same sukham avasthitāḥ  MU
iti pūrṇadhiyo dhīrās samanīrāgacetasaḥ 
na nindanti na nandanti jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā  MU
ity alaṅghyacamatkārā nārāyaṇabhujā iva 
rejur askhalitākārā aparā iva meravaḥ  MU
remire vanaṣaṇḍeṣu dvīpeṣu nagareṣu ca 
devopavanamālāsu svargeṣu ca surā iva  MU
bhremuḥ kusumapūrṇāsu dolālīlābilāsu ca 
vicitravanalekhāsu meruśṛṅgaśilāsu ca  MU
cakrur vijitaśatrūṇi cāmaracchatravanti ca 
vicitrārthāni rājyāni citrācāramayāni ca  MU
anujagmur imāṃ sarvāṃ nānārasaviceṣṭitām 
śrutismṛtyuditārambhām itikartavyatām iha  MU
vilesū ramaṇīyeṣu lalanālāsyahāriṣu 
vihārāhāraramyeṣu bhogābhogeṣu bhūṣitāḥ  MU
viceruś cārucūtāsu mandāravalitāsu ca 
apsarogītapūrṇāsu nandanodyānabhūmiṣu  MU
ūṣur ācārapūteṣu viśrāntākhilajantuṣu 
yajñakriyākarāleṣu gārhasthyeṣu yathākramam  MU
terur hatagajendrāsu bhrāntabhūriśarāsu ca 
bherībhāṅkārabhīmāsu saṅgrāmārṇavavīciṣu  MU
tasthuḥ puruṣacintāsu hṛtacittoddhatāsu ca 
saṃrambhakṣobharaudrāsu sarvāsu dvandvanītiṣu  MU
manas teṣāṃ tu nīrāgam anupādhi gatabhramam 
asaktam uttamaṃ śāntaṃ paraṃ sattvapadaṃ gatam  MU
na mamajja kvacid api saṅkaṭeṣu mahatsu ca 
muhur apy upayāteṣu kulaśailas sarassv iva  MU
nollalāsa vilāsinyā śriyā paramakāntayā 
paripūrṇendulakṣmyeva jalarāśī raghūdvaha  MU
na mamlau duḥkhaśoṣeṇa grīṣmeṇeva vanasthalam 
jaharṣa ca na bhogaughair avaśyāyair ivauṣadhiḥ  MU
te hi kevalam avyagrāḥ kurvantaḥ kāryapañjaram 
iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ rāma nābhileṣur na tatyajuḥ  MU
nodaguḥ kāryasampattāv ākrāntā nāstam āyayuḥ 
jahṛṣur na sukhaprāptau mamlur naiva ca saṅkaṭe  MU
mumuhur na vimoheṣu mamajjur na vipatkrame 
śuśucur na śucā śoke rurudur na bhavān iva  MU
prakṛtācārasamprāptaṃ kurvantaḥ karma kevalam 
sthitā vigatasaṃrambham aparā iva meravaḥ  MU
tāṃ tvaṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya rāghavāghavighātinīm 
anahaṅkṛtyalaṅkāro vihareha yathāsukham  MU
yathābhūtām imām evaṃ paśyan sargaparamparām 
merusthiro 'bdhigambhīras samāssva vigatabhramaḥ  MU
cinmātraṃ sarvam evedam ittham ābhāsatāṃ gatam 
neha satyam asatyaṃ vā kvacid apy asti kiñcana  MU
mahattām alam ālambya tyaktvedam avahelayā 
asaktabuddhis sarvatra bhava bhavya bhavakṣayī  MU
kiṃ rodiṣi ghanodvegaṃ mūḍhavac cānuśocasi 
bhramasy udbhrāntacittaṃ ca somyāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā  MU
rāmaḥ
aho nu bhagavan nūnaṃ samyagrūpaṃ vilakṣaye 
tvatprasādāt prabuddho 'smi sūryāsaṅgād ivāmbujam  MU
bhrāntir astaṅgatā nūnaṃ mihikā śaradīva me 
saṃśāntākhilasandehaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava  MU
vyapagatamadamoho mānamātsaryamuktaś cirataram uditātmā śāntaśokaś cireṇa

jīvanmuktaniścayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
trayodaśas sargaḥ

jīvanmuktapade brahman vada viśramyate katham  MU

saṃsārottaraṇe yuktir yogaśabdena kathyate 
tāṃ viddhi dviprakārāṃ tvaṃ cittopaśamadharmiṇīm  MU
ātmajñānaṃ prakāro 'syā ekaḥ prakathito bhuvi 
dvitīyaḥ prāṇasaṃrodhaś śṛṇu so 'yaṃ mayocyate  MU
rāmaḥ
sulabhatvād aduḥkhatvāt kataraś śobhano 'nayoḥ 
yenāvagatamātreṇa bhūyaḥ kṣobho na bādhate  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
prakārau dvāv api proktau yogaśabdena yady api 
tathāpi rūḍhim āyātaḥ prāṇayuktāv asau bhṛśam  MU
evaṃ yogas tathā jñānaṃ saṃsārottaraṇakrame 
samāv upāyau dvāv eva proktāv ekaphalapradau  MU
asādhyaḥ kasyacid yogaḥ kasyacij jñānaniścayaḥ 
mama tv abhimatas sādho susādho jñānajaḥ kramaḥ  MU
yaj jñātaṃ na tad ajñātaṃ svapneṣv api punar bhavet 
jñānaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu nityam eva pravartate  MU
dhāraṇāsanadeśādisādhyatvena susādhatāṃ 
nāyāti yogo hy atha vā vikalpo naiṣa śobhanaḥ  MU
dvāv eva kila yatnotthau jñānayogau raghūdvaha 
tatroktaṃ bhavato jñānam antassthajñeyanirmalam  MU

mukhānilasphuraṇanirodhasambhave sthitiṃ gate nṛpasuta cetasaḥ kṣaye 
samāhitasthitir iha yogayuktitaḥ pare pade vigalitabhīr nivatsyasi  MU
jñānayogavicāro nāma sargaḥ
caturdaśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
asti tāvad anantasya khasya kvacid ayaṃ kila 
jagadrūpaḥ parispando mṛgatṛṣṇā marāv iva  MU
tatra kāraṇatāṃ yāto brahmā kamalasambhavaḥ 
sthitaḥ pitāmahatvena sṛṣṭabhūtabharabhramaḥ  MU
tasyāhaṃ mānasaḥ putro vasiṣṭhaś śreṣṭhaceṣṭitaḥ 
ṛkṣacakre dhruvavṛte nivasāmi yugaṃ prati  MU
so 'haṃ kadācid āsthāne svarge tiṣṭhañ śatakratoḥ 
śrutavān nāradādibhyaḥ kathāṃ sucirajīvinām  MU
kathāprasaṅge kasmiṃścid atha tatrābhyuvāca ha 
śātātapo nāma munir maunī mānī mahāmatiḥ  MU
meror īśānakoṇasthapadmarāgamaye divi 
asti kalpataruś śrīmāñ śṛṅge cūḍa iti śrutaḥ  MU
tasya kalpataror mūrdhni dakṣiṇaskandhakoṭare 
kaladhautalatāprānte vidyate vihagālayaḥ  MU
tasmin nivasati śrīmān bhusuṇḍo nāma vāyasaḥ 
vītarāgo bṛhatkośe brahmeva nijapaṅkaje  MU
sa yathā jagataḥ kośe jīvatīha surāś ciram 
cirajīvī tathā svarge na bhūto na bhaviṣyati  MU
sa dīrghāyus sa nīrogas sa śrīmān sa mahāmatiḥ 
sa viśrāntamatiś śāntas sa kāntaḥ kālakovidaḥ  MU
sa yathā jīvati khagas tatheha yadi jīvyate 
tad bhavej jīvitaṃ puṃsāṃ dīrghaṃ cādeyam eva ca  MU
iti tena bhusuṇḍo 'sau bhūyaḥpṛṣṭena varṇitaḥ 
yathāvad eva devānāṃ sabhāyāṃ satyamūrtinā  MU
kathāvasarasaṃśāntāv atha yāte suravraje 
bhusuṇḍavihagaṃ draṣṭum ahaṃ yātaḥ kutūhalāt  MU
bhusuṇḍas saṃsthito yatra meroś śṛṅgaṃ tad unnatam

drutagairikakāntena tejasā vahnivarcasā

susthiraikataḍitpuñjanīlameghasamopamān  MU
devān ivājyapān nityaṃ yajñavedīlatādalān 
śukān kārśānavāñ śyāmāñ śiśūñ śikhiśikhāśikhān  MU
gaurīrakṣitabarhaughān kaumārān varabarhiṇaḥ 
skandopanyastaniśśeṣaśaivavijñānakovidān  MU
vyomny eva jātanaṣṭānāṃ mahatāṃ vyomapakṣiṇām 
bandhūn ābaddhanilayāñ śaradabhrasamākṛtīn  MU
viriñcahaṃsajān anyān anyān agniśukodbhavān 
kaumārabarhijān anyān anyān ambarapakṣijān  MU
dvituṇḍāṃś cātha bhāruṇḍān hemacūḍān vihaṅgamān 
kalaviṅkān bakān gṛdhrān kokilān krauñcakukkuṭān  MU
bhāsacāṣabalākādīn bahūn anyāṃś ca rāghava 
bhūtaughāñ jagatīvāhaṃ dṛṣṭavāṃs tatra pakṣiṇaḥ  MU
dakṣiṇaskandhaśākhāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ khe davīyasi 
athāhaṃ dṛṣṭavān puṣṭapattrāyām ambarasthitaḥ  MU
kālakākolavalayaṃ mañjarījālamālitam 
lokālokācalāraṇye kalpābhraugham iva sthitam  MU
tatra paśyāmy ahaṃ yāvad ekatra skandhakoṭare 
vicitrakusumāstīrṇe vividhāmodaśālini  MU
śakrānilayamārkendugṛhabalyupajīvinaḥ 
puṇyakṛdyoṣitāṃ svarge priyasūcakavāśitāḥ  MU
aparikṣubhitākārās sabhāyāṃ vāyasās sthitāḥ 
vibhedyameghā vātena sameneva prasāritāḥ  MU
teṣāṃ madhye sthitaś śrīmān bhusuṇḍaḥ pronnatākṛtiḥ 
madhye satkācakhaṇḍānām indranīla ivonnataḥ  MU
paripūrṇamanā mānī samas sarvāṅgasundaraḥ 
prāṇaspandāvadhānena nityam antarmukhas sukhī  MU
cirajīvīti vikhyātaś cirajīvitayā tayā 
jagadviditadīrghāyus sa bhusuṇḍa iti śrutaḥ  MU
yugāgamāpāyadaśādarśanaprauḍhamānasaḥ 
pratikalpaṃ ca gaṇayan khinnaś śakraparamparām  MU
janmanāṃ lokapālānāṃ śauriśakragarutmatām 
saṃsmartā samatītānāṃ surāsuramahībhṛtām  MU
prasannagambhīramanāḥ peśalasnigdhamugdhavāk 
avakravaktā jñātā ca nirmamo nirahaṅkṛtiḥ  MU
suhṛd dāntas tathā mitraṃ bhṛtyaḥ putro guruḥ prabhuḥ 
sarvadā sarvathā nityaṃ sarvaṃ sarvasya saṃstave  MU
somyaḥ prasannamadhuro rasavān mahātmā hṛdyas sarovara ivāntar akhaṇḍaśaityaḥ 
hṛtpuṇḍarīkakuharavyavahāravettā gāmbhīryam accham ajahat prakaṭāśayaśrīḥ  MU
bhusuṇḍadarśanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
ṣoḍaśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
atha tasyāham apataṃ dīpyamānavapuḥ puraḥ 
kiñcidvikṣobhitasabhaṃ khān nakṣatram ivācale  MU
cukṣobha vāyasāsthānanīlotpalasaraḥ kṣaṇaṃ 
matpātamandavātena bhūkampeneva sāgaraḥ  MU
aśaṅkitam api prāptād darśanāt samanantaram 
bhusuṇḍas tu vasiṣṭho 'yaṃ prāpta ity avabuddhavān  MU
pattrapuñjāt samuttasthau meghaśāva ivācalāt 
he mune svāgatam iti provāca madhurākṣaram  MU
saṅkalpamātrajātābhyāṃ karābhyāṃ kusumāñjalim 
mahyam āśu dadau bālamegho haimam ivotkaram  MU
idam āsanam ity uktvā navaṃ kalpatarucchadam 
upanītavati tyaktabhṛtye vāyasanāyake  MU
bhusuṇḍānūtthiteṣv īṣaccalapakṣeṣu pakṣiṣu 
upaviṣṭaṃ muniṃ dṛṣṭvā svāsanonmukhadṛṣṭiṣu  MU
sasabhākhagavṛndena bhusuṇḍena samaṃ tataḥ 
tasmin kalpalatākuñje upaviṣṭo 'ham āsane  MU
atha pādyādi dattvā sa bhusuṇḍas tuṣṭamānasaḥ 
mām uvāca mahātejās sauhārdamadhurākṣaram  MU
bhusuṇḍaḥ
aho bhagavatāsmākaṃ prasādo darśitaś cirāt 
darśanāmṛtasekena yat siktās sadrumā vayam  MU
matpuṇyacirasambhārapreritena tvayādhunā 
mune mānyaikamānyena kuta āgamanaṃ kṛtam  MU
kaccid asmin mahāmohe ciraṃ viharatas tava 
akhaṇḍitaiva samatā sthitā cetasi pāvane  MU
kimartham adyāgamanakleśenātmā kadarthitaḥ 
tvadvacaśśrotukāmānām ājñāṃ no dātum arhasi  MU
tvatpādadarśanād eva sarvaṃ jñātaṃ mayā mune 
yathāgamanapuṇyena vayam āyojitās tvayā  MU
cirajīvitacarcābhir vayaṃ te smṛtim āgatāḥ 
tenemaṃ pādapaṃ pādais tvaṃ pavitritavān ayam  MU
jñātatvadāgamo 'py evaṃ tvāṃ pṛcchāmīha yan mune 
bhavadvākyāmṛtāsvādavāñchā tat pravijṛmbhate  MU
ity uktavān asau pakṣī bhusuṇḍaś cirajīvitaḥ 
trikālāmalasaṃvedī tatra proktam idaṃ mayā  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
vihaṅgamamahārāja satyam etat tvayocyate 
draṣṭum abhyāgato 'smy adya tvām eva cirajīvitam  MU
āśītalāntaḥkaraṇo diṣṭyā kuśalavān asi 
patito 'si na śuddhātman bhīṣaṇāṃ bhavavāgurām  MU
tad etaṃ saṃśayaṃ chinddhi bhagavan mama tattvataḥ 
kasmin kule bhavāñ jāto jñātajñeyaḥ kathaṃ bhavān  MU
kiyad āyuś ca te sādho vṛttaṃ smarasi kiṃ ca vā 
kena vāyaṃ nivāsas te nirdiṣṭo dīrghadarśinā  MU
bhusuṇḍaḥ
yat pṛcchasi mune sarvaṃ tad idaṃ kathayāmy aham 
anudvegitayeyaṃ naḥ kathā śravyā mahātmanā  MU
yuṣmadvidhās tribhuvanaprabhupūjyarūpā ākarṇayanti yad udāradhiyo mahāntaḥ 
tenāśubhaṃ prakathitena vināśam eti meghasya dehavibhavena yathārkatāpaḥ  MU
bhusuṇḍasamāgamo nāma sargaḥ
saptadaśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
atha rāma bhusuṇḍo 'sau na prahṛṣṭo na jihmadhīḥ 
sarvāṅgasundaraś śyāmaḥ prāvṛṣīva payodharaḥ  MU
snigdhagambhīravacanas smitapūrvābhibhāṣaṇaḥ 
karasthapālīvatavatpratolitajagattrayaḥ  MU
tṛṇavaddṛṣṭasakalaḥ prameyīkṛtasaṃsṛtiḥ 
lokājavañjavībhāve dṛṣṭe jñātaparāvaraḥ  MU
dhīras sthirasamākāro viśrānta iva mandaraḥ 
paripūrṇas samaś śuddhaḥ pūrṇārṇava ivāhataḥ  MU
padaviśrāntadhīś śāntaḥ paramānandaghūrṇitaḥ 
āvirbhāvatirobhāvatajjñas saṃsārajanminām  MU
sarabhasavacanābhirāmarūpaḥ priyamadhurocitacāruhṛdyavākyaḥ 
svayam iva navam āsthitaś śarīraṃ sakalabhayāpaharaḥ paraḥ prakarṣaḥ  MU
idam amalagirāha hāsaśuddhaṃ mṛdupadam ujjhitasambhramaṃ krameṇa 
kathayitum akhilaṃ nijaṃ svarūpaṃ madhura iva stanitena mugdhameghaḥ  MU
bhusuṇḍanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
aṣṭādaśas sargaḥ
bhusuṇḍaḥ
asty asmiñ jagati jyeṣṭhas sarvanākanivāsinām 
devadevo haro nāma devadevābhipūjitaḥ  MU
ṣaṭpadaśreṇinayanā yasyoccastabakastanī 
vilāsinī śarīrārdhe latā cūtataror iva  MU
himahārasitā yasya laharīstabakombhitā 
āveṣṭitajaṭājūṭā gaṅgā kusumamālikā  MU
kṣīrasāgarasambhūtaḥ prasṛtāmṛtanirjharaḥ 
pratibimbaśaśaś śrīmān yasya cūḍāmaṇiś śaśī  MU
anārataśiraścandraprasraveṇāmarīkṛtaḥ 
yasyendranīlavat kālakūṭaḥ kaṇṭhasya bhūṣaṇam  MU
dhūlilekhāmahāvartaṃ svacchaṃ pāvakasambhavam 
paramāṇucayaṃ bhasma yasya snānajalaṃ sitam  MU
nirmalāni jitendūni ghṛṣṭāni ghaṭitāni ca 
yasyāsthīny eva ratnāni dehe kāntimayāni ca  MU
daśāśādaśam ambhodanīlaṃ śītalapallavam 
tārakābinduśabalaṃ yasya cāmbaram ambaram  MU
bhramacchivāṅganaṃ pakvamahāmāṃsaudanākulam 
bahubhūter gṛhaṃ yasya śmaśānaṃ himapāṇḍuram  MU
kapālamālābharaṇāḥ pītaraktarasāsavāḥ 
antrasragdāmavalitā bandhavo yasya mātaraḥ  MU
prasphuranmūrdhamaṇayaś copanto masṛṇāṅgakāḥ 
bhujagā valayā yasya prakacatkanakatviṣaḥ  MU
dṛkpātapluṣṭaśailendraṃ jagatkavalanālasam 
bhairavācaritaṃ yasya līlāsantrāsitāmaram  MU
svasthīkṛtajagajjīvas svavyāpārasthacetasaḥ 
yadṛcchayā karaspando yasyāsurapurakṣayaḥ  MU
ekāgramūrtayas sneharāgadveṣavivarjitāḥ 
svajanā yasya te śailās sarasā api nīrasāḥ  MU
śiraḥkhurāḥ khurakarāḥ karadantā bhujodarāḥ 
ṛkṣoṣṭrājāhivaktrāś ca pramathā yasya lālakāḥ  MU
yasya netratrayodbhāsivadanasyāmaraprabhoḥ 
yathā gaṇās tathaivānyaḥ parivāro hi mātaraḥ  MU
nṛtyanti mātaras tasya puro bhūtagaṇānatāḥ 
caturdaśavidhānantabhūtajātaikabhojanāḥ  MU
kharoṣṭrakākavadanā raktamedovasāsavāḥ 
digambarā vihāriṇyaś śarīrāvayavasrajaḥ  MU
vasanti girikūṭeṣu vyomni lokāntareṣu ca 
aṭavīṣu śmaśāneṣu śarīreṣu ca dehinām  MU
jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī cāparājitā 
vāmasrotogatā etās tumburuṃ rudram āśritāḥ  MU
siddhā śuṣkā ca raktā ca utpalā ceti devatāḥ 
sroto dakṣiṇam āśritya bhairavaṃ rudram āśritāḥ  MU
sarvāsām eva mātṝṇām aṣṭāv etās tu nāyikāḥ 
āsām anugatās tv anyā devyaś śatasahasraśaḥ  MU
raudrī ca vaiṣṇavī brāhmī vārāhī vāyavī tathā 
kaumārī vāsavī saurī cetyādyās tās sahasraśaḥ  MU
āsām anugatās tv anyā devyaḥ khecarya uttamāḥ 
devakinnaragandharvapuruṣāsurasambhavāḥ  MU
tāsām anugatās tv anyā bhūcaryaḥ koṭiśas sthitāḥ 
rūpikānāmadhāriṇyo bhūmau puruṣabhojanāḥ  MU
hayā gajāḥ kharāḥ kākā uṣṭrājagaramarkaṭāḥ 
ityādivāhanāny āsāṃ carantīnāṃ jagattraye  MU
tāḥ kāścit paśudharmiṇyaḥ kṣudrakarmasv avasthitāḥ 
kāścid viditavedyatvāj jīvanmuktapade sthitāḥ  MU
tāsāṃ madhye mahārhāṇāṃ mātṝṇāṃ munināyaka 
alambuseti vikhyātā mātā mānada vidyate  MU
vajrāśrituṇḍaś caṇḍākhya indranīlācalopamaḥ 
tasyās tu vāhanaṃ kāko vaiṣṇavyā garuḍo yathā  MU
ity aṣṭaiśvaryayuktās tā mātaro raudraceṣṭitāḥ 
vyomni melāpakaṃ cakrur ekadā samam āgatāḥ  MU
pūjayitvā jagatpūjyau devau tumburubhairavau 
vicitrārthāḥ kathāś cakrū rudhirāsavatoṣitāḥ  MU
atheyam āyayau tāsāṃ kathāvasarataḥ kathā 
asmān umāpatir devaḥ kiṃ paśyaty avahelayā  MU
prabhāvaṃ darśayāmo 'sya punar nāsmān asau yathā 
dṛṣṭamātramahāśaktiḥ kariṣyaty avadhīraṇam  MU
iti niścitya tā devyo vivarṇavadanāṅgikām 
umām eva vaśīkṛtya prokṣayām āsur ādṛtāḥ  MU
māyayāpahṛtāṃ bhartur aṅgād bhaṅgam upāgatām 
tām ālolakacāṃ devyaś cakrur odanatāṃ gatām  MU
pārvatīprokṣaṇadine tasmiṃs tatra mahotsavaḥ 
babhūva tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ nṛttageyamanoramaḥ  MU
anyā nanṛtur uddāmaravam evāmbarāmbarāḥ 
dīrghāvayavavikṣepavikāsijaghanodarāḥ  MU
anyā jahasur uddāmatālakṣveḍāghanāravam 
lasadaṅgavikāraṃ ca dhvanaḍḍamarukānanāḥ  MU
anyā jagur dhvanacchailaguham āpānatoṣitāḥ 
tārāravaṃ raṇadrandhrajaganmaṇḍapakoṭare  MU
anyāḥ pānaṃ papuḥ puṣṭacarvitārdraśiraḥkhuram 
līlāghuraghurārāvaraṇadākāśakoṭarāḥ  MU
papur udagur athoccais terur ājagmur ūṣur jahasur apur ahauṣuḥ petur uccair vavalguḥ 
nanṛtur aniśam ādus svādumāṃsaṃ ca devyas tribhuvanam apavṛttaṃ cakrur unmattanṛttāḥ  MU
mātṛvyavahāravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
ekonaviṃśas sargaḥ
bhusuṇḍaḥ
ity utsave vartamāne tāsāṃ vāhās ta uttamāḥ 
tathaiva mattā jahasur nanṛtuḥ papur apy asṛk  MU
tatra kāntāsavonmattāḥ kvacin nanṛtur ambare 
rathahaṃsyas sitā brāhmyaḥ kākaś cālambusārathaḥ  MU
nṛtyantīnāṃ tu haṃsīnāṃ pibantīnāṃ tathāsavam 
velevābdhitaṭīnāṃ tu ratis samyag ajāyata  MU
sañjātaratayo mattās sarvā haṃsyaḥ krameṇa tāḥ 
remire tena kākena caṇḍakākhyena vai tadā  MU
saptānāṃ bālahaṃsīnāṃ dayito vāyasas tv asau 
krameṇāramataikatra yāvad anyo'nyam īpsitam  MU
atha tā garbhadhāriṇyo babhūvur atitoṣitāḥ 
devyaś ca kṛtanṛttās tāḥ praśāntamadatāṃ yayuḥ  MU
dadur odanatāṃ yātām īśvarāya priyām umām 
bhojanāya mahāmāyā devyas tāś śūlapāṇaye  MU
priyā me bhojane dattety evaṃ ca śaśiśekharaḥ 
buddhvā babhūva ruṣito yadā mātṛgaṇaṃ prati  MU
tadā tās tāṃ samutpādya svāṅgadānena vai punaḥ 
dadur bhūyovivāhena pārvatīm indumaulaye  MU
tato devyo haraś caiva parivāras tathaitayoḥ 
sarve santuṣṭamanasas svāṃ svām upayayur diśam  MU
antarvatnyo babhūvus tā brāhmyo haṃsyo munīśvara 
vṛttāntaṃ kathayām āsur brāhmyā devyā yathāsthitam  MU
he vatsās sāmprataṃ garbhavatyo me rathakarmaṇi 
na samarthā bhavatyo 'pi svairaṃ carata sāmpratam  MU
iti garbhālasā haṃsīr muktvā devī dayāparā 
nirvikalpe samādhāne brāhmī tasthau yathāsukham  MU
atha nābhisarojāte vairiñce kamalākare 
garbhālasā vicerus tā rājahaṃsyo munīśvara  MU
evaṃ vipakvagarbhās tā nābhīkamalapallave 
suvate sma mṛdūny aṇḍāny atha vallya ivāṅkurān  MU
tāni kālaṃ samāsādya tatrāṇḍāny ekaviṃśatiḥ 
garbhākrāntyā dvidhā jagmur brahmāṇḍānīva sāravaṃ  MU
aṇḍebhyas tebhya evaṃ hi jātā vayam ime mune 
bhrātaraś caṇḍatanayā vāyasā ekaviṃśatiḥ  MU
te sma jātā gatā vṛddhiṃ tasmin kamalapallave 
sañjātapakṣās sampannā gaganoḍḍayanakṣamāḥ  MU
mātṛbhis saha haṃsībhir brāhmī bhagavatī tataḥ 
ciram ārādhitā samyak samādhiviratā satī  MU
prasādaparayā kāle bhagavatyā tatas svayam 
tathāṅgānugṛhītās smo yathā muktā vayaṃ sthitāḥ  MU
santṛptamanasaś śāntā ekānte dhyānasaṃsthitau 
tiṣṭhāma iti niścitya pituḥ pārśvaṃ vayaṃ gatāḥ  MU
āliṅgitās tataḥ pitrā pūjitālambusā vayam 
tayā dṛṣṭāḥ prasādena saṃsthitās tatra saṃyatāḥ  MU
caṇḍakaḥ
putrāḥ kaccid aparyantād vāsanāsūtrasūmbhitāt 
bhavanto nirgatā nūnam asmāt saṃsārajālakāt  MU
no ced vayaṃ bhagavatīṃ tad imāṃ bhṛtyavatsalām 
prārthayāmo yathā yūyaṃ bhavata jñānapāragāḥ  MU
kākāḥ
tāta jñātam alaṃ jñeyaṃ brāhmyā devyāḥ prasādataḥ 
kiṃ tv ekāntasthites sthānam abhivāñchāma uttamam  MU
caṇḍakaḥ
śṛṇuta vigatadoṣaṃ pāvanaṃ sthānam agryaṃ sthirataram ayi putrā nīḍakāmāḥ pravakṣye 
vyapagatabhayamohaṃ śāntasarvapracāraṃ nivasata ciratṛptā yatra niśśaṅkam uccaiḥ  MU
bhusuṇḍotpattir nāma sargaḥ
viṃśas sargaḥ
caṇḍakaḥ
sarvaratnagaṇādhāras samastasurasaṃśrayaḥ 
asty ameyamahotsedho merur nāma mahīdharaḥ  MU
calaccandrārkadīpasya bhūtavṛndakalatriṇaḥ 
brahmāṇḍamaṇḍapasyāsya stambhaḥ kanakanirmitaḥ  MU
sauvarṇaś candravīṭārthaṃ ratnāḍhyaś śikharāṅguliḥ 
dhvanaddvīpābdhivalayo bhuvevonnāmito bhujaḥ  MU
vṛtaḥ kulādrisāmantair jambudvīpāsane sthitaḥ 
rājā candrārkanayane bhramayañ śailasaṃsadi  MU
tāraughamālatīmālyo digdaśaikāmbarāmbaraḥ 
nāgadvitayasaṃsthātmā nākanāyakabhūṣaṇaḥ  MU
digaṅganābhir abhito ramyābhiḥ purabhūṣaṇaiḥ 
pṛṣanniṣṣyandibhiś śītair vījito ghanacāmaraiḥ  MU
ṣoḍaśāsya sahasrāṇi yojanānām adhaḥ kṣiteḥ 
sthitāḥ pādāḥ prapūjyante nānāsuramahoragaiḥ  MU
aśītis tu sahasrāṇi deho 'syārkendulocanaḥ 
pūjyate nākasadanais suragandharvakinnaraiḥ  MU
caturdaśavidhāny enaṃ gṛhastham iva bandhavaḥ 
upajīvanti bhūtāni mitho'dṛṣṭapurāspadam  MU
asya tv īśānadigbhāge padmarāgamayaṃ bṛhat 
vidyate śṛṅgam aparo divākara ivoditaḥ  MU
tasyāsti pṛṣṭhe bhūtaughavṛtaḥ kalpatarur mahān 
jagataś śikharādarśe pratibimbam iva sthitaḥ  MU
tasyāsti dakṣiṇaskandhe śākhā kanakapallavā 
ratnastabakanīrandhrā candrabimbābhasatphalā  MU
tatra nīḍaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ kṛtam āsīt sphuranmaṇi 
devyāṃ dhyānaniṣaṇṇāyāṃ yasmin kila rame sutāḥ  MU
ratnapuṣpadalacchannaṃ rasāyanaphalānvitam 
cintāmaṇiśalākābhir vihitālindasaṃsthiti  MU
buddhipūrvasamācārais sampūrṇaṃ kākaputrakaiḥ 
śītalābhyantaraṃ hṛdyaṃ pūritaṃ kusumotkaraiḥ  MU
tad gacchata sutā nīḍaṃ durgaṃ nākasadām api 
bhogaṃ mokṣaṃ ca tatrasthā nirvighnaṃ samavāpsyatha  MU
ity uktvāsmān pitā tatra cucumbābhyāliliṅga ca 
dadau devyai yad ānītam asmabhyaṃ ca tad āmiṣam  MU

adhunaikādaśaṃ janma rāmanāmno bhaviṣyati  MU
vasudevagṛhe viṣṇor bhuvo bhāranivṛttaye 
adhunā ṣoḍaśaṃ janma bhaviṣyati munīśvara  MU
nārasiṃhena vapuṣā hiraṇyakaśipuṃ hariḥ 
jaghāna vāratritayaṃ mṛgendra iva vāraṇam  MU
jagattrayībhrāntir iyaṃ na kadācin na vidyate 
vidyate na kadācic ca jalabudbudavat sthitā  MU
dṛśyabhrāntir aniṣṭheyam antassthā saṃvidātmani 
jāyate līyate cāśu lolā vīcir ivāmbhasi  MU
samaikasanniveśāni bahūni viṣamāṇi ca 
tathārdhasamarūpāṇi trijaganti smarāmy aham  MU
tāny eva tādṛkkarmāṇi tathānyācaraṇāni ca 
tatkarmāṇi tathānyāni bhūtānīha smarāmy aham  MU
pratimanvantaraṃ brahman viparyaste jagatkrame 
sanniveśe 'nyathā jāte prayāte saṃstute jane  MU
mamānyāni ca mitrāṇi te 'nya eva ca bandhavaḥ 
anya eva navā bhṛtyā anya eva samāśrayāḥ  MU
kadācid aham ekānte vindhyamūlalatāśrayaḥ 
kadācin meruśṛṅgāgrakalpavṛkṣalatāśrayaḥ  MU
kadācit sahyanilayaḥ kadācid dardurālayaḥ 
kadācid dhimavadvāsī kadācin malayāśrayaḥ  MU
kadācit prāktanenaiva sanniveśena bhūdharam 
vanaṃ vṛkṣaṃ ca śākhāṃ ca prāpya nīḍaṃ karomy aham  MU
adyānanteṣu yāteṣu yugeṣu munināyaka 
prāktanenaiva jāto 'yaṃ sanniveśena pādapaḥ  MU
tāte jīvati yaivābhūc chobhāsya sutaros tayā 
kṛtaprāksanniveśo 'yam ahaṃ sthitim upāgataḥ  MU
nehābhūd uttarā pūrvaṃ kakum nāyaṃ ca bhūdharaḥ 
dig uttarābhūd anyaiva pūrvaṃ merumahīdharā  MU
ekaikadehasaṃsthānanītabrahmaniśāgamaḥ 
dhyānānte khastha evaitat sargam ālokya vedmy aham  MU
arkāder ṛkṣasañcārān mervādes sthānakād diśām 
saṃsthānam anyathā tasmin sthite yānti diśo 'nyathā  MU
na san nāsaj jagan manye bhramo 'yaṃ kevalaṃ dhiyaḥ 
ātmaspandacamatkāravibhavo 'yaṃ vijṛmbhate  MU
putraḥ pitṛtvam āyāto mitrāṇi tv aritāṃ tathā 
strītvaṃ ca śataśo yātān puṃsaś caiva smarāmy aham  MU
kalau kṛtayugācārān kṛte kaliyugasthitīḥ 
tretāyāṃ dvāpare caiva saṃsmarāmi munīśvara  MU
adṛṣṭavedavedārthān svasaṅketavihāriṇaḥ 
sargān nirargalācārān kvacit kāṃścit smarāmy aham  MU
dhyātari brahmaṇi brahman sasurāsuramānuṣam 
caturyugasahasre dve jagac chūnyaṃ smarāmy aham  MU
vicitrasaṃsthānaviśeṣadeśān vicitrakāryākulabhūtakośān 
vicitravinyāsavilāsaveṣān smarāmy ahaṃ brahmadineṣv aśeṣān  MU
cirātītasargavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
caturviṃśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
athāsau vāyasaśreṣṭho jijñāsārtham idaṃ mayā 
bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭo mahābāho kalpavṛkṣalatāgrakhe  MU
caratāṃ jagataḥ kośe vyavahāravatām api 
kathaṃ vihagarājendra dehaṃ mṛtyur na bādhate  MU
bhusuṇḍaḥ
jānann api hi sarvajña brahmañ jijñāsayaiva mām 
pṛcchasi prabhavo nityaṃ bhṛtyaṃ vācālayanti hi  MU
tathāpi yat pṛcchasi māṃ tat te prakathayāmy aham 
anājñābhaṅgam evāhur mukhyam ārādhanaṃ satām  MU
doṣamuktāphalaprotā vāsanātantusantatiḥ 
hṛdi na grathitā yasya mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati  MU
viśvāsavṛkṣakrakacās sarve dehalatāghuṇāḥ 
ādhayo yaṃ na bhindanti mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati  MU
ṣaṇḍāt ṣaṇḍaṃ nipatitaṃ śākhāmṛgam ivoddhataṃ 
na cañcalaṃ mano yasya taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati  MU
śarīratarusarpaughāś cittaurvaśikhinaś śikhāḥ 
āśā yaṃ na dahanty antas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati  MU
rāgadveṣaviṣāpūras svamanobilamandiraḥ 
lobhavyālo na bhuṅkte yaṃ mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati  MU
pītāśeṣavivekāmbuś śarīrāmbhodhivāḍavaḥ 
na nirdahati yaṃ kopas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati  MU
yantraṃ tilānāṃ kaṭhinaṃ rāśim ugram ivākulam 
yaṃ pīḍayati nānaṅgas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati  MU
ekasmin nirmale yena pade paramapāvane 
saṃśritā dṛḍhaviśrāntis taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati  MU
ete brahman mahādoṣās saṃsāravyādhihetavaḥ 
manāg api na lumpanti cittam ekasamāhitam  MU
ādhivyādhisamutthāni valitāni mahābhramaiḥ 
na vilumpanti duḥkhāni cittam ekasamāhitam  MU
na dādati na cādatte na jahāti na yācate 
kurvad eva ca kāryāṇi cittam ekasamāhitam  MU
nāstam eti na codeti nasaṃsmṛti navismṛti 
na suptaṃ na ca jāgratsthaṃ cittam ekasamāhitam  MU
andhīkṛtahṛdākāśāḥ kāmakrodhavikārajāḥ 
cintā na parihiṃsanti cittam ekasamāhitam  MU
ye durarthā durārambhā durguṇā durudāhṛtāḥ 
duṣkramās te na kṛntanti cittam ekasamāhitam  MU
śubhāni vipulārthāni mahānti guṇavanti ca 
sarvāṇy evānudhāvanti cittam ekasamāhitam  MU
yad udarkahitaṃ satyam anapāyi gatabhramam 
durīhitadaśāmuktaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ  MU
yad adṛṣṭam aśuddhena ciravaidhuryakāriṇā 
mune kāmapiśācena tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ  MU
ādau madhye tathānte ca cirāya pari coditam 
yac cāru madhuraṃ pathyaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ  MU
yad anarthadaśāhīnaṃ nirṇītaṃ sadbhir āditaḥ 
guṇānubandhi lokyaṃ ca tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ  MU
peśalaṃ madhuraṃ hṛdyaṃ svādu śītam apakṣayam 
sutīkṣṇam atinirṇītaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ  MU
yad buddheḥ param ālokyam ādyaṃ yad amṛtaṃ param 
yad anuttamasaubhāgyaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ  MU
sāmare sahagandharve savidyādharakinnare 
sasurastrīgaṇe svarge na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham  MU
sanare sanarādhīśe saparvatapuravraje 
sāmbudhau bhūtale tāta na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram  MU
sanāge sāsuravyūhe sāsurastrījane tathā 
samasta eva pātāle na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram  MU
sasvarge sadharābhoge sapātāle sadiktaṭe 
jagaty asmiṃs tu sarvasmin na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram  MU
samukhe sakare sāṃse sapāde sorumaṇḍale 
saraktamāṃse dehe 'smin na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram  MU
ādhivyādhivilolāsu duḥkhaughavalitāsu ca 
kriyāsu nityatucchāsu na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram  MU
taralīkṛtacittāsu hṛdayāmardanīṣu ca 
cintāsu jīvakārāsu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham  MU
hṛtkṣīrodakasaspandamandareṣu caleṣv ati 
svasaṅkalpavikalpeṣu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham  MU
anāratāgamāpāyaparāsv aśiśirāsv ati 
citrācārāsu ceṣṭāsu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham  MU
na varam ekamahītalarājatā na ca varaṃ vividhāmararūpatā 
na ca varaṃ dharaṇītalanāgatā sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ  MU
na varam ākulaśāstravicāraṇaṃ na ca varaṃ varakāvyavivecanam 
na varam agryakathākramacarvaṇaṃ sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ  MU
na varam ādhimayaṃ cirajīvitaṃ na ca varaṃ maraṇaṃ dṛḍhamūḍhatā 
na ca varaṃ narako na ca viṣṭapaṃ sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ  MU
iti vividhajagatkramās samastāś calamatimūḍhatayā narasya rūḍhāḥ 
calatarakalanāhite padārthe katham upayānti ciraṃ sthitiṃ mahāntaḥ  MU
bhusuṇḍopākhyāne samādhānasaṅkalpaikanirākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
pañcaviṃśas sargaḥ
bhusuṇḍaḥ
ekaiva kevalaṃ dṛṣṭir anapāyā gatabhramā 
vidyate sarvavicchreṣṭha sarvaśreṣṭhā samunnatā  MU
ātmacintā samastānāṃ duḥkhānām antakāriṇī 
cirasambhṛtasantaptasaṃsāraśramahāriṇī 
niṣkalaṅkamanomārgavipulāṅganacāriṇī  MU
tayā samastaduḥkhānāṃ sattānarthavilāsinām 
jyotsnayevāndhakārāṇām alam antaḥ prajāyate  MU
sā svātmacintā bhagavan sarvasaṅkalpavarjitā 
yuṣmadādiṣu suprāpā duṣprāpaivāsmadādiṣu  MU
samastakalanātītaṃ parāṃ koṭim upāśritam 
padam āsādayantv etat kathaṃ sāmānyabuddhayaḥ  MU
ātmacintāvilāsinyas tv asyās sakhyo mahāmate 
kiñcit sāmyam upāyātā vidyante śaśiśītalāḥ  MU
ātmacintāsamānānāṃ vividhānāṃ munīśvara 
ātmacintāvayasyānāṃ madhyād ekatamā mayā  MU
sarvaduḥkhakṣayakarī sarvasaubhāgyavardhinī 
kāraṇaṃ jīvitasyeyaṃ prāṇacintā samāśritā  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
ity uktavantaṃ vihagaṃ bhusuṇḍaṃ punar apy aham 
jānann apīdam avyagraḥ pṛṣṭavān krīḍayā punaḥ  MU
sarvasaṃśayavicchedinn atyantacirajīvita 
yathārthaṃ brūhi me sādho prāṇacintā kim ucyate  MU
bhusuṇḍaḥ
sarvavedāntavettāsi sarvasaṃśayanāśakaḥ 
mām etat parihāsārthaṃ mune pṛcchasi vāyasam  MU
atha vā bhavatām eva bhavadbhyaḥ pariśikṣitam 
punaḥ pratyuccarāmīdaṃ kā me kṣatir upasthitā  MU
bhusuṇḍajīvitakaraṃ bhusuṇḍasyātmalābhadam 
śṛṇu prāṇasamādhānaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ mayā  MU
paśyedaṃ bhagavaṃs tāvad dehagehaṃ manoramam 
tripradhānamahāsthūṇaṃ navadvārasamāvṛtam  MU
puryaṣṭakakalatreṇa tanmātrasvajanena ca 
ahaṅkāragṛhasthena sarvataḥ paripālitam  MU
antassuṣirasatkarṇaśaṣkulīcandraśālikam 
śiroruhācchādanavad vipulākṣagavākṣakam  MU
āsyapradhānasaddvāraṃ bhujapārśvopamandiraṃ 
dantāliketakasragbhir bhūṣitadvārakoṭaraṃ  MU
anārataraṭadrūparasanādvārapālakam 
aṅgulīlokavalitapādālindakṛtasthiti  MU
raktamāṃsarasādigdhasnāyusantativeṣṭitam 
sthūlāsthikāṣṭhasadbandhaṃ sukuḍyaṃ supramārjitam  MU
īdṛśasyāsya dehasya gehasya munināyaka 
suṣire komale madhye pārśukābhittimālite  MU
padmayugmamayaṃ yantram asthimāṃsamayaṃ mṛdu 
ūrdhvādhonālam anyo'nyamilatkośaṃ lasaddalam  MU
satataspandarūpeṇa sakalākāśacāriṇā 
tasya yantrasya pattrāṇi mṛdūny āttāni vāyunā  MU
lasatsu teṣu pattreṣu sa marut parivardhate 
vātāhatalatāpattrajāle bahir ivābhitaḥ  MU
vṛddhiṃ gato 'sau pavanaḥ kṛtvātmānam anekadhā 
ūrdhvādho dikṣu cānyāsu dehe 'smin prasaraty atha  MU
prāṇāpānasamānādyais tatas sa hṛdayānilaḥ 
saṅketaiḥ procyate tajjñair vicitrācāraceṣṭitaḥ  MU
hṛtpadmayantrakuharāt samastāḥ prāṇaśaktayaḥ 
ūrdhvādhaḥ prasṛtā dehe candrabimbād ivāṃśavaḥ  MU
yānty āyānti vivalganti haranti viharanti ca 
utpatanti patanty āśu tā etāḥ prāṇaśaktayaḥ  MU
sa eṣa hṛtpadmagataḥ prāṇa ity ucyate budhaiḥ 
asya kācin mune śaktiḥ praspandayati locane  MU
kācit sparśam upādatte kācid vahati nāsayā 
kācid annaṃ jarayati kācid vakti vacāṃsi ca  MU
bahunātra kim uktena sarvam eva śarīrake 
karoti bhagavān vāyur yantrehām iva yāntrikaḥ  MU
tatrordhvādho dvisaṅketau prasṛtāv anilau mune 
prāṇāpānāv iti khyātau prakaṭau tau varānilau  MU
tayor anusaran nityaṃ mune gatim ahaṃ sthitaḥ 
śītoṣṇavapuṣor nityaṃ nityam ambarapānthayoḥ  MU
kalevaramahāyantre vāhayoś śramahīnayoḥ 
hṛdākāśārkaśaśinor agnīṣomasvarūpayoḥ  MU
śarīrapurapālasya manaso rathacakrayoḥ 
ahaṅkāreśvarasyāsya praśasteṣṭaturaṅgayoḥ  MU
tayor mamānusarataḥ prāṇāpānābhidhānayoḥ 
gatiṃ śarīramarutor āśarīram aruddhayoḥ  MU
jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu sadaiva samarūpayoḥ 
suṣuptasaṃsthitasyeva brahman gacchanti vāsarāḥ  MU
sahasradhā nikṛttāṅgād bisatantulavād api 
durlakṣyā vidyamānā ca gatis sūkṣmatarā tayoḥ  MU
aviratagatayor gatiṃ viditvā hṛdi marutor anusṛtya coditāṃ tām 
na punar iha hi jāyate mahātman muditamanāḥ puruṣaḥ praṇaṣṭapāśaḥ  MU
bhusuṇḍopākhyāne prāṇavicāro nāma sargaḥ
ṣaḍviṃśas sargaḥ
bhusuṇḍaḥ
jānann api mune sarvaṃ kiṃ māṃ pṛcchasi līlayā 
yathāpṛṣṭam ahaṃ vacmi tatrāpi śṛṇu me vacaḥ  MU
prāṇo 'yam aniśaṃ brahman spandaśaktis sadāgatiḥ 
sabāhyābhyantare dehe prāṇo 'yam upari sthitaḥ  MU
apāno 'py aniśaṃ brahman spandaśaktis sadāgatiḥ 
sabāhyābhyantare dehe tv apāno 'yam avāk sthitaḥ  MU
jāgratas svapataś caiva prāṇāyāmo 'yam uttamaḥ 
pravartate yas tajjñasya taṃ tāvac chreyase śṛṇu  MU
bāhyonmukhatvaṃ prāṇānāṃ yad dhṛdambhojakoṭarāt 
svairam evāttayatnānāṃ taṃ dhīrā recakaṃ viduḥ  MU
dvādaśāṅgulaparyantaṃ bāhyam ākramatāṃ hṛdaḥ 
prāṇānām aṅgasaṃsparśo yas sa pūraka ucyate  MU
bāhyāt parāpataty antar apāne yatnavarjitam 
yo 'ṅgaprapūraṇe sparśo vidus tam api pūrakam  MU
apāne 'staṅgate prāṇo yāvan nābhyudito hṛdi 
tāvat sā kumbhakāvasthā yogibhir yānubhūyate  MU
pūrakaḥ kumbhakaś caiva recakaś ca dvidhā sthitaḥ 
apānasyodayasthāne dvādaśāntābhidhe bahiḥ  MU
svabhāvāt sarvakālasthās somyā yatnavivarjitāḥ 
ye proktās sphāramatibhis tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇu mahāmate  MU
dvādaśāṅgulaparyantād bāhyād abhyuditaḥ prabho 
apānas tasya tatraiva svabhāvāt pūrakādayaḥ  MU
mṛdantarasthāniṣpannaghaṭavad yā sthitir bahiḥ 
vyomni nityam apānasya taṃ viduḥ kumbhakaṃ budhāḥ  MU
bāhyonmukhatvaṃ vāyor yā nāsikāgrāvadhir gatiḥ 
taṃ bāhyapūrakaṃ tv ādyaṃ vidur yogavido janāḥ  MU
nāsāgrād api nirgatya dvādaśāntāvadhir gatiḥ 
yā vāyos taṃ vidur dhīrā aparaṃ bāhyapūrakam  MU
atraivāstaṅgate prāṇe yāvan nāpāna udgataḥ 
tāvat pūrṇāṃ samāvasthāṃ bahissthaṃ kumbhakaṃ viduḥ  MU
yat tadantarmukhatvaṃ syād apānasyodayaṃ vinā 
taṃ bāhyarecakaṃ vidyāc cintyamānaṃ vimuktidam  MU
dvādaśāntād yad utthāya rūpapīvaratā parā 
apānasya bahis tat tam aparaṃ recakaṃ viduḥ  MU
bāhyān ābhyantarāṃś caitān kumbhakādīn anāratam 
prāṇāpānasvabhāvān svān buddhvā bhūyo na jāyate  MU
aṣṭāv ete mahābuddhe rātrindivam anusmṛtāḥ 
svabhāvād eva vāyūnāṃ kathitā muktidā mayā  MU
gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato 'pi vā 
ete na rodham āyānti prakṛtyā hi calo 'nilaḥ  MU
yat karoti yad aśnāti buddhyaitān samanusmaran 
kumbhakādīn naras so 'ntas tatra kartā na kiñcana  MU
suvyagram asmin vyāpāre bāhyaṃ parijahan manaḥ 
dinaiḥ katipayair eva padam āpnoti kevalam  MU
etad abhyasyataḥ puṃso bāhye viṣayavṛttiṣu 
na badhnāti ratiṃ cetaś śvadṛtau brāhmaṇo yathā  MU
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya ye sthitāḥ kṛtabuddhayaḥ 
prāptaṃ prāptavyam akhilaṃ tair akhinnās ta eva hi  MU
tiṣṭhatā gacchatā nityaṃ jāgratā svapatā tathā 
eṣā cet prekṣyate dṛṣṭis tan na bandhanam āpyate  MU
prāṇāpānānusaraṇāt prāpte bodhe nirāmaye 
saṃśāntamadamohena svasthenāntar ihoṣyate  MU
sarvārambhāṃs tyajan svasthaḥ kurvaṃś cāpi budho janaḥ 
prāṇāpānagatīḥ prāpya susvasthas sukham edhate  MU
prāṇasyābhyudayo brahman padmayantrād dhṛdi sthitāt 
dvādaśāṅgulaparyante prāṇo 'staṃ yāty ayaṃ bahiḥ  MU
apānasyodayo bāhyād dvādaśāntān mahāmune 
astaṅgatir athāmbhojayantre hṛdayasaṃsthite  MU
prāṇo yatrāstam āyāti dvādaśānte nabhaḥpade 
padāt tasmād apāno 'yam udeti samanantaram  MU
bāhyākāśonmukhaḥ prāṇo vahaty agniśikhā yathā 
hṛdākāśonmukho 'pāno nimne vahati vārivat  MU
apānaś candramā deham āpyāyayati bāhyataḥ 
prāṇas sūryo 'gnir atha vā pacaty antar idaṃ vapuḥ  MU
prāṇo hi hṛdayākāśaṃ tāpayitvā pratikṣaṇam 
mukhāgragaganaṃ paścāt tāpayaty uttamo raviḥ  MU
apānendur mukhāgre khaṃ pyāyayitvā hṛdambaram 
paścād āpyāyayaty eṣa nimeṣasamanantaram  MU
apānaśaśino 'ntassthāḥ kalāḥ prāṇavivasvatā 
yatra grastās tad āsādya padaṃ bhūyo na śocyate  MU
prāṇārkasya kalāntassthā yatrāpānahimāṃśunā 
grastā tat padam āsādya na bhūyo janmabhāṅ manaḥ  MU
prāṇa evārkatāṃ yāti sabāhyābhyantare 'mbare 
āpyāyanakarīṃ paścāc chaśitām adhigacchati  MU
prāṇa evendutāṃ tyaktvā śarīrāpyāyakāriṇīm 
kṣaṇād āyāti sūryatvaṃ saṃśoṣaṇakaraṃ param  MU
arkatāṃ samparityajya na yāvac candratāṃ gataḥ 
prāṇas tāvad vicāryāntar deśakālau na śocyate  MU
hṛdi candrārkayor jñātvā nityam astamayodayam 
ātmano nijam ādhāraṃ na bhūyo jāyate manaḥ  MU
sodayāstamayaṃ senduṃ saraśmiṃ sasamāgamam 
hṛdaye bhāskaraṃ devaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati  MU
nākṣīṇaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bahissthaṃ siddhaye tamaḥ 
hārdaṃ tu kṣapayed dhvāntaṃ yatkṣaye siddhir uttamā  MU
bāhye tamasi saṅkṣīṇe lokālokaḥ prajāyate 
hārde tu tamasi kṣīṇe svāloko jāyate paraḥ  MU
hārdāndhakārakṣayadaṃ parijñātaṃ vimuktidam 
sodayāstamayaṃ yatnāt prāṇārkam avalokayet  MU
apānenduḥ prayāty astaṃ yatra hṛtpadmakoṭare 
padāt tasmād udety antaḥ prāṇārko bahirunmukhaḥ  MU
apāne 'staṅgate prāṇas samudeti hṛdambujāt 
chāyāyāṃ galitāṅgāyāṃ tatraivāśu yathātapaḥ  MU
prāṇe tv astaṅgate bāhyād apānaḥ prodayet kṣaṇāt 
ātape parito naṣṭe chāyevāśu pade navā  MU
prāṇajanmāvanau naṣṭam apānaṃ viddhi sanmate 
apānajanmabhūmau ca prāṇaṃ naṣṭam avaihi hi  MU
astaṅgatavati prāṇe tv apāne 'bhyudayonmukhe 
bahiḥkumbhakam ālambya ciraṃ bhūyo na śocyate  MU
apāne 'staṅgate prāṇe kiñcid abhyudayonmukhe 
antaḥkumbhakam ālambya ciraṃ bhūyo na śocyate  MU
prāṇarecakamūlastham apānāpūrakoṭigam 
svasthaṃ kumbhakam abhyasya na bhūyaḥ paritapyate  MU
apānarecakādhāraṃ prāṇapūrāntasaṃsthitam 
svasaṃsthaṃ kumbhakaṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhūyaḥ paritapyate  MU
prāṇāpānāv ubhāv antar yatraitau vilayaṃ gatau 
tad ālambya padaṃ śāntam ātmanā nānutapyate  MU
prāṇabhakṣyonmukhāpānaṃ deśaṃ kālaṃ ca niṣkalam 
vicārya bahir antar vā na bhūyaḥ pariśocyate  MU
apānabhakṣaṇaparaṃ prāṇaṃ hṛdi tathā bahiḥ 
deśaṃ kālaṃ ca samprekṣya na bhūyo jāyate manaḥ  MU
yatra prāṇo hy apānena prāṇenāpāna eva ca 
nigīrṇo bahir antaś ca deśau kālau ca paśya tau  MU
kṣaṇam astaṅgataprāṇam apānodayavarjitam 
ayatnasiddhaṃ bāhyasthaṃ kumbhakaṃ tat padaṃ viduḥ  MU
kṣaṇam astaṅgatāpānaḥ prāṇodayavivarjitaḥ 
ayatnasiddho hy antassthaḥ kumbhakaḥ paramaṃ padam  MU
etat tad ātmano rūpaṃ śuddhaiṣā sā paraiva cit 
etat sad asadābhāsam etat prāpya na śocyate  MU
puṣpasyāntar ivāmodaṃ prāṇasyāntar avasthitam 
na ca prāṇaṃ na cāpānaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
prāṇakṣayapadāntastham apānakṣayakoṭigam 
apānaprāṇayor madhyaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
prāṇasya prāṇanaṃ proccaiḥ paraṃ jīvasya jīvitam 
dehasya dhāraṇaṃ dhuryaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ 
yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe  MU
ālokālokanaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvapāvanapāvanam 
bhāvābhāvanam anyūnaṃ cidātmanam upāsmahe  MU
parasparopasaṅghaṭṭe hṛdaye marutos sthitam 
bahir antas tathākāśe cidātmanam upāsmahe  MU
apāno 'staṅgato yatra prāṇo nābhyuditaḥ kṣaṇam 
kalākalaṅkarahitaṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe  MU
nāpāno 'bhyudito yatra prāṇaś cāstam upāgataḥ 
nāsāgragaganāvartaṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe  MU
prāṇāpānodbhavasthāne bāhyābhyantarasaṃsthite 
ye dve yogipadādhāraṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe  MU
prāṇāpānarathārūḍham aprāṇāpānam ātatam 
yac chaktirūpaṃ śaktīnāṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe  MU
hṛtprāṇakumbhakaṃ devaṃ bahiś cāpānakumbhakam 
pūrakāṃśavimṛṣṭaṃ yat tac cittattvam upāsmahe  MU
prāṇāpānaparāmarśasattārūpāvabodhakam 
yat prāpyaṃ prāṇamananāt tac cittattvam upāsmahe  MU
yat prāṇapavanaspando yat spandānandakāraṇam 
kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānāṃ yat tac cittattvam upāsmahe  MU
yad akhilakalanākalaṅkahīnaṃ parivalitaṃ ca sadā kalāgaṇena 
anubhavavibhavaṃ padaṃ tad agryaṃ sakalasurāvanataṃ paraṃ prapadye  MU
bhusuṇḍopākhyāne prāṇasamādhivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
saptaviṃśas sargaḥ
bhusuṇḍaḥ
eṣā hi citi viśrāntir mayā prāṇasamādhinā 
krameṇānena samprāptā svayam ātmani nirmale  MU
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya saṃsthito 'smi mahāmune 
na calāmi nimeṣāṃśam api merur ivācalaḥ  MU
gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato 'pi vā 
svapne 'pi na calaty eṣa susamādhir mamātmani  MU
nityānityāsu lolāsu jagatsthitiṣu saṃsthitaḥ 
antarmukho 'smi tiṣṭhāmi svayam evātmanātmani  MU
api saṃrudhyate vāyur api vā salilaṃ gateḥ 
naitasmāt susamādhānān niruddhaṃ saṃsmarāmy aham  MU
prāṇāpānānusaraṇāt paramātmāvalokanāt 
aśokam anuyāto 'smi padam ādyaṃ mahātapaḥ  MU
ā mahāpralayād brahmann unmajjananimajjane 
ayam adyāpi bhūtānāṃ paśyañ jīvāmi dhīradhīḥ  MU
na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyac ca cintayāmi kadācana 
dṛṣṭim ālambya tiṣṭhāmi vartamānām ihātmanaḥ  MU
yathāprāpteṣu kāryeṣu parityaktaphalaiṣaṇaḥ 
suṣuptasamayā buddhyā paritiṣṭhāmi kevalam  MU
bhāvābhāvamayīṃ cintām īhitānīhitānvitām 
vimucyātmani tiṣṭhāmi ciraṃ jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
prāṇāpānasamāyogasamayaṃ samanusmaran 
svayam ātmani tuṣyāmi tenāsmi cirajīvitaḥ  MU
idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ lapsyāmi sundaram 
iti cintā na me tena ciraṃ jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
na staumi na ca nindāmi kvacit kiñcit kadācana 
ātmano 'nyasya vā sādho tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
na tuṣyati śubhaprāptau nāśubheṣv api khidyate 
mano mama samaṃ nityaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
paramaṃ tyāgam ālambya sarvam eva sadaiva hi 
jīvitādi mayā tyaktaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
praśāntacāpalaṃ vītaśokam astasamīhitam 
mano mama mune śāntaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
kāṣṭhaṃ vilāsinīṃ śailaṃ tṛṇam agniṃ himaṃ nabhaḥ 
samaṃ sarvatra paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
kim adya mama samprāptaṃ prātar vā bhavitā punaḥ 
iti cintājvaro nāsti tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
jarāmaraṇaduḥkheṣu rājyalābhasukheṣu ca 
na bibhemi na hṛṣyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyaṃ mamāyam ayam anyataḥ 
iti brahman na jānāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
āharan viharaṃs tiṣṭhann uttiṣṭhann ucchvasan svapan 
deho 'ham iti no vedmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
imaṃ saṃsāram ārambhaṃ suṣuptavad avasthitaḥ 
asantam iva paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
yathākālam upāyātāv arthānarthau samau mama 
hastāv iva śarīrasthau tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
apāriplavayā ṛjvyā sudṛśā snigdhamugdhayā 
ṛju paśyāmi sarvatra tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
āpādamastakānte 'smin na dehe mamatā mama 
tyaktāhaṅkārapaṅkasya tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
yat karomi yad aśnāmi tat tyaktvā tadvato 'pi me 
mano naiṣkarmyam ādatte tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
yadā yadā mune kiñcid vijānāmi tadā tadā 
natim āyāmi nauddhatyaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
karomīśo 'pi nākrāntiṃ paritapye na kheditaḥ 
daridro 'pi na vāñchāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
naśyadrūpe śarīre 'sminn anaṣṭātmā cidāspadaḥ 
bhūtavṛndaṃ hasāmy ārāt tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
āśāpāśavinunnāyāś cittavṛttes samāhitaḥ 
saṃsparśaṃ na dadāmy antas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
asattāṃ jagatas sattām ātmanaḥ karabilvavat 
suptaḥ prabuddhaḥ paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
kṣīṇaṃ bhinnaṃ ślathaṃ jīrṇaṃ kṣubdhaṃ kṣuṇṇaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam 
paśyāmi navavat sarvaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
sukhito 'smi sukhāsakte duḥkhito duḥkhite jane 
sarvasya priyamitraṃ ca tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
āpady acaladhīro 'smi jaganmitraṃ ca sampadi 
bhāvābhāveṣu naivāsmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
nāham asmi na cānyo me nāham anyasya kasyacit 
iti me bhāvitaṃ cetas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
ahaṃ jagad ahaṃ vyoma deśakālakramāv aham 
ahaṃ kriyeti me buddhis tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
ghaṭaś cic cit paṭaś cit khaṃ cid vaṭaś śakaṭaś ca cit 
cit sarvam iti me bhāvas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ  MU
ity ahaṃ muniśārdūla trilokīkamalālikaḥ 
bhusuṇḍanāmā kākolaḥ kathitaś cirajīvitaḥ  MU
brahmārṇave vilulitaṃ trijagattaraṅgam utpādanāśavibhavena vibhinnarūpam 
ālīnam unnamitam ākuladṛśyadṛśyam ālokayan prakalayaṃś ca ciraṃ sthito 'smi  MU
bhusuṇḍopākhyāne cirajīvitahetukathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
aṣṭāviṃśas sargaḥ
bhusuṇḍaḥ
etat te kathitaṃ brahman yathāsmi yad ihāsmi vā 
tvadājñāmātrasiddhyarthaṃ dhārṣṭyena jñānapāraga  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
aho nu citraṃ bhagavan bhavatā bhūṣaṇaṃ śruteḥ 
ātmodantaḥ prakathitaḥ paraṃ vismayakāraṇam  MU
dhanyās te ye mahātmānam atyantaṃ cirajīvitam 
bhavantaṃ paripṛcchanti dvitīyam iva padmajam  MU
vayam adya bhṛśaṃ dhanyās svātmodantam akhaṇḍitam 
yathāvat pāvanaṃ buddhes sarvaṃ kathitavān asi  MU
prabhrāntaṃ dikṣu sarvāsu dṛṣṭā vibudhabhūmayaḥ 
bhavān iva jagaty asmin na mahān avalokitaḥ  MU
kathañcit prāpyate kaccid bhrāntveha hi mahājanaḥ 
na bhavān iva bhavyātmā sulabho jagati kvacit  MU
vaṃśakhaṇḍe hi kasmiṃścij jāyate mauktikaṃ yathā 
jagatkhaṇḍe hi kasmiṃścij jāyate tvādṛśas tathā  MU
mayā tu sumahat kāryam adya sampāditaṃ śubham 
puṇyadeho vimuktātmā yad bhavān avalokitaḥ  MU
tad astu tava kalyāṇaṃ praviśātmaguhāṃ śubhām 
madhyāhnasamayo 'yaṃ me vrajāmi suramandiram  MU
ity ākarṇya bhusuṇḍo 'sau jagrāhotthāya pādapāt 
saṅkalpitābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ supātraṃ hemapallavam  MU
kalpavṛkṣalatāpuṣpakesareṇa himatviṣā 
tat pātraṃ mauktikārgheṇa pūrayām āsa pūrṇadhīḥ  MU
tenārghyapādyapātreṇa trinetram iva mām asau 
āpādamastakaṃ bhaktyā pūjayām āsa pūrvajaḥ  MU
anuvrajyākadarthena khagendrālam iti bruvan 
viṣṭarād aham utthāya tataḥ khagavad āplutaḥ  MU
vyomni yojanamātreṇa madanuvrajyayā gataḥ 
karaṃ kareṇāvaṣṭabhya balāt saṃrodhitaḥ khagaḥ  MU
mayi yāte tato dīrghe gaganādhvany adṛśyatām 
nivṛtto 'sau vihaṅgeśo dustyajā saṅgatis satām  MU
anyo'nyaṃ mayi tasmiṃś ca taraṅgaka ivāmbudhau 
vyomany adṛśyatāṃ yāte gatas smṛtyā munīn aham  MU
saptarṣimaṇḍalaṃ prāpya jāyayā paripūjitaḥ 
vismayotphullahṛdayas tato 'haṃ rāghavāvasam  MU
bhusuṇḍo bhavyatuṇḍo 'sau tasmin kalpalatālaye 
samaś śāntamanā mānyas svasamādhānavān abhūt  MU
jīvaty adyāpi matimāṃs tasminn eva latādale 
tatraiva saṃsthito meros tathaiva kanakadrume  MU
yāte kṛtayugasyādau purā varṣaśatadvaye 
saṅgato 'haṃ bhusuṇḍena merau śṛṅgadrume 'bhavam  MU
adya rāma kṛte kṣīṇe tretā samparivartate 
madhye tretāyugasyāsya jātas tvaṃ ripusūdana  MU
punar adyāṣṭamaṃ varṣaṃ tatraivopari bhūbhṛtaḥ 
milito 'bhūd bhusuṇḍo 'sau tathaivājararūpavān  MU
itīdaṃ kathitaṃ citraṃ bhusuṇḍodantam uttamam 
śrutvā vicārya caivāntar yad yuktaṃ tat samācara  MU
iti sumunibhusuṇḍasaṅkathāṃ yo vimalamatiḥ pravicārayiṣyatīha 
bhavabhayabahalāṃ kusaṃsṛtiṃ sa prasabham asatsaritaṃ tariṣyatīti  MU
bhusuṇḍopākhyānaṃ samāptam
ekonatriṃśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
evaṃ bhusuṇḍavṛttāntaḥ kathitas te mayānagha 
anayā prajñayā tīrṇo bhusuṇḍo mohasaṅkaṭāt  MU
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya svaprāṇābhyāsapūrvikām 
bhusuṇḍavan mahābāho bhava tīrṇabhavārṇavaḥ  MU
yathā jñānena yogena santatābhyāsajanmanā 
bhusuṇḍo 'vāptavān prāpyaṃ tathā sādhaya tat padam  MU
asaktabuddhayas santo bhusuṇḍavad avasthitim 
prāpnuvanti pare tattve prāṇāpānāvalokinaḥ  MU
etā vicitrā bhavatā śrutā vijñānadṛṣṭayaḥ 
idānīṃ dhiyam ālambya yathecchasi tathā kuru  MU
rāmaḥ
bhagavan bhavatā bhūmibhāsvatā jñānaraśmibhiḥ 
hārdam uddāmadaurātmyaṃ pramṛṣṭam akhilaṃ tamaḥ  MU
prabuddhās smaḥ prahṛṣṭās smaḥ praviṣṭās smas svam āspadam 
sthitās smo jñātavijñeyā bhavanto hy aparā iva  MU
aho bhusuṇḍacaritaṃ paraṃ vismayakārakam 
bhagavan bhavatā proktam uttamārthāvabodhadam  MU
bhusuṇḍacarite brahmann etasmin yat tvayā vibho 
tac charīragṛhaṃ proktaṃ māṃsacarmāsthinirmitam  MU
tat kena nāma racitaṃ kuto vā tat samutthitam 
kathaṃ vā sthitim āyātaṃ ko vā tatrāvatiṣṭhate  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
paramārthāvabodhāya doṣāpākaraṇāya ca 
śṛṇu rāghava tattvena vakṣyamāṇam idaṃ mayā  MU
asthisthūṇaṃ navadvāraṃ raktamāṃsāvalepanam 
śarīrasadanaṃ rāma na kenacid idaṃ kṛtam  MU
ābhāsamātram evedam ittham evāvabhāsate 
dvicandravibhramākāraṃ sad asac ca vyavasthitam  MU
dvicandravibhramavidhau dvicandratvaṃ sad eva hi 
vastutaś caika evendus sthitir dehe tathaiva hi  MU
dehapratyayakāle hi deho 'yaṃ san vyavasthitaḥ 
asann eva vastutas sa proktas sadasadātmakaḥ  MU
svapnas svapnavidhau satyas tv anyadā sa mudhaiva hi 
budbudo budbudavidhau satyo mithyaiva cānyadā  MU
deho dehāvadhau satyo 'py asatya itarāvadhau 
pratibhāsāvadhau tāpe jalaṃ sad asad anyadā  MU
pratibhāsāvadhau dehas sann asaṃs tv anyadā smṛtaḥ 
ābhāsamātram evedam itthaṃ samprati bhāsate  MU
ayaṃ nāmāham ity antar gṛhītamananaṃ sthitam  MU
māṃsāsthimayanirmāṇaṃ deho nānyad iti bhramam 
tyaja saṅkalpanirmāṇā dehās santi sahasraśaḥ  MU
varatalpagato yena svapne dehena diktaṭam 
paribhramasi he rāma sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ  MU
jāgarāyāṃ manorājye yena svargapurāntaram 
paribhramasi meruṃ vā sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ  MU
svapneṣv api ca yas svapnas tatra yena mahītaṭān 
paribhramasi he rāma sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ  MU
gatair dehair manorājye mahāvibhavabhūmiṣu 
paribhramasi yeneha sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ  MU
manorājye manorājye vicitrā yā jagatkriyāḥ 
prakaroṣi mahābāho yair dehais te kva saṃsthitāḥ  MU
vilāsinyānurāgiṇyā yena saṅkalpakāntayā 
nirvṛtiṃ yāsi dehena sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ  MU
ete rāma yathā dehā mānasaspandasanmayāḥ 
tathaiva tādṛgārambho deho 'yaṃ mānasas smṛtaḥ  MU
idaṃ dhanam ayaṃ deho deśo 'yam iti yo bhramaḥ 
tat sarvaṃ cittavīryasya saṅkalpasya vijṛmbhitam  MU
dīrghaṃ svapnam imaṃ viddhi dīrghaṃ vā cittavibhramam 
dīrghaṃ vāpi manorājyaṃ saṃsāraṃ raghunandana  MU
prabodham eṣyasi yadā param ātmecchayā svayā 
drakṣyasi tvaṃ tadā samyag idam ūrdhvād adho yathā  MU
svapnasaṅkalpakalane yathānyeva jagatsthitiḥ 
tathaiveyaṃ hi saṅkalpakalanā kācid eva ha  MU
yathā pūrvaṃ mayotpattiḥ proktā kamalajanmanaḥ 
manasas svayam evāntas saṅkalpakalanodbhavā  MU
vicitraracanopetam anantaśatavibhramam 
saṅkalpakalanāmātraṃ tathedam avabhāsate  MU
yathā kalita ābhāso manaso 'bjajatāgatau 
dehavac cintito dehas sthito 'nyas tadvad eva hi  MU
prākpravāhacirābhyasto vāsanāvilayena yaḥ 
tathaiva dṛśyate dehas tadākṛtyudayena saḥ  MU
pauruṣeṇa prayatnena saṅkalpo hy ayam eva cet 
anyathā bhāvyate rāma bhūyate tad ihānyathā  MU
ayaṃ so 'haṃ mamāyaṃ ca saṃsāra iti bhāvite 
satyo 'yaṃ bhāsate rāma bhāvanādārḍhyasambhavaḥ  MU
bhāvitaṃ tīvravegena yad evāśu tad eva ca 
sarvatra dṛśyate rāma kāntevātyantavallabhā  MU
aharvyāpṛtir abhyastā yathā svapne 'pi dṛśyate 
tathā sambhāvanābhyastas saṃsāro 'py avalokyate  MU
yathā svapnāvadhau kṣipram aharvad avabhāsate 
tathedaṃ sarvakālastham api saṃlakṣyate ciram  MU
vyomany eva yathā tāpasantapte dṛśyate sarit 
dharāpy avidyamānaiva saṅkalpād dṛśyate tathā  MU
dṛśyate dṛṣṭivairūpyād yathā vyomani piñchikā 
tathaiveyaṃ jagallakṣmīr durjñānād eva bhāsate  MU
bhīrur apy eti na yathā svasaṅkalpeṣu sambhramam 
svasaṅkalpe 'pi saṃsāre na tathaiti bhayaṃ sudhīḥ  MU
sva eva hi svabhāvo 'yam itthaṃ samprati bhāsate 
saṃsārasaraṇisthityā kasmāt ko 'tra vibhāti kim  MU
sa eva kiñcit saṃśodhyaś śuddhyā vimalatāṃ gate 
tasmin na dṛśyate rāma moho 'yaṃ jāgataś calaḥ  MU
samyagālokamātreṇa svabhāvaś śuddhim ṛcchati 
na gṛhṇāti malaṃ bhūyas tāmratām iva kāñcanam  MU
ābhāsamātram evaitan na san nāsaj jagattrayam 
ity anyakalanātyāgaṃ samyagālokanaṃ viduḥ  MU
maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ svargo jñānam ajñānam eva ca 
cidābhāsād ṛte nāstīty ekatā samyagīkṣaṇam  MU
tvamahantādisaṃsāram idam etā diśo daśa 
sarvaṃ svābhāsam eveti samyagālokanaṃ viduḥ  MU
sadasanmayasaṃsāre yathābhūtārthadarśanāt 
nāstam eti na codeti samyagālokanān manaḥ  MU
nirṇīya sarvabhāvānām asattvaṃ sattvam eva vā 
niṣkāmaṃ śāntim abhyeti samyagālokanān manaḥ  MU
na nindati na ca stauti na hṛṣyati na śocati 
śītalaṃ satyatām eti samyagālokanān manaḥ  MU
avaśyam eva martavyaṃ sarvair eva hi bandhubhiḥ 
iti bandhuviyogeṣu kiṃ vṛthā paritapyase  MU
avaśyam eva ca mayā martavyam iti niścaye 
ity ātmamaraṇaprāptau kiṃ mudhā paritapyase  MU
avaśyam eva jātena kiñcit svavibhavādikam 
prāptavyaṃ puruṣeṇeti harṣasyāvasaro hi kaḥ  MU
sarvasyaiva hi saṃsāre narasya vyavahāriṇaḥ 
anarthāya bhavaty āpac chokasyāvasaro hi kaḥ  MU
bruḍaty udeti sphurati budbudaugha ivārṇave 
idaṃ hi janatājālaṃ kim atra paridevanā  MU
sat sad eva sadaivaitad asad evāsad eva hi 
kriyāvaicitryamātre tu kim asmin paridevanā  MU
nāham asmi na cābhūvaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi cādhunā 
deho 'haṃ cittadoṣo 'yaṃ kim anyat paridevyate  MU
dehāc ced anya evāhaṃ cidābhāsas tad aṅga he 
kau tau me sadasadbhāvau yanniṣṭhaṃ paritapyate  MU
iti niścayavat tv antas samyagjñānān mano muneḥ 
nāstam eti na codeti na cāntaḥ paritapyate  MU
paratām eva tāṃ so 'ntar anuttarapadasthitām 
ādatte tittirir mṛdvīṃ tṛṇakoṭim ivāmalām  MU
etadartham asatye 'smin nāsthā kāryā manāg api 
surajjveva balīvardo badhyate jantur āsthayā  MU
asatsvapnaṃ dṛḍham idam iti nirṇīya buddhitaḥ 
āsthārahitayā dṛṣṭyā vihartavyam ihānagha  MU
kartavyam eva kartavyaṃ yasya na pratibhāsate 
so 'ntaśśītalatām eti dinānte bhuvanaṃ yathā  MU
pravibhāgaṃ parityajya padārthapaṭalavraje 
ābhāsamātrasāmānyam idam ālokayānagha  MU
ābhāsamātrakaṃ rāma cintāmarśakalaṅkitam 
tatas tad api santyajya nirābhāso bhavottamaḥ  MU
cidākāśamayo nityas sarvagas sarvavarjitaḥ 
ābhāsasya parityāge bhavasy ekāntanirmalaḥ  MU
nāham asmi na me bhogās satyā ity abhibhāvite 
nedam āḍambaraṃ vyartham anarthāyāvabhāsate  MU
aham eva hi vā sarvaṃ cid ity evābhibhāvite 
nedam āḍambaraṃ vyartham anarthāyāvabhāsate  MU
darśanadvayam apy etat satyam atyantasiddhidam 
yad ekam etayor vetsi ramyaṃ tad rāma saṃśraya  MU
dvābhyām evātha vai tābhyāṃ darśanābhyām ihānagha 
viharan kuru kalyāṇaṃ rāgadveṣaparikṣayāt  MU
yat kiñcid ucitaṃ loke yan nabhasy atha yat pare 
tat sarvaṃ prāpyate rāma rāgadveṣaparikṣayāt  MU
rāgāhihitayā buddhyā yādṛg rāma viceṣṭyate 
tat tad eva prayāty āśu mūḍhānāṃ viparītatām  MU
dveṣadoṣoparuddhāsu na guṇāś cittavṛttiṣu 
padaṃ kurvanti dagdhāsu sthalīṣu hariṇā iva  MU
rāgo dveṣaś ca sarpau dvau na nilīnau manobile 
yasya kalpataros tasmāt kiṃ nāmāṅga na labhyate  MU
ye hi prājñās suniyatā vidagdhāś śāstraśālinaḥ 
rāgadveṣamayās te cej jambukās tad dhig astu tān  MU
mad dhanaṃ bhuktam anyena dhanaṃ bhuktaṃ mayānyataḥ 
itthaṃ saṃvyavahārehā ko rāgadveṣayoḥ kramaḥ  MU
dhanāni bandhavo mitraṃ punar āyānti yānti ca 
kim eteṣu naraḥ prājño rajyate vā virajyate  MU
bhāvābhāvabhavābhogā māyeyaṃ pārameśvarī 
saṃsāraracanāsarpī prasaktaṃ pradahaty alam  MU
na dhanaṃ na jano nāsmi satyaṃ rāghava vastutaḥ 
mithyaiva mithyāvalitam itīdaṃ parilakṣyate  MU
ādyantayos sarvam asan madhye 'py asthiram ādhimat 
kva badhnātu dhṛtiṃ dhīro hy anyakalpitakhadrume  MU
ekena kalpitā khe strī bhuṅkte tāṃ dūrago 'paraḥ 
itīyam aṅga saṃsāraracanā netaraḥ kramaḥ  MU
ihājavañjavībhāvam imam ākulam ātatam 
gandharvapuranirmāṇavināśena samaṃ viduḥ  MU
svapnasaṅkalpapuravad asad evedam utthitam 
kāladairghyadhiyā jātapratyayaṃ jātam adya vaḥ  MU
nāsi nāyaṃ paṭo nārtho vidyate bhittibhāgavān 
saṅkalpakalanaiveyam abhyāsāt puṣṭatāṃ gatā  MU
suṣuptasaṃsthito nityaṃ vitate śāśvate pade 
na kaścid eva parame bhavān ātmani saṃsthitaḥ  MU
sarvaṃ tatrastha evedaṃ suṣuptapadavicyutaḥ 
paripaśyasi saṃsāradīrghasvapnam urubhramam  MU
ajñānanidrāsughanasvasvabhāvān manāk cyutaḥ 
saṃsārasvapnasambhrānto bhavān ayam iha sthitaḥ  MU
tad etāṃ vitatāṃ nidrāṃ ghanājñānamayātmikām 
tyajālakṣmīm iva prāptanidhānaḥ puruṣottama  MU
prabodham ehi paśyāccham ātmānam uditaṃ sadā 
nirvikalpacidābhāsaṃ prātaḥ padmo raviṃ yathā  MU
prabudhyasva prabudhyasva punaḥ punar ayaṃ mayā 
prabodhyase mahābāho paśyātmārkam anāmayam  MU
mayaitenātiśītena vṛṣṭena jñānavāriṇā 
suśabdaśālinā rāma ghanenevāsi bodhitaḥ  MU
bodham āsādaya paraṃ prabuddho 'sy eva rāghava 
satyam ālokayālīkaṃ tyaktvemaṃ jāgataṃ bhramam  MU
na te janma na te duḥkhaṃ na doṣas te na te bhramaḥ 
sarvasaṅkalpamuktas tvaṃ svātmanātmani saṃsthitaḥ  MU
parigalitavikalpadoṣajālas samasitasārasuṣuptasomyavṛttiḥ 
ativitatam idaṃ ca somyarūpaṃ samupaśamātmani tiṣṭha he mahātman  MU
paramārthayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ
triṃśas sargaḥ
vālmīkiḥ
ity ākarṇayati svacchasamacetasi rāghave 
viśrānte svātmani svairaṃ paramānandam āgate  MU
tatrastheṣu ca sarveṣu teṣūpaśamaśāliṣu 
aparikṣubdhacitteṣu sthiteṣv abhyuditātmasu  MU
saṃśāntasakalaspandaśabdasaṃvyavahāriṇi 
sabhābhoge sthite somye rātrāv iva mahītale  MU
pramūkamugdhaghaṇṭāsu niṣaṇṇāsu nabhastale 
śṛṇvantīṣv iva śuddhāsu patākāsu vaco muneḥ  MU
śāntasañcārasaṅkrāntaniścalāsyeṣu pakṣiṣu 
svapatsv antaḥpurāṇāṃ ca pañjareṣv ālayeṣu ca  MU
vicārayatsu tattvārthaṃ buddhyā prāptavikāsayā 
sutattvajñeṣu sabhyeṣu sahajānandaśāliṣu  MU
paropaśamaśālinyā tayā sadvākyamālayā 
vinayāvanatistheṣu krīḍāmarkaṭakeṣv api  MU
rāghavasyātmaviśrāntisthityarthaṃ vacanaughataḥ 
virarāma munir vāri sasetv ātmarayād iva  MU
atha yāte muhūrtārdhe rāghave pratibodhite 
punar āha tam evārthaṃ vasiṣṭho vadatāṃ varaḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
rāma samyakprabuddho 'si svātmānam asi labdhavān 
etam evāvalambyāntas tiṣṭha meha madaṃ kṛthāḥ  MU
idaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ hi nābhau saṅkalpamātrake 
saṃrodhitāyāṃ vahanād raghunandana rudhyate  MU
bodhitāyāṃ manonābhyām idaṃ saṃsāracakrakam 
prayatnād rodhitam api pravahaty eva vegataḥ  MU
paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya balaṃ prajñāṃ ca yuktitaḥ 
nābhiṃ saṃsāracakrasya cittam eva nirodhayet  MU
prajñāsaujanyayuktena śāstrasaṃvalitena ca 
pauruṣeṇa na yat prāptaṃ na tat kvacana labhyate  MU
daivaikaparatāṃ tyaktvā bālabodhopakalpitām 
nijaṃ prayatnam āśritya cittam ādau nirodhayet  MU
ā viriñcāt pravṛttena bhrameṇājñānarūpiṇā 
asad eva sadābhāsam idam ālakṣyate 'nagha  MU
ajñānabhramavistāramithyaikākṛtayo 'nagha 
ime dehā bhramantīha sarva evāsadutthitāḥ  MU
saṅkalpapuruṣasyeva dehasyārthe kadācana 
sukhaduḥkhavikāritvaṃ na kāryaṃ rāma dhīmatā  MU
duḥkhamlānamukhakledī prasannāt kledavarjitāt 
api citranarād dehanaras tucchataras smṛtaḥ  MU
ādhivyādhiparimlāne svayaṃ kledini nāśini 
na tathā sthiratā dehe citrapuṃsi yathā kila  MU
vināśito hi citrastho deho naśyati nānyathā 
avaśyanāśo nāśātmā svayaṃ deho vinaśyati  MU
pālitas susthirāṃ śobhām ādatte citramānavaḥ 
dehas tu pālito 'py uccair naśyaty eva na vardhate  MU
tena śreṣṭhaś citradeho nāyaṃ saṅkalpadehakaḥ 
ye guṇāś citradehe hi na te saṅkalpadehake  MU
citradehād api jaḍād yo 'yaṃ tucchataraḥ kila 
tasmin māṃsamaye dehe kevāsthā bhavato 'nagha  MU
dīrghasaṅkalpadeho 'yam asmin kvāsthā mahāmate 
svalpasaṅkalpajād dehād api tucchataro hy ayam  MU
svalpasaṅkalpajo dīrghais sukhaduḥkhair na gṛhyate 
dīrghasaṅkalpajaś cāyaṃ dīrghaduḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ  MU
deho hi saṅkalpamayo nāyam asti na nāsti ca 
kiṃ vyartham etadarthaṃ hi mūḍho 'yaṃ kleśabhāg janaḥ  MU
yathā citramaye puṃsi kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ 
yathā saṅkalpapuruṣe kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ  MU
yathā manorājyamaye kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ 
yathā dvitīye śaśini kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ  MU
yathā svapnasamārambhe kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ 
yathā ghanātapajale kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ  MU
saṅkalpamātrakalite prakṛtyaiva vināśini 
tathā śarīrayantre 'smin kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ  MU
dīrghasvapnamaye hy asmiṃś cirasaṅkalpakalpite 
bhūṣite dūṣite dehe na hi kiñcic citaḥ kṣatam  MU
na cid astam upāyāti nātmā calati rāghava 
na brahma vikṛtiṃ yāti kiṃ vo dehakṣaye kṣatam  MU
bhramaccakroparistho hi tyaktacakro 'pi cakravat 
yathā paśyati dikcakraṃ bhramad atyantamohitaḥ  MU
akasmād eva rūḍhena mithyājñānena valgatā 
abhyastena tathaivedaṃ dṛśyate dehacakrakam  MU
bhramitaṃ ca bhramadrūpaṃ patadrūpaṃ ca pātitam 
hataṃ ca hanyamānaṃ ca vapur durvāsanāvaśāt  MU
ajñānajaṃ bhramaṃ tyaktvā satyāṃ dṛṣṭim avekṣya ca 
dhīratām alam ālambya ghanaṃ bhramam idaṃ tyajet  MU
saṅkalpena kṛto deho mithyājñānena san na san 
asatyena kṛtaṃ yat syān na tat satyaṃ kadācana  MU
asadabhyutthito deho rajjvām iva bhujaṅgamaḥ 
asatyām eva cemāṃ ca karoti ca jagatkriyām  MU
jaḍena rāma kriyate yat tan na kṛtam ucyate 
kurvann api tato deho na kartā kvacid eva hi  MU
nirīho hi jaḍo deho nātmano 'sty abhivāñchitam 
kartā na kaścid evāto draṣṭā kevalam asy ajaḥ  MU
yathā dīpo nivātasthas svātmany eva hi tiṣṭhati 
sākṣivat sarvabhāveṣu tathā tiṣṭha jagatsthitau  MU
yathā divasakāryāṇi bhāskaras svastha eva san 
karoty evam imāṃ rāma kuru pārthivasaṃsthitim  MU
asmin hy asanmaye dehagehe śūnye samutthite 
sattām upagate mithyā bālakalpitayakṣavat  MU
kuto 'py āgatya nissāras sarvasajjanavarjitaḥ 
ahaṅkārakuvetālaḥ praviṣṭaś cittanāmabhṛt  MU
bhṛtyatāṃ māsya gaccha tvam ahaṅkārasya durmateḥ 
asya bhṛtyatayā rāma nirayaḥ prāpyate phalam  MU
svasaṅkalpavilāsena dehagehe nirākṛtiḥ 
unmattacittavetālaḥ parivalgati līlayā  MU
śūnyadehagṛhaṃ prāpya cittayakṣeṇa tat kṛtam 
bhītā yena mahānto 'pi samādhiniratās sthitāḥ  MU
cittavetālam udvāsya svaśarīraikamandirāt 
saṃsāraśūnyanagare na bibheṣi kadācana  MU
cittabhūtābhibhūte 'smin ye śarīragṛhe ratāḥ 
citram adyāpi te kasmād ghaṭṭitā nāśmavat sthitāḥ  MU
graste cittapiśācena dehaveśmani yā dhṛtiḥ 
piśācasyaiva sā buddhir nāpiśācasya rāghava  MU
ahaṅkārabṛhadyakṣe gṛhe dagdhaśarīrake 
viharānāsthayā sādho na tavaitat kila sthiram  MU
ahaṅkārānucaratāṃ tyaktvā vitatayā dhiyā 
ahaṅkāramṛtiṃ prāpya svātmaivāśv avalambyatām  MU
ahaṅkārapiśācena grastā ye nirayaiṣiṇaḥ 
teṣāṃ mohāmayāndhānāṃ na mitrāṇi na bandhavaḥ  MU
ahaṅkāropahatayā buddhyā yā kriyate kriyā 
viṣavallyā iva phalaṃ tasyās syān maraṇātmakam  MU
vivekadhairyahīnena svāhaṅkāramahāśavam 
mūrkheṇālambitaṃ yena naṣṭam evāśu viddhi tam  MU
ahaṅkārapiśācena varākā ye vaśīkṛtāḥ 
ta ete narakāgnīnāṃ rāghavendhanatāṃ gatāḥ  MU
ahaṅkārorago yasya parisphurati koṭare 
sa dehapādapo dhīrair acireṇa nipātyate  MU
ahaṅkārapiśāco 'smin dehe tiṣṭhatu yātu vā 
tvam enam ālokaya mā manasā mahatāṃ vara  MU
avadhūto hy avajñātaś cetasaiva tiraskṛtaḥ 
ahaṅkārapiśācas te neha kiñcit kariṣyati  MU
dehālaye sphuraty asmin rāma cittapiśācake 
asyānantavilāsasya kim ivāgatam ātmanaḥ  MU
cittayakṣābhibhūtānāṃ yāḥ puṃsāṃ vitatāpadaḥ 
śakyante parisaṅkhyātuṃ na tā varṣaśatair api  MU
hato mṛto 'smi dagdho 'smīty etā durbhagavṛttayaḥ 
ahaṅkārapiśācasya śaktayo 'nyasya nānagha  MU
sarvago 'pi yathākāśas sambaddho neha kenacit 
sarvago 'pi tathaivātmā nāhaṅkāreṇa saṅgataḥ  MU
yat karoti yad ādatte dehayantram idaṃ calam 
vātarajjuyutaṃ rāma tad ahaṅkāraceṣṭitam  MU
vṛkṣonnatau yathā hetur akartr api kilāmbaram 
ātmasaṃsthas tathehātmā cittaceṣṭāsu kāraṇam  MU
ātmasannidhimātreṇa kuḍyarūpam ivāmalam 
dīpasannidhimātreṇa sphuraty āttavapur manaḥ  MU
ativiśliṣṭayo rāma nityam evātmacittayoḥ 
dyāvāpṛthivyor iva kas sambandhaḥ prakaṭāndhayoḥ  MU
calanaspandanehābhir ātmaśaktibhir āvṛtam 
cittam ātmeti maurkhyeṇa dṛśyate raghunandana  MU
ātmā prakāśarūpo hi nityas sarvagato vibhuḥ 
cittaṃ śaṭham ahaṅkāraṃ viddhi hārdaṃ bṛhattamaḥ  MU
ātmāsi raghusarvasva jaḍā nāsi manodṛṣat 
dūrīkuru manomohaṃ kim etenāsi saṅgataḥ  MU
piśāco hi manonāmā śūnye dehagṛhe sthitaḥ 
bhāyayaty eṣa duṣṭātmā mainam uttama saṃspṛśa  MU
bhayapradam akalyāṇaṃ dhairyasarvasvahāriṇam 
manaḥpiśācam utsārya yo 'si sa tvaṃ sthiro bhava  MU
cittayakṣadṛḍhākrāntaṃ na śāstrāṇi na bandhavaḥ 
śaknuvanti paritrātuṃ guravo na ca mānavam  MU
saṃśāntacittavetālaṃ guruśāstrārthabandhavaḥ 
śaknuvanti samuddhartuṃ svalpapaṅkān mṛgaṃ yathā  MU
asmiñ jagacchūnyapure sarvam eva pradūṣitam 
dehagehaṃ pramattena cittayakṣeṇa valgatā  MU
cittavetālavalitasamastagṛhaṣaṇḍakā 
iyaṃ jagadaraṇyānī śūnyā kasya na bhītaye  MU
jagannagaryām asyāṃ tu śāntacittapiśācakam 
dehagehaṃ katipayais sevyate sadbhir eva ca  MU
iha saṃśrīyate yā yā dik saiva raghunandana 
pramattamohavetālaiḥ pūrṇā dehaśmaśānakaiḥ  MU
asyāṃ jagadaraṇyānyāṃ muhūrtaṃ mugdhabālavat 
svayam ālambya dhairyāṃśam ātmanātmānam uddhara  MU
jagajjaradaraṇye 'smiṃś caradbhūtamṛgavraje 
dhṛtiṃ tṛṇarasai rāma mā gaccha mṛgapotavat  MU
asmin mahītalāraṇye carannṛmṛgapotake 
tvam ajñānagajaṃ bhaṅktvā saiṃhīṃ vṛttim upāśraya  MU
anye naramṛgā mugdhā jambudvīpe svajaṅgale 
viharanti yathā rāma tathā mā viharānagha  MU
atyalpakālaṃ śiśire kardamālepadāyini 
na maṅktavyaṃ vadhūrūpe mahiṣeṇeva palvale  MU
bhogābhogā bahiṣkāryā āryasyānusaret padam 
pravicārya mahāryais svam ekam ātmānam āśrayet  MU
apavitrasya tucchasya durbhagasya durākṛteḥ 
dehasyārthe na maṅktavyaṃ cintācuṇṭīṣu cāruṇā  MU
anyena racito deho yakṣeṇānyena saṃśritaḥ 
duḥkham anyasya bhoktānyaś citreyaṃ maurkhyacakrikā  MU
yathaikarūpā ghanatā dṛṣado 'py ātmanas tathā 
sattāmātraikasāmānyād itarasyātyasambhavāt  MU
yathopalasya ghanatā manastā hi tathātmanaḥ 
sattāmātrād abhinnā svād abhāvād anyasaṃvidaḥ  MU
yathopalasya ghanatā tathāsya paramātmanaḥ 
rūpaikarūpā saṃvittis sattāsāmānyarūpataḥ  MU
pṛthak sambhavatīhāṅga na jāḍyaṃ na ca cetanam 
mithyāsaṅkalparacite ete hi śiśuyakṣavat  MU
yathekṣurasamātrasya tv ekasyaiva pṛthaṅmayī 
ayaṃ guḍa idaṃ khaṇḍam iti māyā mudhoditā  MU
paramātmana ekasya sattāsāmānyarūpataḥ 
mudhaivābhyuditaiveyaṃ jāḍyājāḍyamatis tathā  MU
kṣīyate prekṣitaivaiṣā prekṣāmātraikanāśinī 
śuktirupyamatiprakhyā na satī nāsatī tataḥ  MU
nāsato vidyate bhāvo yo nāsty eveha san na saḥ  MU
svarūpamātraniṣṭhatvād dvaitaikyābhāvayogataḥ 
abhāvād anyasaṃvittes samatvam upalātmanoḥ  MU
ananyo 'nanta ekātmā svasattānubhavī yathā 
tathopalas svatāniṣṭho na jaḍo na ca cetanaḥ  MU
anyāsambhavato nityadvaitaikyābhāvayogataḥ 
cetyasyāsambhavād ātmā na jaḍo na ca cetanaḥ  MU
jaḍājaḍadṛśau vandhyāputravad vyomavṛkṣavat 
samāyāte na cāyāte prekṣite na ca vīkṣite  MU
jaḍacetanaśabdārthāv asantau rajjusarpavat 
bhavatas tau kathaṃ satyam aprekṣāmātrakād ṛte  MU
yac ca cetanam ātmeti jaḍaś copala ity api 
uktaṃ tad īdṛgvāgyogyabodhyabodhanahetukam  MU
bodhyaḥ paratare bodhe yayā yuktyā prabodhyate 
sopadeśyā na gṛhṇāti mūḍhas tat sahasā padam  MU
cittaṃ pṛthak pṛthag imāni hatendriyāṇi kartā na dṛśyata idaṃ ca gṛhaṃ mudhaiva 
ko 'py anya eva parivalgati nissvabhāva eṣo 'ham ity alam aho mahad indrajālam  MU
lolāsu saṃsṛtiṣu bhūtaparamparāṇāṃ krīḍāsu cānyapuruṣasya cidekavṛtteḥ 
tattvaṃ vicārya ramate hi mahānubhāvo mantrī yatholbaṇaviṣāsu bhujaṅgamīṣu  MU
na tvaṃ śiro na nayane na ca raktamāṃse nāsthīni naiva ca mano na ca bhūtajālam 
mā moham ehi na śarīram asi prasannā cit tvaṃ prapannasakalāmalasarvageti  MU
dehasattāvicāro nāma sargaḥ
ekatriṃśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya naṣṭakaṣṭeṣṭaceṣṭitaḥ 
tiṣṭhāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryam apy ariṣṭam ivotsṛjan  MU
athemām aparāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ mahāmohavināśinīm 
duṣprāpām api suprāpām anapāyām anāmayām  MU
śṛṇu yā kathitā pūrvaṃ mama kailāsakandare 
saṃsāraduḥkhaśāntyarthaṃ devenārdhendumaulinā  MU
astīndukarasambhārabhāsuraḥ pārago divaḥ 
kailāso nāma śailendro gaurīramaṇamandiram  MU
