tiṣṭha niviṣṭamatis samatāyām astasamastabhavāmayamāyaḥ  MU
akṣasaṃvedanavicārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ
pañcapañcāśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
navād udbhavataḥ pūrvaṃ sampannāś cakṣurādayaḥ 
yathā kamalajasyaitat sarvam eva tvayā śrutam  MU
brahmapuryaṣṭakasyādāv akṣasaṃvid yathoditā 
puryaṣṭakasya sarvasya tathaivodeti sarvadā  MU
viddhi puryaṣṭakaṃ jīvaṃ sa garbhasthendriyodayaḥ 
yad yathā bhāvayaty āśu tat tathā paripaśyati  MU
indriyāṇīndriyārthākhyaṃ viddhi saṃvedanaṃ svakam 
sampannaṃ ca yathā tat te proktam ādyamanassthitau  MU
śuddhā saṃvit saṃvidantī saṃvedanam aninditam 
ato 'haṃvedanād antar jīvaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ tv itā  MU
na tv ekatvād anantatvād avedyatvād anāmayā 
ananyatvād anekatvād aśūnyatvāt parā sthitiḥ  MU
cetyādi budhyate kiñcin na manastāṃ ca gacchati 
na ca jīvatvam āyāti na ca puryaṣṭakātmikā  MU
nāvidyādivilāso 'sti so 'sti nāstīva yas sadā 
paramātmeti kathito manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyātigaḥ  MU
tasmāt sampadyate jīvaś cinmūrtir mananātmakaḥ 
bhramaḥ kevalam ity ādya upadeśāya gīyate  MU
yataḥ kutaścit sampanne tv avidyāmaya āmaye 
upadeśyopadeśena pravilīne vicāraṇāt  MU
praśāntasakalācāraṃ jñānaṃ tad avaśiṣyate 
yatrākāśam api sthūlam aṇāv iva surācalaḥ  MU
yatrodyadācāram api sad apy asad avasthitam 
jagaj jñaviṣayaṃ paṅkād iva tiṣṭhati nirmitam  MU
asanmayam avidyāyā rūpam etāvad eva hi 
yad vīkṣitā satī nūnaṃ naśyaty eva na dṛśyate  MU
ālokitaṃ nāma katham avastu kila labhyate 
prayatnenāpi samprāptaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu kena vā  MU
asad eva sadaivāsad ajñānād asya satyatā 
jñānād yathāsthitaṃ vastu dṛśyate naśyati bhramaḥ  MU
avidyāyā vicārāya jīvapuryaṣṭakādikā 
apy atyantam asatyāyāḥ kalpanā kalpitātmani  MU
tasmāt tadupadeśāya seyaṃ jīvādikalpanā 
kṛtā śāstraiḥ prabodhāya tāṃ tvam ekamanāś śṛṇu  MU
jīvatvam iva samprāptā puryaṣṭakapade sthitā 
kalākalaṅkarahitā citir ācetanonmukhī  MU
yad yathā bhāvayaty āśu tat tathānubhavaty alam 
satyaṃ bhavatv asatyaṃ vā bāleva niśi yakṣakam  MU
pañcatanmātrakalanās sā bhāvayati yatra yāḥ 
tatrātmani tathārandhrās tāḥ paśyati tathoditāḥ  MU
tābhya eva samutpannaṃ bahissthaṃ bhūtapañcakam 
paśyaty ananyad anyābhaṃ śākhāśatam ivāṅkuraḥ  MU
idam antar idaṃ bāhyam iti niścayavāṃs tataḥ 
jīvo yathā yad ādatte tat tathā draḍhayaty alam  MU
raśmijālam ivendor yad ātmanaḥ pratibhāsanam 
bāhyasparśatayā tena tad evāśūrarīkṛtam  MU
maricasyeva yat taikṣṇyaṃ śūnyatvam iva khasya yat 
ātmano vedanaṃ tena tad evānyad ivāśritam  MU
atraiva niścayaṃ buddhvā niyamas sudṛḍhīkṛtaḥ 
anenettham anenetthaṃ bhāvyam ity avikhaṇḍitam  MU
svabhāvetaranāmāsau svasaṅkalpaniyāmakaḥ 
kvacit kadācid bhavati svabhāvenaiva nānyathā  MU
ātmanaivedam akhilaṃ sampannaṃ dvaitam advayam 
ṣaṇḍo madhuraseneva mṛdeva ca mahāghaṭaḥ  MU
sanniveśavikārādi deśakālādisambhavāt 
sambhavaty atra na tv īśe deśakālādyasambhavāt  MU
itaḥ puṣpam itaḥ pattram aham ity udito yathā 
ṣaṇḍe svātmani vāsanto raso 'dvitve dvitāṃ haran  MU
itaḥ paṭam itaḥ kuḍyam aham ity uditas tathā 
sargātmany ātmani brahma nirdvandve dvitvam āharat  MU
adyāṅkuro 'ham adyārkarug ahaṃ tv adya vāridaḥ 
yatheti tiṣṭhaty abbhāgas tathātmā sadasadvapuḥ  MU
iti bhāvyam anenettham iti sarveśvareritam 
kramaṃ khaṇḍayituṃ loke kasya nāmāsti śaktatā  MU
ādarśe svaccha ākāro naiva svaḥ pratibimbati 
vyatirekāsambhavataḥ kacaty eva tu kevalam  MU
brahmaṇi tv ātmanātmaiva sthitaḥ kacati bimbati 
dvaitībhavaty adeho 'pi cinmayatvāt svabhāvataḥ  MU
yad yathaivātmakacanaṃ cetitaṃ kacatātmanā 
asatyam api tan neha vyabhicāri kadācana  MU
hematvakaṭakatve dve satyāsatyasvarūpiṇī 
hemni bhāṇḍamatau yadvac cittvācittve tathātmani  MU
sarvagatvāc citeś cittvaṃ nityaṃ manasi vidyate 
hematvaṃ kaṭakasyeva jaḍatā ca sthitānyadā  MU
cittvajāḍyātmakaṃ cittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhāvayati svayam 
yadā yathaiva yadbhāvaṃ tadā bhavati tat tathā  MU
kāle kāle citā jīvas tv anyo 'nyo bhavati svayam 
bhāvitākāravān antar vāsanākaṇikodayāt  MU
svapne dṛṣṭo yathā grāmo yāti satyātmatāṃ kṣaṇam 
dehād dehaṃ tathā yāti jīvo 'yaṃ pratibhātmakam  MU
pratibhāso yathā svapne naraḥ kuḍyaṃ paṭaṃ bhavet 
bhavaty asatyam evaivaṃ dehād dehāntaraṃ sa naḥ  MU
asatyam eva mriyate tv asatyaṃ jāyate punaḥ 
jīvas svapratibhāsena svapnavat svānyarūpavat  MU
kālenaitāvatā rūpam idaṃ tyājyaṃ mayety asau 
prākṛtaṃ niścayaṃ rūḍhaṃ bhavaty anubhavat svataḥ  MU
vastu dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ ca svapne samanubhūyate 
jīvasvapnaṃ jagadrūpaṃ viddhi vedyavidāṃ vara  MU
ajāgraddraṣṭṛdṛśyo yas so 'bhidhānādinā vinā 
na svapno bhidyate svasmād acchāt saṃvittimātrakāt  MU
anyapūrvābhidhabṛhatsvapnaṃ paśyati nā yathā 
aprāgdṛṣṭaṃ tathaiṣā svaṃ cetanaṃ cit prapaśyati  MU
prākkṛtā vāsanādyāśu pauruṣeṇaiva jīyate 
hyaḥkukarmādya yatnena prayāti hi sukarmatām  MU
mokṣād ṛte na śāmyanti jīvānāṃ cakṣurādayaḥ 
unmajjanti nimajjanti kevalaṃ deśakālataḥ  MU
cittvasya kalanāt tasya deho 'gra iva tiṣṭhati 
pañcātmā bhāvito 'satyo mahāyakṣaś śiśor iva  MU
mano buddhir ahaṅkāras tathā tanmātrapañcakam 
iti puryaṣṭakaṃ proktaṃ deho 'sāv ātivāhikaḥ  MU
amūrta eva cittātmā khatvam asyātipīnatā 
vātatāsya mahāgulpho dehatāsya sumerutā  MU
dviravasthaḥ krameṇaiṣa niravasthas tu muktibhāk 
suṣuptataikāvasthāsya jaḍā kroḍīkṛtodayā  MU
svapnatāsyetarāvasthā dehapratyayaśālinī 
āmokṣaṃ bhramatīhāyam iti sthāvarajaṅgamaiḥ  MU
kadācid dhi suṣuptasthaḥ kadācit svapnasaṃsthitaḥ 
ātivāhikadeho 'yaṃ sarvasyaivāvatiṣṭhate  MU
yadā suṣuptabhāvastho bhāviduḥkhaprabodhanaḥ 
tadākāśopalasamas tiṣṭhaty anuditākṛtiḥ  MU
sthāvarādyāsv avasthāsu kalpavṛkṣadaśāsu ca 
bhavaty eṣa suṣuptastho ghanamohaś śilāghanaḥ  MU
suṣuptatāsya jaḍatā svapno 'syeyaṃ tu saṃsṛtiḥ 
yaḥ prabodho 'sya sā muktis taj jāgrat sā ca turyatā  MU
jīvaprabodho muktir hi sā ceha dvividhocyate 
ekā jīvanmuktateti dvitīyādehamuktatā  MU
jīvanmuktir hi turyatvaṃ turyātītaṃ paraṃ tataḥ 
muktir jīvaprabodho hi sa ca buddhiprayatnataḥ  MU
jñānapramāṇo jīvo 'ntar yaj jānāti hi tanmayaḥ 
jānātu jñaptim evāto bhavaty āśu sa tanmayaḥ  MU
paśyatīmam ayaṃ jīvas sudīrghaṃ svapnavibhramam 
mithyoditaṃ svahṛdaye svaccha eva śilīkṛte  MU
jīvāṇor antar asty asya na kiñcic citkalāṃ vinā 
tām evānyatayā paśyan mudhaiva pariśocati  MU
jīvāṇor antar asty asya na kiñcit paramād ṛte 
yatra tatra jagad dṛṣṭam aho māyāvijṛmbhitam  MU
sthālyantaḥ kvathadambūnāṃ yathānnānāṃ bhramodayaḥ 
jīvāṇūnāṃ tathā svāntar mithyā saṃsaraṇodayaḥ  MU
bandho 'sya vāsanāvattvaṃ mokṣas syād vāsanākṣayaḥ 
vāsanāto 'sya sauṣuptī svāpnī ca sphurati sthitiḥ  MU
ghanavāsanamoho 'yaṃ suṣuptātmā jaḍas smṛtaḥ 
tadantarbhāvinā svapnenāvaśyambhāvinānvitaḥ  MU
vāsanāveśanidrālur jīvaḥ paśyati vibhramam 
yadāsya vāsanānidrā kṣīyate budhyate tadā  MU
vāsanoktā dṛśyaratir dṛśyatvaṃ ca na vidyate 
hemnīva kaṭakāditvaṃ sarvātmany ātmanā kvacit  MU
abodhād etad abhavad vilīnaṃ cet prabodhataḥ 
tad vāsyavāsanāyās tu kṣayād udaya eva vaḥ  MU
ghanaṃ svavāsanāmohaṃ kṣapayitvā suṣuptagaḥ 
tanuvāsanatām etya svapnaṃ paśyati saṃsṛtim  MU
ghanavāsanamoho 'yaṃ jīvas sthāvaratādibhāk 
madhyasthavāsanas tiryak puruṣas tanuvāsanaḥ  MU
yadāntar jīvitenāttā bahir jīvā ghaṭādayaḥ 
jīvaikyād ubhayos sattā grāhyagrāhakayos tataḥ  MU
ātmanātmā samālīḍho bahir antar yadā citā 
tadā grāhyagrahaṇadhīr mṛgatṛṣṇeva sodayā  MU
neha santyajyate kiñcin neha kiñcana gṛhyate 
bāhyāntarakalākāraś cidātmaikaḥ prakāśate  MU
trijagac ciccamatkāras tv alaṃ bhedavikalpanaiḥ 
cetitās smaś citi citā bāhyādy anyan na vidmahe  MU
abdher yathāmalam apāstasamastabhedaṃ svādv accham eva sakalaṃ dravam ekaśuddham 
sarvaṃ tathedam apahastitabhedajātam ādyaṃ paraṃ padam anāmayam eva buddham  MU
indriyārthopalambhavicāro nāma sargaḥ
ṣaṭpañcāśas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
yo jīvasyoditas svapno nānākalanakomalaḥ 
tam imaṃ viddhi saṃsāraṃ na satyaṃ nāpy asanmayam  MU
na puṃsa iva jīvasya svapnas sambhavati kvacit 
tenaite jāgatā bhāvā jāgratsvapnaikatātra hi  MU
jīvasvapnam idaṃ dīrghaṃ kṣipraṃ ca pratibhāsate 
asatyam apy avastutvād viddhi vedyavidāṃ vara  MU
svapnāt svapnāntaram iva gacchanto jīvajīvakāḥ 
asatyam eva paśyanti ghanasatyatayā ciram  MU
ajaḍā jaḍatāṃ yātā jāḍye cājāḍyatoditā 
asatye satyatā jātā jīvānubhavamohataḥ  MU
sthāṇor apy antar akhilaṃ paśyantas trijagadbhramam 
bhramanti svapnasambhrāntā iha jīvāhirāśayaḥ  MU
sarvagatvād anantasya svasya jīvasya vai citeḥ 
yad bhāvayanti cetanti tad evāśv eti satyatām  MU
puṇḍarīkākṣagaditām asaṃsaṅgagatiṃ śubhām 
yām āliṅgya mahābāho jīvanmukto mahāmuniḥ  MU
pāṇḍoḥ putro 'rjuno nāma sukhaṃ jīvitam ātmanaḥ 
kṣapayiṣyati nirduḥkhaṃ tathā kṣapaya jīvitam  MU
rāmaḥ
bhaviṣyati kadā brahmann arjunaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ 
kīdṛśīṃ ca haris tasya kathayiṣyaty asaktatām  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
asti sanmātram ātmeti parikalpitanāmakam 
sthitam ātmany anādyante nabhasīva mahānabhaḥ  MU
dṛśyate vimale tasminn ayaṃ saṃsāravibhramaḥ 
kaṭakādi yathā hemni taraṅgādi yathāmbhasi  MU
caturdaśavidhā bhūtajātayaḥ prasphuranty alam 
tasmin saṃsārajāle 'smiñ jāle śakunayo yathā  MU
tatra te yamacandrārkaśakrādyās saṃsṛtikramāḥ 
bhūtapañcakasaṃsthānā lokapālatvam āgatāḥ  MU
idaṃ puṇyam upādeyaṃ heyaṃ pāpam idaṃ tv iti 
tais svasaṅkalpaghaṭitā vedena sthāpitā sthitiḥ  MU
evaṃ prauḍhiṃ prayātāyāṃ vahantyāṃ ca ciraṃ ciram 
acchinnāyāṃ vināśinyāṃ nadyām iva jagatsthitau  MU
vaivasvato yamo nāma lokapālaḥ pratāpavān 
maraṇāṅkitasattākaprajāsaṃyamane sthitaḥ  MU
tasyādya yāvad anagha pravāhāpatite nije

bhagavān sa yamaḥ kiñcid vrataṃ praticaturyugam 
tathāpi kurute bhūtadalanotthāghaśaṅkayā  MU
kadācid aṣṭau varṣāṇi daśa dvādaśa vāpi ca 
kadācit pañca saptāpi kadācit ṣoḍaśāpi vā  MU
udāsīnavad āsīne tasmin niyamam āsthite 
na hinasti jagajjāle mṛtyur bhūtāni kānicit  MU
tena nīrandhrabhūtaughaṃ nissañcāraṃ mahītalam 
bhavati prāvṛṣi svedī kuñjako maṣakair iva  MU
atha tāni vicitrāṇi bhūtāni bahuyuktibhiḥ 
kṣapayanti surā rāma bhuvo bhāranivṛttaye  MU
evaṃ yamasahasrāṇi vyavahāraśatāni ca 
samatītāny anantāni bhūtāni ca jaganti ca  MU
vaivasvato 'dya tu yamo ya eva pitṛnāyakaḥ 
anena tv adhunā sādho parikṣīṇeṣu keṣucit  MU
yugeṣv aghavighātāya varṣāṇi dvādaśātmanā 
vratacaryeha kartavyā dūrāstakrūrakarmaṇā  MU
teneyam urvī nīrandhrā bhūtair martair amṛtyubhiḥ 
dīnā praghanagulmeva bhārabhūtair bhaviṣyati  MU
bhūr bhāraparibhūtāṅgī hariṃ śaraṇam eṣyati 
kāntā dasyuparābhūtā dīnā patim iva priyam  MU
harir dehadvayenātha mahīm avatariṣyati 
devāṃśair akhilais sārdhaṃ naranāyakatāṃ gataiḥ  MU
vasudevasutas tv eko vāsudeva iti śrutaḥ 
deho bhaviṣyati harer dvitīyaḥ pāṇḍavo 'rjunaḥ  MU
yudhiṣṭhira iti khyāto dharmaputro bhaviṣyati 
ambhodhimekhalābhūpaḥ pāṇḍoḥ putras sa dharmavit  MU
duryodhana iti khyātas tasya bhrātā pitṛvyajaḥ 
bhaviṣyati dṛḍhadvandvo bhīmo babhrur aher iva  MU
anyo'nyaṃ harator urvīṃ tayos saṅgrāmalālasāḥ 
aṣṭādaśākṣauhiṇyo hi ghaṭiṣyanty atra bhīṣaṇāḥ  MU
tatkṣayeṇa vibhāratvaṃ bhuvo viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati 
rāghavārjunadehena bṛhadgāṇḍīvadhanvanā  MU
viṣṇor arjunanāmāsau prākṛtaṃ bhāvam āsthitaḥ 
harṣāmarṣānvito deho naradharmā bhaviṣyati  MU
senādvayagatān dṛṣṭvā svajanān maraṇonmukhān 
viṣādam eṣyaty udyogaṃ yuddhāya na kariṣyati  MU
tam arjunābhidhaṃ dehaṃ prāptakāryaikasiddhaye 
harir buddhena dehena bodhayiṣyati rāghava  MU
bhagavān
tvaṃ mānuṣeṇopahatāntarātmā viṣādamohābhibhavād visañjñaḥ 
naṣṭas svam utsṛjya paraṃ prakāśaṃ tadātmatattvaṃ nanu rājasiṃha  MU
anantam avyaktam anādimadhyam ātmānam ālokaya saṃvidātman 
saṃvidvapus sphāram alagnadoṣam ajo 'si nityo 'si nirāmayo 'si  MU
na jāyate mriyate vā kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ 
ajo nityaś śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre  MU
nārāyaṇāvatāro nāma sargaḥ
saptapañcāśas sargaḥ
bhagavān
ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam 
ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate  MU
anantasyaikarūpasya satas sūkṣmasya khād api 
ātmanaḥ parameśasya kiṃ kathaṃ kena hanyate  MU
nārjunas tvaṃ na hantā tvam abhimānam alaṃ tyaja 
jarāmaraṇanirmuktas svayam ātmāsi śāśvataḥ  MU
yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo yasya buddhir na lipyate 
hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate  MU
yaiva sañjāyate saṃvid antas saivānubhūyate 
ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me ity atas saṃvidaṃ tyaja  MU
anayaiva ca yukto 'smi naṣṭo 'smīti ca bhārata 
abhitas sukhaduḥkhābhyām avaśaḥ parikṛṣyase  MU
svātmāṃśaiḥ kriyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi bhāgaśaḥ 
ahaṅkāravimūḍhātmā kartāham iti manyate  MU
cakṣuḥ paśyatu karṇaś ca śṛṇotu tvak spṛśatv iyam 
rasanā ca rasaṃ yātu ko 'traiko 'ham iti sthitaḥ  MU
kalanākarmanirate manasy api mahāmate 
na kaścid atrāham iti kleśabhāgī ka eva te  MU
bahubhis samavāyena yat kṛtaṃ tatra bhārata 
eko 'bhimānaduḥkhena hāsāyaiva hi gṛhyate  MU
kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api 
yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgaṃ tyaktvātmasiddhaye  MU
ahantvaviṣacūrṇena yeṣāṃ kāyo na bhāvitaḥ 
kurvanto 'pi haranto 'pi ta ete nirviṣūcikāḥ  MU
na kvacid rājate kāyo mamatvāmedhyadūṣitaḥ 
prājño 'py atibahujño 'pi duśśīla iva mānavaḥ  MU
nirmamo nirahaṅkāras samaduḥkhasukhaḥ kṣamī 
yas sa kāryam akāryaṃ vā kurvann api na lipyate  MU
idaṃ ca te pāṇḍusuta svakarma kṣātram uttamam 
atikrūram api śreyas sukhāyaivodayāya ca  MU
api kutsitam apy antyam apy adharmamayaṃ kṛśam 
śreyase svaṃ yathā karma na tathehāmṛtāsavaḥ  MU
mūrkhasyāpi svakarmaiva śreyase kim u sanmateḥ 
matir galadahaṅkārā patitāpi na lipyate  MU
yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya 
nissaṅgas tvaṃ yathāprāptakarmāsi cen na badhyase  MU
śāntabrahmavapur bhūtvā karma brahmamayaṃ kuru 
brahmārpitasamācāro brahmaiva bhavasi kṣaṇāt  MU
īśvarārpitasarvārtha īśvarātmā nirāmayaḥ 
īśvaras sarvabhūtātmā bhava bhūṣitabhūtalaḥ  MU
sannyastasarvasaṅkalpas samaś śāntamanā muniḥ 
sannyāsayogayuktātmā kurvan muktamatir bhava  MU
arjunaḥ
saṅgatyāgasya bhagavaṃs tathā brahmārpaṇasya ca 
īśvarārpaṇarūpasya sannyāsasya ca sarvaga  MU
tathā jñānasya yogasya vibhāgaḥ kīdṛśaḥ prabho 
krameṇa kathayaitan me mahāmohanivṛttidam  MU
bhagavān
sarvasaṅkalpasaṃśāntāv ekāntaghanavedanam 
nakiñcidbhāvanākāraṃ yat tad brahma paraṃ viduḥ  MU
tadudyogaṃ vidur jñānaṃ yogaṃ ca kṛtabuddhayaḥ 
brahma sarvaṃ jagad ahaṃ ceti brahmārpaṇaṃ viduḥ  MU
antaśśūnyaṃ bahiśśūnyaṃ pāṣāṇahṛdayopamam 
śāntam ākāśakośācchaṃ na śūnyaṃ na dṛṣat param  MU
tata īṣad yad utthānam īṣad anyatayodaye 
sa jagatpratibhāso 'yam ākāśa iva śūnyatā  MU
bhāgo 'ham iti ko 'py eṣa pratyekam uditaś citeḥ 
koṭikoṭyaṃśakalitaḥ ka ivainaṃ prati grahaḥ  MU
vikalpabhede sphurite saṃvitsāramayātmani 
vaicitryeṇāvicitre 'pi kim ekatrāpi vo grahaḥ  MU
apṛthagbhūta evaiṣa pṛthagbhūta iva sthitaḥ 
pṛthag abdhir aparyanto nāham ity avagacchati  MU
yathehāhaṃ tathehāsi ghaṭādīhāsti markaṭaḥ 
kham ihaivaṃ tathāmbvādi kim ahantāṃ prati grahaḥ  MU
iti jñānād vibhāgasya yo dvaitasya parikṣayaḥ 
tyāgas saṅkalpajālānām asaṃsaṅgas sa kathyate  MU
samastakalpanājālasyeśvaraikatvabhāvanam 
galitadvaitanirbhāsam etad eveśvarārpaṇam  MU
abhedavaśato bhedo nāmnaivaiṣāṃ cidātmani 
bodhātmākhilaśabdārthaṃ jagad ekaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  MU
aham āśā jagad ahaṃ kham ahaṃ karma cāpy aham 
kālo 'ham aham advaitaṃ dvaitaṃ cāham ahaṃ jagat  MU
manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru 
mām evaiṣyasi matvaivam ātmānaṃ matparāyaṇaḥ  MU
arjunaḥ
dve rūpe tava deveśa paraṃ cāparam eva ca 
kīdṛśaṃ tat kadā rūpaṃ tiṣṭhāmy āśritya siddhaye  MU
bhagavān
sāmānyaṃ paramaṃ caiva dve rūpe viddhi me 'nagha 
pāṇyādiyuktaṃ sāmānyaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam  MU
paraṃ rūpam anādyantaṃ yan mamaikam anāmayam 
brahmātmaparamātmādiśabdair etad udīryate  MU
yāvad apratibuddhas tvam anātmajñatayā sthitaḥ 
tāvac caturbhujākāradevapūjāparo bhava  MU
tatkramāt samprabuddhas tvaṃ tato jñāsyasi tat param 
mama rūpam anādyantaṃ yena bhūyo na jāyase  MU
yadi vā vedyavijñāto bhavāṃs tad arimardana 
taṃ mamātmānam ātmānam ātmanaś cāśu saṃśraya  MU
idaṃ cāham idaṃ cāham iti yat pravadāmy aham 
tad etad ātmatattvaṃ tan muhur vyapadiśāmy alam  MU
manye sādho prabuddho 'si pade viśrāntavān asi 
saṅkalpair avamukto 'si satyaikātmamayo bhava  MU
sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani 
paśya tvaṃ yogayuktātmā sarvatra samadarśanaḥ  MU
sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ yo bhajaty aikyam āsthitaḥ 
sarvathā vartamāno 'pi na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate  MU
ekatvaṃ sarvaśabdārtha ekaśabdārtha ātmatā 
ātmāpi ca na san nāsad gato yasyāśu tat sa sat  MU
trailokyacetasām antar āloko yaḥ prakāśajaḥ 
anubhūtim upārūḍhas so 'yam ātmeti niścayaḥ  MU
trailokyapayasām antar yo rasānubhavas sthitaḥ 
gavyānām abdhijānāṃ ca so 'yam ātmāsmi bhārata  MU
antas sarvaśarīrāṇāṃ yas sūkṣmo 'nubhavas sa ca 
mukto 'nubhavanīyena so 'yam ātmāsmi sarvagaḥ  MU
samagrapayasām antar yathā ghṛtam avasthitam 
tathā sarvapadārthānāṃ dehānāṃ ca sthitaḥ paraḥ  MU
sarvāmbhonidhiratnānāṃ sabāhyābhyantare yathā 
tejas tathāsmi dehānām asaṃsthita iva sthitaḥ  MU
yathā kumbhasahasrāṇāṃ sabāhyābhyantare nabhaḥ 
jagattrayaśarīrāṇāṃ tathātmāham avasthitaḥ  MU
muktāphalaśataughānāṃ tantuḥ protavapur yathā 
tathāhaṃ dehalakṣāṇāṃ sthita ātmāsmy alakṣitaḥ  MU
brahmādau tṛṇaparyante padārthanikurumbake 
sattāsāmānyam etad yat tam ātmānam ajaṃ viduḥ  MU
tad īṣatsphuritākāraṃ brahma brahmaiva tiṣṭhati 
ahantādi jagattādi krameṇa bhramakāriṇā  MU
ātmaivedaṃ jagadrūpaṃ hanyate hanti cātra kim 
śubhāśubhair jagadduḥkhaiḥ kim asyārjuna lipyate  MU
pratibimbeṣv ivādarśaṃ samaṃ sākṣivad āsthitam 
naśyatsu na vinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati  MU
idaṃ cāham idaṃ cāham itīdaṃ kathyate mayā 
evam ātmāsi sarvātmā mām evaṃ viddhi pāṇḍava  MU
imās sarvāḥ pravartante sargapralayavikriyāḥ 
ātmatantoś cito 'ntassthāḥ payasspandā ivāmbudhau  MU
yathopalatvaṃ śailānāṃ dārutvaṃ ca mahīruhām 
taraṅgāṇāṃ jalatvaṃ ca padārthānāṃ tathātmatā  MU
sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani 
yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati  MU
nānākāravikāreṣu taraṅgeṣu yathā payaḥ 
kaṭakādiṣu vā hema bhūteṣv ātmā tathārjuna  MU
nānātaraṅgavṛndāni yathā lolāni vāriṇi 
kaṭakādīni vā hemni tathā bhūtāni cātmani  MU
padārthajātaṃ bhūtādi bṛhad brahma ca bhārata 
ekam evākhilaṃ viddhi pṛthaksthaṃ na manāg api  MU
kiṃ tadbhāvavikārāṇāṃ gamyam asti jagattraye 
kva te vāpi jagat kiṃ vā kiṃ mudhā parimuhyasi  MU
iti śrutvāvagamyāntar bhāvayitvā suniścitam 
jīvanmuktāś carantīha santas samarasāśayāḥ  MU
nirmānamohā jītasaṅgadoṣā adhyātmavidyā vinivṛttakāmāḥ 
dvandvair vimuktās sukhaduḥkhasañjñair gacchanty amūḍhāḥ padam avyayaṃ tat  MU
arjunopadeśo nāma sargaḥ
aṣṭapañcāśas sargaḥ
bhagavān
bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ 
yat te 'haṃ prīyamāṇāya vakṣyāmi hitakāmyayā  MU
mātrāsparśās tu kaunteya śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhadāḥ 
āgamāpāyino 'nityās tāṃs titikṣasva bhārata  MU
te tu naikātmanaś cānye kvāto duḥkhaṃ kva vā sukham 
anādyante 'navayave kutaḥ pūraṇakhaṇḍane  MU
saṃsthitā sparśamātrākhyā kalāsmin paramātmani 
anante 'sanniveśādau hemnīva kaṭakāditā  MU
yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete mātrāsparśā bhramātmakāḥ 
samaduḥkhasukho dhīras so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate  MU
sarvatvād ātmanas tv ete ābhāsās saṃsthitā iva 
asadrūpās tv asadrūpaṃ kathaṃ soḍhuṃ na śakyate  MU
manāg api na vidyete sukhaduḥkhe asarvage 
sarvatvād ātmatattvasya sattā katham ivānayoḥ  MU
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ 
nāsty eva sukhaduḥkhādi paramātmāsti sarvagaḥ  MU
sattvāsattvamatī tyaktvaivaitayor jagadātmanoḥ 
tyaktvā nakiñcin madhyaṃ ca śeṣe baddhapado bhava  MU
na hṛṣyati sukhenātmā duḥkhair glāyati nārjuna 
dṛṣadvac cetanātmāpi śarīrāntargato 'pi san  MU
jaḍaṃ cittādi duḥkhasya bhājanaṃ dehatāṃ gatam 
na caitasmin kṣate kṣīṇe kiñcid evātmanaḥ kṣatam  MU
jaḍaṃ dehādi duḥkhāder yad idaṃ bhoktr iti sthitam 
tan māyābhramam evāṅga viddhy abodhavaśotthitam  MU
na kiñcid eva dehādi na ca duḥkhādi vidyate 
ātmano yat pṛthagbhūtaṃ kiṃ kenāto 'nubhūyate  MU
yad idaṃ kathayāmy atra tenaiṣā te vinaśyati 
bhrāntir duravabodhotthā samyagbodhena bhārata  MU
yathā rajjvām ahibhayaṃ bodhān naśyaty abodhajam 
tathā dehādi duḥkhādi bodhān naśyaty abodhajam  MU
viṣvag viśvam ajaṃ brahma na naśyati na jāyate 
iti satyaṃ paraṃ viddhi bodhaḥ parama eṣa saḥ  MU
brahmārṇavataraṅgas tvaṃ kiñcid bhūtvā vilīyase 
brahmāvarte sphurasy adya brahmaivāsi nirāmayam  MU
jagat kālaḥ kriyā deśas tvam ahaṃ sainikā iti 
brahmaṇy evaṃ parispando nātra stas sadasatkramau  MU
jahi mānaṃ madaṃ śokaṃ bhayam īrṣyāṃ sukhāsukhe 
dvaitam etad asadrūpam ekas sadrūpavān bhava  MU
puruṣākṣauhiṇīnāṃ tvaṃ kṣayeṇānubhavātmanā 
brahmaṇā bṛṃhitaṃ yuddhaṃ brahma brahmamayaṃ kuru  MU
asaṃvidan sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ lābhālābhau jayājayau 
yuddhabrahmaikatāṃ gaccha brahmādistambha bhārata  MU
lābhālābhasamo bhūtvā bhūtvā nūnaṃ nakiñcana 
jaḍo vāta iva spandī prasṛtaṃ kāryam ācara  MU
yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat 
yat kariṣyasi kaunteya tad ātmeti sthiro bhava  MU
yanmayo yo bhavaty antas sa tad āpnoty asaṃśayam 
brahmasatyam avāptuṃ tvaṃ brahmasatyamayo bhava  MU
anapekṣya phalaṃ brahma bhūtvā brahmeti bhāvitam 
kriyate kevalaṃ karma brahmajñena yathāgatam  MU
karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyaty akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ 
sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa coktas sarvakarmakṛt  MU
mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi 
yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya  MU
karmāsaktim anāśritya tathā nāśritya mūḍhatām 
naiṣkarmyam apy anāśritya samas tiṣṭha yathāsthitam  MU
tyaktvā karmaphalāsaṅgaṃ nityatṛpto nirāśrayaḥ 
karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiñcit karoti saḥ  MU
āsaktim āhuḥ kartṛtvam akartur api tad bhavet 
maurkhye sthite hi manasi tasmān maurkhyaṃ parityajet  MU
paraṃ tajjñatvam āśritya nirāsakter mahātmanaḥ 
sarvakarmaratasyāpi kartṛtodeti na kvacit  MU
akartṛtvād abhoktṛtvam abhoktṛtvāt samaikatā 
samaikatvād anantatvaṃ tato brahmatvam ātatam  MU
nānātām alam utsṛjya paramātmaikatāṃ gataḥ 
kurvan kāryam akāryaṃ ca naiva kartā tvam arjuna  MU
yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāmasaṅkalpavarjitāḥ 
jñānāgnidagdhakarmāṇaṃ tam āhuḥ paṇḍitaṃ budhāḥ  MU
samas somyas sthiras svasthaś śāntas sarvārthanisspṛhaḥ 
yas tiṣṭhati sa suvyagro 'py alam avyagratāṃ gataḥ  MU
nirdvandvo nityasattvastho niryogakṣema ātmavān 
yathāprāptānuvartī ca bhava bhūṣitabhūtalaḥ  MU
karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran 
indriyārthān vimūḍhātmā mithyācāras sa ucyate  MU
yas tv indriyāṇi manasā niyamyārabhate 'rjuna 
karmendriyaiḥ karmayogam asaktas sa viśiṣyate  MU
āpūryamāṇaṃ tv acalapratiṣṭhaṃ samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat 
tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī  MU
arjunopākhyāna ātmajñānopadeśo nāma sargaḥ
ekonaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ
bhagavān
na kuryād bhogasantyāgaṃ na kuryād bhogabhāvanam 
sthātavyaṃ susamenaiva yathāprāptānuvartinā  MU
anātmany ātmatāṃ dehe mā bhāvaya bhavātmani 
ātmany evātmatāṃ satye bhāvayābhāvarūpiṇi  MU
dehanāśe mahābāho na kiñcid api naśyati 
ātmanāśe hi nāśas syān na cātmā naśyati kvacit  MU
avināśam anādyantam ātmānam ajaraṃ viduḥ 
naśyaty ātmeti durbodho mā tavāstv atiduḥkhadaḥ  MU
na kadācana naśyanti viditātmāna uttamāḥ 
naśyanty aviditātmāno hy anātmany ātmamāninaḥ  MU
arjunaḥ
evaṃ cet taj jagannātha mūḍhānām api mānada 
dehanāśe samutpanne manye naṣṭaṃ na kiñcana  MU
bhagavān
evam eva mahābāho na kiñcin naśyati kvacit 
ātmaivāsty avināśātmā kiṃ tasya kva vinaśyati  MU
idaṃ naṣṭam idaṃ yuktam iti mohād bhramād ṛte 
anyat tathā na paśyāmi vandhyāstrītanayaṃ yathā  MU
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ 
ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ  MU
avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam 
vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaścit kartum arhati  MU
antavanta ime dehā nityasyoktāś śarīriṇaḥ 
anāśino 'prameyasya tasmād yudhyasva bhārata  MU
ātmaivaiko 'sti na dvitvam asatas sambhavaḥ kutaḥ 
avināśas tv ananto 'sau sato nāśo na vidyate  MU
dvaitaikatvaparityāge yac cheṣam avaśiṣyate 
śāntaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ tad astīha paraṃ padam  MU
arjunaḥ
tan mṛto 'smīti bhagavan kiṃrūḍheha nṛṇāṃ sthitiḥ 
kathaṃ sthitau vā lokānāṃ tau svarganarakau prabho  MU
bhagavān
bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca 
etattanmātrajātātmā jīvo deheṣu tiṣṭhati  MU
sa kṛṣyate vāsanayā rajjveva paśupotakaḥ 
sa tiṣṭhati śarīrāntaḥ pañjare vihago yathā  MU
sa kālavaśato dehāj jarjaratvam upāgatāt 
vāsanāvaśato yāti vṛkṣaparṇād raso yathā  MU
śrotraṃ cakṣus sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca 
gṛhītvaitāni saṃyāti vāyur gandhān ivāśayāt  MU
vāsanāvattvam evāsya deho netarayuktijaḥ 
kṣīyate vāsanātyāge kṣīṇe bhavati tat padam  MU
vāsanāvān purā puṣṭo bhūtvā bhrāmyati yoniṣu 
jīvo bhramabharākāro māyāpuruṣako yathā  MU
akṣasvabhāvān akhilāñ śarīrād vāsanāvaśaḥ 
jīvo gṛhītvā saṃyāti puṣpād gandhān ivānilaḥ  MU
deho nisspandatām eti jīve kaunteya nirgate 
nisspandāvayavābhogaś śāntavāta iva drumaḥ  MU
aceṣṭaś chedabhedādidoṣair āyāty adṛśyatām 
mṛta ity ucyate loke deho vigatajīvitaḥ  MU
sa jīvaḥ prāṇamūrtiḥ khe yatra yatrāvatiṣṭhate 
tatra svavāsanābhyāsāt paśyaty ākāram ātatam  MU
ayaṃ deho hi jīvena tv asann evāvalokitaḥ 
asya nāśe 'nyam apy evaṃ paśyaty evāśu svapnavat  MU
yathaiva paśyaty ākārāṃs teṣāṃ nāśāṃs tathaiva saḥ 
ādisarge bhāvanayā kilaivaṃ saṃvibhāvitaḥ  MU
jhagity udbhavakāle tu yad yathā dṛśyate puraḥ 
ānirvāṇaṃ tad evāsyā avinābhāvisaṃvidaḥ  MU
prāktanaṃ vāsanājālaṃ puruṣārthena jīyate 
yatnenādyatanenāśu yatanaṃ hyastanaṃ yathā  MU
ya eva puruṣārthena dṛṣṭo balavatā kṣaṇāt 
pūrvottaranimeṣāṃśas sa eva jayati sphuṭam  MU
api sphuṭati vidhyaṇḍe vāti vā pralayānile 
pauruṣaṃ hi yathāśāstram atas tyājyaṃ na dhīmatā  MU
narakasvargasargādi vāsanāvaśato 'bhitaḥ 
prapaśyati cirābhyastaṃ jīvo jaraḍhamohadhīḥ  MU
arjunaḥ
narakasvargasargādisambhrameṣu jagatpate 
kim asya kāraṇaṃ brūhi jīvasya janitasthiteḥ  MU
bhagavān
vāsanātmānam enaṃ tvaṃ jīvaṃ viddhi śarīrakam 
svavāsanātmikaivāsya sattā saṃsṛtikāraṇam  MU
dhriyate saṃsṛtis tāvad yāvat sphurati vāsanā 
svapnopamānā teneha śreyase vāsanākṣayaḥ  MU
arjunaḥ
cirābhyāsavaśāt prauḍhā saṃsārabhramakāriṇī 
kimutthā devadeveśa vāsanā kṣīyate katham  MU
bhagavān
maurkhyamohasamucchrāyād anātmany ātmabhāvanāt 
ajñānād ātmanas sādho sattām āyāti vāsanā  MU
bhāvitātmāsi kaunteya satyaṃ vijñātavān asi 
ayaṃ so 'haṃ janā ete mameti tyaja vāsanāḥ  MU
vāsanāvilaye jīvo vilīno bhavati svayam 
yo hi yatsattayocchūnas tannāśāt sa vilīyate  MU
dehe vilayam āyāte deśakālānyatākṛteḥ 
ko 'sau bhājanatām eti janmano maraṇasya ca  MU
svayaṃ kalpitasaṅkalpam ātmarūpaṃ yad ābilam 
tad eva vāsanākāraṃ jīvaṃ viddhi mahāmate  MU
anāyattam asaṅkalpam ātmarūpaṃ yad avyayam 
prabodhād vāsanāmuktaṃ taṃ mokṣaṃ viddhi bhārata  MU
jīvann eva mahābāho tattvaṃ prekṣya yathāsthitam 
vāsanāvāgurāmukto mukta ity abhidhīyate  MU
yo na nirvāsano nūnaṃ sarvadharmaparo 'pi saḥ 
sarvajño 'py abhito baddhaḥ pañjarastho yathā khagaḥ  MU
durdarśanasya gagane śikhipiñchikeva sūkṣmāpi visphurati yasya na vāsanāntaḥ 
muktas sa eva bhavatīha hi vāsanaiva bandho 'naghasya nanu tatkṣaya eva mokṣaḥ  MU
arjunopākhyāne jīvatvanirṇayo nāma sargaḥ
ṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ
bhagavān
iti nirvāsanatvena jīvanmuktatayātmani 
antaśśītalatām etya bandhuduḥkham alaṃ tyaja  MU
jarāmaraṇaniśśaṅka ākāśaviśadāśayaḥ 
tyakteṣṭāniṣṭasaṅkalpo vītarāgo bhavānagha  MU
pravāhāpatitaṃ kāryam idaṃ kiñcid yathāgatam 
kuru kāryam akārpaṇyaṃ na kiñcid iha naśyati  MU
pravāhāpatitaṃ karma svam eva kriyate hi yat 
jīvanmuktasvabhāvo 'sāv ajīvanmuktatānyathā  MU
idaṃ karma tyajāmīdam āśrayāmīty anirmalam 
mūḍhasya manaso rūpaṃ jñamanas tu samasthiti  MU
pravāhāpatitaṃ kāryaṃ kurvantaś śāntacetasaḥ 
jīvanmuktās suṣuptasthās sphuranty ardhaprabuddhavat  MU
sthirāṃ saṃhṛtim āyānti kūrmāṅgānīva sarvaśaḥ 
indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyo hṛdi jñasya svabhāvataḥ  MU
cinmātre vitate tantau dṛḍhe srag iva saṃsthitam 
sadasadgrathitaṃ viśvaṃ viśvāṅge viśvakarmaṇi  MU
prasārite prasarati tv antardhiṃ yāti saṃvṛte 
vicitraracanājālam ananyac cidvitānake  MU
ananyad apy anyad iva svāṅgarūpam anaṅgavat 
citraṃ vitānaka iva sthitaṃ jagad idaṃ citi  MU
yathaivāracitaṃ citraṃ sthitaṃ citrakṛdīhite 
tathā jātam ajātaṃ ca viśvaṃ saṃsthitam ātmani  MU
yathā sphurati kartavyaṃ citraṃ citrakṛtaś citi 
viśvātmani tathā viśvaṃ kālatrayamayodayam  MU
abhitti trijagaccitraṃ kurute cittacitrakṛt 
vyomni vyomātmakam api prasphuṭaṃ vṛttivartibhiḥ  MU
cittacitrakareṇādau citraṃ citraṃ vitānitam 
paścād bhittiḥ kṛtā vyomarūpā cāsāv aho bhramaḥ  MU
apūrvaivātimāyeyaṃ kila yatra khakuḍyayoḥ 
na manāg api bhedo 'sti sphuṭam apy upalabdhayoḥ  MU
imā yā upalakṣyante bhittayaś cittacitrajāḥ 
vyomnaś śūnyatayā viddhi tās tāmarasalocana  MU
kṣaṇena cetasi yathā bhāto lokakṣayodayau 
khātmā jagat tathaivedaṃ sabāhyābhyantaraṃ nabhaḥ  MU
cirantanamanorājyamātre 'smin kila satyatā 
katham ālokite 'pi syāt satyaṃ nāsty eva vibhrame  MU
bhrameṇālokitas satyam ālokena vilīyate 
dṛśyamānam api kṣāmaṃ śaradīvābhram ambare  MU
cittacitrakṛtaś citte saṃsthitāś citraputrikāḥ 
bhittyabhāvād anādhārā bahis tribhuvanādikāḥ  MU
naitās santi na cāsi tvaṃ kiṃ kena parirudhyate 
rodhyarodhakasammohaṃ tyaktvā khavimalo bhava  MU
pravṛttir eva kā vyomnaḥ pravṛttiś caiva khātmikā 
ataḥ kālakriyākuḍyakalādi vimalaṃ nabhaḥ  MU
cittasaṃsthaṃ yathā citraṃ sadrūpam api khātmakam 
vyomnaś śūnyatamaṃ viddhi tathedam akhilaṃ jagat  MU
cittabhittau kṛtaṃ citraṃ yac ciccitrakareṇa tat 
sarvaṃ śūnyatayā vyomno manāg api na bhidyate  MU
yathā prakacataś citte jagannirmāṇasaṅkṣayau 
kṣaṇenaiva tathaivemau bahissthāv iti viddhi he  MU
ādyakṣaṇamanorājye nānābhuvananāmani 
kṣaṇabhāvini mohena kalpatā parikalpitā  MU
asad eva manorājyaṃ kartuṃ śaktaṃ yathā manaḥ 
kṣaṇasya kalpīkaraṇe tathaiva balavan manaḥ  MU
kṣaṇaṃ kalpīkaroty etat tathālpaṃ kurute bahu 
asat sat kurute kṣipram itīyaṃ bhrāntir utthitā  MU
kṣaṇam ādimanorājyaṃ pratibhātaṃ svabhāvataḥ 
yad vicitrātma tad idaṃ jagajjālam iti sthitam  MU
sargo nirvāṇaniṣṭhatvān nimeṣam ayam utthitaḥ 
pratibhāmātrato 'traiva kalpitā vajrasāratā  MU
cittacitrakṛtaś citsthaṃ jagaccitraṃ kacat sthitam 
akuḍyam apy araṅgāḍhyam idaṃ sphāram ivāgrataḥ  MU
aho nu citraṃ nirbhitti citram ujjvalam utthitam 
surañjanaṃ jagad iti sthitaṃ dṛṣṭivilobhanam  MU
nānātamomaṣīlekhaṃ nānātejo'ṃśarañjanam 
nānākalaṅkāvayavaṃ nānārāgānurañjitam  MU
nānādṛṣṭivilāsāḍhyaṃ nānānubhavalocanam 
nānābhrakograracanaṃ nānākārāgrapaścimam  MU
vyomanīlasaraḥphullatārācandrārkapaṅkajam 
vicitraracanodyuktameghālīpattramañjari  MU
svakoṣṭhakābhilikhitasurāsuranṛputrikam 
paramālokamakkoladhavalākāśakuḍyakam  MU
ākāśa eva racitā pratibhaikaraṅgā mugdhā jagattrayamanoharaputrikeyam 
cinmātravaktraparirañjitasarvalokā līlākulā capalacittakacitrakartrā  MU
hemācalāṅgalatikā ghanakeśapāśā candrārkalocanavicālanadṛṣṭalokā 
dharmārthakāmatrikayantritaśāstravastrā pātālatālacaraṇonnatabhūnitambā  MU
brahmendrarudraharibāhucatuṣṭayogrā satyānṛtonnatakucā kakubaṅgayaṣṭiḥ 
abdhyantraveṣṭitamahītalapadmapīṭhapattrīkṛtācalamahābhuvanodarī ca  MU
rātryandhakāracapalabhrurahassmitoccais tārākarālapulakā grahadantapaṅktiḥ 
cañcaccaturdaśavidhākulabhūtajātaromā dhvanatpralayavāridakambupūgā  MU
jīvānvitā gagana eva kṛtā vicitrā vyomātmikāciravilakṣaṇacitrakartrā 
cittena citraparikarmavidā trilokī nānāvilāsavalitā varaputriketi  MU
jagaccitravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
ekaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ
bhagavān
idaṃ viddhi mahāścaryam arjuneha hi yat kila 
pūrvaṃ sañjāyate citraṃ paścād bhittir udeti hi  MU
abhittāv utthite citre dṛśyate bhittir ātatā 
aho nu citrā māyeyaṃ magnaṃ tumbu śilā plutā  MU
cittasthacitrasadṛśe vyomātmani jagattraye 
vyomātmanas te kim iyam ahantā vyomatoditā  MU
sargavyoma kṛtaṃ vyomnā vyomni vyoma vilīyate 
bhujyate vyomani vyoma vyoma vyomani cātatam  MU
veṣṭitaṃ vāsanārajjvā dīrghasaṃsṛtidāma yat 
vāsanodveṣṭanenaiva tad ihodveṣṭyate 'rjuna  MU
pratibimbaṃ yathādarśe tathedaṃ brahmaṇi svayam 
agamyaṃ chedabhedāder ādhārānanyatāvaśāt  MU
ananyac chedabhedādi brahmaṇi brahma cāmbaram 
kiṃ kathaṃ kasya kenaitac chidyate vā kva bhidyate  MU
brahmatā brahmatāpūre jale jalam iva sphurat 
sthitā samasamā vyoma nirmalā śāntam ātmani  MU
vāsyavāsakabhāvo 'to manāg api na bhidyate 
tenehāvāsanībhāvo bodhāt sampanna eva te  MU
yo na nirvāsano nūnaṃ sarvadharmaparo 'pi saḥ 
sarvajño 'py atibaddhātmā tapasvy api sa rāgavān  MU
yasyāsti vāsanābījam atyalpaṃ citibhūmigam 
bṛhat sañjāyate tasya punas saṃsṛtikānanam  MU
abhyāsād dhṛdi rūḍhena satyasambodhavahninā 
nirdagdhaṃ vāsanābījaṃ na bhūyaḥ parirohati  MU
dagdhaṃ tu vāsanābījaṃ na nimajjati vastuṣu 
sukhaduḥkhādiṣu svacchaṃ tumbīpattram ivāmbhasi  MU
śāntātmā vigatabhavāmayo 'si jāto nirvāṇo dalitamahāmanovimohaḥ 
samyagjñaś śrutam avagamya pāvanaṃ tat tiṣṭhātmavyavahṛtir ekaśāntarūpaḥ  MU
arjunaviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ
dviṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ
arjunaḥ
naṣṭo mohas smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta 
sthito 'smi gatasandehaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava  MU
bhagavān
vṛttayo yadi bodhena saṃśāntā hṛdaye sphuṭam 
tac cittaṃ śāntam evāśu viddhi sattvam upāgatam  MU
atra tac cetyarahitaṃ pratyakcetananāmakam 
vastu śiṣṭaṃ vinirmuktaṃ yat sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yat  MU
na kecana prabādhante tat padaṃ jagadādhayaḥ 
bhūtalād gaganoḍḍīnaṃ vihaṅgamam ivotavaḥ  MU
pratyakcetanam ābhāsaṃ śuddhaṃ saṅkalpavarjitam 
agamyam enam ātmānaṃ viddhi duṣṭadṛśām iha  MU
sarvātītapadasthasya citā śuddhasya vāsanā 
na śaknoti padaṃ draṣṭuṃ janadṛṣṭir aher iva  MU
yatprāptau sarva eveme kṣīṇā ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ 
varākī vāsanā tatra kiṃ karoti pare pade  MU
yathānalagiriṃ prāpya himaleśo vilīyate 
śuddham āsādya cittattvam avidyā līyate tathā  MU
kva varākī rajastucchā vāsanā bhogabandhanī 
kvāpūritajagajjālaś cittattvavipulānilaḥ  MU
tāvat sphuraty avidyeyaṃ nānākāravikāriṇī 
yāvan na samparijñātaś śuddhas svātmāyam ātmanā  MU
sarvā dṛśyadṛśaḥ kṣīṇāś śuddhataivoditātatā 
nabhasīva pade tasmin svātmany akhilapūraṇe  MU
samagrākārarūpaṃ tat samagrākāravarjitam 
vāgatītaṃ paraṃ vastu kena nāmopamīyate  MU
viṣayaviṣaviṣūcikām atas tvaṃ nipuṇam ahaṃsthitivāsanām apāsya 
abhimataparihārayatnayuktyā bhava virujo bhuvanaikanāthamūrtiḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
iti gaditavati trilokanāthe kṣaṇam iva maunam avasthite purastāt 
atha madhupa ivāsitābjaṣaṇḍe vacanam upaiṣyati tatra pāṇḍuputraḥ  MU
arjunaḥ
parigalitasamastaśokabhāvā param udayaṃ bhagavan matir gateyam 
mama tava vacanena lokabhartur dinapatinā paribodhitābjinīva  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
ity uktvotthāya gāṇḍīvadhanvā sa harisārathiḥ 
arjuno gatasandeho raṇalīlāṃ kariṣyati  MU
kariṣyati kṣatagajavājisārathidrutadravadrudhiramahānadīṃ bhuvam 
śarotkaraprasaramayābhramaṇḍalītirohitadyumaṇivilocanāṃ divam  MU
arjunaviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ arjunopākhyānaṃ samāptam
triṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya rāghavāghavighātinīm 
tiṣṭha nissaṅgasannyāsabrahmārpaṇamayātmikām  MU
yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ 
yaś ca sarvamayo nitya ātmānaṃ viddhi taṃ param  MU
dūrastham apy adūrasthaṃ sarvagaṃ tvaṃ svam eva ca 
tatsthas tattām avāpnoṣi tad evāsy astasaṃśayam  MU
yat saṃvedyavinirmuktaṃ saṃvedanam aninditam 
cetyamuktacidābhāsaṃ tad viddhi paramaṃ padam  MU
sā parāt paramā kāṣṭhā sā dṛśāṃ dṛg anuttamā 
sa mahimnāṃ ca mahimā gurūṇāṃ sa gurur guruḥ  MU
sa ātmā tac ca vijñānaṃ tac chūnyaṃ brahma tat param 
tac chreyas sa śivaś śāntas sā vidyāparamā sthitiḥ  MU
yo 'yam antaścetanātmā sarvānubhavarūpakaḥ 
yatra svadante sarvāṇi dravyāṇi svātmasattayā  MU
sa jagattilatailātmā sa jagadgṛhadīpakaḥ 
sa jagatpādaparasas sa jagatpaśupālakaḥ  MU
sa tantur bhūtamuktānāṃ pariprotahṛdambaraḥ 
sa bhūtamaricaughānāṃ paramā tiktatātatā  MU
sa padārthe padārthatvaṃ sa tucchatvam avastunaḥ 
sa sato vastunas sattvam asattvam asataś ca saḥ  MU
jagadgṛhakriyābhāṇḍopaskarāṇāṃ sa dīpakaḥ 
candrārkatārakātejas tenedaṃ prakaṭīkṛtam  MU
sarvaṃ prasṛtam etasmāc cetanāt paramātmanaḥ 
svasaṃvittivicāreṇa svayam ātmaiṣa labhyate  MU
sarva eva jagadbhāvā avicāraṇacāravaḥ 
avidyamānasadbhāvā vicāraviśarāravaḥ  MU
aham ādau jagajjāle mithyābhramabharātmani 
ko bhūtvā kvānubadhnāmi dhṛtiṃ katham avāstavīm  MU
ādimadhyāntamananasaṅkalpakalanāsv aham 
brahmākāśam anādyantaṃ keveyattā mamātmanaḥ  MU
itiniścayavān yo 'ntas samavyavahṛtir bahiḥ 
udayāstamayonmuktas sthito 'nantas sa sarvadā  MU
nāstam eti na codeti sāmyaṃ samam avasthitam 
yasya khasyeva śūnyatvaṃ sa mahātmeha sadvapuḥ  MU
bhāvādvaitapadārūḍhas suṣuptaparayā dhiyā 
vyavahāry api hṛtkṣobhaṃ naity ādarśanaro yathā  MU
ādarśapuruṣasyeva vyavahāravato 'pi ca 
na yasya hṛdayollekho manāg api sa muktibhāk  MU
avibhāgamatāv eva jñamaṇau pratibimbati 
citeḥ paramavaimalyād vyavahāro yathāgataḥ  MU
ciccamatkṛtir eveyaṃ jagad ity avabhāsate 
nehāsty aikyaṃ na ca dvitvam upadeśo 'pi tanmayaḥ  MU
vācyavācakaśiṣyehāgurvākhyais svacamatkṛtaiḥ 
ātmanātmani śāntaiva cic camatkurute citi  MU
citpraspando hi saṃsāras tadaspandaḥ paraṃ padam 
citspandaśamaneneyaṃ pariśāmyati saṃsṛtiḥ  MU
mahāciter nañarthāṃśabhāvo yo 'bhāvanakṣayaḥ 
asann iva svabhāvena sa citspanda udāhṛtaḥ  MU
śūnyatvam ajaḍaṃ yat tat param āhuś citer vapuḥ 
nañarthābhāvanā yātra saṃsṛtis sānubhūyate  MU
abhāvanāmātralayā sā ca nissārarūpiṇī 
kevalaṃ kevalībhāvas svas sadrūpo 'vaśiṣyate  MU
citspanda eva saṃsāracakrapravahaṇaṃ viduḥ 
mātṛmānaprameyādi kaṭakādīva hemani  MU
pṛthag asti na ca spandaś citer yas saṃsṛtir bhavet 
cittvam eva cites spandas tadabodho hi saṃsṛtiḥ  MU
abodhamātraṃ citspandaḥ kaṭakatvam ivotthitam 
bodhamātravilīne 'smiñ śuddhaṃ ciddhema śiṣyate  MU
satyāvabodhamātreṇa kṣīyate bhogabhāvanā 
bhogābhāvanam eveha paramaṃ jñatvalakṣaṇam  MU
ime 'nabhimatās sarve jñasya bhogās svabhāvataḥ 
bhavanti ko 'titṛpto hi durannaṃ kila vāñchati  MU
etad eva paraṃ viddhi jñatvasya paralakṣaṇam 
svabhāvenaiva bhogānāṃ yat kilānabhivāñchanam  MU
cid aspandaiva sarvātmarūpiṇy astīti niścayaḥ 
yo 'ntaḥ prarūḍhas svābhyāsāj jñatvaśabdena sa smṛtaḥ  MU
yo na bhuṅkte bhujyamānān api bhogān abuddhimān 
lokānurodhasiddhyarthaṃ sa hanti laguḍair nabhaḥ  MU
vinākṛtrimayā yuktyā na siddhir adhigamyate 
kvacid ātmani loke vā svāṅgāvadalanair api  MU
cic cetyacaityakoṭisthā tāvat paśyati vibhramam 
iyaṃ yāvad abodhātmā spandate spandarūpiṇī  MU
samyagbodhodaye tv asyās spandāspandadaśākramāḥ 
kvāpi yāntīva saṃśāntadīpavat sābhidhānakāḥ  MU
citaḥ prakāśarūpāyā dīpikāyās svabhāvataḥ 
spandāspandamayī neha kathaivāsti manāg api  MU
yad aspandasya maruto na san nāsan na madhyagam 
rūpaṃ tad eva saṃvittispandatā praśamocitā  MU
abhinno 'syāś cites spandaś śuddhacitsārarūpadhṛt 
na bandhāya na mokṣāya sthita ātmani kevalam  MU
cic cen nañarthasaṃvittiṃ nirvāṇeva na vindate 
tad bandhamokṣapakṣāder nāmāpi hi na vidyate  MU
mokṣo 'stv ity eva bandho 'ntaḥpūrṇatākṣayakāraṇaṃ 
māstv itīty api bandhas te śreyase 'vedanaṃ param  MU
yad anābhāsam ajaḍaṃ tad viddhi paramaṃ padam 
citas svarūpasaṃsthānam acetyonmukhatātmakam  MU
yas saṅkalpanaśabdārtharūpas spando mahāciteḥ 
bandhamokṣādikārho 'sau prekṣyamāṇaḥ praśāmyati  MU
prekṣaṇād eva saṃśānte tv ahambhāve nirāspade 
na vidmaḥ kena kiṃ kasya badhyate vātha mucyate  MU
saṅkalpa eva ca citer buddhaś ced avibhāgavān 
tad asaṅkalpam aspandaṃ sarvaṃ jātam avāritam  MU
spande 'spandatayaivātte tanmayatvāt sadā citā 
saṅkṣīṇa eva saṃsāro nisspande cidghane sthite  MU
citteja eva citspanda iti buddhe nirantaram 
vyatiriktaś citas spando na kaścid avaśiṣyate  MU
asmin dṛśyamaye dīrghasvapne svapnāntaraṃ vrajan 
na jño moham upādatte sarvagatvāt svasaṃvidaḥ  MU
yatrodeti prasabham aniśaṃ sarvasaṃvittisattā yasminn ete sakalakalanākāraṭaṅkā laganti 
utpadyante svadanasubhagaṃ yatra sarvopalambhā dhyānenainaṃ tam avagamaya pratyagātmānam
antaḥ  MU
pratyagātmāvabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
catuṣṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
enam āhuḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ viddhy enaṃ paramaṃ padam 
vedmy enam ekam evāham eṣa evāsti netaraḥ  MU
ya eṣa pratyagātmāntas sarvasattaikadarpaṇaḥ 
etasmād idam utpannaṃ jagad bījād iva drumaḥ  MU
buddhyahaṅkāracittādi varjayitvā jaḍātmakam 
yatrānubhavitāntas te tad viddhi paramaṃ padam  MU
śuddhānubhavamātraṃ yan manobuddhyādivarjitam 
mahācidabhidhaṃ puṇyaṃ tad etat paramaṃ padam  MU
tatsthā ete mahārūpā brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ 
vibhūtibhis sphuranty uccair janās tuṣṭanṛpā iva  MU
ākāśagamanādyābhiḥ krīḍābhiḥ krīḍyate ciram 
tatsthenaiva janeneha svarge svargaukasā yathā  MU
tat prāpya nāṅga mriyate tat prāpyāṅga na śocyate 
tat prāpya kṣīyate nāṅga tat prāpyāṅga na badhyate  MU
apāraparamākāśarūpiṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ 
sattāsāmānyarūpaṃ cen manāg api vibhāvyate  MU
tat tannimeṣamātreṇa jantur muktamanā muniḥ 
kurvan saṃsārakarmāṇi na bhūyaḥ paritapyate  MU
rāmaḥ
mano buddhir ahaṅkāra iti yatra kṣayaṃ gatam 
sattāsāmānyam ābhānaṃ kiṃ tat kīdṛśam ucyate  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
yad brahma sarvadehasthaṃ bhuṅkte pibati valgati 
ādatte vinihanty atti saṃvitsaṃvedyavarjitam  MU
tat sarvagatam ādyantarahitaṃ sthitam ūrjitam 
sattāsāmānyam akhilaṃ vastutattvam ihocyate  MU
tat sthitaṃ khatayā vyomni śabde śabdatayā sthitam 
sparśe sthitaṃ sparśatayā tvaci tat tvaktayā sthitam  MU
rase līnaṃ rasatayā rasanāyāṃ ca tattayā 
rūpe rūpatayā dṛṣṭaṃ netre līnaṃ ca dṛktayā  MU
ghrāṇe ghrāṇatayā dṛṣṭaṃ gandhe gandhatayoditam 
puṣṭaṃ kāyatayā kāye bhūmāv api ca bhūtayā  MU
payastayā ca payasi vāyau vāyutayā sthitam 
tejastayā tejasi ca buddhau buddhitayā gatam  MU
manastayā manasy antar ahaṅkṛtyāpy ahaṅkṛtau 
rūḍhaṃ saṃvidi saṃvittyā citi cittvena cotthitam  MU
vṛkṣe vṛkṣatayā lagnaṃ paṭe paṭatayā sthitam 
ghaṭe ghaṭatayā rūḍhaṃ vaṭe vaṭatayā sthitam  MU
sthāvare sthāvaratvena jaṅgamatvena jaṅgame 
pāṣāṇatvena pāṣāṇe cetanatvena cetane  MU
amareṣv amaratvena naratvena nareṣu ca 
tiryaktvena ca tiryakṣu krimitvena krimisthitau  MU
kālakrame kālatayā ṛtāv ṛtutayānayā 
tuṭikṣaṇanimeṣādau saṃsthitas tattayā vibhuḥ  MU
śukle śuklatayā jātaṃ kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇatayā sthitam 
kriyāsu spandarūpeṇa niyatau niyamena ca  MU
saṃsthitas saṃsthitau sthityā nāśe nāśatayā sthitaḥ 
utpattirūpeṇotpattāv āsthitaḥ parameśvaraḥ  MU
bālye bālyena viśrānto yauvane yauvanena ca 
jarasā ca jarārūpe maraṇe maraṇena ca  MU
iti sarvapadārthānām abhinnaḥ parameśvaraḥ 
kallolaśīkarormīṇām abdhāv iva payobharaḥ  MU
nānātaiṣā tv asatyaiṣā satyenānena caiva hi 
kalpitā citsvabhāvena vetālaś śiśunā yathā  MU
sarvatra saṃsthitimatā vigatāmayena vyāptaṃ mayedam akhilaṃ vividhair vilāsaiḥ 
cidrūpiṇaiva kalitākalitātmaneti sarvopaśāntamatir āssva sukhaṃ mahātman  MU
vālmīkiḥ
ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma 
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma  MU
vibhūtiyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ
pañcaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ
rāmaḥ
yathāsmākaṃ mune svapnapurapattanamaṇḍalam 
tathaiva padmajādīnāṃ yadi dehaparigrahaḥ  MU
tathaivedaṃ ca sañjātaṃ yadi sarvam asanmayam 
tad asmākaṃ dṛḍhataraḥ pratyayaḥ katham utthitaḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
asmatsargavad ābhāti pūrvasargaprajāpatiḥ 
svajīvapratibhāsātmā vidyate na tu vāstavaḥ  MU
sarvagatvāc cites sarvaṃ jīvas sarvatra saṃsṛtiḥ 
sā cāsatyā darśanotthā samyagdarśananāśinī  MU
svapnābhaḥ pratibhāso 'sya ya eṣa svayam utthitaḥ 
ahantāpratyayaikātmā sa evātidṛḍhas sthitaḥ  MU
svapne kṣaṇavināśitvaṃ yathā puṃsā na dṛśyate 
sargasvapne tathaivaitad brahmaṇāpi na lakṣyate  MU
svapno 'grapuruṣasyāsya pratibhāsaś ca yo bhavet 
rāmāsmadādisargātmā bhavet tādṛśa eva saḥ  MU
yat svapnapuruṣāj jātaṃ tat svapnapuruṣātmakam 
bhavatīty anubhūtaṃ hi yad bījaṃ tat phalaṃ yathā  MU
asatyam eva tad viddhi yad asatyena sādhyate 
asaty arthe samarthe 'pi na yuktaṃ bhāvabandhanam  MU
asaty arthe samarthe 'pi sattā bhāvanasambhavā 
yatas tena parityājyam asadbhāvanabhāvanam  MU
dṛḍhapratyayinas svapnapuruṣād yat samutthitam 
bhavaty ātmani sargādi dṛḍhapratyayam eva tat  MU
nimeṣamātram evāyaṃ sargasvapnas sphuran sthitaḥ 
tasmin nimeṣa evāsmatkalpatā parikalpitā  MU
sudīrghasvapnaṣaṇḍo 'yaṃ yathodeti prajāpateḥ 
sargādyās sarvabhūtānāṃ pratyekam uditās tathā  MU
cittattvasyaiva bhāvena sargasvapnaparamparāḥ 
sphuranty ambho dravatvena yathāvartavivartanaiḥ  MU
yadā svapnātmikaiveyaṃ sargalakṣmīr na vāstavī 
idaṃ sambhavatīdaṃ no vety ataḥ pralayaṃ gatam  MU
yad yathā yādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tat tādṛg vidyate tathā 
na hi paryanuyujyante svapnavibhramanītayaḥ  MU
na tad asti jagaty asmin yan na sambhavati bhrame 
vicitrās triṣu lokeṣu dṛśyante vastudṛṣṭayaḥ  MU
jalamadhye jvalaty agnir yathābdhau vaḍavānalaḥ 
nagarāṇy ambare santi yathā vaimānikāśrayāḥ  MU
śilāsv abjāni jāyante hemādrāv iva pādapāḥ 
ekāge sarvapuṣpāṇi santi kalpatarau yathā  MU
śilāḥ phalanti phalavad yathā ratnagulucchakāḥ 
śilāntaḥ prāṇinas santi bhekā iva śilāntare  MU
dṛṣado vāri niryāti candrakāntopalād iva 
nimeṣeṇa ghaṭo yāti paṭatāṃ śāpavān iva  MU
svāsattām api budhyante svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā 
adhogāmi jalaṃ vyomni ḍīyate 'bhragataṃ yathā  MU
vitānam iva khe vāri tiṣṭhati svarnadī yathā 
uḍḍīyante śilās sthūlāḥ pakṣavanto 'drayo yathā  MU
śilātaḥ prāpyate sarvaṃ nanu cintāmaṇer iva 
cintitāni phalanty āśu devodyānāntareṣv iva  MU
tāny eva na phalanty āśu mokṣādīnīva rāghava 
acetano 'pi kurute karma yantrapumān iva  MU
evamādis tathānyaś ca vicitrārambhavibhramaḥ 
dṛṣṭaś śambaragandharvavilāsair apy asambhavaḥ  MU
deśakālakriyādravyaratnaśambaraśāpajāḥ 
mayagandharvajanitā anantās satyasambhavāḥ  MU
asambhavas sambhavānām apīhābhyupapadyate 
sambhavāsambhavāṃśasya siddhayas svapnavibhramāḥ  MU
na tad asti na yat satyaṃ na tad asti na yan mṛṣā 
sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvatra svapne sargābhidhānake  MU
svapne nimagnadhīr jantuḥ paśyati sthiratāṃ yathā 
sargasvapne magnabuddhiḥ paśyati sthiratāṃ tathā  MU
bhramād bhramāntaraṃ gacchan svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ vrajan 
atisthirapratyayabhāg iha jīvo vimuhyati  MU
śvabhrāntaraṃ śvabhranipātadoṣāt samprāpnuvan mugdhamṛgaḥ prayāti 
mohaṃ yathā pātamayaikarūpaṃ jīvas tathā saṃsṛtipātamūḍhaḥ  MU
jagatsvapnakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
atra rāghava vakṣye 'ham itihāsam imaṃ śṛṇu 
yad vṛttaṃ kasyacid bhikṣoḥ kvacin mananaśālinaḥ  MU
āsīt kaścin mahābhikṣus samādhyabhyāsatatparaḥ 
nityaṃ svavyavahāreṇa kṣapayann akhilaṃ dinam  MU
samādhyabhyāsaśuddhaṃ tat tasya cittaṃ kṣaṇena yat 
cintayaty āśu tadbhāvaṃ gacchaty ambv iva vīcitām  MU
kadācit sa samādhānavirato 'tiṣṭhad ekadhīḥ 
kañcit sañcintayām āsa svāsanasthaḥ kriyākramam  MU
tasya cintayato jātā pratibheyam atha svataḥ 
bhāvayāmy āśu līlārthaṃ sāmānyajanavṛttitām  MU
iti sañcintya ceto 'sya sthitaṃ kiñcin narāntaram 
spandasaṃsthānasantyāgamātreṇāvartake 'mbv iva  MU
tena cittanareṇātha kṛtaṃ nāmātmanīcchayā 
jīvaṭo 'smīti sahasā kākatālīyavat sthitam  MU
jīvaṭo vijahārātha sa svapnapuruṣaś ciram 
svapnanirmāṇanagare kasmiṃścit puravīthiṣu  MU
tatra pānaṃ papau matto bhṛṅgaḥ padmarasaṃ yathā 
śilayeva dṛḍhaṃ piṣṭas suṣvāpa ghananidrayā  MU
svapne dadarśa vipratvaṃ pāṭhānuṣṭhānatuṣṭimat 
pratibhāmātrasampannaṃ cittadeśāntarāptivat  MU
kadācit sa dvijaśreṣṭhas svāharvyāpāraniṣṭhayā 
ājagāma ghanāṃ nidrāṃ bījatām iva pādapaḥ  MU
so 'py apaśyat svayaṃ svapne sāmantatvam athātmani 
patākārathahastyaśvasenājaladamālitam  MU
sa sāmantaḥ kṛtāhāraḥ kadācid ghananidrayā 
suṣvāpāntarvyavahṛtir bījatāyām iva drumaḥ  MU
apaśyad rājatāṃ svapne kakubvalayamālinīm 
lālitāṃ bhogapūgena puṣpaughenartutām iva  MU
sa kadācin nṛpas svasthas suṣvāpāstamitehitaḥ 
purobhāvinijācāras svaṃ kāryam iva kāraṇe  MU
apaśyad ātmani svapne surastrītvam aninditam 
vṛkṣaḥ kesarasollāso mañjarītvam ivoditam  MU
sā reme surasenāsu devodyānasthalīṣu ca 
kṣīrāmbhodhitaraṅgeṣu loleva harivallabhā  MU
suṣvāpa saikadā bālā mattodyānalatāgṛhe 
saṃśāntasvamanasspandaṃ gandhalekheva paṅkaje  MU
dadarśātmany atha svapne saṃsargavaśatoditam 
mṛgītvam ātmani svairam āvartatvam ivāmbutā  MU
sā mṛgī lolanayanā kadācin nidrayāhṛtā 
svapne dadarśa vallītvaṃ svābhyāsād rūḍham ātmani  MU
tiryañco 'pi prapaśyanti svapnaṃ cittasvabhāvataḥ 
dṛṣṭānto 'tra śukāśvebhasañjñāsmaraṇam akṣatam  MU
sā babhūva latā puṣpaphalapallavaśālinī 
vanadevīvanodyānalatāgṛhavilāsinī  MU
bījāntassthāṅkurākārarūpayehādhirūḍhayā 
sāpaśyad antassaṃvittyā sphuṭaṃ lavanam ātmanaḥ  MU
kañcit kālaṃ suṣuptasthakalayā jaḍatāṃ ghanam 
anubhūya dadarśātha svātmānaṃ bhramaraṃ sthitam  MU
ṣaṭpado vijahārātha vane vanalatāsv asau 
padminīṣu ca phullāsu taruṇīṣv iva vallabhaḥ  MU
bimbādharaṃ vidalayan svādayan kausumaṃ madhu 
svapan kusumaśayyāsu bhuktvā vallīvilāsinīḥ  MU
sa babhūva sarojinyāṃ vyasanī bisanālavat 
kvacid eva ratiṃ yāti ceto jaḍamater api  MU
tām ājagāma nalinīṃ pariloḍayituṃ gajaḥ 
ramyavastukṣayāyaiva mūḍhānāṃ jṛmbhate manaḥ  MU
nalinīmathanenaiva samaṃ tena sa ṣaṭpadaḥ 
guṇavattāntare rūḍhir iva cūrṇatvam āyayau  MU
bhramaro vāraṇālokād vāraṇālokabhāvanāt 
dadarśātmānam ālolamattahastitayoditam  MU
śuṣkasāgaragambhīre gajaḥ khāte papāta ha 
tamoghanaghane śūnye saṃsāra iva jīvakaḥ  MU
babhūva vallabho rājño mahān parabalāntakaḥ 
sadā madabalakṣīvo ghūrṇann iva niśācaraḥ  MU
kadācid arinistriṃśacchinnas so 'stam upāyayau 
vivekāsilatālūnarūpo jīva ivātmani  MU
paśyan gajaghaṭākumbhamaṇīn procchalitān alīn 
utkrāman sa gajāj jīvo bhūyo drāgity abhūd aliḥ  MU
sevamāno vanalatāḥ punar āyāt sa padminīm 
dustaro hi cirābhyāso vāsanānām abodhataḥ  MU
tatra hastikhurākrāntyā punar ācūrṇatāṃ yayau 
pārśvasthahaṃsasaṃvittyā babhūva kalahaṃsakaḥ  MU
sa haṃsaḥ phullapadmāsu sarasīṣu ciraṃ caran 
kadācid bahubhir haṃsais saṅgato virarāja ha  MU
brahmahaṃsātmikā saṃvid aśabdārthavatī manāk 
tatra pusphora tasyāntaḥ prāgjāṇḍarasabarhivat  MU
sa tāṃ vibhāvayan dūrād dṛḍhaṃ dāśeṣuṇā hataḥ 
tatsaṃvittyanusandhānāj jātaḥ padmajasārasaḥ  MU
tatrātisantatavivekavacovilāsair ābodhito 'dhigatapāvanavastudṛṣṭiḥ 
muktas sthito nanu yugāntavidhau videhamuktena tena kila bhāvyam avaśyam eva  MU
bhikṣusaṃsārodāharaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
saptaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
sa kadācid dadarśātha rudraṃ rudrapure khagaḥ 
vairiñcanalinīnālalīlālānebhalīlayā  MU
tatra buddhir abhūt tasya rudro 'ham iti niścitā 
pratibimbaṃ varādarśe jhagity eva hi bimbati  MU
rudrībhūtavapus tatra tanuṃ tatyāja tām asau 
gandhaḥ pavanatāṃ gacchan kusumastabakaṃ yathā  MU
rudro 'tha rudrabhavane vijahāra yadṛcchayā 
tais taiś śivapurācārair gaṇagoṣṭhīgariṣṭhayā  MU
rudras tv anuttarajñānavilāsaikatayā tayā 
svam aśeṣam udantaṃ tam apaśyat prāktanaṃ dhiyā  MU
nirāvaraṇavijñānavapus sa bhagavān haraḥ 
uvāca svayam ekānte svasvapnaśatavismitaḥ  MU
aho nu citrā māyeyaṃ bata viśvavimohinī 
asaty evāpi sadrūpā surūḍhā maruvārivat  MU
idamprathamam ākrāntacetyo 'haṃ cittatāṃ gataḥ 
pūrvasampannasargasthagaganādivibhāvanāt  MU
yadṛcchāsthitajīvatvo bhūtatanmātrarañjitaḥ 
kasmiṃścid abhavaṃ sarge bhikṣur akṣubhito 'bhitaḥ  MU
tenālayanibaddhena bahis svairavihāritā 
līlāvilulitākārā yadā ramyeti bhāvitā  MU
sarvabhāvopamardena tadabhyāsavaśāt tadā 
tām eva so 'nvabhūd bhikṣus tyaktvānyaṃ mananodayam  MU
camatkṛtiś cetasi yā rūḍhā saiva vijṛmbhate 
vallī tyajati naidāghī pītam apy ambu mādhavam  MU
sa bhikṣur jīvaṭo bhūtvā jantur jaraḍhavāsanaḥ 
teṣu deśeṣu babhrāma randhreṣv iva pipīlakaḥ  MU
ātmani dvijabhaktatvāt so 'paśyad dvijatām atha 
bhāvo bhāvaviparyāse balavān eva vardhate  MU
sāmantatām avāpāsau vipras satatacintitām 
sātatyena rasaḥ pītaḥ phalatām eti pādape  MU
rājyārthadharmakāryāṇāṃ kartṛtvāt so 'bhavan nṛpaḥ 
sa kāmukatayā rājā surastrītvam avāpa ha  MU
lolalocanalobhena sā mṛgī rasaśālinī 
babhūva vāsanāmohas tv aho duḥkhāya jantuṣu  MU
mṛgī satatacittasthā babhūva vipine latā 
avaśyambhāvi lavanaṃ latikānubabhūva ha  MU
antassañjñācirābhyastaṃ bhramaratvam athātmani 
sāpaśyad bhāvamardena sadātadbhāvabhāvitā  MU
sa vāraṇakhurakṣodam anubhūyātha bhāvitam 
bhūyo bhūyaḥ prababhrāma mahāsaṃsṛtivibhramān  MU
saṃsāraśataparyante rudras so 'yam ahaṃ sthitaḥ 
asmin saṃsārasaṃrambhe svamanomātrasambhṛte  MU
evaṃ saṃśāntarūpāsu saṃsārāraṇyabhūmiṣu 
bahvīṣv aham abhibhrāntas tv aśūnyāsv iva bhūriśaḥ  MU
kasmiṃścid abhavaṃ sarge tv ahaṃ jīvaṭanāmakaḥ 
kasmiṃścid brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhaḥ kasmiṃścid vasudhādhipaḥ  MU
haṃsaḥ padmavane bhūtvā vindhyakacche ca vāraṇaḥ 
hariṇo hehayādrau ca daśām aham imāṃ gataḥ  MU
atra varṣasahasrāṇi caturyugaśatāni ca 
samatītāny anantāni dinarturacitāni ca  MU
mama prathamam eva prāksphuritasya parāt padāt 
sattvajātitayā rūḍho bhikṣutve yo jñatākramaḥ  MU
bhūyo bhūyo 'py atikramya gatasya brahmahaṃsatām 
sa eva prāktano 'bhyāsaḥ phalitas saṅgamodayāt  MU
dṛḍhābhyāso ya evāsya jīvasyodety avighnataḥ 
yonyantaraśatenāpi tam evaiṣo 'nudhāvati  MU
kākatālīyayogena kadācit sādhusaṅgamāt 
aśubho vāsanābhyāso jīvasya vinivartate  MU
saṅgatyādikam evaiṣa kevalaṃ svodayaṃ prati 
prāktano vāsanābhyāso hetuṃ laghum apekṣate  MU
yad yad abhyasyate 'jasram anyadehāntare 'pi ca 
jāgratsvapneṣv asad api tat sad ity anubhūyate  MU
tat tad arthakriyākāri duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca 
udeti bhāvanā tasmād bhāvanābhāvanaṃ jayaḥ  MU
bhāvanaiva svam ātmānaṃ deho 'yam iti paśyati 
svasattāmātravistāraṃ taṃ gulmatvam ivāṅkuraḥ  MU
bhāvanā prekṣyamāṇaiṣā na kiñcid api śiṣyate 
naiva vidyata eveti tadbhrameṇālam astu naḥ  MU
bhramasyāsanmayasyāsya jātasyākāśavarṇavat 
asaṃvedanamātraikamārjanīyasya vastutaḥ  MU
asanmayī kharūpaiṣā varaṃ sattaiva lālanī 
pravartatāṃ vinodāya kim asan naḥ kariṣyati  MU
tat tān sarvān svasaṃsārān utthāyālokayāmy aham 
kāṃścid ālokadānena tebhya ekīkaromy aham  MU
iti sañcintya rudro 'sau taṃ sargaṃ prajagāma ha 
yatra bhikṣur vihārasthas suptaś śava iva sthitaḥ  MU
bodhayitvātha taṃ bhikṣuṃ cetasā cetanena ca 
yojayām āsa sasmāra bhikṣur apy ātmano bhramam  MU
rudram ātmānam ālokya jīvaṭādimayaṃ tathā 
bodhād avismayārho 'pi sthityarthaṃ vismayaṃ yayau  MU
atha rudras tathā bhikṣur dvāv evotthāya jagmatuḥ 
kvāpi jīvaṭasaṃsāraṃ cidākāśaikakoṇagam  MU
tatra tadbhavanaṃ gatvā tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam 
viṣayaṃ taṃ puraṃ tac ca tac ca pānavaṇiggṛham  MU
suptaṃ dadṛśatur naṣṭasañjñaṃ jīvaṭakaṃ śavam 
sthāpayitvā vapurbhāraṃ prabhrāntaṃ bhavabhūmiṣu  MU
taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca 
ekarūpās trirūpās te rudrajīvaṭabhikṣukāḥ  MU
bodhavanto 'py abuddhābhā vismitā apy avismitāḥ 
babhus tūṣṇīṃ sthitāś citre kṛtākārā iva kṣaṇam  MU
atha jagmuś ca te sarve kvacic cidvyomani sthitam 
viprasaṃsāram ārambhaparabhūtasaghuṅghumam  MU
tatra tadbhavanaṃ gatvā tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam 
viṣayaṃ taṃ ca taṃ grāmaṃ prāpus te brāhmaṇālayam  MU
vipraṃ te dadṛśus suptaṃ kalatravalitaṃ gṛhe 
kaṇṭhe gṛhītaṃ brāhmaṇyā bahirjīvam iva sthitam  MU
taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca 
tasthus te bahavo 'py eke savismayam avismayāḥ  MU
atha jagmuś cidākāśakacitaṃ cetitaṃ ca taiḥ 
sāmantanṛpasaṃsāram ārambhabharasundaram  MU
tatra tadbhavanaṃ prāpus tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam 
sāmantaṃ dadṛśur mattaṃ suptaṃ paryaṅkapaṅkaje  MU
hemāvadātaṃ hemāṅgyā nihitaṃ kucakoṭare 
bhramaryevānvitaṃ padmakośasuptaṃ madhuvratam  MU
kāntābhir abhyāvalitaṃ mañjarībhir iva drumam 
dīpajālakamadhyasthaṃ ratnaugha iva kāñcanam  MU
taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca 
tasthus te bahavo 'py evaṃ savismayam avismayam  MU
atha te rājasaṃsāraṃ jagmus tatra prabodhya tam 
tena sārdham athānyāsu bhremus saṃsṛtibhūmiṣu  MU
prāpya tāṃ brahmahaṃsehāṃ rudratāṃ sarva eva te 
samājagmur virejuś ca rudrāṇām uttamaṃ śatam  MU
ekasaṃvid bhinnatanu citraceṣṭam aceṣṭitam 
ekarūpam anekātma rūpaṃ ca parameśvaram  MU
rudrāṇāṃ tac chatam atha nirāvaraṇacinmayam 
sarvasaṃsāragaṃ viddhi sthitaṃ sarvajagatsthiti  MU
daśa rudraśatānīha santi rāma mahānti ca 
etad ekādaśaṃ viddhi saṃsāraṃ prati saṃsthitam  MU
yo yo hi yasya jīvasya saṃsāras samudeti hi 
tatrāprabuddhā jīvaughāḥ paśyanti na parasparam  MU
milanti hi mitho buddhās taraṅgāmbv iva vāridhau 
aprabuddhās svatāmātraniṣṭhā loṣṭavad āsthitāḥ  MU
yathā dravatvād vīcyambūny anyo'nyaṃ sammilanty alam 
tathā prabuddhā jīvaughā mithaś cittvān milanty alam  MU
pratyekam uditāś caite saṃsāre jīvarāśayaḥ 
ciddhātos sarvagatvena tv asatyās satyavat sthitāḥ  MU
yad yad ākhanyate bhūmes tat tan nāma yathāṅga mṛt 
sarvagāyāś citer yad yad ūhyate tat tatheha cit  MU
sarvatra pañcabhūtāni yathānubhavasīha hi 
tatheha sarvabhūtātma cittvaṃ sarvatra vidyate  MU
yat sālabhañjikāvṛnde śailastambhagate 'ṅgakam 
prekṣyate tat tad evāśma tathā citi jagac citaḥ  MU
avedane pare śuddhe vedanaṃ yaj jaganti tat 
akāraṇakam evaitac chūnyatvaṃ nabhaso yathā  MU
cidghane vedanaṃ dṛśyaṃ bandho mokṣas tv avedanaṃ 
yad eva rucitaṃ te syāt tad evāśu dṛḍhīkuru  MU
sargāsargau bandhamokṣau vedanāvedanātmakau 
abhinnau bodhataś caitau yathecchasi tathā kuru  MU
asaṃvittyaiva yan nāsti tannāśe kā kadarthanā 
tūṣṇīmbhāvena yat prāpyaṃ prāptam evāśu viddhi tat  MU
yad vai vedanamātrātma tad aṅgāvedanakṣayam 
tad vedanāvedanayor yad iṣṭaṃ tat samācara  MU
vīcir yathāmbhasi spando jagac citraṃ tathā citau 
etāvanmātra evātra bhedo yad raghunandana  MU
deśakālakharūpeṣu satsu vīcyāditāmbhasi 
jagadādau tu deśādyā asanto nirmitāś citā  MU
ābhāsuraṃ trijagad ity avabhāti bhāsvat saṃvedanaṃ cayanam ekacites svarūpam 
vāci sthitaṃ bhavati caitad upoḍhabhedaṃ kliṣṭaṃ praśāntavacanas tu śivaḥ parātmā  MU
saṃvedanaṃ sarga itīha śabdāv arthena bhinnau na kadācid etau 
vīcyambhasī dve iti nocitoktir jñasyājñatāyāṃ tv idam eva yuktam  MU
svapnaśatarudropākhyāne saṃsāraśatānveṣaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ
rāmaḥ
jīvaṭabrāhmaṇādīnāṃ haṃsāntānāṃ munīśvara 
bhikṣusvapnaśarīrāṇāṃ sampannaṃ kim ataḥ param  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
rudreṇa saha sambhūya prabuddhās sarva eva te 
mithaś ca dṛṣṭasaṃsārā rudrāṃśās sukhinas sthitāḥ  MU
tena rudreṇa tāṃ māyām avalokya tathoditām 
svāṃśās tām eva saṃsārasthitiṃ te preṣitāḥ punaḥ  MU
rudraḥ
gacchatāśu nijaṃ sthānaṃ tatra bhuktvā kalatrakaiḥ 
kañcit kālaṃ samaṃ bhogān matsakāśam upaiṣyatha  MU
bhaviṣyatha madaṃśā me gaṇā matpurabhūṣaṇāḥ 
tato mahāpralayato yāsyāmas tat padaṃ saha  MU
ity uktvā bhagavān rudras teṣāṃ so 'ntaradhīyata 
anyasaṃsārasaṃsthānāṃ rudrāṇāṃ madhyam āyayau  MU
prayayus svāspadaṃ te 'pi jīvaṭabrāhmaṇādayaḥ 
svakalatrais samaṃ dehaṃ kṣapayitvātha kālataḥ  MU
rudralokaṃ samāsādya bhaviṣyanti gaṇottamāḥ 
kadācid vyomni dṛśyante tārakākāradhāriṇaḥ  MU
rāmaḥ
bhikṣusaṅkalparūpās te jīvaṭabrāhmaṇādayaḥ 
kathaṃ satyatvam āyātās saṅkalpārtheṣv asatyatā  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
saṅkalpasatyatāstīśe saṅkalpāsatyatāsty aje 
yatra yan nāsti tan nāsti yatas sarvātma tat padam  MU
yat svapne dṛśyate yac ca saṅkalpair avalokyate 
tat tathā vidyate tatra sarvakālaṃ tadātmakam  MU
taddeśakālātmikayā tayaivāvasthayāpyate 
taddeśakālātmikayā gatyā deśāntaraṃ yathā  MU
deśād deśāntaraṃ yadvad yatnagatyādikaṃ vinā 
na labhyate tathā svapno vinā tattāṃ na labhyate  MU
sarvam asti citaḥ kośe yad yathālokayaty asau 
cit tat tathā tadāpnoti sarvātmatvād avikṣatam  MU
saṅkalpasvapnavastv aṅga yayā ca daśayāpyate 
paramābhyāsayogābhyāṃ vinā seha na labhyate  MU
yeṣāṃ tu yogavijñānadṛṣṭayaḥ phalitās sthitāḥ 
sarvaṃ sarvatra paśyanti ta ete śaṅkarādayaḥ  MU
idam agragataṃ vastu tathāsaṅkalpitaṃ ca yaḥ 
prārthayaty ubhayabhraṃśaṃ sa prāpnoty ubhayāśrayāt  MU
sarvaṃ hy abhimataṃ kāryam ekaniṣṭhasya sidhyati 
dakṣiṇāṃ kakubhaṃ gacchan kaḥ prāpnoty uttarāṃ diśam  MU
saṅkalpārthaparair eva saṅkalpārtho 'vagamyate 
agrasthārthaparair agrasaṃsthito 'rtho 'vagamyate  MU
agrasthabuddhisaṃsthe 'smin kalpitaṃ prāptum icchati 
yas sa nā naikaniṣṭhatvāt tadā tan nāśayed dvayam  MU
tasmād ekārthaniṣṭhatvād bhikṣujīvena rudratām 
prāpya sarvātmano labdhaṃ padāt sarvaṃ tathāsthiteḥ  MU
bhikṣusaṅkalpajīvānāṃ pratyekaṃ taj jagat pṛthak 
paśyanti te ca nānyo'nyaṃ rudrajñānād ṛte tataḥ  MU
aprabuddhāḥ prajāyante jīvā jīvāt prabodhinaḥ 
tadicchayāśu viduṣa iva mūrkhās sutā iva  MU
iha vidyādharo 'haṃ syām iha syām aham eḍikā 
ity ekadhyānasāphalyadṛṣṭānto 'syāṃ kriyāsthitau  MU
ekatvaṃ ca śatatvaṃ ca maurkhyaṃ pāṇḍityam eva ca 
devatvaṃ mānuṣatvaṃ ca deśakālakriyākramaiḥ  MU
tulyakālam alaṅkartuṃ dhāraṇādhyānayatnataḥ 
sarvaśaktyajarūpatvāj jīvasyāsty eva śaktatā  MU
anantaś cāntayuktaś ca svabhāvo 'sya svabhāvataḥ 
savikāsas sasaṅkoco haṃsasyeva cidātmanaḥ  MU
yad icchati tad asty aṅga nanu sampadyate svayam 
svayaṃsaṅkalpitair ebhir deśakālakriyākramaiḥ  MU
yoginyo yoginaś ceha tiṣṭhanty anyatra yānti ca 
iha cāmutra cehante dṛṣṭam etad anekaśaḥ  MU
kārtavīryo gṛhe tiṣṭhan vavarṣāmbudharo bhavan 
viṣṇuḥ kṣīrodadhau tiṣṭhañ jāyate puruṣo bhuvi  MU
paśvarthaṃ yānti tiṣṭhantyo yoginyo yoginīgaṇe 
śakras svargāsane tiṣṭhan yāti yajñārtham urvarām  MU
sahasram ekaṃ bhavati tathāsmiñ jagadātmani 
nṛṇāṃ śatāni bhaktānāṃ yānti sāyujyatāṃ tanau  MU
ekas sahasraṃ bhavati tathā caiṣa janārdanaḥ 
ekaḥ kāntāsahasrāṇi tulyakālaṃ niṣevate  MU
evaṃ te bhikṣusaṅkalpajīvaṭabrāhmaṇādayaḥ 
rudravijñānavaśatas svasaṅkalpapurīr gatāḥ  MU
tatra bhuktvā ciraṃ bhogān prāpya rudrapuraṃ tataḥ 
gaṇatām āpnuvantas te sthāsyanti saparicchadāḥ  MU
nityapraphultanavakalpalatālayeṣu rudreṇa sārdham ururatnagulucchakeṣu 
nānājagatsu ca tadā purapattaneṣu vidyādharīṣv amalamaulidharā ramante  MU
bhikṣuviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ
ekonasaptatitamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
eṣa dṛṣṭo yathānena bhikṣuṇā cetanābhramaḥ 
bhūtaṃ pratyekam evaivaṃ pṛthaṅ mṛtvā tu paśyati  MU
sarvasya nāma jīvasya mṛtijanmamayī sthitiḥ 
bhavaty eva cidākāśarūpiṇo 'py ākṛtiṃ gatā  MU
pṛthak pratyekam abhyeti khātmā saṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ 
pṛthag āmodasārthasya yathā kusumaṣaṇḍakaḥ  MU
sarva eva mṛto jantuḥ pṛthak svapratibhātmakam 
paśyaty evaṃ kharūpo 'pi dehī cāmokṣam ākulaḥ  MU
jīva eṣa mayā tubhyaṃ kathitaḥ kathayānayā 
parāt praspanditātmeti na bhikṣū rāma kevalaḥ  MU
mohān mohāntaraṃ yāti jīvo jaraḍhajīvitaḥ 
parvatāgraparibhraṣṭo hy adho 'dha upalo yathā  MU
paramātmapadabhraṣṭo jīvas svapnam imaṃ dṛḍham 
paśyaty asmād api svapnād yāti svapnāntaraṃ punaḥ  MU
svapnāt svapne 'pi nipatan mṛṣaivedaṃ śilādṛḍham 
paripaśyati deho 'ntar māyayā jarjarīkṛtaḥ  MU
kvacit kenacid evaiṣa kadācid vā na vā svayam 
dehena mohanidrāto mucyate samprabudhyate  MU
rāmaḥ
aho nu viṣamo moho jīvasyāsyopajāyate 
padāc cyutasya stokena nānākāravikāradaḥ  MU
mithyājñānograyāminyā māyayā nipuṇād idam 
aho nu khalu vaiṣamyaṃ bhīmaṃ nijapadacyuteḥ  MU
bhagavan sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvathaiva jagatsthitau 
tvayā sambhavatīty uktaṃ mayā tac cānubhūyate  MU
evaṃguṇaviśiṣṭātmā sumahātman sa bhikṣukaḥ 
kvacid asti na vety antar ālokya kathayāśu me  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
atra rātrau samādhisthas trilokīmaṭhikām imām 
bhikṣur eṣo 'sti nāstīti prekṣya prātar vadāmy aham  MU
vālmīkiḥ
munāv evaṃ kathayati bahir madhyāhnadiṇḍimaḥ 
udabhūt pralayakṣubdhaghanagarjitamāṃsalaḥ  MU
tatyajuḥ pādayos tasya puṣpāñjaliparamparāḥ 
nṛpāḥ paurā viṭapinaḥ puṣpaṃ vātayutā iva  MU
pūjayitvā muniśreṣṭhān udatiṣṭhat sa viṣṭarāt 
muninā saha bhūpāla udayādrer ivāṃśumān  MU
sabhā tadanu sottasthau sapraṇāmaparasparam 
krameṇa hyastanenaiva jagmuḥ khecarabhūcarāḥ  MU
svāspadeṣu yathāśāstram aharvyāpāram ādṛtāḥ 
sarve sampādayām āsur nijadharmakramocitam  MU
cintayanto muniproktaṃ mahīcaranabhaścarāḥ 
jñānaṃ kṣapāṃ kṣaṇam iva ninyuḥ kalpam ivāpi ca  MU
prātaḥ punaḥ prasṛtakāryaparampare 'smiñ jāte jane khacarabhūcarasiddhasaṅghaḥ 
āsthānalokaracanena tathaiva tasthāv anyo'nyasaṃvadanapūjitapūjyalokaḥ  MU
bodhāntaravismayavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
saptatitamas sargaḥ
vālmīkiḥ
vasiṣṭhamunisaṃyuktā viśvāmitrādisaṃyutā 
sthitakhecarasiddhaughā viśrāntanṛpanāyakā  MU
sarāmalakṣmaṇā saiva tathaivātha sabhā babhau 
somyā samasamābhogā śāntavātyeva padminī  MU
anapekṣyaiva ca praśnam uvācātha munīśvaraḥ 
bodhayanti balād eva sānukampā hi sādhavaḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
rājan raghukulākāśaśaśāṅka raghunandana 
hyo mayā dhyānanetreṇa sa bhikṣuḥ prekṣitaś ciram  MU
dhyānenāhaṃ ciraṃ bhrāntas tādṛgbhikṣudidṛkṣayā 
dvīpāni sapta vipulāṃs tathaiva kulaparvatān  MU
yāvat kutaścid apy eva bhikṣur labdho na tādṛśaḥ 
kathaṃ kila manorājyaṃ bahir apy upalabhyate  MU
tatas tribhāgaśeṣāyāṃ rātrau punar ahaṃ dhiyā 
uttarāśāntaraṃ yāto velāvāta ivārṇavam  MU
cīnanāmātha tatrāsti śrīmāñ janapado mahān 
valmīkopari tatrāsti vihāro jinasaṃśrayaḥ  MU
tasmin vihāre svakuṭīkośe kapilamūrdhajaḥ 
bhikṣur dīrghaśayā nāma sthita evaṃparodayaḥ  MU
ekaviṃśatirātraṃ ca tasyaivaṃsthitiśālinaḥ 
dṛḍhārgaḍaṃ gṛhaṃ dhyānabhaṅgabhītā viśanti no  MU
bhṛtyāḥ prāyaḥ kila tathā sa tiṣṭhati subhikṣukaḥ 
adyaivaṃ tasya sampannaṃ niyater īdṛśī sthitiḥ  MU
rātrayo dhyānaniṣṭhasya gatās tasyaikaviṃśatiḥ 
sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tathā citte 'nubhūtavān  MU
kasmiṃścit prāktane kalpe bhikṣur evaṃ purābhavat 
adya tv iha dvitīyo 'sti tṛtīyo nopalabhyate  MU
mayā tu punar anviṣṭaś cetasā caturātmanā 
tādṛg bhikṣus tṛtīyo 'nyo jagatpadmodarālinā  MU
asmāt sargāt tu no labdhas tṛtīyas tādṛgāśayaḥ 
athānye līlayā sargā mayā samprekṣitās tataḥ  MU
yāvat kasmiṃścid ākāśakośaśāyini sargake 
tṛtīyo vidyate bhikṣur brāhmaṇaś cedṛśakramaḥ  MU
evaṃ tenaiva tenaiva sanniveśena bhūriśaḥ 
bhaviṣyanty abhavan santi padārthās sargasantatau  MU
asyāṃ sabhāyām api ye munayo brāhmaṇā nṛpāḥ 
bhāvyam evaṃsamācārais tair anyair apy anekaśaḥ  MU
nāradenāmunā bhāvyaṃ punar anyena cānagha 
evam evātriṇā bhāvyaṃ punar anyena cādhunā  MU
evaṃ kalatrakarmabhyāṃ yuktenānena bhūriśaḥ 
evaṃjanmādinā bhāvyaṃ vyāsena ca śukena ca  MU
janakena punar bhāvyaṃ kratunā pulahena ca 
agastyena pulastyena bhṛguṇāṅgirasāpi ca  MU
eta eva tathānye ca evaṃrūpakriyāspadam 
cirāc cirād bhaviṣyanti māyeyaṃ vitatā yataḥ  MU
sadṛśācārajanmānas ta evānye ca bhūriśaḥ 
bhūyo bhūyo vivartante sargeṣv apsv iva vīcayaḥ  MU
atyantasadṛśāḥ kecit kecid ardhasamakramāḥ 
kecid īṣatsamāḥ kecin na kadācit punas tathā  MU
evam eṣātivitatā māyā manasi mohinī 
kṣaṇo nehāsti no kalpaḥ pratipattir hi jṛmbhate  MU
kvaikaviṃśatyahorātrā anantāḥ kva kuyonayaḥ 
kva tāsām upalambho 'lam aho bhīmā manogatiḥ  MU
pratibhāmātram evedam itthaṃ vikasitaṃ sitam 
nānākalahakallolacalaṃ prātar ivāmbujam  MU
jātaṃ saṃvedanād eva śuddhād idam aśuddhavat 
saṃsārajālam akhilaṃ vahnir vahnikaṇād iva  MU
pratyekam evam uditaḥ pratibhāsaṣaṇḍaṣ ṣaṇḍāntareṣv api ca tatra vicitraṣaṇḍāḥ 
sarve svayaṃ nanu ca te ca mitho na mithyā sarvātmani sphurati kāraṇakāraṇe 'smin  MU
ekasaptatitamas sargaḥ
daśarathaḥ
munināyaka taṃ bhikṣuṃ gatvā sambodhayantv amī 
narā matprahitāś śīghraṃ cīnabuddhakuṭīgatam  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
rājaṃs tasya mahābhikṣos sa dehaḥ prāṇavarjitaḥ 
kledaṃ vaivarṇyam āyāto nāsau jīvitabhājanam  MU
tasya bhikṣoś ca jīvo 'sau bhūtvā padmajasārasaḥ 
jīvanmuktas sthito bhūyo nāsau saṃsṛtibhājanam  MU
tadgṛhe māsaparyante balān niṣkāsitārgaḍāḥ 
antar ālokayiṣyanti bhikṣum akṣuṇṇamānasam  MU
anyenaiva sa dehena bhikṣur mukto vyavasthitaḥ 
kathaṃ prabodhyate naṣṭaṃ tadvihāre śarīrakam  MU
eṣā guṇamayī māyā durbodhena duratyayā 
nityaṃ satyāvabodhena sukhenaivātivāhyate  MU
asatyaiva kṛtārambhā hemnaḥ kaṭakatā yathā 
pratibhāsaviparyāsamātrakāraṇakodayā  MU
paramātmana eveyam itthaṃ māyeti mīyate 
taraṅgateva payasi prekṣāmātravināśinī  MU
jño 'pi dṛśyamayād dīrghasvapnāt svapnāntaraṃ vrajan 
evaṃ nānyatvam āyāti vivekāt sarvagātmadṛk  MU
yo yo 'sya pratibhāsas syād ātmaiva sa sa bodhataḥ 
sa evodeti saṃsārakarañjavanagulmadṛk  MU
pratyekaṃ bhūtam uditaṃ pṛthak saṃsāramaṇḍalam 
bhikṣos svapnāntaram iva parād vīcir ivāmbhasaḥ  MU
prasṛtaḥ padmajād eva jagatsvapno 'yam āditaḥ 
tathaivātha svacittotkarūḍhas sarvajanaṃ prati  MU
āpitāmaham ābhāti sargas svapnavilāsavat 
pratyekam uditas tena brahmāṇḍānīha koṭiśaḥ  MU
sphuran parasmin pratyekaṃ jīvaḥ paśyati vibhramam 
hṛdaye 'rthasamarthaṃ ca svapnavad dīrgham āntaram  MU
citsattāmātrasāmānyapratīticyutimātrataḥ 
jarāmaraṇaduḥkhānāṃ kaścid bhājanatāṃ gataḥ  MU
pātālaṃ brahmalokaṃ vā cic camatkṛtiśālinī 
cittāṃśaspandamātreṇa kṛtvā kṛtvaiva saṃsthitā  MU
cit spandarūpiṇī jīvanāmnāgatyātmanātmani 
anyatrānyeva luṭhati bhūtvā sambhramabhāriṇī  MU
bibheṣi paramātmātmā paramātmana eva kim 
jīvadehādināmno 'smāt pratibimbād ivārbhakaḥ  MU
brahmaṇy eva paraṃ brahma jagaddṛṣṭyaiva sat sthitam 
śuddhākāśam ivākāśe jale jalam ivāmalam  MU
loko brahmaṇa evāyaṃ jagadrūpeṇa tiṣṭhataḥ 
bibhety anyatayopāttāt pratibimbād ivārbhakaḥ  MU
spande 'spandīkṛte bodhāc citas sañjñā vilīyate 
sāpy alaṃ pariṇāmena līyate 'gnau ghṛtaṃ yathā  MU
citspanda eva citspande sarvātmātmani jṛmbhate 
spandāspandau jṛmbhaṇādi kalpitaṃ nātra vāstavam  MU
na spando 'stīha nāspando naikatā nāpi ca dvitā 
śuddhacinmātram evāsti sarvaṃ cāsti yathāsthitam  MU
pareṇa pariṇāmena sargāhantārthayoś śame 
cinmātram api nāsty eva nāstīty api na vidyate  MU
bhedabhāvanayodeti bhedaḥ prakṛtilāñchanaḥ 
abhedabodhād akhile galite śiṣyate param  MU
nānātehāsty abodhena so 'bodho 'sty anavekṣaṇāt 
prekṣakaś caiva nāsty eva tasmān niśśaṅkatā parā  MU
nātas svapno na jāgracchrīr na suṣuptaṃ na turyatā 
na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti nānyad vā kalanātmakam  MU
śāntir ekā jagannāmnī śāntāv iyam avasthitā 
abodho 'satya evātaḥ kva dṛśyadraṣṭṛdarśanam  MU
spando 'py aspanda evāsyā nissaṅkalpatayā citeḥ 
na spandāspandayor bhinnā saṅkalparahitaiva cit  MU
dvitvaikyādikalārūpas saṅkalpaś cittabhāvanam 
sa cābhāvanamātreṇa galati brahma śiṣyate  MU
ciccandrabimbe saṅkalpakalaṅkas sphuratīva yaḥ 
nāsau kalaṅkas tad viddhi cidghanasya ghanaṃ vapuḥ  MU
cidghanaś ca na san nāsat sthīyatāṃ tat tate pade 
ity aśeṣamahābodhasārasaṅgrahaṇaṃ kṛtam  MU
ciccandrabimbāt saṅkalpakalaṅko 'mṛtavigrahāt 
tvayā bhāvena sammṛṣṭo bhāvābhāvakṣayātmanā  MU
bhāvābhāvādikalanāṃ nītvā cinmayatāṃ citā 
śamollāsavilāsānte samam āssva yathāsukham  MU
spandāspandau kalpanākalpanāṃśau cittvān nānyau cit tv anāmā niraṃśā 
sarvākārānāvṛtiś śāntasattā sattvāpūrṇaikārṇavābhā sthiteti  MU
brahmaikatāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
dvisaptatitamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
suṣuptamaunavān bhūtvā dhūtvā dvitvaikarūpiṇīm 
kalanāṃ kānta cidrūpas tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabhya tat padam  MU
rāmaḥ
vāṅmaunam akṣamaunaṃ ca kāṣṭhamaunaṃ ca vedmy aham 
suṣuptamaunaṃ mauneśaṃ brahman brūhi kim ucyate  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
dvividhaḥ procyate rāma munir munivarair iha 
ekaḥ kāṣṭhatapasvī ca jīvanmuktas tathetaraḥ  MU
abhāvitātmā śuṣkāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ baddhaniścayaḥ 
haṭhāj jitendriyagrāmo munis syāt kāṣṭhatāpasaḥ  MU
yathābhūtam idaṃ buddhvā bhāvitātmātmani sthitaḥ 
lokopamo 'pi tṛpto 'ntar yas sa muktamunis smṛtaḥ  MU
etayor yo bhaved bhāvaś śāntayor munināthayoḥ 
cittaniścayarūpātmā maunaśabdena sa smṛtaḥ  MU
catuṣprakāram āhus tan maunaṃ maunavido janāḥ 
vāṅmaunam akṣamaunaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ sauṣuptam eva ca  MU
vāṅmaunaṃ vacasāṃ rodho balād indriyanigrahaḥ 
akṣamaunaṃ parityāgaś ceṣṭānāṃ kāṣṭhasañjñakam  MU
manomaunaṃ pañcamaṃ yat tan mṛte kāṣṭhatāpase 
bhavet suṣuptamaunākhyaṃ jīvanmukte hi jīvati  MU
triṣu maunaviśeṣeṣu viṣayaḥ kāṣṭhatāpasaḥ 
suṣuptamaunāvasthāyāś caturthyāś caiva muktadhīḥ  MU
vāṅmaunaṃ maunam ity eva siddhaṃ tac ca manaḥkalā 
malinaṃ jīvabandhāya tatrasthāḥ kāṣṭhatāpasāḥ  MU
haṭhād vā yogayuktyaiva yas svākṣāṇāṃ vinigrahaḥ 
tad akṣamaunam ity āhus tatrasthāḥ kāṣṭhatāpasāḥ  MU
asmaran saṃsmaran vāpi dṛśyaṃ vāgdvayam aspṛśan 
apaśyann eva paśyantīṃ kāṣṭhamaunī hi tiṣṭhati  MU
prasphuraccittakalanam etan maunatrayaṃ smṛtam 
sambhavaty ajñamuniṣu na tu tajjñeṣu līlayā  MU
nātropādeyatā jñānām etan maunatrayaṃ kila 
līlayā helayā vāpi tajjñāḥ kurvanti vā na vā  MU
idaṃ suṣuptamaunaṃ tu jīvanmuktamatisthitam 
apunarjanmane jantoś śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam  MU
nātra saṃyamyate vāṇī trividhā nāpi cojjhyate 
nollāsyante na jīyante samastendriyasaṃvidaḥ  MU
nānātākalaneyaṃ hi na valgati na śāmyati 
ceto na ceto nāceto na san nāsan na khaṃ na gauḥ  MU
avibhāgam anāyāsaṃ yad anādyantam āsitam 
dhyāyato dhāvataś caiva sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat  MU
yathābhūtam imaṃ buddhvā jagannānātvavibhramam 
yad āsitam asaṅgehaṃ sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat  MU
anekasaṃvidrūpātma caikam evedam ātatam 
ity āsitam anantaṃ yat sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat  MU
ākāśaṃ naiva cākāśaṃ sarvam asmi na cāsmi ca 
iti sthitaṃ samaṃ śāntaṃ yat tan maunaṃ suṣuptavat  MU
sarvaṃ śūnyaṃ nirālambaṃ śāntaṃ vijñaptimātrakam 
na san nāsad iti svastham āsitaṃ maunam uttamam  MU
bhāvābhāvadaśonmeṣaviśeṣair vitathotthitaiḥ 
saṃvido yad anāmarśas tan maunaṃ paramaṃ viduḥ  MU
asataiva satevāntaś cetasā vṛttirūpiṇā 
yad anāvartanaṃ saṃvidvṛttes tan maunam akṣayam  MU
nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti na mano na ca mānasam 
iti saṃvidasaṃvittir avicchinnātimaunatā  MU
aham asmi jagac cāsti tv astiśabdārthamātrakam 
sattāsāmānyam eveti sauṣuptaṃ maunam ucyate  MU
sattvāt saṃvida evānyās svapnādikalanāḥ kutaḥ 
anantam eva sauṣuptaṃ sarvaṃ maunam atas tatam  MU
suṣuptamaunam evedam anantatvāt prabodhavat 
turyam evāmalaṃ viddhi turyātītam athāpi vā  MU
suṣuptaikasamādhānas tathā turyasamādhikaḥ 
turyātītasamādhir vā jāgraty api bhaveta vai  MU
turyastha eva sakalāmalaśāntavṛttir jāgraty api vyavaharan nipuṇaṃ svapitvā 
nityaṃ sadeha uta vāpi videha eva brāhmaṃ nabho bhava tad eva kilāsi sādho  MU
om ity apāstabhavavāsanam ekam āssva na tvaṃ na cāham iti kiñcid ihāsti satyam 
sarvaṃ ca vidyata itīha śilāntarābhaṃ jñas tiṣṭha cidgaganakośakalaikaniṣṭhaḥ  MU
mahāmaunayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ
trisaptatitamas sargaḥ
rāmaḥ
kutaś śatatvam āyātaṃ rudrāṇāṃ munināyaka 
ye gaṇās te ca kiṃ rudrā uta neti vadasva me  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
svapnānāṃ bhikṣuṇā dṛṣṭaṃ śataṃ śataśarīrakam 
sarvam uddeśato jñātam ata uktaṃ na tan mayā  MU
yad ākārāś śataṃ svapne tat tad gaṇaśataṃ smṛtam 
tad eva tad rudraśataṃ rudrā api gaṇābhidhāḥ  MU
rāmaḥ
ekasmād bhagavaṃś cittāt kathaṃ cittaśataṃ kṛtam 
tatsvapnaśatarudreṇa dīpād dīpaśataṃ yathā  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
nirāvaraṇasadbhāvā yad yathā kalpayanti ye 
tat tathāśu bhavaty eva na sāvaraṇasaṃvidaḥ  MU
sarvātmanas sarvagatvād yad yathā yatra bhāvyate 
tathānubhūyate tatra tat tat tajjñena nādhiyā  MU
rāmaḥ
kapālamālābharaṇo bhasmasnāyī digambaraḥ 
śmaśānanilayo brahman kāmukaś ca maheśvaraḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
maheśvarāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ jīvanmuktaśarīriṇām 
na kriyāniyamo 'stīha sa hy ajñeṣv eva kalpitaḥ  MU
ajñās tv ajitacittatvāt kriyāniyamanaṃ vinā 
gardhān mātsyena nyāyena paraṃ duḥkhaṃ prayānti hi  MU
tajjñās tv iṣṭeṣv aniṣṭeṣu na nimajjanti vastuṣu 
jitendriyatvād buddhatvān nirvāsanatayānayā  MU
kākatālīyavad rūḍhāṃ kriyāṃ kurvanti te sadā 
na kurvanty api vā kecin naiṣāṃ kvacid api grahaḥ  MU
kākatālīyavad viṣṇur evaṃkarmoditaḥ parāt 
evaṃkarmā trinayana evaṃkarmāmbujodbhavaḥ  MU
na nindyam asti nānindyaṃ nopādeyaṃ na heyakam 
na cātmīyaṃ na ca paraṃ karma jñaviṣayaṃ kvacit  MU
agnyādīnāṃ yathauṣṇyādi sargādau rūḍhim āgatam 
harādīnāṃ tathā karma dvijātīnāṃ ca jātayaḥ  MU
sarge prarūḍhim āyāte saṅketavaśataḥ pṛthak 
anubhūtaphalais svārthāḥ kalpanāḥ kalpitās tataḥ  MU
videhamuktaviṣayaṃ turyaṃ maunam ito mayā 
noktaṃ te pañcamaṃ maunaṃ videhasya raghūdvaha  MU
khād apy atitarām accham ātmākāśaṃ cidātmakam 
tatra prāptiḥ paraṃ śreyas sā kathaṃ prāpyate śṛṇu  MU
samyagjñānāvabodhena nityam ekasamādhinā 
saṅkhyayaivāvabuddhā ye te sāṅkhyā yoginas smṛtāḥ  MU
prāṇādyanilasaṃśāntau yuktā ye padam āgatāḥ 
anāmayam anādyantaṃ te smṛtā yogayoginaḥ  MU
upādeyaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śāntaṃ padam akṛtrimam 
tat kaiścit saṅkhyayā prāptaṃ kaiścid yogena dehataḥ  MU
ekaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati 
yat sāṅkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ paraṃ yogais tad eva hi  MU
yatra prāptā manovṛttir atyantaṃ nopalabhyate 
vāsanāvāgurākrāntā tad viddhi paramaṃ padam  MU
vāsanāṃ cittam evāhuḥ kāraṇaṃ tad dhi saṃsṛteḥ 
tad akāraṇatām eti vilīya bhavakarmasu  MU
manaḥ paśyati vai dehaṃ bālo vetālakaṃ yathā 
ātmānaṃ vilayaṃ nītvā na bhūyas taṃ prapaśyati  MU
mano mudhaivābhyuditam asad evānavekṣaṇāt 
svapne svamaraṇākāraṃ prekṣyamāṇaṃ na vidyate  MU
mano'bhāvān na saṃsāraḥ kvāmodaḥ kusumaṃ vinā 
upadeśyopadeśādi bandhamokṣau ca tat kutaḥ  MU
ekatattvaghanābhyāsaḥ prāṇānāṃ vilayas tataḥ 
manovinigrahaś ceti mokṣaśabdārthakāraṇam  MU
rāmaḥ
yadi hi prāṇavilayo mune mokṣasya kāraṇam 
mṛtā eva hi mucyante tan manye sarvajantavaḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
triṣv eteṣu prayogeṣu manaḥpraśamanaṃ varam 
sādhyaṃ viddhi tad evāśu yathā bhavati tac chivam  MU
yadā nirvāsanaṃ prāṇās tyajantīdaṃ śarīrakam 
tadā na bhūyas tanmātrair yānti vyomani saṅgamam  MU
vāsanāṃśātmakāny eva viddhi tanmātrakāṇi vai 
tadātmakair manovadbhiḥ prāṇāś śliṣyanti netaraiḥ  MU
savāsanās tu yady ete prāṇā muñcanti dehakam 
tad vyomavāyusaṃśleṣaṃ yānti duḥkhāya gandhavat  MU
manas sāmbur ivāmbhodo na śāmyati savāsanam 
nāmanaskās sambhavanti prāṇās sūryā ivātviṣaḥ  MU
na jahāti manaḥ prāṇān vinā jñānena karhicit 
tṛṇāntareṇaiva vinā tṛṇāgram iva tittiriḥ  MU
jñānād avāsanībhāvaṃ svanāśaṃ prāpya vai manaḥ 
prāṇaspandaṃ ca nādatte tataś śāntir hi śiṣyate  MU
jñānāt sarvapadārthānām asattvaṃ samudety alam 
tato 'ṅga vāsanānāśād viyogaḥ prāṇacetasoḥ  MU
tato na paśyati manaḥ praśāntaṃ dehatāṃ punaḥ 
svanāśena padaṃ prāptaṃ vāsanaiva mano viduḥ  MU
ceto hi vāsanāmātraṃ tadabhāvaḥ paraṃ padam 
tac ca sampadyate jñānāj jñānam āhur vicāraṇam  MU
ity asyās saṃsṛte rāma paryantas sampravartate 
svayaṃ vivekamātreṇa rajjusarpabhramākṛteḥ  MU
ekārthābhyasanaprāṇarodhacetaḥparikṣayāḥ 
ekasminn eva saṃsiddhe saṃsidhyanti parasparam  MU
tālavṛntaparispande śānte śānto yathānilaḥ 
prāṇānilaparispande śānte śāntaṃ tathā manaḥ  MU
prāṇāś śarīravilaye prayānti vyomavāyutām 
yathāvāsitam evedaṃ manaḥ paśyanti tatra ca  MU
yathā videhāḥ paśyanti prāṇā vyomani dehakam 
samanaskās tathācāraṃ sarvaṃ cānubhavanti te  MU
śānte vātaparispande yathā gandhaḥ praśāmyati 
tathā śānte manasspande śāmyanti prāṇavāyavaḥ  MU
avinābhāvinī nityaṃ jantūnāṃ prāṇacetasī 
kusumāmodavan miśre tilataile iva sthite  MU
manasas spandanaṃ prāṇaḥ prāṇasya spandanaṃ manaḥ 
ete viharato nityam anyo'nyaṃ rathasārathī  MU
ādhārādheyavat tv ete ekābhāve vinaśyataḥ 
kurutaś ca svanāśena kāryaṃ mokṣākhyam uttamam  MU
ekatattvaghanābhyāsāc chāntaṃ śāmyaty alaṃ manaḥ 
tallayatvāt svabhāvasya tena prāṇo 'pi śāmyati  MU
vicārya yad anantātmatattvaṃ tanmayatāṃ nayet 
manas tatas tallayatas tad eva bhavati sthiram  MU
yad evātitarāṃ śreyo 'nupalambhopalambhayoḥ 
dvayor apy asatos tatra śeṣe vāpi sthiro bhava  MU
ekasmin sudṛḍhe tattve tāvad bhāvaṃ vibhāvayet 
bhāvo 'bhāvatvam āyāti svābhyāsād yāvad ātatam  MU
pratyāhāravaśāc cetas svayaṃ bhogyakṣayād iva 
vilīyate saha prāṇaiḥ param evāvaśiṣyate  MU
yadekatānaṃ bhavati cetas tad bhavati kṣaṇāt 
śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaughaṃ cirābhyāsasvabhāvataḥ  MU
avidyeyaṃ tu nāstīti buddhvā yuktiyutaṃ dhiyā 
jñānād eva parāvāptis tadabhyāsas tato varam  MU
citte śānte śāmyatīyaṃ saṃsāramṛgatṛṣṇikā 
jarām upagate meghe mihikā mahatī yathā  MU
cittamātram avidyeti kuru tenaiva tatkṣayam 
tadrūpanāma cittātmānubhāvo hi paraṃ padam  MU
muhūrtam eva nirvāṇaṃ yadi cetaḥ pare pade 
tat tatpariṇataṃ viddhi tatraivāsvādam āgatam  MU
yadi sāṅkhyena viśrāntaṃ ceto yogena vā pade 
kṣaṇaṃ tat sattvatāṃ yātaṃ na bhūyaḥ parijāyate  MU
ceto vigalitāvidyaṃ sattvaśabdena kathyate 
dagdhaṃ saṃsārabījaṃ tan na dadyād aṅkuraṃ punaḥ  MU
jñaś cidvigalitāvidyas sattvasthaś śāntavāsanaḥ 
samaṃ śūnyopamaṃ śāntaṃ jyotiḥ paśyati śāmyati  MU
vigalitājñapadaṃ vimalaṃ manas subhaga sattvam itīha hi kathyate 
na punar eti kalāmalinaṃ padaṃ kanakatām iva tāmram upāgatam  MU
prāṇamanassaṃyogavicāro nāma sargaḥ
catussaptatitamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
jīvo 'jīvībhavaty āśu yāti cittam acittatām 
vicārād ity avidyānto mokṣa ity abhidhīyate  MU
mṛgatṛṣṇājalam iva sargo 'hantādi dṛśyate 
asad eva manāg eva tad vicārāt pralīyate  MU
saṃsṛtisvapnaviśrāntau vetālodāhṛtān imān 
praśnān ākarṇaya śubhān prasaṅgāt smṛtim āgatān  MU
asti vindhyamahāṭavyāṃ vetālo vipulākṛtiḥ 
sa kiñcin maṇḍalaṃ gardhād ājagāma jighatsayā  MU
sa vetālo 'vasat pūrvaṃ kasmiṃścit sajjanāspade 
bahubalyupahāreṇa nityatṛptatayā sukhī  MU
nirnimittaṃ nirāgaskaṃ na tenāsau purogatam 
kṣudhito 'pi naraṃ hanti saṅgo hi nyāyadaiśikaḥ  MU
sa kālenāṭavīgeho jagāma nagarāntaram 
nyāyayuktyā janaṃ bhoktuṃ kṣudhā samabhicoditaḥ  MU
tatra prāpa sa bhūpālaṃ rātricaryāvinirgatam 
tam āha ghanaghoreṇa śabdenograniśācaraḥ  MU
vetālaḥ
rājaṃl labdho 'si bhīmena vetālena mayādhunā 
kva gacchasi vinaṣṭo 'si bhavān bhojanam adya me  MU
rājā
bho rātricara nirnyāyaṃ māṃ ced atsi balād iha 
tat te sahasradhā mūrdhā sphuṭiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ  MU
vetālaḥ
na tvām admy aham anyāyaṃ nyāyo 'yaṃ tu mayocyate 
rājāsi sakalāśāś ca pūraṇīyās tvayārthinām  MU
mamemām arthitāṃ rājan sambhavārthaṃ prapūraya 
praśnān imān mayoktāṃs tvaṃ samyag vyākhyātum arhasi  MU
kasya sūryasya raśmīnāṃ brahmāṇḍāny aṇavaḥ kṛśāḥ 
kasmin sphuranti pavane mahāgaganareṇavaḥ  MU
svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ gacchañ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ 
tyajan na tyajati svacchaṃ kas svarūpaṃ prabhāsuram  MU
rambhāstambho yathā pattramātram eva punaḥ punaḥ 
antar antas tathāntaś ca tathā ko 'ṇus sa eva hi  MU
brahmāṇḍākāśabhūtaughasūryamaṇḍalameravaḥ 
aparityajato 'ṇutvaṃ kasyāṇoḥ paramāṇavaḥ  MU
kasyānavayavasyaiva paramāṇumahāgireḥ 
śilāntar nibiḍaikāntarūpo majjā jagattrayī  MU
iti kathayasi cen na me durātmaṃs tad iha nigīrya bhavantam ātmaghātin 
phalam iva tava maṇḍalaṃ graseyaṃ prasabham upetya jagad yathā kṛtāntaḥ  MU
vetālapraśno nāma sargaḥ
pañcasaptatitamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
ity uktavati vetāle vaktuṃ praśnān vihasya saḥ 
uvāca vacanaṃ rājā dantāṃśudhavalānanaḥ  MU
rājā
asti cittiktatātmedaṃ brahmāṇḍamaricaṃ phalam 
uttarottarasaṃvṛttabhūtatvakpariveṣṭitam  MU
tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi phalānāṃ yatra santi hi 
asty uccais tādṛśī śākhā vipulā calapallavā  MU
tādṛśīnāṃ sahasrāṇi śākhānāṃ yatra santy atha 
tādṛśo 'sti mahāvṛkṣo durlakṣyo vipulākṛtiḥ  MU
yatra santi sahasrāṇi tādṛśānāṃ mahīruhām 
tādṛśaṃ vanam asty uccair anantatarugulmakam  MU
tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi vanānāṃ yatra santy atha 
tādṛg asti bṛhac chṛṅgam atyuccair bharitākṛti  MU
tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi śṛṅgāṇāṃ yatra santy atha 
tādṛśo 'sti mahāśailaḥ pūritākhiladiktaṭaḥ  MU
tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi śailānāṃ yatra santy atha
