babhūva maṇirājendre na tu niścayavān asau 
rājye jhagiti samprāpte sudīna iva pāmaraḥ  MU
idaṃ sañcintayām āsa manasā smayaśālinā 
samprāptopekṣayā dīrghaduḥkhasambhramabhāvinā  MU
ayaṃ maṇir maṇir nāyaṃ maṇiś cet tad bhaven na saḥ 
spṛśāmi na spṛśāmy enaṃ kadācit sparśato vrajet  MU
naitāvataiva kālena maṇīndraḥ kila sidhyati 
yatnenājīvitāntena sidhyatīty āgamakramaḥ  MU
kriyānikūṇitenākṣṇā lolālātatalopamam 
ratnālokaṃ prapaśyāmi dvicandratvam iva bhramāt  MU
kuta etāvatī sphītā bhāgyasampan mamātatā 
adhunaiva yad āpnomi maṇīndraṃ sarvasiddhidam  MU
kecid eva mahāntas te mahābhāgyā bhavanti hi 
yeṣām alpena kālena prayānty abhimukhaṃ śriyaḥ  MU
aham alpatapās sādhur varāko mānuṣaḥ kila 
siddhayaḥ katham āyānti mām abhāgyaikabhājanam  MU
evaṃ vikalpasaṅkalpaiś ciram ajñaḥ parāmṛśan 
na maṇigrahaṇe yatnam akaron maurkhyamohitaḥ  MU
na yadā yena labdhavyaṃ na tat prāpnoty asau tadā 
cintāmaṇir avāpto 'pi durdhiyā helayojjhitaḥ  MU
iti tasmin sthite yāto maṇir uḍḍīya siddhayaḥ 
tyajanti hy avamantāraṃ śarā guṇam ivojjhitāḥ  MU
hṛtvā prāksampadaḥ puṃsas sa yātas siddhayaḥ kila 
āgatās samprayacchanti sarvaṃ yātā haranty alam  MU
pumān bhūyaḥ kriyāyatnaṃ cakre ratnendrasādhane 
nodvijante hi kāryeṣu janā adhyavasāyinaḥ  MU
dadarśātha kacadrūpaṃ kācakhaṇḍam apaṇḍitaḥ 
hasadbhir vañcakais siddhaiḥ puras tyaktam alakṣitaiḥ  MU
ayaṃ cintāmaṇir iti mūḍhas tasmin sa vastutām 
bubudhe mohito hy ajño mṛdaṃ hemeti paśyati  MU
aṣṭau ṣaṣṭiṃ dviṣan mitraṃ rajjuṃ sarpaṃ sthalaṃ jalam 
candrau dvau kurute citte śiśor moho 'mṛtaṃ viṣam  MU
taṃ dagdhamaṇim ādāya prāktanīṃ sa śriyaṃ jahau 
sarvaṃ cintāmaṇer asmāt prāpyate kiṃ dhanair iti  MU
deśo 'yam asukho rūkṣo janaiḥ pāpibhir āvṛtaḥ 
kiṃ tad gehaṃ hataprāyaṃ ke nāma mama bandhavaḥ  MU
dūraṃ gatvā yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi sampadā 
ity ādāya maṇiṃ mūḍhaś śūnyaṃ kānanam āyayau  MU
tatra kācadalenāsau tena tām āpadaṃ yayau 
kajjalādrer iva niśā maurkhyasyaivāṅga yā samā  MU
duḥkhāni maurkhyavibhavena bhavanti yāni naivāpadā na ca jarāmaraṇena tāni 
sarvāpadāṃ śirasi tiṣṭhati maurkhyam ekaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ janasya vapuṣām iva keśajālam  MU
cintāmaṇyupākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ
trinavatitamas sargaḥ
cūḍālā
athemam aparaṃ ramyaṃ vṛttāntaṃ śṛṇu bhūpate 
paraṃ prabodhanaṃ buddhes sādho sadṛśam ātmanaḥ  MU
asti vindhyavane hastī mahāyūthapayūthapaḥ 
agastyaruddhayā vṛddhyā vindhyenevaidhitas svataḥ  MU
vajrāśriviṣamau dīrghau stas tasya daśanau śitau 
kalpānalaśikhātulyau sumerūnmūlanakṣamau  MU
sa baddho lohajālena hastipena cchalāditaḥ 
munīndreṇeva vindhyādrir upendreṇeva vā baḍiḥ  MU
nibaddho yantraṇāpāśaśastrakumbhārpito gajaḥ 
tāṃ jagāma vyathāṃ vīro na vāggocaram eti yā  MU
ripau hastipake dūrād guptaṃ paśyati vāraṇaḥ 
ayassamudgake tasmin nināya divasatrayam  MU
khedān nigaḍanirbhedayatnavān sa jhaṇajjhaṇam 
cakāra kiṅkiṇīkvāṇam upodghātai ratho yathā  MU
dantābhyāṃ yatnatas tābhyāṃ muhūrtadvitayena saḥ 
babhañja śṛṅkhalājālaṃ svargārgaḍam ivāsuraḥ  MU
taṃ tasya nigaḍacchedam apaśyad dūrato ripuḥ 
baḍes svargāvadalanaṃ harir merutaṭād iva  MU
tasyāvacchinnapāśasya mūrdhni tālataro ripuḥ 
papātākramatas svargaṃ harir meror baḍer iva  MU
sa patan pādapān mohād aprāpya kariṇaś śiraḥ 
papātordhvyāṃ phalaṃ pakvaṃ vātāhatam ivākulaḥ  MU
taṃ puraḥ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahebhaḥ karuṇāṃ yayau 
sphuratsphāraguṇās santas santi tiryaggatāv api  MU
patitaṃ dalayāmīti kiṃ nāma mama pauruṣam 
vāraṇo 'pīti kalayan na jaghāna ca taṃ ripum  MU
kevalaṃ nigaḍavyūhaṃ vidāryāśu jagāma ha 
vitataṃ setum utsārya vipulaugha ivāmbhasaḥ  MU
tam anādṛtya mātaṅgo bhaṅktvā jālaṃ javād yayau 
vidārya meghasaṅghātaṃ nabhasīva divākaraḥ  MU
gate gaje samuttasthau hastipas svasthadehadhīḥ 
gajenaiva samaṃ tasya vyathā dūrataraṃ gatā  MU
prottālatālaviṭapāt sa tathā patito 'pi san 
na bhedam āpa durbhedā manye dehā durātmanām  MU
vardhate prāvṛṣīvābdaḥ kukāryeṣv asatāṃ balam 
atīvāsīt samutsāhī sa gajākramaṇe tadā  MU
vāraṇārir asiṃho 'sau gatebho duḥkham āyayau 
āgatyopagate 'ntardhiṃ nidhāna iva nirdhanaḥ  MU
so 'nviyeṣa gajaṃ yatnād gulmakāntaritaṃ vane 
payodapihitaṃ bhoktuṃ rāhur indum ivāmbare  MU
cireṇālabhatebhendraṃ kasmiṃścit kānane sthitam 
viśrāmyantaṃ tarutale samarād iva nirgatam  MU
atha yatra sthito nāgas tatra tadbandhanakṣamam 
parayā rājasāmagryā gajalampaṭarūpayā  MU
sa khātavalayaṃ cakre hastipaḥ kānane navam 
sarvadikkaṃ vidhir bhūmau samudravalayaṃ yathā  MU
upary asthagayaj jīrṇalataughena sa taṃ śaṭhaḥ 
śūnyaṃ tanvabhrajālena śaratkāla ivāmbaram  MU
dinaiḥ katipayair eva vāraṇo viharan vane 
tasmin nipatitaḥ khāte śuṣkābdhāv iva parvataḥ  MU
vrajan sarpākṛtau kūpe pātālatalabhīṣaṇe 
khāte śuṣkābdhikhātābhe gajaratnasamudgake  MU
iti bhūyo dṛḍhaṃ baddhas tena hastipakena saḥ 
tiṣṭhaty adyāpi duḥkhena bhūsadmani yathā baḍiḥ  MU
ahaniṣyat puraivāsau yady agropagataṃ ripum 
tan nālapsyata tad duḥkhaṃ gajaḥ khātanibandhanam  MU
maurkhyād āgāminaṃ kālaṃ vartamānakriyākramaiḥ 
aśodhayan naro duḥkhaṃ yāti vindhyagajo yathā  MU
mukto 'smi śastranigaḍād iti tuṣṭo 'pi vāraṇaḥ 
dūrastho 'pi punar baddho maurkhyaṃ kveva na bādhate  MU
maurkhyaṃ nibandhanam avaihi paraṃ mahātman bandho na bandha iha cetasi tadviyukte 
ātmodaye trijagad ātmamayaṃ samastam aśve sthitasya sahayā nanu sarvabhūmiḥ  MU
gajopākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ
caturnavatitamas sargaḥ
śikhidhvajaḥ
maṇisādhanavanyebhabandhanādy amarātmaja 
sūcitaṃ satkathājālaṃ punar me prakaṭīkuru  MU
cūḍālā
vākyārthadṛṣṭer niṣpattyā hṛdgṛhe cittabhittiṣu 
śṛṇuṣva satkathācitraṃ citram unmīlayāmi te  MU
yo 'sau śāstrārthakuśalas tattvajñāne tv apaṇḍitaḥ 
ratnasaṃsādhane proktas sa tvam eva mahīpate  MU
tajjño bhavasi śāstreṣu ravir merutaṭeṣv iva 
tattvajñāne tu viśrānto na tvaṃ dṛṣad ivāmbare  MU
viddhi cintāmaṇiṃ sādho sarvatyāgam akṛtrimam 
tam antaṃ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ saṃsādhayasi śuddhadhīḥ  MU
sarvatyāgena śuddhena sarvam āsādyate 'nagha 
sarvatyāgo hi sāmrājyaṃ kiṃ cintāmaṇinā bhavet  MU
siddhas sa sarvasantyāgas sādho saṃsādhitas tava 
kharvīkurvañ jagadbhūtiṃ vindhyasyātmodayo yathā  MU
santyaktaṃ bhavatā rājyaṃ sadāradhanabāndhavam 
brahmaṇeva jagatsargavyāpāras svaniśāgame  MU
svadeśasyātidūrastham āgato 'sīmam āśramam 
bhuvo 'ntam iva viśrāntyai vainateyas sakacchapaḥ  MU
kevalaṃ sarvasantyāge śeṣitāhammatis tvayā 
mṛṣṭākhilakalaṅkena svasattevānilena khe  MU
manomātre hṛdas tyakte yāvat te yāti pūrṇatām 
tyāgas tāvad vikalpas tvāṃ kham ambuda ivāvṛṇot  MU
nāyaṃ sa paramānandas sarvatyāgo mahodayaḥ 
ko 'py uccair anya evāsau cirasādhyo mahān iti  MU
cintayeti gate vṛddhiṃ saṅkalpagrahaṇe śanaiḥ 
vātyayeva vanaspande tyāgaḥ proḍḍīya te gataḥ  MU
tyāgitā syāt kutas tasya cintām apy āvṛṇoti yaḥ 
pavanaspandayuktasya nisspandatvaṃ kutas taroḥ  MU
cintaiva cittam ity āhus saṅkalpetaranāmakam 
tasyām eva sphurantyāṃ tu cittaṃ tyaktaṃ kathaṃ bhavet  MU
citte gṛhīte trijagajjālabījakaṇe kṣaṇāt 
kathaṃ sampadyate sādho sarvatyāgo nirañjanaḥ  MU
saṅkalpagrahaṇenāntas tyāgaḥ proḍḍīya te gataḥ 
śabdasaṃśravaṇenāṅga yathā grāmavihaṅgamaḥ  MU
niścintatvadhanaṃ sarvaṃ tyāga ādāya te gataḥ 
āmantryāpūjito yāti yas sa duḥkhaṃ karoti hi  MU
sarvatyāgamaṇāv evaṃ gate kamalalocana 
tapaḥkācamaṇir dṛṣṭas tvayā saṅkalpacakṣuṣā  MU
tvayā tasmiṃs tapasy eva duḥkhe dṛṣṭibhramodite 
grāhyaikabhāvanā baddhā jalendau śiśunā yathā  MU
avāsanam anārabhya kṛtānandā savāsanā 
ādyantamadhyaviṣamā duḥkhāyaiva tapaḥkriyā  MU
amitānandam utsṛjya susādhaṃ yaḥ pravartate 
mite vastuni dussādhe svātmahā sa śaṭhas smṛtaḥ  MU
sarvatyāgas samārabhya na viniṣpāditas tvayā 
tapoduḥkhaikatajjñena baddhena vanasadmani  MU
rājyabandhād viniṣkramya gajavad duḥkhapūrite 
vanavāsābhidhe sādho baddho 'si dṛḍhabandhane  MU
dviguṇā eva te cintāś śītavātātapādayaḥ 
bandhanād adhikaṃ manye vanavāsam ajānataḥ  MU
cintāmaṇir mayā prāpta ity alaṃ buddhavān asi 
na labdhavān bhavān sādho sphaṭikasyāpi khaṇḍikām  MU
ity etad aṅga maṇiyatnakathāsamānaṃ samyaṅ mayā prakaṭitaṃ tava padmanetra 
udbodhya bodham amalaṃ svayam eva buddhyā yad vacmi tat pariṇatiṃ kuru cittakośe  MU
cintāmaṇilābhakartṛvṛttāntavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
pañcanavatitamas sargaḥ
cūḍālā
idānīṃ rājaśārdūla vastusampratipattaye 
śṛṇu vindhyebhavṛttāntavivṛtiṃ smayakāriṇīm  MU
yo 'sau vindhyavane hastī so 'smin bhūmitale bhavān 
yau vairāgyavivekau te tau tasya daśanau śitau  MU
yaś cāsau vāraṇākrāntitatparo hastipas sthitaḥ 
tad ajñānaṃ tvadākrāntitatparaṃ tava duḥkhadam  MU
atiśakto 'py aśaktena duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam 
hastī hastipakeneva rājan maurkhyeṇa nīyase  MU
yal loharajjusāreṇa vāraṇaḥ pariyantritaḥ 
tad āśāpāśajālena bhavān āpadam āgataḥ  MU
āśā hi loharajjubhyo viṣamā vipulā dṛḍhā 
kālena kṣīyate lohaṃ tṛṣṇā tu parivardhate  MU
yad baddhaṃ prekṣate vairī gajam ārād alakṣitaḥ 
prekṣate tvāṃ tad ajñānaṃ krīḍārthaṃ baddham ekakam  MU
yad babhañja gajaś śastraśṛṅkhalājālabandhanam 
tat tatyāja bhavān bhogabhūmiṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam  MU
kadācit sukaraṃ śastraśṛṅkhalājālabhedanam 
na tv asya manasas sādho bhogāśāvinivāraṇam  MU
yad ibhe pāṭayaty uccair bandhaṃ hastipako 'patat 
tvayi tyajati tad rājyam ajñānaṃ patitaṃ kṣatam  MU
yadā viraktaḥ puruṣo bhogāśāṃ tyaktum icchati 
tadā prakampate 'jñānaṃ chedyavṛkṣapiśācavat  MU
yadā vivekī puruṣo bhogān santyajya tiṣṭhati 
tadā palāyate 'jñānaṃ chinnavṛkṣapiśācavat  MU
bhogaughe nūnam unmukte pataty ajñānam asthiti 
pādape krakacacchinne kulāyas tadgato yathā  MU
yadā vanaṃ prayātas tvaṃ tadājñānaṃ kṣataṃ tvayā 
patitaṃ san na vihataṃ manastyāgamahāsinā  MU
tena bhūyas samutthāya smṛtvā paribhavaḥ kṛtaḥ 
tapaḥprapañcakhāte 'smin gahane tvaṃ niyojitaḥ  MU
tadaivāghātayiṣyas tvaṃ yady ajñānaṃ yadā patat 
rājyatyāgavidhau tat tvāṃ nāhaniṣyat kṣayaṃ gatam  MU
yat khātavalayas tena vairiṇā hastinaḥ kṛtaḥ 
tat tapoduḥkham atulam ajñānena tavārpitam  MU
yāṃ tasya rājasāmagrīṃ gajārer āharan nṛpaḥ 
sā tvadajñānanṛpateś cittabhūtir visāriṇī  MU
tvaṃ gajendras tapaḥkhāte dīrghe vanagato 'pi san 
ajñānavairiṇā tena nikṣiptas tarasāciti  MU
yat khātavalayo bālalatābhir avaguṇṭhitaḥ 
āvṛtaṃ tat tapoduḥkham īṣatsajjanavṛttibhiḥ  MU
ity adyāpi tapaḥkhāte duḥkhe hy asmin sudāruṇe 
sthito 'si pātālatale nṛpa baddho yathā baḍiḥ  MU
gajas tvam āśā nigaḍāni vairī moho nikhātaḥ punar ugrabandhaḥ 
mahītalaṃ vindhya udanta itthaṃ tvadīya uktaḥ kuru yat karoṣi  MU
vāraṇavṛttāntavivaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ
ṣaṇṇavatitamas sargaḥ
yad uktaṃ nayaśālinyā tayā viditavedyayā 
tadā cūḍālayā jñānaṃ tat kasmān norarīkṛtam  MU
sā hi tattvavidāṃ mukhyā yad yad vakti karoti ca 
tat sarvaṃ satyam evāṅga tad anuṣṭheyam ādarāt  MU
atha ced vacanaṃ tasyās tvayā nānuṣṭhitaṃ nṛpa 
tat sa sarvaparityāgaḥ kasmān na nipuṇīkṛtaḥ  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
rājyaṃ tyaktaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktaṃ deśas tyaktas tathāvidhaḥ 
dārās tyaktās tathāpy aṅga sarvatyāgo na kiṃ kṛtaḥ  MU
cūḍālā
dhanaṃ dārā gṛhaṃ rājyaṃ bhūmiś chattraṃ ca bāndhavāḥ 
iti sarvaṃ na te rājan sarvatyāgo 'tra kas tava  MU
tavāsty evāparityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ 
taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
rājyaṃ cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vanam eva me 
sālavṛkṣādigulmāḍhyaṃ tad apy etat tyajāmy aham  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
iti rāma vadann eva kumbhavākyapracoditaḥ 
nimeṣāntaramātreṇa vaśī vīraś śikhidhvajaḥ  MU
pramamārja vanāsthāṃ tāṃ hṛdas sudṛḍhaniścayaḥ 
prāvṛḍvātas taṭagatāṃ rajorekhām ivātmanaḥ  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
savṛkṣādivanaśvabhrād vipinād api vāsanā 
parityaktā mayā nūnaṃ sarvatyāgas sthito mama  MU
kumbhaḥ
adres taṭavanaṃ śvabhraṃ salilaṃ pādapās sthalam 
ityādi tava no sarvaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kathaṃ tava  MU
tavāsty evāparityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ 
taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
etac cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ svāśramo mune 
vāpīsthaloṭajayutas tam evāśu tyajāmy aham  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
iti rāma vadann eva kumbhavākyapracoditaḥ 
nimeṣadhyānamātreṇa vaśī vīraś śikhidhvajaḥ  MU
pramamārjāśramāsthāṃ tāṃ saṃvidā śuddhayā hṛdi 
sphurantīṃ sphuraṇenaiva rajorekhām ivānilaḥ  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
savṛkṣoṭajavīrutkād vāsanā svāśramād api 
parityaktā mayā nūnaṃ sarvatyāgas sthito mama  MU
kumbhaḥ
vṛkṣo vāpī sthalaṃ gulma uṭajaṃ vratatīvṛtiḥ 
iti kiñcin na te sarvaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kutas tava  MU
tavāsty anyo 'parityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ 
taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
etac cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhājanādi me 
carmakuṭyakṣasūtrādi tat tāvat santyajāmy aham  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
ity uktvā sa samuttasthāv avikṣubdhamanāś śamī 
viṣṭarād avadātātmā śṛṅgād iva śaradghanaḥ  MU
kumbhas tv ālokayann eva tatkriyāṃ saṃsthitas samām 
āsane lokakāryeṣu sve syandana ivāṃśumān  MU
yat karoti karotv etad asyaitat pāvanaṃ param 
iti tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ kumbhaś śikhidhvajam avaikṣata  MU
śikhidhvajas tu tat sarvaṃ bhāṇḍopaskaram āśramāt 
ekatraivānayām āsa bhuvo vāry abdhibhūr iva  MU
tat saṃsthāpyendhanaiś śuṣkair jvalayām āsa pāvakam 
karasañcāravān arkas sūryakāntataṭaṃ yathā  MU
bhāṇḍopaskarajātaṃ tad agnau tyaktuṃ viveśa saḥ 
bṛsikāyāṃ jagad dagdhuṃ meruśṛṅge yathā raviḥ  MU
etāvantaṃ mayā kālaṃ vṛto yat tvaṃ vratipriya 
ajātabuddhibhedena tenaivānṛṇyam astu te  MU
bhrāntau tu vinivartinyāṃ nādhunopakaroṣi me 
devaputraprasādena daṇḍakāṣṭha namo 'stu te  MU
ity uktvā vaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ cikṣepāgnau śikhidhvajaḥ 
gāṅgaṃ pravāham ādīrghaṃ vaḍavāgnāv ivārṇavaḥ  MU
prasaṅkhyātāny asaṅkhyāni janmānīva tvayā mayā 
sakhi mantrapadāny adya yāhi nopakaroṣi me  MU
mantrāṭavyāṃ ciraṃ bhrāntaṃ vihṛtaṃ kāryavartmasu 
dṛṣṭāni dharmasthānāni viśrāmyāmy adhunā sakhi  MU
ity akṣamālāṃ jvalane cikṣepoktvā śikhidhvajaḥ 
kalpāntāgnāv iva vyomatārālīṃ pavano 'malām  MU
mayā naramṛgeṇa tvaṃ ciraṃ vanamṛgacyutam 
abodhena dhṛtaṃ vṛttyā dayayeva mṛgājina  MU
idānīṃ gaccha sacchāya panthānas santu te śivāḥ 
vahninā vyomatāṃ gaccha satāraṃ vyoma te samam  MU
unmocyāṅgāt karābhyāṃ ca dhṛtvā carma jahāv iti 
nṛpo 'gnāv ambudaṃ vāto davavahnāv ivācalāt  MU
mayā dhṛtena bhavatā tvayā vāri dhṛtaṃ mama 
sādho kamaṇḍalo samyakkṛte pratikṛtaṃ kṛtam  MU
sauhṛdasya manojñasya saujanyasya sthirasya ca 
sādhutvasya ca sarvasya tvam ekaḥ paramāspadam  MU
yenaiva vahninā dehaṃ saṃśodhyābhyāgato 'si mām 
tenaiva gaccha he mitra panthānas santu te śivāḥ  MU
ity uktvā śrotriyāyaiṣa kamaṇḍalum adāt tadā 
agnaye mahate vāpi dātavyaṃ sādhu yad bhavet  MU
mūrkhasyeva matir gupte nityam eva vasasy adhaḥ 
ucitā te gatiḥ keva bṛsike bhasmatāṃ vraja  MU
ity uktvādāya bṛsikām agnāv indhanavṛddhidām 
śuddhyartham āsanārthaṃ cety agnau tatyāja bhāsure  MU
yat tyājyam acireṇaiva tyaktavyaṃ kila tat satā 
upāyaḥ kriyate sadbhir upādeye mate sati  MU
śīghram agnāv idaṃ sarvaṃ bhāṇḍajālaṃ tyajāmy aham 
ekavāraṃ dahann agnir dāhyaṃ bhavati tuṣṭaye  MU
sādho kriyopakaraṇa niṣkriyas tvāṃ tyajāmy aham 
na khedas tv atra kartavyo 'nupayogyaṃ bibharti kaḥ  MU
ity uktavāñ jhagiti bhojanabhājanādyaṃ sarvaṃ juhāva vanavāsavilāsayogyam 
tad bhāṇḍajālam anale samam eva rājā kalpāntatejasi jagaj jvalatīva kālaḥ  MU
sarvatyāgo nāma sargaḥ
saptanavatitamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
athotthāya dadāhāsau śuṣkaṃ tat parṇamandiram 
ajñena svena manasā vṛthā saṅkalpyakalpitam  MU
śiṣṭaṃ yat kiñcid abhavat tatra tat sa śikhidhvajaḥ 
asaṃrabdhamanā maunī krameṇa samayā dhiyā  MU
dadāha dūre cikṣepa tatyāja ca babhañja ca 
bhāṇḍajātaṃ svavasanabhojanādy api ruṣṭavat  MU
sa babhūvāśramas tasya dagdhanaṣṭanijasthitiḥ 
vīrabhadrabaladhvastadakṣayajñāśramopamaḥ  MU
āśramāt te mṛgakhagās tyaktaromantham udyayuḥ 
sāgnidāhāt puravarād bhītabhītā janā iva  MU
bhāṇḍajātaṃ dahaty agnau saha śuṣkendhanena tat 
kevalākṛtir asnehas tuṣṭimān āha bhūpatiḥ  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
aho nu cirakālena devaputra prabodhitaḥ 
sampannaḥ kevalaś śuddhas sukhito bodhavān aham  MU
kiṃ nāma kila vastv etad bhavet sāṅkalpikakramam 
yad bhāṇḍopaskarasthānasadanādyavalambanam  MU
yāvad yāvat prahīyante vibandhā bandhahetavaḥ 
tāvat tāvat samāyāti paramāṃ nirvṛtiṃ manaḥ  MU
śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukhito 'smi jayāmy aham 
vibandhāḥ prakṣayaṃ yātās sarvatyāgo mayā kṛtaḥ  MU
digambaro diksadano diksakho 'yam ahaṃ sthitaḥ 
devaputra mahātyāgāt kim anyad avaśiṣyate  MU
kumbhaḥ
sarvam eva na santyaktaṃ tvayā rājañ śikhidhvaja 
sarvatyāgaparānandaṃ mā mudhābhinayīkuru  MU
tavāsty evāparityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ 
yaṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
iti śrutavatā tena kiñcit sañcintya bhūbhṛtā 
idam uktaṃ mahābāho rāma rājīvalocana  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
indriyavyālasaṅghāto raktamāṃsamayākṛtiḥ 
śiṣyate sarvasantyāge deho me devatātmaja  MU
tad utthāya purassaṃsthabhṛgupātād avighnajāt 
vināśātmakatāṃ nītvā sarvatyāgī bhavāmy aham  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
ity uktvā deham agrasthe śvabhre tyaktum asau javāt 
karoti yāvad utthānaṃ tāvat kumbho 'bhyuvāca ha  MU
kumbhaḥ
rājan kim iti dehaṃ tvaṃ nirāgaskaṃ mahāvaṭe 
tyajasy ajño hi vṛṣabhaḥ kupito hanti tarṇakam  MU
jaḍo varāko mūkātmā tapasvī dehako hy ayam 
na kaścana tavaitasmai mā mudhaiva ruṣaṃ kuru  MU
ātmany evaiṣa mūḍhātmā dhyānavān iva tiṣṭhati 
sañcālyate pareṇaiva taraṅgeṇeva kāṣṭhakam  MU
kṣobhayaty anya evainaṃ nigrahārho muhur balāt 
tapasvinaṃ yathaikāntasaṃsthitaṃ mattataskaraḥ  MU
sukhaduḥkhānubhūtyā hi nāparādhi śarīrakam 
nātmanaḥ phalapātāt sa spandair vṛkṣo 'parādhavān  MU
vātaḥ phalaśikhāpuṣpapātanaṃ kurute sphuran 
taruṇā sādhunā sādhor aparāddhaṃ kim ātmanaḥ  MU
tyaktenāpi śarīreṇa kila tāmarasekṣaṇa 
sarvatyāgo na te yāti niṣpattiṃ viṣamo hi saḥ  MU
bhṛgoḥ kevalam etat tvaṃ nirāgaskaṃ śarīrakam 
mudhā kṣipasi no dehatyāgena tyāgitā bhavet  MU
yenāyaṃ kṣobhyate deho mattebheneva pādapaḥ 
tat santyajasi cet pāpaṃ tan mahātyāgavān bhavān  MU
tasmiṃs tyakte bhavet tyaktaṃ sarvaṃ dehādi bhūpate 
no cen nirdagdham apy etad bhūyo bhūyaḥ prarohati  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
kenāyaṃ cālyate dehaḥ kiṃ bījaṃ janmakarmaṇām 
kasmiṃs tyakte parityaktaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati sundara  MU
kumbhaḥ
sādho na dehatyāgena na rājyatyajanena ca 
na coṭajādiploṣeṇa sarvatyāgo bhaven nṛṇām  MU
yat sarvaṃ sarvato yac ca tasmin sarvaikakāraṇe 
sarvasmin samparityakte sarvatyāgaḥ kṛto bhavet  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ sārvaṃ heyaṃ tyājyaṃ ca sarvathā 
sarvaṃ kim ucyate brūhi sarvatattvavidāṃ vara  MU
kumbhaḥ
sādho sarvakalādhāraṃ jīvaprāṇādināmakam 
na jaḍaṃ nājaḍaṃ bhrāntaṃ cittaṃ sarvam iti smṛtam  MU
rājyāder atha dehāder āśramāder mahīpate 
sarvasyaiva mano bījaṃ tarubījaṃ taror iva  MU
sarvasya bīje santyakte sarvaṃ tyaktaṃ bhavaty alam 
sambhavāsambhavād bhūyas sarvatyāgo bhaved iti  MU
sarvaṃ dharmādy adharmādi rājyādi vipinādi ca 
sacittasya paraṃ duḥkhaṃ niścittasya paraṃ sukham  MU
idaṃ vivartate sarvaṃ cittam eva jagattayā 
dehādyākārajālena bījaṃ vṛkṣatayā yathā  MU
pādapaḥ pavaneneva bhūkampeneva parvataḥ 
bhastrā bhastrāhinevāyaṃ dehaś cittena cālyate  MU
sarvabhūtopabhogyānāṃ jarāmaraṇajanmanām 
mahāmaṇīnāṃ sudṛḍhaṃ cittaṃ viddhi samudgakam  MU
cittaṃ jīvo mano māyā prāṇaś cetyādibhir mune 
kriyānurūpair abhidhāvyāpāraiś cittam ucyate  MU
cittaṃ sarvam iti prāhus tasmiṃs tyakte mahīpate 
sarvādhivyādhisīmānte sarvatyāgaḥ kṛto bhavet  MU
cittatyāgaṃ vidus sarvatyāgaṃ tyāgavidāṃ vara 
tasmin siddhe mahābāho satyaṃ kenāpi bhūyate  MU
citte tyakte layaṃ yāti dvaitam aikyaṃ ca sarvataḥ 
kenacid bhūyate śāntaṃ svaccham ekam anāmayam  MU
asyāḥ kṣetraṃ viduś cittaṃ saṃsṛtes sasyasantateḥ 
kṣetre tv akṣetratāṃ yāte śāleḥ ka iva sambhavaḥ  MU
cittam eva vicitrehaṃ bhāvābhāvavilāsinā 
vivartate 'rthabhāvena jalam ūrmitayā yathā  MU
cittotsādanarūpeṇa sarvatyāgena bhūpate 
sarvam āsādyate samyak sāmrājyeneva sarvadā  MU
sarvatyāgasya viṣayo yathaivānyo 'sti te tathā 
tvam apy anyasya bhavasi tyāgin gṛhṇāsi cen nṛpa  MU
sūtraṃ muktāphaleneva jagajjālaṃ trikālagam 
sarvam antaḥkṛtaṃ tena yena sarvaṃ samujjhitam  MU
yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ tasmiñ śūnye 'pi saṃsthitaṃ 
jagat sarvaṃ trikālasthaṃ tantur muktāphale yathā  MU
sasneheneva dīpena tena sarvaṃ prakāśitam 
sthitas sarvaṃ parityajya yaś śānto 'snehadīpavat  MU
asneheneva dīpena yena sarvaṃ tirohitam 
sa rājate prakāśātmā samas sasnehadīpavat  MU
samastavastuniṣkāse yathā kham avaśiṣyate 
sarvatyāge kṛte tādṛg vijñānam avaśiṣyate  MU
samastavastūdāso hi yathā khaṃ netaran nṛpa 
sarvasantyāga evāṅga tathā nirvāṇam ucyate  MU
sarvatyāgo hi śūnyātmāpy āśrayas sarvasampadām 
anantānām udārāṇāṃ kham ivedaṃ divaukasām  MU
sarvatyāgarasāpānāj jarāmaraṇabhītayaḥ 
na kāścana prabādhante khasyeva malalekhikāḥ  MU
sarvatyāgo mahattvasya kāraṇaṃ nirmaladyuteḥ 
sarvaṃ tyajati khaṃ yasmāt tasmāc chuddhaṃ sthiraṃ bṛhat  MU
sarvatyāgaḥ parānando duḥkham anyat sudāruṇam 
ity om ity urarīkṛtya yad icchasi tad ācara  MU
sarvaṃ tyajati yas tasya sarvam evopatiṣṭhate 
yathaivāmbu viśaty agnau tathaivāyāti vāridhau  MU
sarvatyāgāntar evāsti jñānam ātmaprasādakam 
yac chūnyaṃ kila bhāṇḍasya tatra ratnādi tiṣṭhati  MU
sarvatyāgavaśād eva hatakāle kalāv api 
śākyena vigatāśaṅkaṃ muninā meruvat sthitam  MU
sarvatyāgo mahārāja sarvasampatsamāśrayaḥ 
na gṛhṇāti hi yaḥ kaścit sarvaṃ tasmai pradīyate  MU
kṛtvā sarvaparityāgaṃ śāntas svaccho viyatsamaḥ 
somyo bhavasi yadrūpas tadrūpo bhava bhūpate  MU
sarvaṃ parityajya mahānubhāva tyajasy alaṃ yena ca tad vihāya 
tyāgaṃ ca sādānam alaṃ vimucya vimuktarūpo bhava bhūmipāla  MU
śikhidhvajabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
aṣṭanavatitamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
evaṃ vadati vai kumbhe cittatyāgaṃ muhur muhuḥ 
antar vicārayan somyo rājā vacanam abravīt  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
hṛdayākāśavihago hṛdayadrumamarkaṭaḥ 
bhūyo bhūyo nirastaṃ hi samāyāty eva māṃ manaḥ  MU
jānāmi naitad ādātuṃ matsyaṃ bāla ivākulam 
tyāgam asya na jānāmi citram andha ivottamam  MU
cittasyādau svarūpaṃ me yathāvad bhagavan vada 
tataś cittaparityāgaṃ yathāvad bhagavan vada  MU
kumbhaḥ
vāsanaiva mahārāja svarūpaṃ viddhi cetasaḥ 
cittaśabdas tu paryāyo vāsanāyā udāhṛtaḥ  MU
tyāgas tv asyātisukaras susādhas spandanād api 
ratād apy adhikānandaḥ kusumād api sundaraḥ  MU
mūrkhasya tu manastyāgo nūnaṃ dussādhatāṃ gataḥ 
pukkasasyeva sāmrājyaṃ tṛṇasyeva sumerutā  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
svarūpaṃ vedmi cittasya vāsanāmayam ākulam 
tyāgo 'sya manye dussādho vajranirdalanād api  MU
saṃsṛtyāmodapuṣpasya duḥkhatailatilasya ca 
jagadvālamṛṇālasya mohamārutakhasya ca  MU
śarīrayantravāhasya hṛtpadmabhramarasya ca 
ayatnāc cetasas tyāgo yathā bhavati tad vada  MU
kumbhaḥ
sarvanāśo 'sya yas sādho cetasas saṃsṛtikṣayaḥ 
sa eva cittasantyāga ity uktaṃ dīrghadarśibhiḥ  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
cittatyāgād ahaṃ manye cittanāśas svasiddhaye 
abhāvaś cetaso vyādheḥ katham asyānubhūyate  MU
kumbhaḥ
ahambījadrumaṃ cittaṃ saśākhāphalapallavam 
unmūlaya samūlaṃ tvam ākāśaviśado bhavan  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
cetasaḥ kiṃ mune mūlaṃ ko 'ṅkuraḥ kaś ca sambhavaḥ 
kāś śākhāḥ ke ca vā skandhāḥ katham unmūlyate ca tat  MU
kumbhaḥ
ahamarthodayo yo 'yaṃ cidātmā vedanātmakaḥ 
etac cittadrumasyāsya viddhi bījaṃ jagadgatam  MU
ahambhāvātmakaṃ vittvaṃ cittabījam udāhṛtam 
paramātmapadakṣetraṃ netraṃ māyāmayasya tat  MU
etasmāt prathamodbhinnād yo 'ṅkuro 'nubhavākṛtiḥ 
niścayātmā nirākāro buddhir ity eva socyate  MU
asya buddhyabhidhānasya yāṅkurasya prapīnatā 
saṅkalparūpiṇī tasyāś cittaṃ nāma mano 'bhidhā  MU
jīvo mithyopalambhātmā śūnyātmāpy upalopamaḥ 
stambhaḥ kāyo 'yam etasya snāyvasthirasarañjitaḥ  MU
deśād deśāntare dūre deśakālavido 'sya yāḥ 
śākhās tāś cittavṛkṣasya dīrghā dūratarās tatāḥ  MU
indriyāṇy atha bhogāś ca bhāvābhāvamayormayaḥ 
viṭapaughā mahānto 'sya śubhāśubhaphalākulāḥ  MU
īdṛśasyāsya cittasya durvṛkṣasya pratikṣaṇam 
śākhāvilavanaṃ kurvan mūlakāṣe bharaṃ kuru  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
cittadrumasya śākhādeḥ kurvāṇo 'haṃ vikartanam 
kathaṃ karomi mūlasya niśśeṣaṃ kaṣaṇaṃ mune  MU
kumbhaḥ
vāsanā vividhāś śākhāḥ phalaskandhādinānvitāḥ 
abhāvitā bhavanty antar lūnās saṃvidbalena te  MU
asaṃsaktamanā maunī śāntavādavicāraṇaḥ 
samprāptakārī yas so 'ntar lūnacittalato bhavet  MU
cittadrumalatājālaṃ pauruṣeṇa vikartayan 
yas tiṣṭhati sa mūlasya yogyo nikaṣaṇe bhavet  MU
gauṇaṃ śākhāvilavanaṃ mukhyaṃ mūlavikartanam 
cittavṛkṣasya tena tvaṃ mūlakāṣaparo bhava  MU
mukhyatvena mahābuddhe mūladāham alaṃ kuru 
cittakaṇṭakaṣaṇḍasya bhavaty evam acittatā  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
ahambhāvātmanaś cittadrumabījasya he mune 
ko 'nalo dāhyadahanasamartho 'rthakaro bhavet  MU
kumbhaḥ
rājan svātmavicāro 'yaṃ ko 'haṃ syām iti rūpadhṛt 
cittadurdrumabījasya dahane dahanas smṛtaḥ  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
mune mayā mahābuddhyā bahuśaḥ pravicāritam 
yāvan nāhaṃ jagan norvī na ca maṇḍalamaṇḍalam  MU
nādres taṭaṃ na vipinaṃ na parṇasadanādi vā 
jaḍatvān na ca dehādi na māṃsāsthyasṛgādi ca  MU
karmendriyāṇy api na ca na ca buddhīndriyāṇi ca 
na mano nāpi ca matir nāhambhāvaś ca jāḍyataḥ  MU
kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemni tathāhantvaṃ cidātmani 
jaḍaṃ tv asadrūpatayā tena tan nāsmi he mune  MU
sanniveśaviśeṣātmaśabdārthādi pare pade 
vidyate nātyanantatvān nabhasīva mahādrumaḥ  MU
jānann apīti bhagavann ahantvamalamārjanam 
antar yadā na jānāmi tena tapye mahāmune  MU
kumbhaḥ
etāvanmātrakaṃ vṛndaṃ yadi na tvaṃ mahīpate 
jaḍatvāt tan mahābuddhe yo 'si taṃ vada me navam  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
cinmātram aham acchātmavedanaṃ viduṣāṃ vara 
yatra bhāvās svadanty ete nirmīyante ca yena vā  MU
evaṃrūpasya me lagnaṃ nūnaṃ malam akāraṇam 
sakāraṇaṃ cāham iti yat tat tyaktuṃ na vedmy aham  MU
asad etad anātmīyaṃ pramārṣṭuṃ malam ātmanaḥ 
mune yadā na śakto 'smi tena tapye sudāruṇam  MU
kumbhaḥ
brūhi kiṃ tan mahābāho lagnaṃ tava malaṃ mahat 
sthito 'si yena saṃsārī satā vāpy asatātha vā  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
cittadrumasya yad bījam ahambhāvas sa me malam 
tac ca tyaktuṃ na jānāmi tyaktaṃ tyaktam upaiti mām  MU
kumbhaḥ
kāraṇāj jāyate kāryaṃ yat tat sarvatra sad bhavet 
anyat tv asad dvicandrābhaṃ dṛṣṭam eva na vidyate  MU
kāraṇāj jāyate kāryam ahambhāvātmakaṃ tataḥ 
itikāraṇam anviṣya kathayāśu mamātmanā  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
mune 'ham iti doṣasya vedanaṃ vedmi kāraṇam 
tad yathopaśamaṃ yāti tan me vada munīśvara  MU
citaś cetyonmukhatvena duḥkhāyāham iti sthitaḥ 
cetyopaśamanaṃ brūhi mune tadupaśāntaye  MU
kumbhaḥ
kāraṇaṃ kāraṇajño 'si vedanasya vadāśu me 
tatas tvāṃ bodhayiṣyāmi kāraṇākāraṇakramam  MU
vedyavedanarūpasya cetyasañcetanasya ca 
akāraṇaṃ kāraṇatāṃ yad gataṃ tava tad vada  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
cetyacetanarūpasya vedyasaṃvedanākṛteḥ 
iyaṃ padārthasatteha dehādyā kāraṇaṃ mune  MU
śarīrāditayodeti vedanaṃ vastusattayā 
asatyābhāsayā spando yathā pavanalekhayā  MU
asattāṃ vastusattāyā nāvagacchāmy ahaṃ yayā 
ahantvavedanaṃ cittabījaṃ samupaśāmyati  MU
kumbhaḥ
vidyate yadi dehādivastusattā tad asti te 
abhāvād dehasattādeḥ kiṃniṣṭhaṃ tava vedanam  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
yasyopalabhyate kiñcit svarūpaṃ kalanātmakam 
asadrūpaṃ kathaṃ tat syāt prakāśas syāt kathaṃ tamaḥ  MU
hastapādādisaṃyuktaḥ kriyāphalavilāsavān 
sadānubhūyamāno 'pi deho nāsti kathaṃ mune  MU
kumbhaḥ
kāraṇaṃ yasya kāryasya bhūmipāla na vidyate 
vidyate neha tat kāryaṃ tatsaṃvittis tu vibhramaḥ  MU
kāraṇena vinā kāryaṃ vidyate na kadācana 
vidyate yasya no bījaṃ tad dravyaṃ kveva jāyate  MU
akāranaṃ tu yat kāryaṃ sad ivāgre 'nubhūyate 
tad draṣṭur vibhramaṃ viddhi mṛgatṛṣṇājalopamam  MU
avidyamānam eva tvaṃ viddhi mithyābhramoditam 
nātiyatnavatāpy etan mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu labhyate  MU
asato dvīndubimbāder na yuktaṃ kāraṇekṣaṇam 
vandhyātanayasarvāṅgamaṇḍanaṃ kasya rājate  MU
kāraṇena vinā kāryaṃ śarīrādy asthipañjaram 
avidyamānam evedaṃ viddhy asambhavato nṛpa  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
hastapādādiyuktasya śarīrasya munīśvara 
nityam ālakṣyamāṇasya pitā kasmān na kāraṇam  MU
kumbhaḥ
kāraṇābhāvato rājan pitā nāma na vidyate 
asato yat tu sañjātam asad eva tad ucyate  MU
padārthānāṃ ca kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ bījam ucyate 
sambhavaty aṅga jagati na bījena vināṅkuraḥ  MU
tasmān na kāraṇaṃ yasya kāryasyehopapadyate 
bījābhāve hi tan nāsti tatsaṃvittis tu vibhramaḥ  MU
avaśyam eva yan nāsti nirbījaṃ tan matibhramaḥ 
dvīndutvamarubhūmyambuvandhyāputradṛśā samaḥ  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
pitāmahānāṃ putrāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca jagattraye 
ādyaḥ pitāmahaḥ kasmāt pūrvotpanno na kāraṇam  MU
kumbhaḥ
ādyaḥ pitāmaho yas syāt so 'pi nāsty eva bhūpate 
kāraṇābhāvato nityaṃ yadā kāryaṃ na kasyacit  MU
kāraṇasya svabījasya nityābhāvāt pitāmahaḥ 
ādyas san dṛśyamāno 'pi bhramād anyo na vidyate  MU
mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvad bhrāntirūpa evāvabhāsate 
pitāmaho 'rthakāritvam api tv asya bhramātmakam  MU
pitāmahāder etasya mithyāpratyayatas tv iti 
ghanatā tu nivṛttaiva mārjayiṣyāmy athetarat  MU
tasmāc cidātmakatayātmani cinnabho yan nityaṃ svayaṃ kacati cāru tad eṣa devaḥ 
tenaiva padmaja iti svayam ātmanātmā proktaḥ kharūpa iti śāntam idaṃ samastam  MU
śikhidhvajāvabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
ekonaśatatamas sargaḥ
śikhidhvajaḥ
ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ yady ayaṃ bhāsate bhramaḥ 
arthakriyāsamarthaś ca tat sthitaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam  MU
kumbhaḥ
evaṃ jagadbhramasyāsya tānavaṃ tāvad āgatam 
śilībhūtasya śītena salilasyeva sūṣmaṇā  MU
ajñānaṃ śithilībhūtam eva naṣṭaṃ vidur budhāḥ 
na nāśena vinodeti pūrvasaṃsthānavicyutiḥ  MU
tanutvaṃ sargabodhasya yat tad eva hi kāraṇam 
sargopaśamasampatteḥ pratipatteḥ pare pade  MU
tānavaṃ dṛśyate yasya tasyānukramatas svayam 
pūrvasaṃsthānavigamāt praśamo 'py upapadyate  MU
anenaiva krameṇainaṃ tvam ādipuruṣaṃ nṛpa 
bhramākārodayaṃ viddhi mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv ivoditam  MU
eṣā pitāmahābhāve 'py asatī bhūtasantatiḥ 
na kadācana tat siddhaṃ yad asiddhena sādhyate  MU
ayaṃ bhūtopalambho hi mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv ivoditaḥ 
vicārād vilayaṃ yāti śuktau rajatadhīr iva  MU
kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryam abhūtvā bhavatīti yat 
mithyājñānād ṛte tasya na rūpam upapadyate  MU
mithyādṛṣṭiḥ prekṣitā ca na kadācana vidyate 
mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhasā kena ghaṭakāḥ paripūritāḥ  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
sraṣṭur ādyasya paramaṃ brahma kasmān na kāraṇam 
anantam ajam avyaktam īśvaraṃ śāntam acyutam  MU
kumbhaḥ
hetutvābhāvato brahma kāryatvābhāvatas tataḥ 
advaitaikyāvikārātma na kāryaṃ na ca kāraṇam  MU
akartṛkarmakaraṇam akāraṇam abījakam 
apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ brahma kartṛ kathaṃ bhavet  MU
akāraṇatvāt kāryatvarahitaṃ tad yadā bhavet 
advaitaikyam anādyantaṃ tadā tadupalambhanam  MU
apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ yac chivaṃ śāntam avyayam 
tat kathaṃ kasya keneva kartṛ bhoktṛ kadā bhavet  MU
ato nedaṃ kṛtaṃ kiñcij jagadādi na vidyate 
na kartāsti na bhoktāsti sarvaṃ śāntam ajaṃ śivam  MU
kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryaṃ na kasyacid idaṃ jagat 
akāryatvāc ca nāsty etat sarga itthaṃ na vidyate  MU
yadā na kasyacit kāryaṃ kāraṇasya jagat tadā 
padārthābhāvasaṃsiddhis tatsiddhau kasya vedanam  MU
evaṃ tu vedanābhāve nāsty ahantvasya kāraṇam 
ataś śuddho 'si mukto 'si kevoktir bandhamokṣayoḥ  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
āṃ prabuddho 'smi bhagavan yuktam uktaṃ tvayottamam 
kāraṇābhāvataḥ kartṛ neha brahmeti vedmy aham  MU
kartrabhāvāj jagan nāsti tena nāsti padārthadṛk 
nātaś cittādi tadbījaṃ nāto 'hantādi kiñcana  MU
evaṃ sthite viśuddho 'smi vibuddho 'smi na cāsmi ca 
namo mahyaṃ paraṃ naumi nakiñcid api bodhataḥ  MU
padārthavedanaṃ mithyaivāsad evāvabhāsate 
ahamādy alam etena śāntam āse khakośavat  MU
jagatpadārthapravibhāgadṛṣṭis sadeśadikkālakalākriyaughā 
aho nu kālena cireṇa śāntā brahmaiva vā nūnam avasthiteti  MU
śāmyāmi nirvāmi paraṃ sthito 'smi na yāmi nodemi na cāstam emi 
tiṣṭhāmy aniṣṭhaṃ ca yathāsthitātmā śivaṃ śubhaṃ pāvanamaunam asmi  MU
śikhidhvajaviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ
śatatamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
iti brahmaṇi viśrāntim avāpya sa śikhidhvajaḥ 
muhūrtam āsīt saṃśāntamanā nirvāṇadīpavat  MU
nirvikalpasamādhānapariṇatyāstam īyivān 
svalīlayeti kumbhena sa jhagity eva bodhitaḥ  MU
kumbhaḥ
rājann ajñānanidrātaḥ prabuddho 'si śivas sthitaḥ 
kāryaṃ nāstamayeneto na cānastamayena te  MU
sakṛd eva vibhātātmā tiṣṭhāniṣṭhapadātmakaḥ 
kalākalananirmukto jīvanmukto 'ṅga sāmpratam  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
kumbhena bodhitas tv evaṃ sa babhūva prabodhavān 
vinirgato rarājoccair mahāmohasamudgakāt  MU
viśrāntadhīḥ kṣaṇenaiva paśyan dṛśyasya vastunaḥ 
asattām eva muktātmā līlayā samuvāca ha  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
jñātaprāyam apīdaṃ tu yat pṛcchāmi tad ucyatām 
bhūyo nipuṇabodhāya mama mānada mohahan  MU
śive śānte nirābhāse pare 'nullaṅghitātmani 
draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyākhyo viśvātmā pratyayaḥ kutaḥ  MU
kumbhaḥ
sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahārāja rājase bodhabhāsvatā 
etad eva hi te śiṣṭaṃ jñatāyās tad idaṃ śṛṇu  MU
yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam 
sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ kalpānte tat praṇaśyati  MU
tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam 
mahākalpavilāsānte sat sāram avaśiṣyate  MU
cinmātram amalaṃ kāntam ābhātam amalaṃ nabhaḥ 
samastakalanonmuktaṃ yuktaṃ paramayā śriyā  MU
yad ekoditam atyacchaṃ śāntam ātatam ujjvalaṃ 
paramātmātmakaṃ tejas stimitaṃ jñaptimātrakam  MU
apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ samaṃ śivam aniṅganam 
brahma nirvāṇam āpūrṇam āghūrṇad iva sampadā  MU
aṇīyasām aṇīyas tat sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām 
garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasām api  MU
īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ sūkṣmaṃ tasyāgre yad idaṃ nabhaḥ 
aṇoḥ pārśve mahāmerur iva sthūlātma lakṣyate  MU
īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ sthūlaṃ tasyāgre yad idaṃ jagat 
paramāṇuvad ābhāti kvacid eva na bhāti vā  MU
īdṛśaṃ tad gariṣṭhaṃ ca jagadrājyaṃ yad akṣatam 
buddhvaitad amalaṃ śāntaṃ jarattṛṇalavāyate  MU
īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ śreyas tasmin sati yad īśvare 
jagatpadārthasārthaśrīs svasattodeti vedanāt  MU
tat sāram ekam eveha vidyate bhūpate tatam 
ekam ekāntabuddhyāttaṃ naikam apy advitāvaśāt  MU
tasmād dvitīyā kalanā kācin nāma na vidyate 
ātmatattvam alaṃ bhātaṃ tad evāpūrṇam akṣatam  MU
saṃsthitaṃ sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvākāram ivoditam 
avācyatvād alabhyatvāt tan na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam  MU
pratyakṣāder agamyatvāt kim apy ekam tad uttamam 
sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ sūkṣmam acchānubhavamātrakam  MU
tasyānākhyasya rūpasya nirgatasya pramādṛśaḥ 
sato vāpy asato vāpi kathaṃ kāraṇatā bhavet  MU
yad vai na kasyacid bījam anākhyatvān na kāraṇam 
na kiñcij jāyate tasmāt pramāṇātigatātmanaḥ  MU
akartṛkarmakaraṇam satyaṃ cidghanam akṣatam 
ātmarūpam anābhāsaṃ svasaṃvedanalakṣaṇam  MU
tasmān na jāyate kiñcit parasmād brahmaṇo mune 
kathaṃ kila vadāvyakte syāj janyajanakakramaḥ  MU
na kiñcij jāyate śānte na ca kiñcit pralīyate 
svasattayā sthitaṃ brahma na bījaṃ na ca kāraṇam  MU
śuddhānubhavamātraṃ tat tasmād anyan na vidyate 
kiñcij jagadahantādi tad evānantam asti hi  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
śive jagadahantādi mune nāstīti vedmy aham 
sargavedanam ābhāti katham etad vadāśu me  MU
kumbhaḥ
citsāraṃ tad anādyantaṃ tat svasaṃvidi tiṣṭhati 
tat tadbhavanam atyacchaṃ tattāmātraṃ jagad viduḥ  MU
citsvātmakacanaṃ nāma yad asambhavacetyadṛk 
tad ahaṃvedanaṃ viddhi virāḍātma jagat sthitam  MU
vātasya vātaspandasya yathā bhedo na vidyate 
śūnyatvakhatvopamayoś cinmātrāhantvayos tathā  MU
jale 'sti deśakālātte yathormyādi sakāraṇam 
pare 'sty adeśakālātte tathā jagad akāraṇam  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
jalādau yat taraṅgādi tat sakāraṇam astv iha 
pare jagadahantādi nākāraṇam avaimy aham  MU
kumbhaḥ
idānīṃ bhavatā jñātam etat satyaṃ mahīpate 
idaṃ jagadahantādi neha kiñcana vidyate  MU
jagacchabdārtharahitaṃ jagad asti śivātmakam 
vyomny eva nirmitaṃ śāntaṃ vyomnas sūkṣmatareṇa vā  MU
yathā nabhasi śūnyatvaṃ tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam 
sadasadvasturūpeṇa na vā rūpeṇa kenacit  MU
evaṃrūpaṃ jagad idaṃ samyagjñānāc chivaṃ bhavet 
samyagjñānaprabhāveṇa viṣam apy amṛtaṃ bhavet  MU
asamyagjñānam akhilaṃ jagad duḥkhapradaṃ param 
viṣabuddhyāmṛtam api bhuktaṃ viṣarasāyate  MU
īśvaratvād yathā vetti yad yad eṣa cidīśvaraḥ 
tat tathaivāśu bhavati tādṛgrūpatayā śivam  MU
yathā jvālābhramālā vā vicitrākāravibhramaiḥ 
tiṣṭhaty ananyarūpaiva brahmasattā tathaiva hi  MU
yat paraṃ citsvarūpeṇa sthitam ātmani mantharam 
tat tenedam ahantādi jagadādy eva lakṣyate  MU
kevalaṃ param evetthaṃ paramaṃ bhāsate śivam 
kuto jagadahantādi praśna eveha nocitaḥ  MU
yad vastu vidyamānaṃ sat praśnas tatra virājate 
prekṣitaṃ yat tu nāsty eva prekṣāpraśnena tatra kim  MU
sanniveśaṃ vinā sattā yathā hemno na vidyate 
tathā jagadahambhāvaṃ vinā neśasya saṃsthitiḥ  MU
akāraṇatvān nāstīdaṃ brahmaivetthaṃ vijṛmbhate 
ajṛmbhamāṇam evāhaṃjagattveneha saṃsthitam  MU
yanmayā eva tenaiva mithas sampreritāśayam 
camatkurvanty amī bhāvāḥ pañceṣu mithunaughavat  MU
cinmātra eva cinmātraṃ cinmātreṇaiva cīyate 
nānātmanevānānaiva svātmanātmāpy anātmavat  MU
pūrṇāt pūrṇam uddharanti pūrṇāt pūrṇāni cakrire 
bhavanti pūrṇāt pūrṇāni pūrṇam evāvatiṣṭhate  MU
cinmātram eva kacati yac cinmātratayātmani 
akacat tv eva tan nāma kacitaṃ sargavedanam  MU
ahaṃ citā cid evāsau bhavatīva svayaṃ svataḥ 
abhavanty eva rūpaṃ svam atyajantī nirāmayam  MU
cito rūpam anādyantaṃ manorūpam anantakam 
samrāṭcharīram ābhāsi bhavatīva svayambhuvaḥ  MU
paśyaty athāsad evedaṃ svarūpatvāt sad eva vā 
bhāvanād ghanatām eti dṛśyaṃ bhavati ca kramāt  MU
śāntaṃ jagatprasararūpatayā svabhāvaśabdārthamuktam idam avyapadeśyam ekam 
vastusthitaṃ nijacamatkaraṇāvalokarūpaṃ jagattvarahitānubhavātmatattvam  MU
śikhidhvajabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
ekādhikaśatatamas sargaḥ
kumbhaḥ
na vijñānamayo 'rtho 'sti na bāhyo nāpi śūnyatā 
vedanāmātrasāratvād yathāvit so 'rtha ucyate  MU
dravatvaṃ salilasyeva vido vittvam akāraṇam 
khātma nityam anantaṃ tad yathāsthitam avasthitam  MU
pratiyogivyavacchedābhāvatas svatvabhāvayoḥ 
asattā tena na pare sattvabhāvavyavasthitiḥ  MU
yadi kāraṇatāpattiyogyaṃ śāntaṃ paraṃ bhavet 
aniṅganam anābhāsam apratarkyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet  MU
ato na kāraṇaṃ naiva bījaṃ brahma kadācana 
kāryasya kasyacin nāma tena sargo na vidyate  MU
na cānyathopapattir hi sargasyāsyopapadyate 
cinmātrakād ṛte tasmāj jaḍas sargo na vidyate  MU
yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tac cidghanam avedhitam 
asambhavajjagacchabdaśabdārtharasarañjanam  MU
kāryaṃ na kāraṇābhāvāt padārtha upapadyate 
dvitvaikyādyātmakaṃ vyomapuṣpavat svānubhūtitaḥ  MU
vastu nāśaikaniṣṭhatvān na cājam upapadyate 
upalambhe dhruvo nāśo janma naṣṭasya ca dhruvam  MU
atha vainaṃ sadā santaṃ nityaṃ naṣṭaṃ ca vetsi vā 
padārthaughaṃ tad eṣo 'rtha ekarūpo 'tra kiṃ vyathā  MU
upalambhas tu yaś cāyaṃ sā cittattvacamatkṛtiḥ 
cittattvamātrasattāsti dvitvam aikyaṃ ca nāsty alam  MU
ataḥ padārthasattāyā abhāve sati bhūpate 
asambhave bhāvanasya nāhantābhāvanāsti te  MU
ahambhāvāsambhavataś cittam anyat kim ucyate 
iti cittam ahaṃrūpaṃ nāsty ato bhava vinnabhaḥ  MU
nirvāsanaś śāntamanā maunī paranabhomayaḥ 
sadeho vā videho vā bhava sthāyī calo 'tha vā  MU
sarvatvāc chuddhaviddṛṣṭeḥ padārthābhāvasiddhitaḥ 
bhāvanābhāvataś citte nāsty evāham ataś śivam  MU
sarvaṃ brahmeti vedārthabhāvanād anubhūtitaḥ 
cetitārthaikasatyatvāc cittaṃ nāma na vidyate  MU
tenāsi nirmalam akāraṇam ādimuktaṃ tad brahma śāśvatam aśeṣam anekam ekam 
śūnyaṃ vināmayam asat sad anādimadhyaṃ sarvaṃ na kiñcid api cāssva yathāsthitaṃ sat  MU
śikhidhvajaprathamabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
dvuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ
śikhidhvajaḥ
cittaṃ nāstīti me bodho yathā yuktyā sphuṭo bhavet 
tām anyām anyathā brūhi buddhaṃ na nipuṇaṃ mayā  MU
kumbhaḥ
cittaṃ nāsty eva rājarṣe kadācit kiñcana kvacit 
yac cedaṃ cittavad bhāti tad brahmābhidham avyayam  MU
ajñajñātātmakaṃ yatra jagad eva na vidyate 
tatrāhaṃ tvaṃ tad ityādikalanākalanāḥ kutaḥ  MU
nāsty eva jagad evedaṃ yat tv idaṃ kiñcanoditam 
brahmaivātmani tad bhāti śṛṇv etad budhyate katham  MU
mahāpralayasargādāv evedaṃ noditaṃ jagat 
nirdeśas tv ayam anyatra tvadbodhāya mayā kṛtaḥ  MU
upādānātmakādīnāṃ kāraṇānām abhāvataḥ 
akāraṇaṃ ca bhāvānām aśeṣāṇām asambhavāt  MU
evam ajñāvabuddhātma jagad yasmān na vidyate 
tasmād yad idam ābhāti bhāsanaṃ brāhmam eva tat  MU
anākhyo 'nākṛtir devaḥ karotīdam iti tv asat 
bhāṣitaṃ nopapattyātma na satyenānubhūyate  MU
anākhyo 'pratighaḥ khātmā nirākāro ya īśvaraḥ 
sa karoti jagantīti hāsāyaiva vaco 'dhiyām  MU
anenaiva prayogeṇa rājaṃś ceto na vidyate 
jagad eva na sat sādho kutaś cittādi tadgatam  MU
ceto hi vāsanāmātraṃ vāsye tu sati vāsanā 
vāsyaṃ jagat tad evāsad ataś cittāstitā kutaḥ  MU
yad idaṃ kacati brahma svayam ātmātmanātmani 
kṛtaṃ tasyaiva tenaiva cittam ityādināmakam  MU
jagad dṛśyam idaṃ vāsyaṃ tad evotpannam eva no 
kāraṇābhāvataḥ pūrvam evātaś cittatā kutaḥ  MU
ataś cidvyomamātrātma paramākāśanāmakam 
sphāraṃ vedanam evedaṃ kacaty astīha no jagat  MU
yat kiñcit paramākāśam īṣat kacakacāyate 
cidādarśe nijācchatvāt tac cittaṃ taj jagat kṛtam  MU
ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ity eṣā pratipattir na vāstavī 
mithyā svapna ivābhātā nūnam apy arthakāriṇī  MU
vāsyasya jagato 'bhāvād yato nāsty eva vāsanā 
atas tadātmakaṃ cittaṃ kīdṛśaṃ kva kutaḥ katham  MU
aprabuddhair avagataṃ caittaṃ dṛśyam idaṃ jagat 
asad eva nirākāraṃ pūrvam utpannam eva no  MU
notpannaṃ kāraṇābhāvāt sargādāv eva sarvadā 
lokaśāstrānubhavato na ca dṛśyasya vastunaḥ  MU
anāditvam ajatvaṃ vā sthairyaṃ vāpy upapadyate 
sākārasyāsya jagatas sthūlasapratighākṛteḥ  MU
samastakāraṇābhāvāl lokaśāstrānubhūtibhiḥ 
yujyante ca nirākartuṃ na mahāpralayodayāḥ  MU
śāstrānubhavavedārthasiddhān etāṃś ca yo 'pi vā 
pralayādīn na santīti vakty unmattaka eva saḥ  MU
lokāś śāstrāṇi vedāś ca pramāṇaṃ yasya nāmateḥ 
asatyoktes sumūḍhasya sa paśus taṃ na saṃśrayet  MU
na ca sapratighasyāsya dṛśyasyāpratighaṃ kvacit 
kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ śaktaṃ sākārasya nirākṛtiḥ  MU
ittham ālakṣyamāṇaṃ san na cedaṃ nāvabhāsate 
na ca nārthakriyākāri na caivettham idaṃ jagat  MU
tasmād idaṃ niraṃśasya cidvyomno 'pratighākṛteḥ 
nirākṛter anantasya pūrvāt pūrvataraṃ sataḥ  MU
brahmaṇas sarvarūpasya śāntaṃ śāntasya yat samam 
svata evātmakacanaṃ sargapralayarūpadhṛt  MU
svakaṃ vapus tat tenaiva jñātaṃ jagad idaṃ kṣaṇam 
kṣaṇāntare tu buddhaṃ sad brahmaivāste nijātmani  MU
brahmaivedam atas sarvaṃ kva caittajagadādidhīḥ 
kva cittādi kva dehādi kva dvaitaikyādikalpanāḥ  MU
sarvaṃ nirālambam ajaṃ praśāntam anādimadhyātma yathāsthitaṃ sat 
idaṃ ca nānaiva na cāpi nānā yathāsthitaṃ tiṣṭha sukāṣṭhamaunaḥ  MU
śikhidhvajabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
tryuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ
śikhidhvajaḥ
naṣṭo mohas smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayā mune 
sthito 'smi gatasandeho viśrāntamatir ātmavān  MU
jñātajñeyo mahāmaunī tīrṇamāyāmahārṇavaḥ 
śānto 'ham anahaṃrūpo jñas sthito 'smi nirāmayaḥ  MU
aho nu suciraṃ kālaṃ prabhrānto 'ham avāntare 
sthānam avyayam akṣubdham adhunā prāptavān aham  MU
evaṃ sthite mune nāsti sāhantādijagattrayam 
mūrkhabuddham idaṃ bhāti yat tad brahmeti vedmy aham  MU
kumbhaḥ
jagad eva na yatrāsti tatrāhantvavibhāsanam 
saṃsārāmbarasambhāraḥ kva kutaḥ kīdṛśaḥ katham  MU
yathāsthitavyavahṛtir maunī śāntamanā muniḥ 
somyārṇavodarāvartaparispandavad āssva bhoḥ  MU
brahmarūpatayā śāntam idam asti yathāsthitam 
ahaṃ jagad idaṃ ceti śabdārthātma nabho 'malam  MU
idam ādyantarahitaṃ sargasaṃhāranāmakam 
ciccamatkṛtimātrātma nabhaḥ kacakacāyate  MU
sanniveśadṛśaś śāntau yad asti kanakaṃ yathā 
jagadādyarthasaṃśāntau brahmedaṃ vidyate tathā  MU
yathā svayambhūs saṅkalpas svayaṃnāśas tathaiva hi 
etau svavedanāyattau bandhamokṣau vyavasthitau  MU
aham ity eva saṅkalpo bandhāyātivināśine 
nāham ity eva saṅkalpo mokṣāya vimalātmane  MU
yad bandhamokṣasaṅkalpaśabdārthānāṃ sadāsatām 
svarūpavedanaṃ tat sat kevalatvaṃ ca kathyate  MU
anahaṃvedanaṃ siddhir ahaṃvedanam āpade 
so 'ham evānaham iti śuddhabodho bhavātmavān  MU
asaṅkalpanamātreṇa samyagjñānodayātmanā 
saṅkalpaḥ kṣīyate siddhyai svayam evāsadātmakaḥ  MU
apratarkyasvarūpe hi nāsti kāraṇatā śive 
kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryaṃ padārtho 'pi na vidyate  MU
padārthābhāvasaṃsiddhau vedanaṃ nopapadyate 
kāraṇābhāvato nityam ahambhāvasya nodayaḥ  MU
ahambhāvānudayatas saṃsāraḥ kasya kīdṛśaḥ 
saṃsārābhāvatas sarvaṃ param evāvaśiṣyate  MU
yac cedaṃ bhāsate tat sat param evātmani sthitam 
paraṃ pare parāpūrṇaṃ samam eva vijṛmbhate  MU
tena nistimitaṃ sarvaṃ śailotkīrṇam ivācalam 
viddhi raśmimayākāram iva brahma jagat sthitam  MU
purasaṅkalpake naṣṭe saṅkalpanagarasya yat 
rūpaṃ tad viddhi jagataḥ khād acchaṃ sadasanmayam  MU
chāyāpuruṣavat spandi śāntaṃ nirmananaṃ jagat 
jagacchabdārtharahitaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati  MU
rūpālokamanaskārā nīrasā gatabhāvanāḥ 
samyagjñānavato yasya nirvāṇaṃ taṃ vidur budhāḥ  MU
yathāsti vāto nisspando yathāsti kham anīlima 
yathā hemāsanniveśam asti brahmājagat tathā  MU
nīrasā asadābhāsā jagatpratyayakāriṇaḥ 
rūpālokamanaskārās santīme brahmarūpiṇaḥ  MU
ūrmiśabdārtharahitaṃ yādṛg ambu bahūrmy api 
sargaśabdārtharahitaṃ tādṛg brahmāpi sargavat  MU
sarga eva paraṃ brahma paraṃ brahmaiva sargadṛk 
sargaśabdārtharahito vākyārthas tv eṣa śāśvataḥ  MU
brahmaśabdārthasampattau sargaśabdārthadhīḥ kutaḥ 
sargaśabdārthasampattau brahmaśabdārthadhīḥ kutaḥ  MU
samastaśabdaśabdārthabhāvanābhāvanodaye 
śuddhaṃ kim api cidvyoma brahmaśabdena kathyate  MU
samyagdarśanasaṃsiddhāv ubhayor apy avedane 
yac chiṣṭam ajaraṃ śāntaṃ tato vāg vinivartate  MU
saṃśāntasarvātmakavedanaugham astīdam ekātmakam accharūpam 
yathāsthitaṃ sarvajagat kharūpaṃ pāṣāṇarūpaṃ ca paraṃ jñarūpam  MU
śikhidhvajabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
caturuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ
śikhidhvajaḥ
evaṃ caitan mahābuddhe yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ param 
tādṛśaṃ kāryam evedaṃ jagad ity eva vedmy aham  MU
kumbhaḥ
yatra kāraṇatā tatra kāryaṃ samupapadyate 
yan na kāraṇam evādau tasmāt kāryaṃ kuto bhavet  MU
nehāsti kāraṇaṃ kiñcin na ca kāryaṃ kadācana 
vidyamānam idaṃ sarvaṃ śivaṃ śāntam ajaṃ jagat  MU
jāyate kāraṇāt kāryaṃ yat tat kāraṇavad bhavet 
yan na jāyata eveha tasmin sadṛśatā kutaḥ  MU
bījam eva na yasyāsti tat kathaṃ vada jāyate 
apratarkyam anākhyaṃ ca yan na tasyeha bījatā  MU
deśakālavaśāt sarvā hetumatyaḥ pramopamāḥ 
akartṛ brahma viṣayaḥ pramākāraṇayoḥ katham  MU
akartṛkarmakaraṇe nāsti kāraṇatā śive 
tasmād akāraṇaṃ nāsti jagacchabdārthavedanam  MU
brahmaiva svaṃ svarūpaṃ sad yat sthitaṃ dhārayat tatam 
asamyagdarśiviṣayaṃ tad eva jagad ācitam  MU
cinmātram ajaraṃ śāntaṃ yad ekaṃ tat pragīyate 
tenaivājaṃ jagadbrahma sac chāntaṃ budhyate vapuḥ  MU
asya sva eva yo bhāvaś cetasaḥ pṛthivīpate 
sa eva nāśaḥ kathitaś cānubhūtaś ca paṇḍitaiḥ  MU
cittaṃ nāśasvabhāvaṃ tvaṃ viddhi nāśātmakaṃ nṛpa 
kṣaṇanāśāya saṅkalpaś cittaśabdena kathyate  MU
asaṅkalpanamātreṇa samyagjñānodayaṃ vinā 
saṅkalpaḥ kṣīyate siddhyai svayam evāsadātmakaḥ  MU
nāmnaivāṅgīkṛtābhāvaṃ yad avidyeti kathyate 
vidyamānaṃ kathaṃ tat syāc cittaṃ tāmarasekṣaṇa  MU
hastāv utkṣipya yo brūte śūdro 'smīti bhṛśaṃ girā 
kathaṃ sa vipro bhavati vipratvaṃ tasya kīdṛśam  MU
vivṛttadhātur atyuccair mṛto 'smīti virauti yaḥ 
mṛtam evāṅga taṃ viddhi jīvitaṃ tasya tu bhramaḥ  MU
bhramākṛti yad astīha dṛśyate 'lātacakravat 
mṛgatṛṣṇādvicandrādibālavetālakādivat  MU
tat kathaṃ kila nāma syāt satyaṃ bhramabharātmakam 
ajñānabhrāntir evātaś cittam ity eva kathyate  MU
ajñānam ucyate cittam asat sad iva saṃsthitam 
mithyābhramaṃ nirākāraṃ keśoṇḍukam ivāmbare  MU
evam ajñānam evaitac cittaśabdena kathyate 
tannāśaś cetaso nāśaś cittatyāgas sa eva ca  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
ajñānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ deva kathaṃ caitad vinaśyati 
samāseneti bhagavan vada me vadatāṃ vara  MU
kumbhaḥ
yad asaṃvedanaṃ samyag vastuno rājasattama 
dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasya kumbhādes tad ajñānam iti smṛtam  MU
asaṃvedanam ajñānaṃ jñānaṃ saṃvedanaṃ bhavet 
ajñānasya tv asaṃvitter jñānāt saṃvedanāt kṣayaḥ  MU
jalajñānaṃ mudhābhrāntis sādho marumarīciṣu 
naitaj jalam iti jñānāt saṃvittiḥ pravilīyate  MU
idaṃ cittam iti prauḍhaṃ yad ajñānam alaṃ hṛdi 
nāsti cittam iti jñānāt tat samūlaṃ vinaśyati  MU
yathā rajjvāṃ bhujaṅgatvam ajñānabhramasambhavam 
na sarpo 'yam iti jñānād dhṛdi rūḍhāt praṇaśyati  MU
cittaṃ mano 'ham ity antar yāvad ajñānasambhavaḥ 
tāvac cittaṃ mano māyā bhavaty eva na saṃśayaḥ  MU
cittaṃ nāsty aham ity antar yāvaj jñānodayo bhavet 
tāvac cittaṃ mano māyā nāsty evātra na saṃśayaḥ  MU
mithyāyakṣabhramo yāvat tāvad yakṣo hi dṛśyate 
mithyāyakṣabhrame śānte kuto yakṣasya sambhavaḥ  MU
na cittam asti no caittam ahaṅkārādisaṃyutam 
kiñcid eva jagaty asmin saṃvid ekāsti nirmalā  MU
tayā saṅkalpacittādi kṛtam āsīd vimūḍhayā 
yad yat saṅkalpya tat sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ prabuddhayā  MU
saṅkalpena yad āyāti tat saṅkalpena gacchati 
pavanena mahābāho jvālājālam ivānale  MU
ātmatattvaikaghanayā tat tayā brahmasattayā 
jagat sarvam abhivyāptaṃ samudra iva vāriṇā  MU
nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti na tvaṃ naite na cittakam 
nendriyāṇi na cākāśam ātmaivaiko 'sti nirmalaḥ  MU
ghaṭādyākārarūpeṇa sa evāyaṃ vilokyate 
idaṃ cittam ayaṃ cāham iti keva kukalpanā  MU
na jāyate na mriyate kiñcid asmiñ jagattraye 
kevalaṃ vilasaty ātmā sadasadbhāvanātmanā  MU
sarvam ātmā paraṃ brahma sakṛt prakaṭam ātatam 
dvitvaikatve na vidyete nirbhrāntir bhava satyataḥ  MU
sarvendriyaguṇākāras sann evāsi sakhe nabhaḥ 
na dahyase mahābuddhe na ca kvacana lipyase  MU
na te vinaśyati sakhe na ca kiñcid vivardhate 
nirmalākāśarūpasya caikasyānantarūpiṇaḥ  MU
icchānicchātmike śaktī ye tavāpi tvam eva te 
na hy aṃśuvyatirekeṇa śaśāṅka upalabhyate  MU
tvam ajaram aparaṃ parasvabhāvaṃ sakṛd amalaṃ satataṃ sad ekarūpam 
vigalitakalanaṃ kalākhyalīlaṃ samuditam ādyam ajaṃ tad ātmatattvam  MU
śikhidhvajaparamārthabodho nāma sargaḥ
pañcottaraśatatamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
iti kumbhavaco rājā bhāvayaṃs tad akṛtrimam 
sva evātmapade tasmin kṣaṇaṃ pariṇato 'bhavat  MU
babhūvāmīlitamanolocanaś śāntavāg abhīḥ 
śilātalād ivotkīrṇo nisspandāvayavākṛtiḥ  MU
tato muhūrtamātreṇa prabuddhaṃ sphāritekṣaṇam 
tam uvāca mahābāho cūḍālā kumbharūpiṇī  MU
kumbhaḥ
kaccid asmin pade sphāre śuddhe mṛduni nirmale 
sutalpe nirvikalpānāṃ sukhaṃ viśrāntavān asi  MU
kaccid antaḥ prabuddho 'si kaccid bhrāntis tvayojjhitā 
kaccij jñeyaṃ parijñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam eva vā  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
bhagavaṃs tvatprasādena mahāvibhavabhūṣitā 
mahatī padavī dṛṣṭā sarvasyordhve sthitā mayā  MU
satāṃ viditavedyānām aho bata mahātmanām 
apūrvaikāmṛtamayas saṅgas sāraphalapradaḥ  MU
janmanāpi mayā labdhaṃ yan nāma na mahāmṛtam 
tad adya tvatsamāsaṅgāt kṣaṇenāsāditaṃ svayam  MU
anantam ādyam amṛtam etat kamalalocana 
kathaṃ nāsāditam abhūd etad ātmapadaṃ mayā  MU
kumbhaḥ
manasy upaśamaṃ yāte tyaktabhogaiṣaṇe sthite 
kaṣāyapāke nirvṛtte sarvendriyagaṇasya ca  MU
yānti cetasi viśrāntiṃ vimalā daiśikoktayaḥ 
yathā sitāṃśuke śuddhe bindavaḥ kuṅkumāmbhasaḥ  MU
kaṣāyāṇām anantānāṃ sambhṛtānāṃ śarīrake 
svavāsanāsvarūpāṇām adya pākas tavoditaḥ  MU
dehān malāni sarvāṇi kālena kamalekṣaṇa 
sādho vṛkṣāt phalānīva pākena vigalanty adhaḥ  MU
vāsanātmasu yāteṣu maleṣu vilayaṃ sakhe 
yad vakti gurur antas tad viśatīṣur yathā bile  MU
kaṣāyapāke sampanne tvaṃ mayādya vibodhitaḥ 
tenādyaiva tavājñānakṣayo jāto mahāmate  MU
adya pakvakaṣāyas tvam adyaivājñānasaṅkṣayī 
adyaiva sopadeśyas tvam adyaivāsi prabuddhavān  MU
śubhāśubhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇām adya saṅkṣayaḥ 
satsaṅgavyapadeśena tava niṣpattim āgataḥ  MU
yāvad asya dinasyaiṣa pūrvo bhāgo mahīpate 
tāvac ceto hy aham iti tavājñānaṃ babhūva ha  MU
idānīṃ madvacobodhāc cetasi kṣayam āgate 
hṛdayāt samparityakte samprabuddho 'si bhūpate  MU
hṛdi yāvan manassattā tāvad ajñānasaṃsthitiḥ 
citte cittatayā tyakte jñānasyābhyudayo bhavet  MU
dvitvaikatvadṛśau cittaṃ tad evājñānam ucyate 
etayor yo layo dṛṣṭyos taj jñānaṃ sā parā gatiḥ  MU
prabuddho 'si vimukto 'si tyaktaṃ cittaṃ tvayā nṛpa 
sad eva sattayāttaṃ hi tvayā tyaktam asat padam  MU
vītaśoko nirāyāso nissaṅgo nityam ātmavān 
mahodayo munir maunī kharūpas tiṣṭha nirmalaḥ  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
evaṃ hi bhagavañ jantor mūrkhasyaivāsti cittabhūḥ 
na prabuddhasya tajjñasya cittam asti kila prabho  MU
jīvanmuktās ta ete hi viharanti kathaṃ vada 
avidyamānamanaso yuṣmadādyās tathā narāḥ  MU
iti me kathayāśeṣam anyaiś ca vacanāṃśubhiḥ 
hārdaṃ tamo me nipuṇam evamprāyaiḥ pramārjaya  MU
kumbhaḥ
yathā vadasi dharmajña tat tathaiva hi nānyathā 
cittaṃ hi jīvanmuktānāṃ nāsty aṅkura ivāśmanām  MU
punarjananayogyā yā vāsanā ghanavāsanā 
sā proktā cittaśabdena na sā tajjñasya vidyate  MU
yayā vāsanayā tajjñā viharantīha karmasu 
tāṃ tvaṃ sattvābhidhāṃ viddhi punarjananavarjitām  MU
jīvanmuktā mahātmānas sattvasthās saṃyatendriyāḥ 
viharanti gatāsaṅgaṃ na cittasthāḥ kadācana  MU
mūḍhaṃ cittaṃ cittam āhuḥ prabuddhaṃ sattvam ucyate 
aprabuddhā hi cittasthās sattvasthā hi mahādhiyaḥ  MU
bhūyaḥ prajāyate cittaṃ sattvaṃ bhūyo na jāyate 
aprabuddhasya bandho 'sti na prabuddhasya bhūpate  MU
sattvavān asi sañjāto mahātyāgī sthito bhavān 
aśeṣeṇa tvayā tyaktaṃ cittam adyeti vedmy aham  MU
samastavāsanāmukto rājan rājeva rājase 
ākāśasāmyam āyātaṃ manye tava mune manaḥ  MU
śamaṃ prāpto 'si paramaṃ śuddhas samasamasthitiḥ 
mandarāhananonmukto yathā kṣīramahārṇavaḥ  MU
parityaktā tvayā rājyād vāsanā tapasas tathā 
kānanāc ca śarīrāc ca śubhāśubhaphalād api  MU
nirīho vigatāsaṅgas tyaktacitto vivāsanaḥ 
sampannas tvaṃ mahābāho mahātyāgipadaṃ gataḥ  MU
ayaṃ sa hi mahātyāgas sarvaṃ yatra samujjhitam 
svargāpavargacittādi tapodānaphalādy api  MU
prabuddhayeddhayā sādho dhiyā paramabodhayā 
tapo nāma kiyanmātraduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ bhavet  MU
kṣayātiśayanirmuktaṃ yat sukhaṃ samatāmayam 
tat sat tad vastu tat kiñcin na tu svargādi bhaṅguram  MU
bhāvābhāvatulārūḍhas sthitādhivyādhivedhitaḥ 
svargo nāma kimānandas so 'pi sandeham āsthitaḥ  MU
aprāptasvārthasaṃsiddheḥ kriyākāṇḍaś śubho bhavet 
yena nāsāditaṃ hema rītiṃ kiṃ sa parityajet  MU
cūḍālādisamāsaṅgād bhavej jñatvaṃ sukhena te 
tat kimartham anarthe 'smin nimagnas tvaṃ tapomaye  MU
āśramādivikalpāṃśasādhyasyāsya kukarmaṇaḥ 
ādyantau paśya sumate madhya eva ramasva mā  MU
yata ete samāyātā yasmin pariṇamanti ca 
taporūpā vikalpāṃśās tatra baddhapado bhava  MU
cidvyomno nabhaso 'py acchāt sarve bhāvās samutthitāḥ 
tatraiva ca layaṃ yānti tatraivāssva ramasva ca  MU
idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti saṅkalpā brahmabindavaḥ 
bindūñ śikhidhvaja tyaktvā pūrṇameghaṃ samāśraya  MU
iṣṭaṃ me prārthayasveti yathaiva prārthyate sakhī 
striyā tathaiva na kathaṃ dayitaḥ prārthyate svayam  MU
saṅkalparacitān etān bhāvān āpātabhāsurān 
na gṛhṇanti mahātmānaḥ prājñā jalaravīn iva  MU
svargamokṣādiphaladaṃ yat kiñcit samam eva tat 
tyaktvā samasamābhāso yo 'sy asāv eva vai bhava  MU
santaṃ sattvena nāśena naśyantaṃ vigataspṛhaḥ 
padārthaugham imaṃ gṛhṇaṃs tiṣṭhāspanditacittabhūḥ  MU
aparispandacittasya saṃsṛtir neha bādhate 
pauruṣaprabhavā sādho vipan nītimato yathā  MU
yāni yānīha duḥkhāni prasphuranti jagattraye 
cetaścāpalajāny eva tāni tāni mahīpate  MU
sthiraṃ śāntaṃ gataspandaṃ yasya cittam acāpalam 
sa vibhus sa mahānandī sāmrājyasya sa bhājanam  MU
atha cetasi tattvajña spandāspandau tad ekatām 
nītvā tiṣṭha yathākāmam aikyam āgatya śāśvatam  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
katham aikyavidhiṃ yātas spandāspandāv imau vibho 
sarvasaṃśayavicchedakārinn etad vadāśu me  MU
kumbhaḥ
ekaṃ vastu jagat sarvaṃ cinmātraṃ vār ivāmbudhiḥ 
tad eva spandate no vā śuddhaṃ vārīva vīcibhiḥ  MU
brahma cinmātram amalaṃ satyam ityādināmabhiḥ 
yad gītaṃ tad idaṃ mūḍhaḥ paśyaty aṅga jagattayā  MU
nisspanda eva sarvasmin sarge tasmād dhi saṃsṛtiḥ 
parispando hi vīcyādis tad aspandaṃ samaṃ param  MU
citas sa eva cet spandas tathāspandaś ca bhāvitaḥ 
ekarūpatayā nāma tat tad apy acalaṃ śivam  MU
sargaś citspandamātrātmā samyagdṛṣṭo vilīyate 
udety asamyagdṛṣṭātmā rajjvāṃ sarpabhramo yathā  MU
saspandā cic cidabhidhā nisspandā tv iyam ātatā 
turyātītapadārūḍhā vācā vaktuṃ na pāryate  MU
śāstrasajjanasamparkasantatābhyāsayogataḥ 
kālenāmalatāṃ yāte cetasīndāv ivodite  MU
etat kevalam ābhātaṃ svānubhūtigirātatam 
kathyate svānubhūtes tu svayaṃ svaṃ rūpam ātmanā  MU
prāpto 'si bhāvaṃ svam anādimadhyam atraiva tiṣṭheṣṭapade niviṣṭaḥ 
nīrūpanirbhedamahācidātmā jāto 'si sādho khalu vītaśokaḥ  MU
śikhidhvajabodho nāma sargaḥ
ṣaḍuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ
kumbhaḥ
iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ śikhidhvaja mahīpate 
yathedam utthitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā ca pravilīyate  MU
etac chrutvā ca buddhvā ca matvā ca munināyaka 
yathecchasi tathā tiṣṭha dṛṣṭaspaṣṭapadaḥ pade  MU
svargaṃ gacchāmy ahaṃ tatra kāle 'smin nārado muniḥ 
brahmalokāt samāyāto bhavaty amarasaṃsadam  MU
na māṃ paśyati cet tatra tat kopam upagacchati 
nodvejanīyā bhavyena guravo hi kadācana  MU
tyaktasaṅkalpalekhena na kiñcid abhivāñchatā 
tvayātmany eva vastavyaṃ dṛṣṭir eṣaiva pāvanī  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
iti yāvat prativacaḥ puṣpahastaś śikhidhvajaḥ 
praṇāmāya dadāty eṣa tāvad antardhim āyayau  MU
pratibhāsagataṃ vastu yathaivāgre na dṛśyate 
na dṛṣṭavāṃs tathā kumbham agre rājā śikhidhvajaḥ  MU
gate kumbhe mahīpālaḥ paraṃ vismayam āyayau 
tad eva cintayaṃś citraṃ citrārpita ivābhavat  MU
iti sañcintayām āsa citraṃ vilasitaṃ vidheḥ 
yat kumbhavyapadeśena bodhito 'smi cirād ayam  MU
kva nāradasutaḥ kumbhaḥ kvāhaṃ nāma śikhidhvajaḥ 
kevalaṃ kālayuktyaivam ahaṃ sampratibodhitaḥ  MU
aho nu samyak kathitaṃ devaputreṇa yuktimat 
aho nu samprabuddho 'smi mohanidrākulaś cirāt  MU
kvāham āsaṃ vinirmagnaḥ kriyājālakukardame 
idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti mithyāvibhramam ācaran  MU
aho nu śītalā śuddhā śānteyaṃ padavī nijā 
rasāyanadravākārā sattvaṃ śītayatīva me  MU
śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam 
cinmātram api necchāmi saṃsthito 'smi yathāsthitam  MU
evaṃ sañcintayan rājā evaṃnirvāsanāśayaḥ 
śailād iva samutkīrṇo maunam evātha tasthivān  MU
tasminn eva tato maunī nissaṅkalpe nirāmaye 
pratiṣṭhāṃ niścalāṃ prāpya sa tasthau giriśṛṅgavat  MU
sa tatra saṃśāntabhayo mahātmā cireṇa viśrāntim itas samātmā 
cireṇa samprāptanijāmalātmā yogena suṣvāpa tadā cidātmā  MU
śikhidhvajasamādhānaṃ nāma sargaḥ
saptottaraśatatamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
nirvikalpasamādhānāt kāṣṭhakuḍyopamas sthitaḥ 
evaṃ śikhidhvajo rāma cūḍālām adhunā śṛṇu  MU
śikhidhvajaṃ taṃ bhartāraṃ kumbhaveṣena tena sā 
prabodhyāntardhim āgatya tatāra tarasā nabhaḥ  MU
devaputrākṛtiṃ vyomni jahau māyāvinirmitām 
vidagdhamugdham ākāraṃ straiṇaṃ jagrāha sundaram  MU
nabhasā svapuraṃ prāpya viveśāntaḥpuraṃ kṣaṇāt 
dṛśyā babhūva lokasya nṛpakarma cakāra sā  MU
vāsaratritayenāpi punar ambaram etya sā 
babhūva kumbho yogena śikhidhvajavanaṃ yayau  MU
tathā tatraiva taṃ bhūpam apaśyad vanabhūmigā 
nirvikalpasamādhisthaṃ samutkīrṇam iva drumāt  MU
aho nu khalu bho diṣṭyā viśrānto 'yam ihātmani 
sthitas svasthas samaś śānta ity uvāca puraḥ prabhoḥ  MU
tad enaṃ tāvad etasmād bodhayāmi parāt padāt 
idānīm eva kiṃ dehatyāgam eṣa karoti vai  MU
kañcit kālaṃ sphuritveha rājyena vipinena vā 
samam eva gamiṣyāvas tyaktadehāv imau śamam  MU
tad yāvad eṣo vicalaṃ pariṇāmaṃ na gacchati 
anenābhyāsayogena tāvad ābodhayāmy aham  MU
iti sañcintya cūḍālā siṃhanādaṃ cakāra sā 
bhūyo bhūyaḥ prabhor agre vanecarabhayapradam  MU
na cacāla śilevādrau yadā nādena tena saḥ 
bhūyo bhūyaḥ kṛtenāpi tadā sā taṃ vyacālayat  MU
cālitaḥ pātito 'py eṣa yadā na bubudhe nṛpaḥ 
tadā sañcintayām āsa cūḍālā kumbharūpiṇī  MU
aho pariṇatas sādhus svapade bhagavān ayam 
tad enaṃ hi kayā yuktyā sāmprataṃ bodhayāmy aham  MU
atha vainaṃ mahātmānaṃ kimarthaṃ bodhayāmy aham 
videhaṃ bodham āsādya tiṣṭhatv eṣa yathāsukham  MU
aham apy aṅganādeham imaṃ tyaktvā paraṃ padam 
apunarjananāyaiva gacchāmīha hi kiṃ mama  MU
iti sañcintya dehaṃ svaṃ tyaktum abhyudyatā satī 
punas sañcintayām āsa cūḍālā sā mahāsatī  MU
ālokayāmi vai tāvad enaṃ dehaṃ mahīpateḥ 
yady asya sattvaśeṣo 'sti bodhabījaṃ hṛdantare  MU
tat kālenaiṣa bhagavān samprabodham upaiṣyati 
mūlakośarasālīnaṃ puṣpajālaṃ madhāv iva  MU
tadeha viharañ jīvanmukta eko bhavaty ayam 
maiko bhavatv eṣa iti manye gacchāmi no śamam  MU
iti sañcintya cūḍālā sparśena nayanena ca 
patim ālokya sāśaṅkam uvāca varavarṇinī  MU
asty eva sattvaśeṣo 'sya hṛdi sambodhakāraṇam 
kāyo 'yam agaladrūpo nemaṃ dehaṃ tyajāmy aham  MU
rāmaḥ
bhṛśaṃ saṃśāntacittasya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamasthiteḥ 
sattvaśeṣaḥ kathaṃ brahmañ jñāyate dhyānaśālinaḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
prabodhakāraṇaṃ yasya durlakṣyāṇuvapur hṛdi 
vidyate sattvaśeṣo 'ntar bīje puṣpaphalaṃ yathā  MU
cittaspandavimuktasya tasyāspanditasaccitaḥ 
dvitvaikatvavihīnasya samasyācalasaṃsthiteḥ  MU
kāyas samasamābhogo na glāyati na hṛṣyati 
nāstam eti na codeti samam evāvatiṣṭhate  MU
dvitvaikatvādiyuktasya yasya praspandate manaḥ 
tasya deho 'nyatām eti nāspandasya kadācana  MU
cittaspando hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇaṃ jagatas sthiteḥ 
rāma bhāvavikārāṇāṃ kusumānāṃ yathā madhuḥ  MU
yasmin praspandate dehe cittaṃ sa hi muhur muhuḥ 
harṣaglapanasammohavaśam eti raghūdvaha  MU
citte praśamam āyāte kāyo yas sattvavān sthitaḥ 
bādhate nāmbarasyeva tasya bhāvavikārabhūḥ  MU
vīcyādi na yathodeti samāyā jalasantateḥ 
tathā na dṛśyate doṣas samāyās sattvasaṃsthiteḥ  MU
sattvasyānupalambho 'sti nānyas svopaśamād ṛte 
yāvad bhāvi samaṃ sattvaṃ kālāc chāmyati kevalam  MU
dehe yasmiṃs tu no cittaṃ nāpi sattvaṃ ca vidyate 
sa tāpahimavad rāma pañcatvena vilīyate  MU
śikhidhvajasya deho 'sau niścitaṃ cetasojjhitaḥ 
sattvāṃśena ca saṃyuktas tena na mlānibhājanam  MU
taṃ tathābhūtam ālokya bhartur dehaṃ varāṅganā 
anujjhitavatī dehaṃ cintayām āsa satvaram  MU
cittattvaṃ sarvagaṃ śuddhaṃ praviśyābodhayāmy aham 
bhaviṣyadbodhanaṃ kāntam eṣa tatra hi saṃsthitaḥ  MU
na bodhayāmi yady enaṃ cirāt tad budhyate svayam 
kim ihaikāvatiṣṭhe 'ham ity enaṃ bodhayāmy aham  MU
iti sañcintya cūḍālā dehaṃ kāraṇapañjaram 
santyajya prāpa cittattve sthitim ādyantavarjite  MU
tatra sā cetanaspandaṃ kṛtvā sattvavataḥ prabhoḥ 
svaṃ viveśa punar dehaṃ khān nīḍam iva pakṣiṇī  MU
kumbhākṛtir athotthāya niviṣṭā kusumasthale 
sāma gātuṃ pravṛttā sā bhramarīvṛndasasvanā  MU
taṃ sāmasvanam ākarṇya cit sattvaguṇaśālinaḥ 
bubudhe bhūpater dehe vasanta iva padminī  MU
dṛśaṃ vikāsayām āsa tāṃ tadārka ivābjinīm 
gṛhītasattvasampattiś śikhidhvajamahīpatiḥ  MU
apaśyat kumbham agrasthaṃ sāmagāyanatatparam 
pareṇa vapuṣā yuktaṃ sāmavedam ivāparam  MU
aho bata vayaṃ dhanyāḥ punaḥ prāpto munes sutaḥ 
ity evodāharan rājā kumbhāya kusumaṃ dadau  MU
diṣṭyā sthitās smo bhagavaṃs tava cetasi pāvane 
ke nāma na mahāsattvāḥ prasādeṣv aṅga hi sthirāḥ  MU
asmatpavitrīkaraṇam ekam āgamakāraṇam 
tava pāpāpahaṃ brūhi dvitīyaṃ katarad bhavet  MU
kumbhaḥ
yataḥ prabhṛti yāto 'smi tvatsakāśād arindama 
tataḥ prabhṛti ceto me tvayaiveha samaṃ sthitam  MU
na rame svargaraṅgeṣu devodyāneṣu cānagha 
merumandarakūṭeṣu kailāsakuhareṣu ca  MU
tvatsaṅgam eva vāñchāmi subhagācārapeśalam 
amṛtasyandasaṅkāśaṃ madhumāsam iva drumaḥ  MU
tasmād eveha tiṣṭhāmi samīpe tava sāmpratam 
abhīṣṭaṃ yad yad evāṅga ramyāṇāṃ dhuri tat sthitam  MU
tvādṛśo bandhur āptaś ca suhṛn mitraṃ sakhā tathā 
viśvāsyaś caiva śiṣyaś ca manye jagati nāsti me  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
aho nu phalitaṃ puṇyapādapair naḥ kulācale 
yad bhavān apy asaṅgo 'pi vāñchaty asmatsamāgamam  MU
idaṃ vanam ime vṛkṣā bhṛtyo 'yam aham ādṛtaḥ 
rocate cen na te svargas tad iha sthīyatāṃ prabho  MU
bhavadvitīrṇayā yogayuktyā viśrāntavān aham 
yathā sādho tathā manye svarge viśramaṇaṃ kutaḥ  MU
tām eva svasthitiṃ svacchām avalambya prakāśinīm 
vihareha yathākāmaṃ svarge bhūmitale 'tha vā  MU
kumbhaḥ
pare pade mahānande kaccid viśrāntavān asi 
idaṃ bhedamayaṃ duḥkhaṃ kaccit santyaktavān asi  MU
kaccid āpātaramyebhyas saṅkalpebhyo ratir bhṛśam 
nirmūlatāṃ gatā rājann oghatīralateva te  MU
heyādeyadaśātītaṃ śāntaṃ samasamasthiti 
yathāprāpteṣv anudvegi kaccit tava manas sthitam  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
tvatprasādena bhagavan dṛṣṭā dṛśyātigā gatiḥ 
prāptas saṃsārasīmānto labdho labdhavyaniścayaḥ  MU
cirāyāticireṇaiva viśrāntās smo nirāmayāḥ 
labdhaṃ labdhavyam akhilaṃ tṛptās smaś ciram akṣatāḥ  MU
nopadeṣṭavyam asmākaṃ kiñcid apy upayujyate 
sarvatraivātitṛptās smas saṃsthitās smo gatajvaram  MU
jñātam ajñātam aprāptaṃ samprāptaṃ tyaktam āśritam 
tvattvaṃ paratvaṃ mattvaṃ me khasyevāsti na kiñcana  MU
nissaṃsṛtir vigatamohabhayābhirāmo nityoditas samasamāśayasarvasomyaḥ 
sarvātmakas sakalasaṅkalanāvimukta ākāśakośaviśadaś śamam āsthito 'smi  MU
kumbhapunarāgamanayogo nāma sargaḥ
aṣṭottaraśatatamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
ity adhyātmavicitrābhiḥ kathābhis tau parasparam 
āsatāṃ vedyavettārau muhūrtatritayaṃ vane  MU
tata utthāya kasmiṃścit snātau sarasasārase 
sarovare vane caiva vihṛtau nandanopame  MU
tenācāreṇa tābhiś ca kathābhis tau vanecarau 
nītavantau dināny aṣṭau tāsu kānanavīthiṣu  MU
atha kumbha uvācānyad vanaṃ yāvo girāv iti 
tad om iti nṛpo matvā tāv ubhau praviceratuḥ  MU
vanāny anekarūpāṇi jaṅgalāni taṭāni ca 
sarāṃsi gulmajālāni śṛṅgāṇi gahanāni ca  MU
nadīr deśāṃs tathā grāmān nagarāṇi purāṇi ca 
marūn ghorān girīn kuñjāṃs tīrthāny āyatanāni ca  MU
samam eva samasnehau samaveṣau sthitāv ubhau 
samasattau samotsāhau sasnatus tasthatus tathā  MU
ānarcatuḥ pitṝn devān bubhujāte ca rāghava 
samaṃ talpe ca śiśyāte samabuddhī babhūvatuḥ  MU
tamālavanaṣaṇḍeṣu mandāragahaneṣu ca 
dampatī snigdhahṛdayau suhṛdau tau virejatuḥ  MU
idaṃ grāhyam idaṃ neti vikalpakalanā manaḥ 
na jahāra tayo rāma vātyeva vibudhācalam  MU
viceratus tau suhṛdau kvacid dhūlividhūsarau 
kvacic candanadigdhāṅgau kvacid bhasmānurañjitau  MU
kvacid divyāmbaradharau cīrāmbaradharau kvacit 
kvacit pallavasañchannau kvacit kusumamaṇḍitau  MU
dinaiḥ katipayair eva gatacittatayā tayā 
sattvodāttatayā caiva rājā kumbhavad ābabhau  MU
atha taṃ suragarbhābhaṃ cūḍālā sā śikhidhvajam 
dṛṣṭvā śobhām upagataṃ cintayām āsa māninī  MU
ayaṃ patir anindyātmā tathemā vanabhūmayaḥ 
iyaṃ sthitir anāyāsā yo na kāmī sa vañcitaḥ  MU
jīvanmuktadhiyāṃ bhoge yathāprāptam atiṣṭhatām 
ekagrahātmikā tucchā mūḍhataivoditā bhavet  MU
nijaḥ patir anindyātmā nirādhitvaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ 
gṛhāṇi puṣpajālāni sā hatā yā na kāminī  MU
vanapuṣpalatāgehe svāyatte bhartari priye 
ramate yā na nirduḥkhā sā hataiva duraṅganā  MU
vaśyaṃ vivāhitaṃ kāntaṃ patim āsādya nirjane 
strī satī yā na ramate tāṃ dhig astu duraṅganām  MU
samujjhatā yathāprāptam api vedyavidā satā 
anindyaṃ svam udārārthaṃ kiṃ tajjñena kṛtaṃ bhavet  MU
tat kañcid racayāmy āśu prapañcaṃ prajñayā navam 
yenāyaṃ bhūpatir bhartā ramate mayi mānadaḥ  MU
iti sañcintya cūḍālā kumbhaveṣadharā patim 
prāha kānanagulmasthā kokilaṃ kokilā yathā  MU
kumbhaḥ
caitramāsasya śukle 'yaṃ pratipaddivasas suhṛt 
adyāsthānaṃ mahārambhaṃ svarge bhavati vai hareḥ  MU
sannidhānaṃ mayā tatra kartavyaṃ pitur agrataḥ 
yathāsthitā hi niyatir na santyājyā kadācana  MU
pratipālayitavyaṃ me tvayehādya vanāvanau 
krīḍatā dhyānapuṣpābhyāṃ samudvegam agacchatā  MU
āgacchāmi dinānte 'dya nirvikalpaṃ nabhastalāt 
svargād atitarām eva tvatsaṅgo mama tuṣṭaye  MU
ity uktvā mañjarīṃ kumbho dadau mitrāya kausumīm 
prītaye svām iva prītiṃ kāntāṃ nandanavṛkṣajām  MU
āgantavyaṃ tvayā śīghram evaṃ vadati bhūpatau 
pupluve ca vanād vyoma śaranmugdhapayodavat  MU
puṣpajālaṃ jahau vyoma vrajan kusumadāmajam 
visāri vanavātena himaṃ haima ivāmbudaḥ  MU
śikhidhvajo vrajantaṃ taṃ dadarśādarśanaṃ gatam 
unnidro 'bdaṃ yathā barhī satprītir hi sudustyajā  MU
śikhidhvajadṛśām ante vyomni kumbhavapur jahau 
sānāvarteva vāriśrīr mugdhā svaṃ rūpam āyayau  MU
prāpa mañjaritākārakalpavṛkṣopamaṃ puram 
sphuratpatākam ātmīyaṃ svargaramyaṃ divaḥ pathā  MU
antaḥpuram adṛśyaiva viveśa lalanākulam 
madhumāsamahālakṣmīr lasallatam iva drumam  MU
rājakāryāṇy aśeṣāṇi tatra sampādya satvaram 
śikhidhvajavanaṃ gantuṃ punar āpupluve nabhaḥ  MU
ullaṅghya gaganādhvānaṃ samaṃ dinakarāṃśubhiḥ 
śikhidhvajavanaṃ śaile dadarśa gagane sthitā  MU
taṃ dṛṣṭvā kumbharūpaṃ tat punar jagrāha satvaram 
śikhidhvajasya purataḥ papāta ca khapuṣpavat  MU
tatra mlānadyuti mukhaṃ cakārākhinnamānasam 
induṃ sanīhāram iva yāmā khinnam ivāmbujam  MU
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛgākāraṃ samuttasthau śikhidhvajaḥ 
babhūva khinnacetāś ca samuvācedam ādṛtaḥ  MU
devaputra namas te 'stu vimanā iva lakṣyase 
kumbhas tvaṃ tyaja saṃrambham idam āsanam āsyatām  MU
santo viditavedyā ye te hi harṣaviṣādajām 
nāśrayanti sthitiṃ svasthāḥ padmā iva jalārdratām  MU
tena smopaviśety ukte kumbha āhāsane viśan 
girā viṣaṇṇayā śīrṇavaṃśasvanasamānayā  MU
yāvaddeham avasthāsu samacittatayaiva ye 
karmendriyair na tiṣṭhanti na te tattvadhiyaś śaṭhāḥ  MU
ye hy atattvavido mūḍhā rājan bālatayaiva te 
avasthābhyaḥ palāyante gṛhītābhyas svabhāvataḥ  MU
yāvattilaṃ yathā tailaṃ yāvaddehaṃ daśā tathā 
yo na dehadaśām eti sa cchinatty asināmbaram  MU
eṣa dehadaśāduḥkhaparihāro hy anuttamaḥ 
yat sāmyaṃ cetaso yogān na tu karmendriyasthiteḥ  MU
yāvaddehaṃ yathācāraṃ daśāsv aṅga vijānatā 
karmendriyair hi sthātavyaṃ na tu buddhīndriyaiḥ kvacit  MU
parameṣṭhiprabhṛtayas sarva evoditāśayāḥ 
dehāvasthāsu tiṣṭhanti niyater eṣa niścayaḥ  MU
ajñatattvajñabhūtādi dṛśyajātam idaṃ hi yat 
tat sarvam eva niyatiṃ dhāvaty ambu yathāmbudhim  MU
tajjñā buddhyādisāmyena pāṇyādicalanena ca 
niyatiṃ yāpayantīmāṃ yāvaddeham akhaṇḍitāḥ  MU
ajñās tu sarvakṣobheṇa sukhaduḥkhadaśāhatāḥ 
niyatiṃ yāpayanty aṅga dehalakṣair vikhaṇḍitāḥ  MU
itthaṃ sukheṣu nanu duḥkhadaśāsu cetthaṃ sthātavyam ity adhigataṃ yad ihāṅga jīvaiḥ 
tajjñājñabhūtanicayas sphuritas tad eva durlaṅghya eṣa niyato niyater vilāsaḥ  MU
jīvanmuktavyavahṛtiyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ
navottaraśatatamas sargaḥ
śikhidhvajaḥ
evaṃ sthite mahābhāga katham udvegam īdṛśam 
labdhavān asi devo 'pi svargād api sukhāspadāt  MU
kumbhaḥ
śṛṇu kāryam idaṃ citraṃ madīyaṃ vasudhādhipa 
kathayāmi tavāśeṣaṃ svarge yad vṛttam adya me  MU
suhṛdy āveditaṃ duḥkhaṃ param āyāti tānavam 
ghanaṃ jaḍaṃ kṛṣṇam api muktavṛṣṭir ivāmbudaḥ  MU
suhṛdā pṛcchatā sādhu ceto yāti prasannatām 
snihyatopagatenāśu katakena jalaṃ yathā  MU
ahaṃ tāvad ito yāto bhavate puṣpamañjarīm 
dattvā gaganam ullaṅghya samprāptaś ca triviṣṭapam  MU
tatra pitrā sahendrasya sabhāsthāne yathākramam 
sthitvotthāya tathotthānakāle pitrā visarjitaḥ  MU
ihāgantum ahaṃ svargaṃ tyaktvā samprāptavān nabhaḥ 
divākarahayais sārdhaṃ vahāmy anilavartmani  MU
athaikatra gato bhānur ekenānyena vartmanā 
āgacchāmy aham ākāśasāgarāt patitākṛtiḥ  MU
athāgre vāripūrṇānāṃ meghānāṃ madhyavartmanā 
apaśyaṃ munim āyāntam ahaṃ durvāsasaṃ javāt  MU
payodharapaṭacchannaṃ vidyudvalayabhūṣitam 
abhisārikayā tulyaṃ dhārādhautāṅgasañcayam  MU
sthitaṃ sumeghacchāyāyāṃ śyāmāyāṃ vasudhātale 
vegenābhisarantaṃ taṃ tapolakṣmīm iva priyām  MU
tasya kṛtvā namaskāram uktaṃ ca vahatā mayā 
mune nīlābdavastras tvam abhisārikayā samaḥ  MU
ity ākarṇya cukopāsau mayi mānada mānahā 
visphārya rakte nayane prāha gambhīranissvanam  MU
pautro 'smi padmajasyeti garvitas tvaṃ kim īdṛśaḥ 
bhavyā hi natim āyānti guṇair vṛkṣāḥ phalair iva  MU
veśyābhisārikārūpo bhavān ity aśubhaṃ vacaḥ 
mayi vakṣi durācāra mūḍha devakumāraka  MU
stanakeśavatī kāntā hāvabhāvavikāriṇī 
gacchānena duruktena rātrau veśyā bhaviṣyasi  MU
iti śrutvāśubhaṃ vākyam ujjhitaṃ jarjaradvijāt 
vimṛṣyāmi manāg yāvat tāvad antarhito muniḥ  MU
ity udvignamanās sādho samprāpto 'smi nabhastalāt 
etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ sampanno 'smi niśāṅganā  MU
ativāhyaṃ dinānteṣu strītvam etan mayā katham 
yonistanavatā rātrau vaktavyaṃ kiṃ mayā pituḥ  MU
saṃsṛtau bhavitavyānām aho nu viṣamā gatiḥ 
aham apy anyavad daivād yūnām āmiṣatāṃ gataḥ  MU
kaṣṭaṃ madapahāreṇa kalaho jāyate 'dhunā 
divi devakumārāṇāṃ kāmākuladhiyām iha  MU
gurudevadvijātīnāṃ lajjāparavaśātmanā 
katham agre mayā samyak sthātavyaṃ yāminīstriyā  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
ity uktvā kṣaṇam ekaṃ sa tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā munes sutaḥ 
dhairyam ālambya kumbho 'tra punar āha raghūdvaha  MU
kim ajña iva śocāmi kiṃ mama kṣatam ātmanaḥ 
yathāgatam ayaṃ deho matto 'nyo 'nubhaviṣyati  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
paridevanayā ko 'rtho devaputra tavaitayā 
yad āyāti tad āyātu dehasyātmā na lipyate  MU
kānicid yāni duḥkhāni sukhāni vihitāni vā 
tāni sarvāṇi dehasya dehino na tu kānicit  MU
yadi tvam api kāryāṇām akhedārho 'pi khidyasi 
tad anyeṣām upāyas syāt ka ivāgamabhūṣaṇa  MU
khede 'khedocitaṃ vācyam iti kiṃ ca tvam uktavān 
idānīṃ samatām etya tiṣṭhākhinno yathāsthitaḥ  MU
vasiṣṭhaḥ
tāv evamādibhir vākyair anyo'nyāśvāsanaṃ svayam 
kṛtvā sthitau vane snigdhau suhṛdau khedinau mithaḥ  MU
athārkas tasya kumbhasya strītvam utpādayann iva 
jagāmāstaṃ jagaddīpo dīpas snehakṣayād iva  MU
vyavahārabharais sārdhaṃ padmās saṅkocam āyayuḥ 
mārgāś ca pathikais sārdhaṃ pānthastrīhṛdayāni ca  MU
dāśavad vihagān sarvān kurvad ekatra puñjitān 
tārakāratnajālāḍhyaṃ bhuvanaṃ śyāmatāṃ yayau  MU
khaṃ hasann iva tārāḍhyaṃ vikāsaṃ kumudākaraḥ 
yayāv unnādacakrāhvaṃ bhramadbhramarapeṭakaḥ  MU
suhṛdau tāv athotthāya sandhyām udyanniśākarām 
vandayitvā tathā kṛtvā japyaṃ gulmāntare sthitau  MU
tataḥ kumbhaś śanais tatra straiṇam abhyāharan vapuḥ 
śikhidhvajaṃ purassaṃsthaṃ provāca galadakṣaram  MU
patāmīva sphurāmīva dravāmīvāṅgayaṣṭibhiḥ 
lajjayeva ca he rājan manye strītvaṃ vrajāmy aham  MU
paśyeme parivardhante rājan mama śiroruhāḥ 
prasphurattārakāmālā dinānte timirā iva  MU
paśyemau mama jāyete pronmukhāv urasi stanau 
korakāv iva padminyā vasante gaganonmukhau  MU
āgulpham eva lambāni sampadyante 'mbarāṇi me 
dehād eva sakhe paśya striyā iva śanaiś śanaiḥ  MU
bhūṣaṇāny ururatnāni mālyāni vividhāni ca 
paśyemāny aṅga jāyante svāṅgebhyo vṛkṣapuṣpavat  MU
paśyāyaṃ svayam evodyaccandrāṃśubharasundaraḥ 
mūrdhni paṭṭāṃśuko jāto nīhāro 'drāv ivāṅga me  MU
sarvāṇi kāntāliṅgāni jātāni mama mānada 
hā dhik kaṣṭaṃ viṣādo me kiṃ karomy aṅganāsmy aham  MU
hā dhik kaṣṭam aho sādho sthita evāham aṅganā 
saṃvidānubhavāmy antar nitambaṃ jaghanānvitam  MU
vipine kumbha ity uktvā tūṣṇīṃ khinno babhūva ha 
rājāpi ca tam ālokya tathaivāsīd viṣaṇṇadhīḥ  MU
muhūrtamātreṇovāca śikhidhvaja idaṃ vacaḥ 
kaṣṭaṃ so 'yaṃ mahāsattvas sampanno varavarṇinī  MU
sādho viditavedyas tvaṃ jānāsi niyater gatim 
avaśyabhāviny arthe 'smin mā khinnahṛdayo bhava  MU
āpatanti daśās tāta sudhiyāṃ dehamātrake 
na cetasy adhiyāṃ tv etāś cittaṃ yānti sadehakam  MU
kumbhaḥ
evam astv anutiṣṭhāmi yāminīstrītvam ātmanaḥ 
na khedam anugacchāmi niyatiḥ kena laṅghyate  MU
iti nirṇīya tau khedaṃ taṃ nītvā tanutāṃ mithaḥ 
ekatalpe niśāṃ tūṣṇīṃ nītavantau cireṇa tām  MU
atha prabhāte tat svairaṃ vapur utsṛjya yauvatam 
babhūva kumbhaḥ kumbhābhakucaprojjhitamūrtimān  MU
iti sā rājamahiṣī cūḍālā varavarṇinī 
kumbhatvam āsthitā bhartuḥ paścāt strītvam upāgatā  MU
vijahāra vanānteṣu kumārī dharmiṇī niśi 
kumbharūpadharā cāhni bhartrā mitreṇa saṃyutā  MU
kailāsamandarasumerumahendrasahyasānuṣv aviskhalitayogagamāgamā sā 
sārdhaṃ priyeṇa suhṛdā vibhunā yathecchaṃ sragdāmahāravalitā vijahāra nārī  MU
strītvalābho nāma sargaḥ
daśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
tataḥ katipayeṣv eva divaseṣu gateṣu sā 
idaṃ provāca bhartāraṃ kumbharūpadharā satī  MU
rājan rājīvapattrākṣa mamedaṃ vacanaṃ śṛṇu 
niśāyāṃ pratyahaṃ tāvat sthita evāham aṅganā  MU
tad icchāmy aṅganādharmaṃ nipuṇīkartum īdṛśam 
bhartre kasmaicid ātmānaṃ vivāhena dadāmy aham  MU
tad bhavān eva me bhartā rocate bhuvanatraye 
gṛhāṇa māṃ vivāhena bhāryātve niśi sarvadā  MU
ayatnopanataṃ sādho priyeṇa suhṛdā saha 
strīsukhaṃ bhoktum icchāmi mā me vighnakaro bhava  MU
kramapravṛttam ā sṛṣṭes sukhasādhyaṃ manoramam 
prakṛtaṃ kurvataḥ kāryaṃ doṣaḥ ka iva jāyate  MU
icchānicchādṛśor aikyāt samatvāt sarvavastuṣu 
vayaṃ na secchā nānicchāḥ kurvas tenaitad īpsitam  MU
śikhidhvajaḥ
kṛtenānena kāryeṇa na śubhaṃ nāśubhaṃ sakhe 
paśyāmi tan mahābuddhe yathecchasi tathā kuru  MU
samatāṃ samprayātena cetasedaṃ jagattrayam 
kharūpam eva paśyāmi yathecchasi tathācara  MU
kumbhaḥ
yady evaṃ tan mahīpāla lagnam adyaiva śobhanam 
rākeyaṃ śrāvaṇasyāsya hyas sarvaṃ gaṇitaṃ mayā  MU
rātrāv adyodite candre paripūrṇakalāmale 
janyatraṃ nau mahābāho dvayor eva bhaviṣyati  MU
mahendrādriśiraśśṛṅgasānāv asmin manorame 
ratnadīpaprakāśāḍhyamaṇimandiramaṇḍite  MU
puṣpabhārānatottuṅgavṛkṣajanyavirājite 
vanapuṣpalatālāsyanārīnṛttamanohare  MU
niśi vyomagatās tārā bhartrā pūrṇendunā saha 
āvayoḥ paripaśyantu karṇāntāgatalocanāḥ  MU
uttiṣṭhātmavivāhārthaṃ kurvaḥ kānanakoṭarāt 
rājaṃś candanapuṣpādisambhāraṃ ratnasaṃyutam  MU
ity uktvā kumbha utthāya saha tena mahībhṛtā 
kusumāvacayaṃ cakre tathā ratnādisañcayam  MU
tato muhūrtamātreṇa ratnasānau same śubhe 
samālambhanapuṣpāḍhyās tābhyāṃ vai rāśayaḥ kṛtāḥ  MU
hārāmbaramaṇīndrādirāśayas te virejire 
saubhāgyasyeva kāmena kośāḥ kālena sambhṛtāḥ  MU
tathā janyatrasambhāraṃ kṛtvā kāñcanakandare 
yayatus tau mahāmitre snātuṃ mandākinīṃ nadīm  MU
tatrainaṃ snapayām āsa mahārājam athādarāt 
gajakumbhopamaskandhaṃ kumbho maṅgalapūrvakam  MU
bhaviṣyadvanitārūpāṃ bhaviṣyatpatitāṃ gataḥ 
cūḍālāṃ snapayām āsa kumbharūpadharāṃ priyām  MU
pūjayām āsatus snātau tatra devān pitṝn munīn 
yathā kriyāphale 'nicchau kriyātyāge tathaiva tau  MU
nityaṃ jñānarasātṛptau vyavasthārthaṃ jagatsthiteḥ 
cakrāte bhojanaṃ bhavyau tāv anyo'nyasamīritau  MU
kalpavṛkṣadugūlāni paridhāya sitāni tau 
phalāni bhuktvā janyatrasthānam āyayatuḥ kramāt  MU
etāvatātra kālena tayor janyatrasotkayoḥ 
priyaṃ kartum ivāstādrau jhagity evāviśad raviḥ  MU
atha sandhyākrame vṛtte kṛte japyāghamarṣaṇe 
vivāhadarśanāyeva tārājāle kham āgate  MU
mithunaikasakhī yāmā kumudotkarahāsinī 
prāleyajālaprakaraṃ vikirantī samāyayau  MU
ratnadīpān bahūn samyak kumbhas sānāv ayojayat 
jyotīṃṣīndvarkayuktāni padmodbhava ivāmbarāt  MU
bhūṣayām āsa rājānaṃ strītvaṃ gacchan niśāmukhe 
candanāgurukarpūrapūrair mṛgajakuṅkumaiḥ  MU
hārakeyūrakaṭakais tathā kalpalatāṃśukaiḥ 
sragdāmair avataṃsaiś ca mālyaiś ca vividhombhitaiḥ  MU
tathā kalpalatāgucchair mandāraiḥ pārijātakaiḥ 
santānair bahuratnaiś ca maulinā cendurūpiṇā  MU
etāvatātha kālena vadhūtvaṃ kumbha āyayau 
ghanastanataṭākrānto babhūvāśu vilāsavān  MU
idaṃ sañcintayām āsa sampanno 'yam ahaṃ vadhūḥ 
kāmāyātmā mayādeyaḥ kāryaṃ kālocitaṃ kila  MU
iyam asmi vadhūḥ kāntā bhartāyaṃ me puras sthitaḥ 
gṛhāṇa kāma mām ehi kālo 'yaṃ tava hṛcchaya  MU
iti sañcintya bhartāram agrastham abhimaṇḍitam 
udayantam ivādityaṃ ratiḥ kāmam ivāha sā  MU
ahaṃ madanikā nāma bhāryāsmi tava mānada 
pataye te praṇāmo 'yaṃ sasnehaṃ kriyate mayā  MU
ity uktvā sānavadyāṅgī lajjāvanamitānanā 
lolālakena śirasā praṇanāma nayāt patim  MU
uvācedaṃ ca he nātha tvaṃ māṃ bhūṣaya bhūṣaṇaiḥ 
krameṇāgniṃ ca sañjvālya matpāṇigrahaṇaṃ kuru  MU
rājase 'titarāṃ nātha māṃ karoṣi smarāturām 
rater vivāhe madanam abhibhūyādhitiṣṭhasi  MU
indor ivāṃśujālāni rājan mālyāni bhānti te 
merugaṅgāpravāhābhāṃ dhatte hāras tavorasi  MU
mandārakusumaprotaiḥ kuntalair nṛpa rājase 
kanakābjam ivālolair bhṛṅgaiḥ kesaradhūsaraiḥ  MU
ratnāṃśujālaiḥ kusumaiś śriyā sthairyeṇa tejasā 
unnatyā ca vibho merum abhibhūyāvatiṣṭhase  MU
evamādi vadantau tau bhaviṣyannavadampatī 
pracchannapūrvadāmpatyau mithas tuṣṭau babhūvatuḥ  MU
mahārājñīṃ madanikāṃ mahārājaś śikhidhvajaḥ 
kāñcanāmalaparyaṅke niyojyābhūṣayat svayam  MU
avataṃsais tathā mālyair maṇimuktāvibhūṣaṇaiḥ 
vastrair vilepanaiḥ puṣpair ucitasthānayojitaiḥ  MU
sā babhau bhūṣitā tanvī madanī madadāyinī 
girijeva vivāhotkā kāmakānteva kāminī  MU
mahārājo mahārājñīṃ bhūṣayitvedam āha tām 
rājase mṛgaśāvākṣi lakṣmīr iva navotthitā  MU
śakreṇa saha yac chacyā yal lakṣmyā hariṇā saha 
yad gauryāś śambhunā sārdhaṃ tat te bhavatu maṅgalam  MU
padmakandāṅkuraradā lolanīlotpalekṣaṇā 
āmodasubhagākārā tvaṃ sthitā padminīsamā  MU
suraktapallavakarā stabakastanadhāriṇī 
tvam eva phaladā manye kāmakalpataror latā  MU
himaśītāvadātāṅgī jyotsnāprasarahāsinī 
pūrṇenduśrīr ivodyuktā dṛṣṭaivāhlādayasy alam  MU
tad uttiṣṭha varārohe vedīṃ vaivāhikīṃ svayam 
ratnapuṣpalatājālai racayāvo yathākramam  MU
ity uktvā dampatī kāntau racayām āsatus tadā 
vedīm ātmavivāhāya mahendramaṇikandare  MU
muktājālais sajhāṅkāraiḥ puṣpottaṃsais saṣaṭpadaiḥ 
ratnamālyais saṭāṅkārair vaijayantīpaṭaiś calaiḥ  MU
kalpavṛkṣalatāsūtraiḥ kalpastabakamaṇḍalaiḥ 
kalpapādapapaṭṭaiś ca kalpadrumaphalotkaraiḥ  MU
devadārulatājālaiḥ kāṇḍapratisarāṅkitaiḥ 
muktākusumalājānāṃ prakarais tārakopamaiḥ  MU
caturdikkaṃ caturbhiś ca nārikelamahāphalaiḥ 
pūrṇakumbhatayā gāṅgavāripūraiḥ prakalpitaiḥ  MU
jvalayām āsatus tasyāṃ madhye candanadārubhiḥ 
jvalanaṃ jvalitajvālaṃ dakṣiṇasthapradakṣiṇam  MU
pūrvābhimukham agnes tāv agre pallavaviṣṭare 
niyojya dampatī kāntau tayor viviśatus svayam  MU
sa hutvā tilalājādi pāvakāya śikhidhvajaḥ 
utthāyotthāpya kāntāṃ ca pāṇibhyāṃ svayam ādade  MU
anyo'nyaṃ śobhamānau tāv anyāv iva navau śivau 
cakratur dampatī tasya pāvakasya pradakṣiṇam  MU
svadāyaṃ jñānasarvasvaṃ hṛdayaṃ prema cācalam 
dadatus tau mitho mānyau smitakāntamukhaśriyau  MU
pradakṣiṇatrayaṃ kṛtvā lājān santyajya vahnaye 
madbhāryām ambarād dṛṣṭvā karau tatyajatuḥ kramāt  MU
smayamānamukhau kāntau candrāv iva navoditau 
pūrvoparacite puṣpatalpe viviśatur nave  MU
etasminn antare candraś caturbhāgaṃ nabhastalāt 
śanair ākramayām āsa śobhāṃ draṣṭum ivaitayoḥ  MU
tasmin sānau latācchidrair draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭīr ivābhitaḥ 
lolais sañcārayām āsa karān indur varāṅgane  MU
tais tais tatra kathālāpair indāv abhyudite tathā 
tāv āsāṃ cakratuḥ kāntau dampatī tu muhūrtakam  MU
athotthāya jvaladratnadīpāṃ kāñcanakandarām 
svayaṃ pūrvoparacitāṃ guptāṃ viviśatuḥ priyau  MU
navaṃ dadṛśatus tatra talpaṃ kusumakalpitam 
parito vyāptam utphullair hemapaṅkajarāśibhiḥ  MU
mandārādibhir anyaiś ca puṣpair mlānivivarjitaiḥ 
uccakaiḥ puṃpramāṇena nirmitaṃ kusumais samaiḥ  MU
dīrghendubimbapratimaṃ tuṣārasthalaśītalam 
kṣīrodajaladhārābhaṃ jyotsnāsampiṇḍapāṇḍuram  MU
pratibimbam anantasya ratnabhittāv iva sthitam 
sugandham unnataṃ kāntaṃ viśarārutayojjhitam  MU
mithunaṃ puṣparāśau tat papāta dhavalāmale 
tasmin samasamābhoge kṣīrode mandaro yathā  MU
tais tais tataḥ praṇatipeśalavāgvilāsais tatkālakāryasubhagaiḥ praṇayopacāraiḥ 
satkāntayor navanavena tayos sukhena dīrghā muhūrta iva sā rajanī jagāma  MU
līlāvivāho nāma sargaḥ
ekādaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ
atha sūryāṃśuraṅgeṇa rañjite bhuvanodare 
śikhidhvajāṅganā bhūyo madanī kumbhatāṃ yayau  MU
evaṃ mahendradaryāṃ tāv ubhau kumbhaśikhidhvajau 
svayaṃ vivāhitāv iṣṭau sampannau navadampatī  MU
vilesatur vicitrāsu pratyahaṃ vanarājiṣu 
prapakvaphalabhārāsu puṣpapallavinīṣu ca  MU
divā priyatare mitre yāminyām iṣṭadampatī 
prabhādīpāv iva śliṣṭau na viyuktau babhūvatuḥ  MU
remāte vanakuñjeṣu guhāsu ca mahībhṛtām 
tamālasālaṣaṇḍeṣu mandāragahaneṣu ca  MU
sahyadardurakailāsamahendramalayeṣu ca 
gandhamādanavindhyādrilokālokataṭeṣu ca  MU
